Review Title: A well equipped gym, lacked cleaning facilities
Review: a well equipped gym and only noticed one machine out of order. disappointed with the lack of blue towel and sanitizer spray for customers to use once they have finished with equipment. and notices asking customers to do so as a matter of respect for other users

overall a good experience. its still too cramped compared with the old redditch gym, but numbers seem to be reducing a little so equipment is a little more readily available. the changing rooms are far too small though (take a look at sunderland pure gym for comparison). one jewel in the crown is mark fisher. this guys classes are "insane" (in the nicest possible way!). book his classes early to avoid disappointment.

excellent gym, friendly environment, plenty of choice of equipment and space to do your exercise. personal trainers at hand. excellent opening hours, basically you can go whenever you want üôå can get busy at times, but you can always get on something. classes are also very good

Review Title: I'm going to be so fit
Review: havnt been a gym member for 20 years but this is state of the art, brand new with friendly staff and at really good competitive monthly price

i have been training with chloe lawrence at pure gym for 4 months now, soon to finish my 5th month. she is incredible. she pushes you to your absolute maximum without being aggressive or intimidating. she is so inspiring, and i feel amazing coaching with her and i have noticed such a difference in my strength, mood, sleep and health. coaching with her has also helped me create a good schedule with exercising, she has made me confident enough to go in and do things on my own that i never would have done before. chloe is so informative with nutrition and the biology behind exercise as well so i really feel like i have learned so much in this time. in general chloe is a lovely person and makes such an effort to keep you a priority and you really do feel like you have someone in your corner and on your team during this journey. can‚Äôt recommend her highly enough!

Review Title: Every time is a beautiful challenge‚Ä¶
Review: every time is a beautiful challenge working with dominic.i do love his classes ,the music,the vibe... everything. thank you dominic,even if sometimes i feel tired,you build me up with your positivity, and everything seems easier throughout your workout even if is very challenging sometimes ü§£ü§£. again thank youuuuu.

i like the gym and the equipment but please can you get the clock to work in the class, it‚Äôs a quick fix by changing the battery! also i wish there were pegs at the back of the toilet doors to hang things .

Review Title: Great gym and well maintained equipment
Review: great gym, the kit is excellent and well maintained and theres a nice friendly atmosphere.  however, i wish theyd enforce their rule of not leaving padlocks on lockers, there has been a green padlock on a locker near the entrance for at least a month. also, theres been several mentions on trustpilot of a feedback box but it is nowhere to be seen.

good equipment. friendly atmosphere.  the only thing i find annoying is the amount of people using cameras and tripods.  they are situated in a position where they‚Äôre filming other members of the gym which isn‚Äôt acceptable.  if you‚Äôre filming for personal use or your social media you should be asking permission from other members.

Review Title: Puregym longbridge is a great place to‚Ä¶
Review: puregym longbridge is a great place to have a great work out and the staff are all amazing .. the pt‚Ä¶ sam, charlotte , jack and whoever i have missed all beautiful staff u can have a laugh and they are so helpful and u just feel safe around  and the managers sam and dave amazing managers so helpful and understanding and gym is spotless .. and sam thankyou for being so so kind to let the guy from the outside use the toilet .. as he told me he was poorly getting over cancer .. you were so helpful and kind to him amazing customer service and i have noticed that u and dave always helpful and always cleaning .. thank you my amazing gym family love it üòä

historically the upkeep of the machines/facilities has been slow but ok. in the last 2-3 months the mens showers have been lukewarm at best. i know other members have noticed this.  paying a membership every month for a cold shower is not good enough.  let me worry about my carbon footprint. if the cost has gone up increases the membership fee.

i love puregym, and if things were different, id give a 5, but the lack of any staff to help really does drag down the standard. i had a payment issue last month, which the app had no help available so in turn, i had to cancel my account and get a new account. its stupid, and doesnt need to be that rigid. all of last month, i couldnt use yanga water, and just had a rubbish time overall. all over an app not letting me change things in my account. peoples lives have obstacles yet puregym doesnt move like many other companies that adapt. apart from that, love the gym i go to. i can use many other gyms across the country which is great too.

Review Title: Not worth the end of deal price
Review: the close proximity to my home is my biggest like about this gym. besides that, the gym, for the price they are charging is not worth it. it‚Äôs small. is lacking in the equipment department. after only a few weeks of opening, it has now been closed until further notice due to maintenance. this is appalling. not everyone wants to travel to other locations and have chosen this location for the convenience that is now being taken from them. communication with staff is poor, handling customers possession without permission. the space is not utilised effectively, making the gym smaller than it needs to be. for such a price, a lot more equipment is needed to make my workouts work while and the money. staff look like they do not have a clue. and if i want to invite a buddy the system for me to do so if terrible as i have to delete the first buddy, wait for hours before i can then invite someone else

this review is about classes only as it to attend them that i joined the gym. the classes are often cancelled last minute, if at all. it happened regularly that i just showed up and the class was cancelled even though it was booked. the quality of the classes, when they happen, is good, but this management issue made me leave this gym and the group after only a few months. regarding the reply, this should be investigated internally and not me to chase. i emailed when i first had the issue and was told i had to go and see the manager at the gym. no contact given and i have never found him.

the personal trainers at puregym stretford are all friendly and welcoming. the most talented pt unfortunately has left now. you need to bring back leah, shes awesome and i think lots of people miss her. she has the best spin and step class. great gym for women and great classes run by experienced pts.

the spin classes are simply fantastic.  marshall/omar/inno/jose/alessio are the reason why i remain consistent and committed.  they always make you feel like you have achieved more than you couldve imagined.  i highly recommend puregym bermondsey.  the management is very helpful and kind and even in the midst of all complaints they go above and beyond to provide everyone a memorable experience.  i couldnt do this fitness journey without the amazing team in bermondsey. absolutely fantastic.

joined my local puregym when the zero joining fee was on except my local gym was exempt from it and i was charged ¬£15 joining fee. was ready to train over the festive period but i cant do that as my local puregym is closed through out the festive period due to staff shortage... a company thay adverises itself as 24/7 365 days access yet i can not access it when i want because its closed. makes no sence having a policy in place if managers just abuse it. futher more my conversion with the manager team should have stayed between us, our conversion transcript shouldnt have been shared with the staff.

Review Title: Absolute lack of respect with its customers!!!!!
Review: almost a week with the gym shut and we still haven‚Äôt received a single email with an update on how to proceed. i can‚Äôt go to any other gyms like (finsbury park) being the nearest one - hence why i joined my local in seven sisters and not the other ones. i have to keep coming to check if the gym is re-opened every day because they have absolutely no commitment in keeping us in the loop. there‚Äôs no maintenance being carried out to try to solve the problem. it‚Äôs making me think that all this was a catch the ¬£16.99 for the first 6 months offer - and they want us to cancel our membership which has now gone up to ¬£24.99 a month.
i was greeted with a smile from the staff and some customers who are regularly in attendance. the equipment is very well maintained and very clean.

Review Title: Thank  to  staff   make  up  healthy
Review: pure  gym    fabulous    way   to  fitness  great  energy   health  well  equip  gym   every   way to  exercises   t r x  band .....equipment   best  ranges we so  value  good  value  knowledge   from  staff   team   teamwork     is  the  dreamwork  u al stars  i had  serous    ill  ness  baby step  to rehab   and   regainconfidences  body  tone  at 66 vital    to  keep  muscle   growth   bone  density    confidences  towell  done   good  value  expert  skill  knowledge   in pure gymwe adore   love  fitness   fun

Review Title: Basic equipment and layout good showers‚Ä¶
Review: basic equipment and layout good showers and easy access . if you want an easy gym with simple machines and weights then this place is for you and its cheap.
dirty. almost never any cleaning equipment. staff don‚Äôt enforce use of towels. benches full of sweat and hair gel. no handwash in toilets. urine and excrement on toilets all the time.

i first got in touch with sanna for pt sessions at pure gym in february this year and have been working with her ever since. i wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude for her dedication and guidance in helping me achieve my fitness goals. i have lost over to 2 stones and my health physically and mentally has improved in so many ways. i just wanted to say her knowledge and expertise have been invaluable to me in this journey, and i appreciate her willingness to tailor workouts to meet my individual needs and abilities. she definitely an asset to pure gym and anyone looking to achieve any fitness goals should get in contact with her.

the best pure ive been to in terms of staff, friendliness and quality of kit. loses a star for size and business. needs to expand considering how many people it serves and the money spent on membership for this gym.

callum is one of the most single handedly nice guys ive ever had as a pt. the bloke genuinely cares and pushes you to an excellent level. ive previously had experiences with trainers who havent necessarily been on the ball in terms of a client/coach relationship and this isnt the case at all with him. props to you dude, top coach so far - give him a good boy sticker pure gym.  also a big thanks to marcy (female manager) who handled a personal situation in the gym amazingly and made me feel comfortable returning to the gym after the incident.

Review Title: I don't recommend this gym at all
Review: i dont recommend this gym at all, there a time the boilers was broken down and they still had it open! no staff never to be seen in this gym! equipment out dated yet they want to be charging ¬£22.99 as if they are a flag ship gym in central london! its a standard gym nothing special can see the management have no interest in the standards of this gym and it definitely not being managed well.

Review Title: Booked on a temporary pass while on‚Ä¶
Review: booked on a temporary pass while on holiday. great price and will definitely use again. very easy access, car park nearby, clean and bright, good equipment and good atmosphere.

Review Title: Showers barely Luke warm again and have‚Ä¶
Review: showers barely luke warm again and have been for several months now, i know you turn the temperature down to try to save on costs but ffs it‚Äôs cold outside and a nice hot shower after a workout would be enjoyable   these are hardly slight changes to the water temperature they are big changes and it‚Äôs unacceptable to expect people to take cold showers

Review Title: I joined this gym under recommendation‚Ä¶
Review: i joined this gym under recommendation from a friend who had lost a lot of weight and reached her target with the help of a personal trainer sanaa. straight from the beginning i felt at ease and comfortable and wasnt worried at all as i have some social anxiety. pt sessions were just as i needed and it was definitely working its treat for my weightloss goals. any ladies out there if you need a female pt please do not shy away from getting ask for sanaa when joining this gym.

overpriced. its a new gym and very clean but very small. there is a changing area upstairs shared between everybody. there are about 20 small lockers at the most and some shelves to put stuff on but you cant lock it. to change you either need to use toilets or changing cubicles like in shops. there are only 2 cross trainers and about 6 treadmills. also the gym got closed due to facilities issues and there isnt any update on when it will reopen so waste of time and money.

Review Title: They‚Äôre a solid and friendly club and I‚Ä¶
Review: they‚Äôre a solid and friendly club and i can only imagine how much they have to control their costs to keep their overheads manageable.  for an online company they have a solid communications architecture so the fact that you can‚Äôt call them is forgivable as their email correspondence is very good.

(basford) it is a decent gym experience but the machines are clearly very old. it feels cluttered and cramped because of the amount of people. the worst thing by far is the scam that is the resubmission fee. and what makes it worse is that they make it impossible to freeze your account and sort things out. the customer service is hard to get in touch with, making things even more complicated. i would definitely advise people to pick another gym.

Review Title: Great gym and great staff members
Review: great gym and great staff members. i have came early to the gym twice outside of my off-peak hours since i made a mistake with what hours i should be allowed but the staff still let me in and had informed me of what hours im allowed. i plan on upgrading my membership but will have to wait until the 15th of decembers.  theres a lot of equipments to use and a wide variety of classes that i would like to take part in at some point.
the classes are brilliant and staff are friendly and love the  way the managers run the gym the way it should be and rewarded for their standards

Review Title: Tony Hilton. The Ultimate Guru in training and fitness
Review: brilliant, brilliant, brilliant work out with this trainer mr tony hilton. he is a great motivator and total inspiration. takes time to engage with every member of the class individually. i thoroughly recommend him. plus he gave me a great personal training package suited to my finances. but his classes are free with the pure bayswater gym membership. ive tried all of his classes from bootcamp to metcon and legs, bums and tums. every class was top notch and mr hilton is  a truly knowledgeable fitness guru and you can tell he lives breathes and eats his work.

puregym -st george‚Äôs (leicester). been a member for almost 6 years. this location, overtime, has declined significantly. many equipment are out of order for a prolonged period of time and the yanga water not available for almost 2 weeks. spoken to staff at the gym and helpdesk. as a paying member it‚Äôs not good value for money!

always something broke in this gym it‚Äôs usually equipment or the toilets doesn‚Äôt seem like there‚Äôs any urgency to have it fixed. this week the whole gym has now been closed for 4 days due to flooding of the toilets.  if you walk in on a rainy day expect to have to walk under a water fall then a paddle through the wet carpet  cleaning isn‚Äôt amazing and equipment can be a bit nasty  use the toilet before you go in as they are usually broke or in a nasty condition - 2 mens cubicles isn‚Äôt really enough especially when one is normally out of order most weeks  don‚Äôt leave anything valuable in your locker - mine was broken into even with a padlock and my jacket stolen and the pt couldn‚Äôt of been less interested when i made them aware  it‚Äôs a big gym with lots of potential but parts of it are always broken.  i‚Äôve given it a 3 for the price and size of the gym ‚Ä¶ could be a easy 5 if they worked on the same occurring issues.

Review Title: One of the better pure gyms I've been‚Ä¶
Review: one of the better pure gyms ive been too, rarely crowded even at the busiest of times! additionally has the necessary equipment.

Review Title: Helpfull from everything and thanks for‚Ä¶
Review: helpfull from everything and thanks for everyone help me to know all the information ‚ù§Ô∏è

safe and friendly atmosphere. staff are always friendly, knowledgeable and happy to help. personal trainers are amazing - especially ollie m. as a female, i always feel comfortable and never feel intimidated. recommend to everyone ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

regarding my previous review.  i have raised with the gym, i have raised in feedback i have raising the issues with this forum to get them resolved. nothing is resolved!  this forum along with every other channel of feedback is pure gym. you are the same company. the comment still stands and need resolving. please send them on to the gym manager instead of asking me. you‚Äôre the same company ??????????

Review Title: A really excellent gym and great vfm.
Review: i joined today, the process was really easy on line and the app works easily to let you in and out of the premises and you can even view how busy it is. you get two hours free parking and there is a ticket validator inside the gym.the gym is large, clean and very well equipped.  there is a wide variety of machines and free weights to suit all tastes plus an exercise floor and a large room for classes.  the mens changing room was clean and had showers and plenty of lockers (bring your own padlock).i was there at about 1130 am and the atmosphere was excellent, no egos, with people just getting on with their workouts.  i met one member of staff and he was really friendly.  this is a really great gym and the price is incredible value for money.i really enjoyed my first session at telford and im looking forward to the next one.

considering there is no contact centre for this gym, the response time and efficiency of the staff who manage the email communication channel is remarkable. i always get whay i need first time! the only thing i will point out is in the gym, i have noticed a number of pieces of gym equipment out of service. it puts me off going to the gym as this is much smaller than my last gym. it would be good to get these operational more quickly.

Review Title: Needs a clean and membership review.
Review: the gym itself it‚Äôs alright, there‚Äôs a good range of equipment to use and different designated spaces to train away from the equipment.  the 24/7 is a bonus to avoid peak times.  price is reasonable.  the same positives can‚Äôt be said about some of the members there clearly not 16+ or just treat the place like an afterschool club. in the evenings, the place is an absolute mess with empty bottles and cans just left on the floors. there doesn‚Äôt seem to be any cleaning facilities for members to use either - i appreciate the behaviour of the members isn‚Äôt directly pure gyms fault however a lot more to could be done to manage the kids and cleanliness‚Ä¶ there clearly isn‚Äôt the respect for the environment from all members.  the changing rooms, showers and toilets need a real deep clean. the mens showers and toilets are absolutely rancid and smell of stagnant water and half the locker doors are broken. this could easily be managed by just leaving a bathroom spray cleaner on the wall in the shower so those who want to spray down the shower with some cleaning fluid before and after the shower can do.

Review Title: Recently join this gym near to where I‚Ä¶
Review: recently join this gym near to where i work. struck gold! the people are great, so enthusiastic and helpful and the classes are perfect to help keep me in shape! thanks team of st paul‚Äôs pure gym.

Review Title: I‚Äôd like to share two reviews
Review: i‚Äôd like to share two separate reviews. one, for my latest pt, cam, who has been guiding me in a 4 weeks programme of specially built for me. not only he‚Äôs defined the right exercises, he‚Äôs challenged me to improve and build on my achievements. can is such a kind person, easy to talk to, flexible with my lack of practice and always careful with me. i‚Äôve learned a lot of new exercises and managed to improve my confidence in using different equipments. highly recommend cam! thanks a lot! second, regarding the equipment in the gym, can someone please check and speed up fixing what‚Äôs broken! i really like the gym, being cosy and friendly. staff is lovely!

Review Title: It's a good place to go workout clean‚Ä¶
Review: its a good place to go workout clean all round nice staff there to help with whatever you want or need made some friends

Review Title: I enjoy using PurGym I do however wish‚Ä¶
Review: i enjoy using purgym i do however wish the keyboard could be made bigger .

sanna is an amazing pt, she is very knowledgeable, patient and caring. i have thoroughly enjoyed my sessions with her and have definitely learnt a lot. would always recommend her and this gym- the ladies only section is large with plenty of equipment and workout areas.
i joined up yesterday,the gym is clean & friendly, the mangers & the personal trainers are helpful & knowledgeable, i am glad i am joined up,  this gym is for newbies & the hardcore people

Review Title: Always clean and accessible staff are‚Ä¶
Review: always clean and accessible staff are on hand to give advice and assistance.

not the best: first impression was how dark it is inside, there are no windows and barely any mirrors. 3 workouts here to date: it is generally clean but compared with other puregyms the equipment lacks diversity and the layout of machines seems odd. ive often seen people queuing for machines so be prepared to "freestyle" your workout due to lack of equipment. ive added this gym on as my secondary gym but personally its not worth the extra ¬£4 p/m. may suit some, but for me its dark and uninspiring.

bodytone, metcon, spin, circuits, & sweat 30 - ellen, craig, beth (to name but a few!)  great classes, enthusiastic instructors. new refurb looks great too - love the functional area and studio looks fab. thank you :)

horrible customer service and sneaky terms of conditions. took ¬£50 out of my account and refused to refund even though i had cancelled the membership and not used it. ¬£20 of administration fees is absurd for such a shabby and cheap gym. always missing equipment such as clamps and bars. dumbbells always in wrong places. accessibility to customer support is difficult to find and even when found you are answers by an ai which didn‚Äôt even understand what you are asking. just another greedy company i would not recommend.

been to many gyms and this has got to be one of the better ones. loads of equipment and never had to wait to use anything! only thing i have dropped a star for is the use of cleaning materials, more could be available..
love this gym, i‚Äôve been to a few in my life and this is the best. friendly and knowledgeable staff, clean change rooms and equipment. always made to feel welcome.

when i first joined the gym i was so nervous,hesitant and totally out of my comfort zone. i didnt know how to use any of the equipment except one or 2 machines. thats when i decided to start pt sessions with sanaa. she taught me alot and i gained alot of confidence and was in a much better shape and form after training with her so thank you sanaa.

Review Title: I am so glad that I joined Pure Gym as‚Ä¶
Review: i am so glad that i joined pure gym as i was so nervous and did not know where to start but then i booked sanaa for my pt sessions and have never looked back! each session is well planned and prepared to push you a little further towards your goal. shes amazing at what she does and has great knowledge on how to use the equipment properly. she doesnt just tell you to do an exercise but explains and ensures you know exactly how to get the best out of a workout. she also goes beyond by giving you tips on healthy eating. thankyou for everything.

ive been a customer here for over a year now, and the gym is pretty good, well equipped and does the job. my main review is for the pts who lead the sessions - either theyre not trained or shouldnt be supported to run classes. sessions where the trainer is 1) underprepared to lead (not knowing what exercises come next), 2) demotivated (barely engaging with customers / going on phones), and 3) not being attentive to attendees (playing random music / not speaking) should not be paid for. im sure that theyre great people and i realise that this isnt a luxury gym experience - but these are some bare minimum things that have gone unchanged for the better part of a year. please do better, puregym!

Review Title: I wasn't going to write a review until‚Ä¶
Review: i wasnt going to write a review until i saw the clearly fake 4 & 5 star reviews below.  this gym is by far the busiest ive ever witnessed (like unsafe busy). you will queue for nearly all machines and someone will then be waiting for you to finish. your workout will be defined by what equipment is available.  side note: why do so many young teenagers hangout here socialising in groups? they dont even exercise.  anyone willing to open an alternative low-cost franchise gym in leamington spa or warrick would make bank.

southport gym‚Ä¶ i have always been someone who has been a bit terrified of the gym and haven‚Äôt been to one for years! everyone is lovely and welcoming, ready to help you if you need it. it‚Äôs helped me to feel more confident in the gym, especially knowing i can ask for help if i ever need it. absolutely nothing intimidating about the place and i really don‚Äôt know why i was worried!
great gym, friendly environment, staff are very helpful and there‚Äôs a lot of equipment available.

Review Title: Booked Absolute Abs class from 1845 to‚Ä¶
Review: booked absolute abs class from 1845 to 1915 on 13th dec 2023 , its gone past time and no instructor was present ,  when i went and enquired - i was told that class was cancelled. 100% unprofessional. this is at puregym dudley!

enjoy using this branch of puregym and i understand that youre trying to keep your overheads down etc. but the temperature of the showers is really not good at all. it may be fine for most members, but if youre like myself and have painful arthritic hands and back, they are unbelievably unpleasant to use, due to the lower temperature. not everyone can go shower at home and they should be useable by all members.

i was so excited about this gym but its not worth the value. new, nicely built, unfortunately very overpriced gym. we appreciate the welcome price but thats the catch! final basic price: ¬£32.99 !  the constructed layout is small, expected much bigger space for the price. too much wasted space and unorganised positions for the machines. missing 1-10kg dumbbell set by the free weight. missing some key machines: biceps curl, triceps press, lat pulldown, lateral raise, calf press, hack squat and very low amount of cardio machines for this price. good amount of cable crossovers, good amount of functional stuff, 3 deadlift rack which could have been 6 if you move it and use the back side too...  ive been to some puregyms which are cheaper and bigger in the area - dont understand why this one is so high priced. maybe the 24/7 access, but thats not compensating the issues i just mentioned.  i really hope you consider and act on my advise. lower the price or add more stuff!

Review Title: I'm in my own little world here
Review: im in my own little world here, surrounded by wonderful people and i even feel im making progress lol. i recommend anyone and everyone to give it a go

long term member. 24hr gym, my daughter went to gym before work arrived at 5:15am left at 5:47am and got a ¬£100 parking ticket. the car park is open, no barriers etc, and is used for puregym, homebase and mcdonalds. and for some reason looking at the small print that you can not see in the dark says no parking between 00.30 & 5:30am. there is no reason to have those restrictions in that car park apart from making money from people who use the gym in those hours. purgym should make it clear on the website no parking available between hours stated above.

Review Title: not suitable for a white working class‚Ä¶.racist undertones unwelcoming for white males ,SAD FACTS not opinions
Review: not suitable for a white working class male to enter, was virtually marched out by management ridiculed and abused ,h.r said sorry and offered me ¬£ 10 pound discount shameful place my ethnicity was not welcome ...sad sad place for a silver medalist gracie jujitsu fighter.terrible experience would not advise any white person to enter here .if you do you will feel the facts.  shameful place as other pure gyms are excellent and welcoming and professional.....this is not suitable for white people .simple.

Review Title: Had a great Box Fit class with Kyle
Review: had a great box fit class with kyle.  really encouraging and a well thought out group of exercises. definitely be back to his classes when i can attend.

Review Title: I had an amazing experience in Burnham
Review: i had an amazing experience with jelenas pump class! jelenas energy and enthusiasm are contagious, making each session not just a workout, but a fun and empowering experience. her personalized approach and clear instruction helped me push my limits. i highly recommend her pump class for anyone looking to challenge themselves and enjoy a dynamic workout with a fantastic trainer!
hadn‚Äôt had an email with my pin so tried emailing with no luck however messaged on the socials and they were super friendly and my pin was sent to me right away

i feel totally scammed by puregym, i‚Äôve just had an accident and can‚Äôt do workouts for a month. i remember my bill date was on mid-december, i rushed to freeze my membership but turns out that you need to do it around 4 days earlier, so need to pay this month as usual and next with the freeze price, what doesn‚Äôt help. i got so annoyed that tried to cancel my membership for good but they don‚Äôt even allow you to do it till your bill date has passed by some days so they can make sure you can‚Äôt claim it back through your bank. i can‚Äôt believe they trick the app this way so you can‚Äôt basically do anything when all subscriptions nowadays allow you to even cancel the day before of your bill date. they got my money for this month but it will be the last, there‚Äôre more gyms in the area that are about same prices and not that crowded and probably not that dirty.. you will never see any cleaning around. also it‚Äôs bloody cold in there, try to have a shower in winter time there..
very helpful introduction from andy. good, clean environment. seems to be well set up.

a bit on a small side same changing rooms for male and female? big no for me! only 20 or so lockers and half of them are already taken by people who keep their stuff over the night. pls do not do that, take your gym bag with you when u leaving and free the lockers! some equipment still missing , not so many machines‚Ä¶. no cleaning stations no sanitising sprays to clean sweaty benches /equipment. it is really uncomfortable and makes you feel bad when you have to use dirty bench covered in sweat. and when gym is closed due to unforeseen circumstances should we not get an email for how long or when will it be reopen? comparing to other pure gyms this one not doing that well..
local, cheap, great gym, new equipment, staff are fabulous, manager fantastic.

just joined this new gym and been there twice. staff are very welcoming, friendly and supportive. the actual place is really nice, they have a separate spacious room for classes. something that i would improve is: more small weights (there‚Äôs only 2sets of 5kg) and more mirrors üòÇ.

puregym elgin grand opening 1st december- long awaited.  a few months ago i received a flyer in the post about joining a new gym in elgin and also via my vitality life insurance i noticed discounts so i took the plunge to join. i turned up on sunday after lunch to avoid the masses and i must admit i was surprised. a very welcoming floor manager open to questions greeted me at the door and i had a look on what was available. different zones like cardio, strength conditioning and a floor space for classes. facilities seemed very accommodating and accessible for people with additional needs.  it‚Äôs open 24rs a day which will suit people that perhaps are shift workers or work outside normal 9-5 work. overall a good experience on a quiet sunday. perhaps peak times are more challenging. overall‚Ä¶first impression is good.  price - very good at just ¬£16 month via vitality and i can take a guest 4x per month. parking - ample amount of ‚Äú free ‚Äú parking. staff - friendly, approachable and helpful. w/c shower facilities- ample and comfortable. cleanliness- top ‚Ä¶ can‚Äôt complain.  negative- didn‚Äôt see a cleaning station to clean down machines after use . suggest bringing own cleaning supplies.
the price for the access to the gym especially the 24-hour one is quite reasonable compared to other gyms that ive inquired u
i go occasionally as a guest.  lot of the equipment is suited to me.  i like the ski bit thats different.  cool room is good for winding down where theres no pressure.
puregym stafford is fab love it! only complaint is the yanga machine isn‚Äôt working and i have paid for as a bolt on. other than that, friendly and great workout environment

Review Title: the gym & class offer is basic
Review: the staff are lovely. but, the gym itself is very basic and the offer of classes is very thin on the ground. one of pure gyms biggest selling points is the ‚Äòover 50 free classes‚Äô line which features outside the gym along the wall. yet there are maybe 5 or 6 classes a day at most. the classes that are always full have not once been increased in number and popular classes have been reduced to 30 min classes to 15 minutes and now are not available at all. i‚Äôm basically paying a monthly fee for access to a treadmill and some weights - very much not the pure gym sell. very disappointing. in addition, the culture perpetuated by some of the young men in this gym is also completely unacceptable and has no place in a modern society. women should feel safe in the gym and able to mind their own business. sadly this doesn‚Äôt seem to be the case in this one. the solution is not ‚Äòfemale only spaces‚Äô it should be a zero tolerance policy led by pure gym.

Review Title: Freezing showers no repair in sight
Review: showers have been broken (freezing) for months, never actually been hot in the ladies for the 2 years + i‚Äôve been a member.  now sourcing an alternative gym to join as i need to get clean after training.  such a shame puregym corporate don‚Äôt care about their clients as the staff at andover are lovely but can‚Äôt do anything about the gym failures such as broken equipment, ablutions, wifi without some corporate authority which is never forthcoming.

Review Title: I`m very happy with the flexibility of‚Ä¶

the gym is closed atm. it closed yesterday at 7pm and today it was closed. there is no information of when is going to open, no explanation

Review Title: There never seems to be any hot water‚Ä¶
Review: there never seems to be any hot water for the showers. the men‚Äôs changing rooms had even lost 3 showers. i assume due to cost saving, which is another issue as you stand in a cold changing room waiting for an available shower. non the less surely it‚Äôs a legal requirement to provide a certain level of warms in a place open to paying members of the public. with saving money not refitting and blocking off three showers surely there is a few pennys more in the jar for some warmer air and water?

the gym itself i cant fault. very clean, to a good standard and well maintained.  however, take caution if you are considering hiring one of the pts there (i wont say who, due to it being there being an ongoing investigation regarding this pt).  the pt i hired promised, for ¬£233 a month, 8 sessions and a fitness plan i could follow. however, this was not delivered. the in-person sessions completely contradicted the online sessions set, the diet plan was completely off from what i needed, the supplements didnt match to watch i stipulated (i told the pt i couldnt take creatine, yet the diet plan heavily relied on it) and i ended up with several injuries as a result of the exercises set-the reason i hired a pt was so i could recover from injuries, among other things.  the pt only delivered on 4 booked sessions, of the 8 promised. i met them for a 5th, however i wont count that one, he cancelled the booked one at short notice, and rearranged it for a time that was completely unsuitable. even though i attended, i only completed about half of it because i ended up with an injury, because he booked a running session the day after another running session, as the pt hadnt checked the online sessions he had set for me. i ended up not being able to rest my legs.  i didnt hear anything after that from the pt for over a week. i was surprised to find the pt had charged me for another month, with no direct debit set up, no subscription agreement set up, nor had the pt asked whether i wanted another month. the pt hadnt delivered on one months worth of sessions.  were now nearly 3 weeks since i had the money taken out, and the pt has still to book a session or even contact me. the clearly never intended on delivering a session this month.  ive tried contacting puregym, and making them aware of the situation. the pt is still operating at the gym, and the issue is still not resolved. i havent really heard from anyone, beyond the odd email to state they were aware. im not the sort to publicly shame, and i was prepared to give the gym time to resolve this issue. however, as i havent heard anything, i dont have much of a choice.

Review Title: Poor gym etiquette, Norwich Aylsham Road
Review: the gym itself is okay, could benefit from an extra leg machine (e.g.: hack squat) and a better calf raise machine (e.g.: standing straight leg). lockers are only outside changing rooms which was annoying at the start but i got used to it after a couple of months.  the biggest issue i have with this gym is the fact that most of the equipment always has plates on it. most people do not bother putting weights back. i have been to a large number of other gyms in norwich (including other puregym in castle mall), other cities and countries, and ive never seen it that bad. the culture in this gym is really poor, and the management needs to do something about it, there are ways to encourage/remind of positive and responsible behaviour. as of now, a lot of people have zero respect for the place, the equipment, and the people who will be using said equipment after theyre done. imagine your young sister or (grand)mother joining the gym and not being able to use half of the machines because they got 20/25kg plates all over which they cannot remove themselves safely. really, really poor.

anja is an angel! i made a mistake of thinking i cancelled my membership! i swear i went to membership i clicked on cancel membership and all i remember after is the reason you wanna leave which i stated health issue and submitted. it also said we are sorry you are leaving smth like this and i thought it was done. until i went to my bank acct and i found money out i was shocked i did not understand what happened there. i sent an email and i got response so quickly. i was writing the email furiously because in my head i already cancelled and the payment was taken. i also was a bit dumb because i never thought of checking my email for cancelation confirmation for some reason! this lovely lady cameback to me and said that they cant see that i cancelled but because it is for health issue she actually done it for me. i really appreciate that. it was entirely my fault for not checking my email when i cancelled. so that was lovely from your side guys and i do appreciate it. 5 star for literally coming back to me very quickly and for offering to cancel when you didnt have to. thank you to daniel for emailing me back as well.

Review Title: I recently joined this gym and I must‚Ä¶
Review: i recently joined this gym and i must say, it has exceeded all my expectations. from the moment i walked in, i was greeted by friendly and knowledgeable staff who made me feel right at home. the facility itself is top-notch, with state-of-the-art equipment and a clean and spacious layout.  what sets this gym apart is the variety of classes and training options available. whether youre into cardio, strength training, or group fitness, they have something for everyone. the instructors are highly skilled and motivate you to push your limits, while also ensuring proper form and technique.  one thing i really appreciate is the sense of community here. the members are supportive and encouraging, creating a positive and motivating atmosphere. its refreshing to be surrounded by like-minded individuals who are all working towards their fitness goals.  additionally, the gym offers amenities such as locker rooms, showers, and even a smoothie bar, making it convenient to fit a workout into my busy schedule. the staff is always available to answer any questions or provide assistance, further enhancing the overall experience.  overall, i highly recommend this gym to anyone looking to improve their fitness journey. its a well-rounded facility with excellent staff, top-notch equipment, and a welcoming environment. joining this gym has been one of the best decisions ive made for my health and well-being.

Review Title: I am absolutely furious about the‚Ä¶
Review: i am absolutely furious about the situation today. ieva vasiliauskaite, the assistant manager, was on shift the entire day. i walked into the changing room only to find a biohazard ‚Äì urine on the floor. shockingly, ieva not only saw it but chose to ignore the issue and casually walked out. its beyond comprehension that someone in a managerial role, responsible for maintaining a clean and safe environment, would neglect such a basic responsibility. i question how she was given this position when she clearly lacks the basic competence needed for the job. this negligence is not just unprofessional; its a serious health risk. the fact that she could blatantly disregard such a blatant problem is infuriating and demands immediate action.

i have been a member of puregym cardiff gate for several years now, but must say that whilst the gym it self is pretty good and suites my needs, the facilities, require some maintenance, the changing room has a number of damaged lockers the hair dryer x 2 has only one dryer working and to top this the showers are absolutely poor at best it appears that they have turned down the thermostat in the spring to save on energy and costs and it has remained poor throughout the months gone by. at best barely warm, when mentioned to one the instructors he just laughed and said it was warm enough for him. absolute joke of a company i tryed to buy a towel out of there vending machine witch never give me the towel. then the only way you can contact them is threw facebook messenger because theres no actual physical phone number you can speak to someone on. after 12 hours i was finally contacted back (because thats there wait time) to be told 3-5 working days. well that time come and the refund never so you have to go back threw the 12 hour process of contacting them and awaiting the reply. i was then told by the exact same person (james) that my refund would infact take 10-14 working days well i then called james out for this but he didnt respond then another person did. no apology just the process takes that time anyway 14 working days have passed and still no refund so back threw the rigmarole of the 12 hour process then having to give all the details again. now im on like the 15th working day i still havent had a reply back from yesterday after giving my details once again absolve joke. im canceling my membership and they can stick the refund where the sun dont shine.

Review Title: Rude manager, even worse from the PTs...
Review: ive been a member here for over two years now, and all i can say is that thankfully there is finally another option opening in the area in the next few weeks. the kit is ok, even if the placement of the kit is very poor. as a gym, its fine and does what youd expect. my issue is the staff. ive seen the manager several times a week since i joined, and he hasnt once even acknowledged me or said as much as hello, the same can be said for the previous assistant manager. the majority of the personal trainers are the same. no interaction, no welcome, not even a smile. some even go as far as dirty looks when they see you, and ive overheard them even insulting and making fun of members. i made this complaint when asked to leave a review some time ago, and all i got was an email telling me i was wrong. this is exactly the kind of place that gives gyms such a bad name, the ignorance of the staff and personal trainers would be enough to put off a new gym goer.

Review Title: Not worth the price & lack of customer service
Review: i was so excited about puregym opening as it‚Äôs a 2 minute walk from my house and i can quickly go home and shower and go straight to work.  that was the only reason i joined as i was a member with the gym group and cannot fault their service.  the second reason i joined is they were having a promotional offer of ¬£16.99 ( if you joined before they opened ) for the first six months and then the price increases to ¬£32.99!  puregym need to rethink this price increase as members want value for money and they aren‚Äôt providing this.  for example: the constructed layout is small, and i expected a much bigger space for the price. there is too much wasted space and the deadlift rack could have been 6 instead of three and there are no mirrors by this area so you can‚Äôt see a side angle.  in addition the way the back extension has been positioned you can‚Äôt see a side angle as there is only one long mirror by the dumbbells and you don‚Äôt have a front view as it‚Äôs been placed in front of a pillar.  i discovered that the cable machines had the wrong stickers on each of the weights so if you thought you were choosing 2.3kg for example it was really 4.3kg. there should have been a sign informing members about this.  where the landline is positioned they have placed a carpet by the window / open doors so if it rains the water comes through and makes the carpet extremely wet.  i discovered this as i was using the landmine in a seated position and my tracksuit bottoms were soaked. i informed the manager and no sign was placed to inform other members.  whoever designed the gym left out critical elements. this gym is missing some key machines: biceps curl, triceps press, lat pulldown, lateral raise, calf press, hack squat and there is a very low amount of cardio machines for this price. for example there is only one upright bike.  there is a good amount of cable machines, but i couldn‚Äôt believe they don‚Äôt provide a cable straight bar which is the most used attachment for cable machines and a narrow grip landmine handle & row attachment. this is shocking. there is a good amount of functional stuff and that‚Äôs about it.  when puregym opened its doors to the public the first thing i was shocked about was the fact that the changing area, toilets/showers and lockers are all on the same floor and shared between men and women.  there aren‚Äôt enough lockers for members and they have also provided open shelves for people to put their possessions in which is ridiculous as there is a sign that says puregym can‚Äôt be held accountable for anything that goes missing. why didn‚Äôt they just provide more lockers?  my frustrations have increased as they opened on the 01/12/2023 and closed 13/12/2023 and didn‚Äôt send an email out to members telling us. i found out by going to the gym and seeing a sign saying the place has shut down due to a facilities issue and to use the closest gym to me.  this is a joke as the main reason i joined was the close proximity and the closest to me would be crouch hill, finsbury park or muswell hill which means an additional cost to pay for transport and the distance doesn‚Äôt work for me.  when i contacted customer service the only option i was given was to freeze my membership which i would have to pay ¬£6.99 for each month.  i find this preposterous as no emails have been sent out to update members as to when the gym will open again. i could pay ¬£6.99 to freeze my membership and they open tomorrow. we‚Äôve been told to just keep an eye out for an email. this is shocking.  the gym group never do this. they give you a timeframe and keep you updated constantly. if i‚Äôm made to pay to freeze my membership i‚Äôm cancelling my membership. i feel a lot of members will leave after the first six months as the price increase doesn‚Äôt reflect the quality of this gym.
access is key, pure gym is a group that keeps up the standard and affordability.
fabulous gym, very modern and great facilities, one of the bests in watford

Review Title: Not the fault of the staff locally
Review: not the fault of the staff locally, who clearly are limited by the choices of higher management. but this gym is poor. almost every locked is smashed in and unusable, and has been for months if not years. complaints to management don‚Äôt see them replaced - they need a wholesale replacement.    the gym space is huge but is very poor used. feels like no logic or thought went into what went where. no natural light - constraint of the space - but that can be dealt with whit light painting schemes and good electric lighting. and keep g your premises free of mould. puregym don‚Äôt manage to get the basics right.  and yes, the situation in the showers is poor. 23 (reduced from 30+ second of very low pressure, tepid water is not exactly invigorating and doesn‚Äôt energise you after a workout. it all feels like what you might get i a comprehensive school that hadn‚Äôt received any investment for thirty years. it‚Äôs a bad space, it isn‚Äôt maintained, and management seem content for it to be run down further.  it‚Äôs a pity because it could be good - or at least far more than it is now.  if you fix anything in short order, fix the lovkers. if nothing g else , our belongings should be safe from robbery

Review Title: A Welcoming Atmosphere and Excellent Value
Review: i want to say a big thank you to the puregym leytonstone team for creating a welcoming environment. the staff are generally friendly and always ready to lend a hand ‚Äì major kudos to them! the facilities are great, with well-kept gear and a spacious setup that suits all fitness lovers. the value for money is good, especially compared to other pricier spots ive hit up before. i used to drop three times the cash on memberships at city gyms only to find outdated equipment and a less-than-cosy vibe. i did read some reviews here mentioning missing paper towels and cleanliness issues. sure, it does get hectic during peak hours, but thats expected when a place is this popular and affordable. i reckon its also on us gym-goers to keep things tidy and not add to the chaos when staff is not around. i also want to give a big shoutout to the management team. theyve always been extremely helpful in finding my lost items...perfume & airpods a few times... always quick and on point! to sum it up, this place isnt just budget-friendly; its also a safe and cosy spot to get your fitness on. massive thanks to the whole crew for making my gym experience positive! üôå

Review Title: Gone down hill impossible to get on a‚Ä¶
Review: gone down hill impossible to get on a bench unless you go at 1am in the morning.  much better 24hour gyms with more equipment and better prices.  will be cancelling.

Review Title: Great gym friendly and love training‚Ä¶
Review: great gym friendly and love training there
this is a nice gym. i enjoy spin with henry and pump with alicia. do not like the dirty cloth to wipe the bikes after class.

i have been going to this gym for around a year and honestly can say it is the friendliest gym i‚Äôve ever been at. the staff are lovely and create a great atmosphere. recently i was involved in an incident where it was alleged a male had been taking pictures of me whilst in the gym. after informing the staff the situation was dealt with professionally and efficiently and resolved within 15 minutes. it is great to see how committed the staff are to making this a safe space to workout in and especially one women can feel confident in. thank you :)

since i joined puregym, i‚Äôve loved the classes, very helpful and friendly trainer, i can finally see the results and i can‚Äôt wait to go every morning when i wake up.  thank you puregym st paul‚Äôs

i have had bayswater puregym membership for almost a year now and i have only good things to say! i was a bit intimidated in the beginning as i am not used to going to the gym alone and lifting weights but the staff there is incredibly friendly and helpful. they also have great facilities and space. something for everyone - lots of dumbbells and variety of machines, cardio space, stretching and dynamic training areas. every now and then i like to do a class and these are fun too as you can feel that the instructors are genuinely putting effort to make the class enjoyable for everyone. the only thing to be aware of is that it gets a bit busy during peak hours (6-7pm) but i feel like that happens in every gym. also so far everyone has been friendly to share the equipment if needed and you can look from the app how many people are in the gym and when it‚Äôs the busiest. so would be smart to work around that if possible.
no hot water for 3 months. it‚Äôs freezing outside!

Review Title: I'm truly devastated by the current‚Ä¶
Review: im truly devastated by the current state of the gym. for the past month, something has felt off ‚Äì its dirty, the changing rooms are unpleasant, and most machines are broken. it seems like theres no visible management, and the gym feels like its running without direction. the shocking part is the terrible attitude of the assistant manager, who only treats her clients well, leaving others feeling mistreated. her leadership style is unacceptable, and the position should be given to someone else. additionally, the lift, crucial for individuals with mobility issues, has been out of order for months without anyone addressing the issue. this drastic decline in the gyms quality within a month is truly disheartening. theres a plea for better treatment of members, as other gyms would gladly welcome them.
plenty of classes, well-maintained and quality equipment, clean and fresh.
good range of equipment and weights

Review Title: Staff are always a pleasure and gym‚Ä¶
Review: staff are always a pleasure and gym super clean!

my personal trainer, cam, is honestly the only reason i was able to get into the gym again. i was struggling with getting into coming to the gym but it was always a goal of mine to do. the first ever time i came to pure gym i had signed myself up for a lbt class and i wasnt able to do some of the exercises everyone else was doing. cam was so supportive and thought of exercises on the spot for me to do so i could still take part, ever since then ve been having 2 sessions a week with him working on my body goals. he has honestly been amazing, so non-judgmental, friendly, easy going/easy to talk to, knows literally everything there is to know about the sport sciences and pushes me to my limits to help better myself! he creates such a positive environment and now instead of being scared to come to the gym, im excited. honestly without cam i would‚Äôve given up a long time ago.

mens changing rooms are disgusting. holes in the wall where someone has punched it. dirty and smell awful. the gym is really busy in peak times. i wont be renewing my membership.

whilst the spin instructors are all very good,the bikes are all in a terrible state. it seems to be a running joke rather than something that needs to be addressed. even the instructors are frustrated with the bike situation. all of them are rusty and have some issues. please get this sorted pure gym.

one star is generous, i‚Äôve really tried to give this gym a chance but it gets worse every week. the gym itself is filthy and the machines are always breaking, this i could tolerate but after having some of my belongings stolen while they were ‚Äúsafe‚Äù in a locker i‚Äôm not sure i‚Äôll ever return. staff are keenly aware that people are having things stolen frequently but don‚Äôt really seem bothered. roid heads and thieves, proper joke.

absolutely disappointed with this gym false advertising i signed up with plus membership to be able to use other gyms checked i could use borehamwood as live in watford but work in borehamwaood now it should i could. i tried to use the gym in borehamwood i couldn‚Äôt get in and received a texts saying i can‚Äôt use this gym and on the puregym app it won‚Äôt let me change anything . so all in all a big waste of time and money

Review Title: Best gym in town and certainly value‚Ä¶
Review: best gym in town and certainly value for money
lovely staff & great classes. the studio room is the perfect quiet area to work out peacefully, not too many people are there wheb there aren‚Äôt any classes running inside.
cheap prices and the equipment is alright, gets very busy though. i like how its open at night so you can work out any time

- do something with scattered dumbbells&barbells on the floor. members are not putting it back in it‚Äôs place. so many times that i want to use 6-8kg dumbbells but it went to 40kg dumbbell zone. - gym is smelly. everytime when i walk in, i smell musty,sweaty smells all the time.

cheap and cheerful friendly staff 5 stars

terrible company. just take money out of your account without your permission. i shared my concerns with the current state of the gym and the manager but nothing changed.   puregym snowhill id question who is giving this gym such good reviews, especially on cleanliness. personal trainers and staff maybe?  this gym is below the standard of others ive used within the chain. the personal trainers are needless arrogant and uninspiring. the equipment is old, rusting and stinks. although there are products to clean the equipment after use by its members this is ultimately the responsibility of the cleaners however, the cleaners spend more time on their phones in the changing rooms than they do cleaning, and pushing a vacuum around is about as much as they do, theres never any soap to wash your hands and when there is, the soap dispensers are broken for weeks on end, this only seems to have been an issue since mid-2022/2023 so i‚Äôd question the management of the place. chewing gum is stuck to carpets it cant be that hard to notice! is it that hard to monitor the cleanliness and safety of the equipment?  every personal trainer must have a disability in this gym as they use the only disabled toilet for members that need it, evidently because its more convenient than walking up 3 steps to the changing room 10 feet away.  if this gym wasnt so close to where i live id have left by now.

Review Title: Management  do not stop working very‚Ä¶
Review: management  do not stop working very approachable 2

Review Title: Cheap and easy to access but parking is crap
Review: cheap and easy to access. clean but parking is a faff because it‚Äôs run by some independent company, and so only 2hs free. normally fine until the gym is rammed and to get a workout plus stretching with everything being used means going over that time is likely. been fined for going a mere ten minutes over the time limit

i was really enjoying this gym but the hip adductor/abductor machine has the handles bolted on the wrong way, so when your legs part, they hit the handles, the handles should be flush with the seat not interfering with your movement. i got sick of it bruising my thighs.  i told the gym via instagram which they read on 31st may, they still havent changed it. i havent been since due to not being able to complete my legs workout.  its literally 4 bolts to undo it then turn it the right way!

hello  i joined the puregym bedford nearly three months ago. my first payment included so called admin fee and other fees, the second payment for the monthly was suppose to be ¬£18.99 they took ¬£51,99 with no reason, my complaints have been ignored, the gym manager states this is a customer services issue contact the puregym customer services on member,service email which gives you get an automatic response stating we our sorry you are leaving our gym, so i just ignored the cost and got on with it, this month they took ¬£36.99. i stopped my gym direct debit they then cancelled my gym membership despite having paid, again i spoke with the gym team and again they pointed me towards the email previously mentioned, puregym more like purecon. ¬£115 for three month membership when the gym membership was suppose to be ¬£18.99. stay well clear

Review: a certain gym machine has been out of order for 3+ weeks and there is only one of this specific machine in this puregym, meaning i‚Äôve had to skip the exercise from my routine for 3 weeks. the gym is busy all the time and it is hard to use equipment without waiting for ages. changing rooms/toilets always stink and are kept it a bad condition.

Review Title: Angel at PureGym South is THE BEST

i use this gym two days a week when i‚Äôm in the office and i love it. the staff (especially the two female pts and the guy with longer hair) are super friendly and the changing rooms/gym are pretty clean and everything works/gets fixed quickly. it doesn‚Äôt feel clicky or intimidating. i prefer this so much to my local one as the atmosphere is so much better, it‚Äôs not as busy and the staff are so much friendlier.  i am actually considering driving out on my wfh days as it‚Äôs that much better. the only thing i‚Äôd change is the heating is just a bit too high, it would be great if they could turn it down a little.

Review: i like the triangle at bournemouth. easy to walk to in 20 minutes for me because it‚Äôs central. the resistance and cardio machines are clean and in good condition. the free weights, benches and smith are clean and in good condition. atmosphere is friendly but you can get on and do your workout without interruptions. in the mornings is easy to access all the kit you need without waiting. a gym for all abilities and all disciplines. definitely recommend.

Review Title: Been coming here for 3 years and now‚Ä¶
Review: been coming here for 3 years and now and only now i feel that they have given me a reason to make a complaint/review‚Ä¶ first and foremost it‚Äôs a good gym hence i been coming here for the past 3 years though i do use rippedgym as well, secondly i don‚Äôt understand the ventilation process in the gym, recently they have bolted all the windows and no air con around the treadmills which i just admit it‚Äôs not only unhygienic but also very uncomfortable when you are in mid run and need a fresh of air, we aren‚Äôt in prison for the windows to be bolted nor are we in a sauna for there to be so much heat/no ventilation. completely wrong so i hope the manager can do something about this because it‚Äôs poor period!!
nice and serene environ, but sometimes customers left equipments unclean after use.

lovely classes run by darren tonight. strength 30 followed by absolute abs. strength 30 is brilliant, week on week darren keeps the excerises fresh and varied so you get a different work out each time. cracking finisher of a longest wall sit getting the class to compete with each other tonight. followed by absolute abs this is a perfect combo for a full body blast. from planks to bicycle crunches..... them abs definitely got a blast. darren always brings full encouragement support and keeps each week fresh. he is very good with his member interaction and takes time to help member and check in when required.

cant really comment on the gym but rubbish customer service.  no way to speak to anyone on the telephone and they dont reply to emails.  they say its easy to cancel the membership online but not in my experience.

terrible experience shower temperature set at luke warm 33 degrees . this is 4.5 degrees below body temperature and is totally unacceptable. complained but response basically from customer service was dismissive and a barely warm shower was company policy . will probably cancel membership and join a new gym opening in december in bromley!

made it 5 minutes late to the first & last class i booked with pure gym (i prefer just using weights usually) because of a bus delay and was told to leave the class. cancelling my membership right after posting this review because this is no proper way to treat a paying customer. lateness of 15 min + i‚Äôd understand, but for 5 minutes you‚Äôre just being unpleasant for the sake of it.  the trainer justified this by saying i missed the warm-up but the class itself was packed to the brim and if you read the other low star reviews you can easily see they are not managing booking properly so let‚Äôs be honest here about what the issue is. any respectable venue would check names before allowing attendees in the class and would give a 5 minutes grace for entrance. back to nuffield i go.  other complaints are: equipment being broken fairly frequently and taking a while to fix venue smelling bad generally - makes you wonder about hygiene standards severe overcrowding at peak times - i understand it‚Äôs a budget gym and i guess this comes with the territory (and it‚Äôs indeed why i decided to try out a class this time around because it‚Äôd be a challenge to secure a squat rack at this time - 6.30pm on a wednesday)  this review pertains to the legs, abs & tums class of wednesday 22nd november 6.30pm. toodles!  p.s. i‚Äôd appreciate it if the venue didn‚Äôt respond to tell me how ‚Äúpopular‚Äù pure gyms venues are as it did to the other low rating reviews. it‚Äôs a budget gym that allows oversubscription and has poor booking management, not the most popular girl in class. be so for real. cute public perception management attempt, i suppose.

Review Title: PureGym in my opinion are the best‚Ä¶PureGym No.1

i am having to write a review again because it seems like this is the only way they will fix things. the showers have been out of order for few weeks due to a hot water issue. they have said this issue has been resolved last week but when using the showers the water is ice cold and now there is barely any water pressure at all and instead its gone worse. people that use the showers in the morning like myself have work to go to after and this is a huge inconvenience as i am paying for my membership and not getting the full amenities. also this problem has been going on for a long time over a year and especially gets worse in the winter as it seems like they are trying to skimp on the hot water as in the summer it is always hot?

the cable machine is by far the most popular in this gym, all four machines are always occupied no matter the time of day (i train outside peak hours). the users hog them for long periods of time. last week i asked a young lad who had already been on for 20mins how many more sets he had and got "quite a few, this is the only machine i like to use here." i did say that it was unfair on other users and he shrugged the comment off. then you have groups of guys hogging the machines together for ages. short of physically dragging someone off, what are customers meant to do; constantly snitch to staff? its either time to invest in a timer say 10mins max per user or to purchase more of these machines replacing less popular ones. if its not adressed ill just cancel my membership.

manager claire and assistant manager mike do an excellent job of making members feel part of a community at harrogate puregym. their enthusiasm and hard work really shows. nothing is too much trouble and they and all the staff do everything they can to make sure the gym runs in the best possible way.

Review: the condition of the toilets and sink of the women‚Äôs changing room are appalling. the sinks stinks and both toilets are constantly clogged and out of order. puregym twickenham, i have pictures.
