planty of space, staff if very kind, they are always helping you, they are putting the weights back on theyre places ( after some lazy customers ) and they are always present.

Review Title: Update: And still the most foul-smelling Gym in Halifax!
Review: the puregym communications manager said this: (15 november 2023 email.) ‚Äúalthough we have been having issues with the air conditioning, there is still ventilation in the gym, which has been checked and confirmed as operational.‚Äù i went the gym on the 18thnovember, as i entered the pod, i could feel the heat from the gym and the stench was sickening. be truthful, the place stinks and has done for many months. fellow gym members are prepared to substantiate the claims made here if requested. at low levels, stale air is uncomfortable, but at higher levels, stale air can become unhealthy. breathing in unhealthy levels of stale air can cause skin irritation, headaches, and fatigue, and can be especially dangerous for individuals with underlying conditions like allergies or respiratory problems. this is a gymnasium in decline, but it is no good blaming gym personnel. start taking the health and safety of your customers seriously. disturbingly shocking!

Review Title: Toilets are often dirty and they are‚Ä¶
Review: toilets are often dirty and they are unisex. classes are in the open space. poor quality equipment.
plenty of equipment and convenient.  clean and tidy environment
excellent classes really enjoy friday evening and sunday morning richard classes

Review Title: Very good 247 gym urinals always out of‚Ä¶
Review: very good 247 gym urinals always out of order and toilets stink

Review Title: The Bridgwater pure gym has everything‚Ä¶
Review: the bridgwater pure gym has everything and a good atmosphere so overall i am very happy using this gym. i have had negative experiences with entering the gym previously so i left for another gym but re joined to try again. been great up until today, went to vehicle to grab something and couldnt get back in, i did attempt to ask assistance but gym staff was teaching a class, when class was finished i was still kept waiting while staff wanted to put things away, during this time i had a bench and personal belongings inside the gym. dissapointed by this as i wouldnt disrupt a class during an interval unless it was urgent.
hi management, any chance we can have some bike stands installed to lock bikes outside the entrance on the block paving?
friendly and helpful staff. great equipment. inclusive atmosphere.

wonderful motivated staff, who are dedicated to their role and welfare of all members!! a big shout out to daria and josh who have done back to back classes this week!! however, there has been a few issues with the gym, which i have already raised with the management at stratford and head office (which have been dealt with professional by all). unfortunately, a number of clients abuse the gym (break machines/hand dryers/soap dispensers/leave their litter wherever etc). i try to help out as best i can.

not a great start at all, joined and booked an induction but the person who was suppose to do it was a no show with no contact at all. which is rich seen as there is a 3 strike rule for classes. also the app says the induction was done which is a lie.  it was only my second visit but i had to do a 44min round trip as i wouldn‚Äôt normally be in the area on a saturday.  other than that first impressions are the equipment is pretty old and grubby. the cleaning station isn‚Äôt well stocked and there is only one which from my observations means most people don‚Äôt bother.  edit: i dont see why i should have to go out of my way to contact the gym manager and to be honest wouldnt know how. i am sure if you feedback the date of my experiance he should very easily be able to check.  pretty unhelpful reply to the review actually you should be much more proactive.

the classes are excellent.sebastian ,antony, georgioüëåüèªtop instructors.any feedback is well taken and the classes are always enjoyable. for the upper management, please bring more weights for the classes , change the spinning bikes and have regular cleaners.

value for money no contract plenty of free weights well maintained and clean equipment  can get very busy at peak times with benches and equipment hogged by people on their mobiles, not even checking a routine...just scrolling.

after 3 years away from the gym, i decided to give puregym a try!  on my first day i was welcomed by joe the manager, he immediately made me feel at ease & comfortable trying a new gym. hes gone on to help me try new exercises, to improve my fitness! always makes the effort to say hello and welcome you into the gym!  ‚Äòbecky‚Äô - assistant manager, has also helped me with lots of tips & advice on the equipment. she makes you feel very comfortable and always has a big smile!  all other staff seem friendly & helpful too.  there is so much awesome equipment to use! i‚Äôve been there 1 month and there‚Äôs still lots of new stuff to try out! the gym is always very clean & tidy. thanks for making me feel comfortable after 3 years out - fully recommended  - much love

Review Title: Been working with Jemma a couple of‚Ä¶
Review: been working with jemma a couple of months now , so amazing at what she does! constantly keeping me motivated and reminding me of the end goal. each workout is different, and although it may feel tough, jemma always encourages me to keep pushing forward. while achieving my goal she always knows how to bring some fun into the session and knows how to connect with you on a 1 to 1 basis. couldn‚Äôt recommend jemma enough!! x

Review Title: Great place to train and keep fit
Review: friendly  staff. lovely atmosphere. love all the classes.  made lots of friends along the way.   highly  recommend it to any one thinking of joining a gym x

hiya all. i regularly travel the length and breadth of the uk and consequently have visited a vast array of gyms in both sectors. pure gym has been, for numerous years,  my reserve.. always available and a plethora of gyms nationwide. though they are extremely convenient i have never seen fit to praise, that is until i visited dumfries. not a huge selection of equipment though more than enough. what does stand out head and shoulders is both the staff, who are all, bar one, cheerful, professional, helpful, attentive  and better than most all pure gym employees. i would especially recommend evgenia baillie. three of the staff addressed me by name, so impressed, no other gym has managed to address me personally, none other than my regulars. the gym is the tidiest public gym that i have been too, including the bathrooms, exceptionally so. i spoke to one of the cleaners, very hardworking and conscientious lady happy work and chat. the free classes are well considered and not overwhelming, suitable for all. though i think that it is difficult to complete a choice of similar classes throughout the week. the fine folk of dumfries were a friendly crowd too.  i was only here/there for one week but hopefully i will return. kevinjon üòÅ

Review Title: I was supposed to have 2 hours free‚Ä¶
Review: i was supposed to have 2 hours free parking but ive received a pcn ,parking fine. so i shall cancel my membership.
great gym, with lots equipment and all working and clean. only bad point is some times its hard to get the machines to switch on but that could be a age thing.
quiet at this time ,  not  much queuing , equipment was clean and being cleaned by staff
i had a couple of issues that needed attention. i wrote a letter to the manager of the gym including my mobile and email address. she failed to respond and my issue still exists.

Review Title: Go to the classes with the best instructors!
Review: good cheap gym. some of the instructors in the class are fantastic (sue is full of energy and makes you feel great), some make it obvious they make the class up as they go along which makes you feel like they don‚Äôt want to be in that class teaching it so you feel that you don‚Äôt want to come back to their class. also would prefer the classes that got reduced to go back to 45 minutes

Review Title: PureGym in Charlon is an excellent gym
Review: puregym in charlon is an excellent gym, with good facilities, great fitness classes and friendly staff. the membership is very reasonable and allows you to attend the gym without breaking the bank.  the manager, ella, is outstanding and has done an amazing job of running the charlton branch. ella listens to customers needs and responds. her classes are also fantastic.  puregym in charlon is located within a small retail park, which offers free parking for four hours. there is also a sainsburys and m&s next to the gym, aldi, asda, and another retail park is nearby.  im able to attend the gym after completing the school run and also do my weekly shop.  this is why i favour charlton over other locations.
same equipment always broken for months on end ......repair or replace it

Review Title: Where do I start been with you from the‚Ä¶
Review: where do i start been with you from the day you started  in weston super -mare and to be fair it‚Äôs a good gym then it all went bad let‚Äôs start with the all cardio machines are dirty and filthy then the air conditioning is not turned on at all and in the summer we got baked alive the manager told me olly morris that controls set by head office he can not touch them or your just trying to save money and please do not mention the environment when you read this. then let‚Äôs move on to the new manager who is just rude and bad mannered so any one reading this thinking i will join pure gym in weston please do not and if you have asthma the humidity will finish you off but there is a god out there a new gym opposite your site in weston which is 24hr with a sauna hot tub and steam room and air con which is turned on will not be coming back down to my last 4 days to go if i survive heat just looked you up on wiki your a billion pound company not good enough

Review Title: It's a good gym at a good location, BUT
Review: its a good gym at a good location. i was looking forward to the "refurb" but only to my greatest disappointment that non of the cardio equipment was upgraded at all! i mean most of the treadmills and ergs are old and constantly breakdown, it isnt a lot to ask to get them refreshed is it?!

Review Title: The gym is clean, bright and has excellent equipemnt.
Review: the gym is clean, light and airy with all the equipment i need however the showers are cold.  they are very clean; the female cleaner is excellent but the shower switch off very quickly and when they turn back on again they are cold then tepid.
good gym. good equipment. good classes. emails from connor hurst on all topics related to fitness have been very useful. they are helping me stay motivated!

clean, airy, bright. average kit could.do with more. fairly impersonal. a good start but more kit and fitness room improvement needed. all in great for 10.99 a month. but when the price goes up will.prob look for somewhere with better and more kit. unless they add more.

Review Title: Need one changes kindly clear washroom‚Ä¶
Review: kindly keep clear and clean changing area and washroom side please
very enjoyable classes and helpful staff.
nice clean gym, plenty of equipment. fun for a first timer (especially rowing games on the machine). wasnt as busy at 3pm as expected, which was great. pleasant staff.

Review Title: Gemma Thomas PT Great!  Also very happy with the gym
Review: i recently finished 4 pt sessions with gemma thomas and i had a great experience! before the sessions, i didnt really know what i was doing, i avoided using certain machines or venturing into the weights area. gemma and i discussed my training goals and in my first session we did a general "lets see where youre at" in a range of exercises to understand my strengths, areas for improvement, etc. ive finished my sessions with a clear idea of what exercises i can do to work certain muscle groups and what weights work for me. she sent everything over to me in a text and i have it all written in my phone now for quick access when im there. gemma is also super lovely and encouraging.  if i wasnt on a crazy budget before travelling soon, id have continued my sessions, having someone there to motivate you and push you makes such a difference. its also really affordable and value for money.  the gym itself is very good, its got a wide variety of machines and areas to work out. i find mondays are very busy, so prepare yourself! but everyone is friendly and willing to offer advice if you ever want it.  2 hr free parking validation is a bonus too!

Review Title: Could do with warmer showers and wipes for equipment.
Review: could do with warmer showers and wipes for equipment in giffnock.

its a budget gym, you get what you pay for. i joined again recently and it is far worse than it was in 2016.  compared to other gyms at a similar price, the gym is lacking cable machines and also accessories for the cable machines. an addition of a box next to the cables to store accessories would be great, similar to how jd gyms store their accessories.  secondly being a budget gym, people disrespect the equipment inside so much more, the free weights are all over the place and more should be done to penalise members not returning weights, or staff should do more to return the weights to where they should be.  finally the male showers are poor, there is always a foul stench in the far left and middle showers, seems something with drainage. also, the lockers, many have doors missing, or the are bent, and the hair dryers, the left needs to be replaced as it over heats within a minute of use.  final thoughts, there is a lot to improve, but you get what you pay for. maybe it is better to spend a couple of ¬£ more and go to a different gym

Review Title: start controlling what is happening at the gym
Review: no one keeps track of the age of children using the gym.  after all, there is always a promotionü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è a regular customer cannot attend the workaut because the machines are blocked by children who are on their phones.  they exercise incorrectly, they injure themselves, and none of the employees react to it.

Review Title: The new cardio set up on the second‚Ä¶
Review: the new cardio set up on the second floor is bad . this is because now there‚Äôs at least 6 cardio machines that face directly towards the leg machines at close proximity . this makes it uncomfortable when doing leg workouts as you‚Äôll have 3-6 people facing and looking at you .

started off with the classes at the end of covid and after a few months i wanted more of a challenge so i started training with pt chantelle. chantelle is the queen of leg day but she absolutely knows her stuff when it comes to upper body too! i started off wanting to lose weight and since achieving that its all about strength! i have made such incredible progress and i couldnt have done it without chantelles knowledge and guidance. i feel so much more confident in the gym and in "real life"! thank you chantelle!

Review Title: I only come here because of the lack of competition
Review: ¬£30 - thats how much my membership costs per month. the equipment is old, tired, squeaky & rusty. when something breaks, it takes weeks to be repaired & because theres just 1 of everything, more often than not you are left waiting for someone to finish. how foolish of me to assume when you made a huge deal about "were building you a better gym"& "upgrading your gym to bring a brand-new look and feel and the latest kit", that this would mean new equipment replacing old & a total refresh. nope, youve just gotten rid of some cardio equipment (keeping the various out of service treadmills in place) and adding a functional area in the cleared space. weight machines are now uncomfortably squeezed together - fantastic! the air con is patchy at best. its an oven in the summer and freezing in winter. the showers are tepid and in desperate need of upgrading. this morning, without any prior warning via social media or emails to members, the gents showers were closed for re-grouting - surely this has been planned for weeks, why couldnt you send a very simple email to advise the showers would be unavailable?! the only reason this gym is as busy as it is, is because theres no competition in the area. expect your memberships to plummet when snap fitness opens, because people will realise there are better alternatives.

the gym is quite basic and some of the equipment is out of order some of the time. but it‚Äôs a budget gym, so i think that some of the negative reviews on here are unfair, and the expectations of some people are unrealistic. if you choose to go at peak times, it‚Äôs obviously going to be busy! the cleaner and other staff members are busy every morning hoovering, wiping down the equipment, and cleaning the changing rooms. sam, the gym manager, is an absolute delight. she‚Äôs always smiling, and very friendly and approachable, so it‚Äôs a real shame that she‚Äôs moving on.
great selection of equipment, easy access.
a really good gym with friendly and approachable staff. i particularly love ellie‚Äôs step classes and darren‚Äôs strength class, they are both fab instructors

brilliantly equipped gym and a welcoming atmosphere. all in all a lovely place to spend some time. the staff are really friendly and helpful, especially the manager sean and the pt sarah. nothing is too much trouble for them. i would highly recommend this gym to beginners and experienced gym goers alike. keep up the good work pure gym!

Review Title: Very friendly gym I‚Äôve been going to PureGym Evesham for‚Ä¶
Review: i‚Äôve been going to puregym evesham for two and a half years now and it‚Äôs fantastic. it‚Äôs clean tidy and all the trainers are brilliant friendly very approachable people, great bunch of guys. the classes are awesome i‚Äôve done over 700 and enjoyed them all. i was broken hearted when my favourite leah perkins left last year! she‚Äôs a fantastic instructor and personal trainer and a lovely person to be around, and now she‚Äôs back on board the gym is even better. so come on class goer‚Äôs and give leah‚Äôs classes a go i‚Äôm pretty sure you won‚Äôt be disappointed.

finding the right personal trainer has been hard over the past few years.   but having danniella as pt since april has been the best choice i have made she‚Äôs the best personal trainer i have ever had she‚Äôs simply amazing the work she‚Äôs done with me i saw progress within weeks of starting with her and i can see more and more as the weeks go on.   she‚Äôs changed my mindset totally and got me out a lazy routine as i struggled a lot before starting with her but i have so much motivation now coming to gym.   she‚Äôs been amazing and an inspiration to me i am forever grateful for what she‚Äôs done with me.  thank u for everything so far dannie if your looking for a personal trainer i would look no further then dannie.

Review Title: One of the best place to train if you‚Ä¶
Review: one of the best place to train if you are in town for a business trip or passing by. clean and spacious the purgmy at abbey wood tricks all the boxes for me.

love the gym, i struggled in the past with other gyms and finding it motivating but this time it has been different. i think the app makes a difference as it tracks our activity and has lots of workouts for me to follow with explanations on how to do it. it‚Äôs absolutely fantastic!!! the staff is always friendly and happy to help and the free top up of sports water is definitely a plus

beaufort park birmingham has become a regular haunt for me these days, although i enjoy the overall facility of this gym, the mens toilet area is not given much attention. its always the dreaded thought of having to attend the wc. it is never very clean and is poorly ventilated.

Review Title: Today I went on the leg curl machine‚Ä¶
Review: today i went on the leg curl machine and realised 2 of the hols have been blocked off for use. it means im unable to use this machine and can imagine alot of others. a gym is meant to cater to everyone and i dont see why you would block off the holes so people with smaller thighs cant use. this machine only available half a year anyway  i go to alot of pure gyms around country nobody has ever done this crazy

Review Title: When I joined I thought I could use all‚Ä¶
Review: when i joined i thought i could use all gyms except central london ones. showers and changing rooms are grubby and water barely warm. in my *home gym" harlow people sleep on hydro massage beds and just sit for ages on equipment.

Review Title: Two weeks in and enjoying the ease of‚Ä¶
Review: two weeks in and enjoying the ease of access, quality equipment and friendly staff at puregym in linlithgow. personal training makes a big difference too, which i struggled to find in other local gyms.

been a week trying to contact puregym but no response, tried email, facebook, twitter still no reply paying member of the gym but being asked to re-join when i try to book a class. unable to enter the gym as well. will be changing to another gym where you can contact staff when an issue like this arise

there is now only 1 small cleaning station on the top floor with limited cleaning things and no cleaning station on the 2nd floor recently.  this really needs addressing, winter bugs are on the rise and uni students are back and its not feeling like a clean environment. not having any way to clean the equipment before or after a workout is not great.  the equipment on the top floor such as the treadmills need a bit of a deep clean and scrub as well but theyre in decent condition.

Review Title: Great gym great classes just wish the‚Ä¶
Review: great gym great classes just wish the class i go to was on more on my days off work or later at night when i finish at 6pm
great gym great equipment. some blue rolls around the place would be good around the place to wipe down machines after a sweaty workout

good opening hours, good facilities and approachable friendly staff.  i was a member of this gym pre covid but have only just gone back after buying a lot of home gym equipment but not really using.  i was surprised with the new layout which is much better with similar equipment on both levels rather than just one as before, apart from the free weights, which is understandable.
its a good gym with good variety of classes to choose. very clean. reasonably priced, good opening hours.
great equipment great staff facilities environment best gym i have been to and great deals and variations of memberships.

Review Title: Two brilliant group fitness classes from Jimmy!
Review: two brilliant group fitness classes from jimmy (assistant manager). great work as always from all the team at pure stretford üôèüëä

Review Title: I swore I would never join a gym
Review: i swore i would never join a gym, but i‚Äôve just retired and it‚Äôs better than i thought it would be. i‚Äôm allowed to just get on doing my own thing at any time of day or night. the equipment is good and once you get used to it your confidence builds.

gym is okay on the whole,  its good value for the price. the music from the studio is insanely loud tho,  when there is a class on the whole gym has to listen to it. have left feedback about this but no response. it‚Äôs not a pleasant environment to work out in.

Review Title: The ladies section has limited equipment
Review: the ladies section has limited equipment! they need a smith machine asap! the ladies section for jd gym down the road has better equipment range than this gym.

i love our local gym, however 1 thing that grates me is a pt taking over most of the equipment with a class, especially when they are not using the equipment and then just standing near by. i understand pts have to make money and classes are an important thing but to take over a full area of equipment with 8 people is frustrating.
great time management with classes,  24 access to the gym, different class options
very welcoming and caring, good equipment, clean and great choice of class.

cold showers.  please stop saying the temperature is set to 33. instead, be pro active and go and take a shower. they are far too cold.

Review: locker room and shower have an horrible smell and are not clean. shower buttons are annoying and water takes too much time to get hot, which is a pain when its cold. machines are matrix brand so the cheapest crap in any uk gym. only positive is that is not as crowded as eldon garden.

Review Title: Great place to achieve your workout‚Ä¶
Review: great place to achieve your workout goals.

great experience. i would recommend it.

i‚Äôm 21, and i go to this gym nearly every day, i have nothing bad to say about it other than the dreadful music they insist on blaring over the speakers. i don‚Äôt know if pure gym are contracted in some sense to play music, but without headphones (headphones, earphones are futile) it is impossible to ignore it. if the music could be tailored slightly to be less agonising, it would be nice. also, i can guarantee that almost everyone will agree with this, even the staff to some degree. i am considering switching gyms.

Review Title: Mark and Andy and Kristian are‚Ä¶
Review: mark and andy and kristian are fantastic!! brilliant gym with a lovely family feel for the members and trainers! i feel like i enjoy coming to the gym regularly and the classes are challenging but fun! my only feedback would be for a spin class offering, this would be a great addition to the gym :) lily
overall the gym is great. only thing to complain about is the music. it would be nice to have some motivational music. i do take my own pods but it get drowned out by the drone in the background.

i had the privilege of undergoing training with cam, an experience that proved truly transformative. his composed demeanor, coupled with an extensive understanding of body development, provided me with invaluable insights. under his guidance, i not only witnessed physical transformation but also imbibed the significance of consistency, discipline, and unwavering commitment. cams motivational approach during our sessions was truly unparalleled. despite my current hiatus from training with him, i eagerly anticipate rejoining this transformative journey as soon as circumstances permit. i am confident that under cams expertise, continued hard work will yield even more remarkable results.
good equipment, it‚Äôs never busy at the times i go and there‚Äôs a nice friendly atmosphere.
24/7 gym. you got your own time. everything you need are all there.  good parking space no hassle at all.

peterborough brotherhood puregym suspended my membership without giving me a reason or an explanation . once you contact members team they advise to you contact the gym and when i contact the gym they tell me to go back to them . i am devastated as they keep on charging me every month yet can not give me an explanation to why i am blocked . there is no way i can even request a refund as there is no one to speak to , i have wrote multiple emails yet i have not had an answer from anyone .  you do not value your customers!  please keep away from these scammers , that can not even make the effort to deal with you

i was visiting relatives near chippenham and booked a one day pass for a sunday morning at the chippenham puregym. i was impressed due to: * nice mix of people - all ages and shapes - people seemed very friendly * lots of space - large functional/stretch/cooldown areas * lots of kit - especially lots of racks/barbell - one of my moans in a lot of other gyms is limited squat racks - not here * overall very clean
way too busy, barely any equipment available when i go so now i have to go really late at night or early in the morning.

Review Title: Amazing  staff and  classes and very‚Ä¶
Review: amazing  staff and  classes and very friendly drake house gym

Review Title: The workers are kind and makes me feel‚Ä¶
Review: the workers are kind and makes me feel very  comfortable in the gym as i‚Äôm a over thinker and i don‚Äôt like my body so it‚Äôs hard for me but i‚Äôm starting to open up because of them

the gym is generally good, but i had a confusing experience recently. as i was using a machine, a chinese boy approached me and indicated that the bag on the floor and near the machine was his, suggesting he was not here but still using that machine and then he asked me to leave. however, for the five minutes prior to that, while i was adjusting the weight, the machine was clearly unoccupied. im not sure if this is an accepted rule for occupying equipment at the gymÔºü
great gym, lots of free fitness classes, good range of machines/equipment, fitness instructors are great
overall excellent gym and facilities but when busy and groups using equipment it does make a full workout difficult at times

Review Title: Jake has made me love the gym already!
Review: i was really nervous about starting at a new gym. i have adhd and autism and its very difficult for me to connect with people and (often) figure out how to use/ do things in the gym. i just had my getting started and learn to lift session with jake and i had absolutely no reason to be worried. he made such an effort to connect with me and couldnt do enough to make sure i was comfortable. ive honestly never had so much fun in the gym as i did in this hour and a bit with jake. pts can be so intimidating but he was a welcome breath of fresh air. i cant wait to book onto one of his classes and im so pleased that ive left my first session at pure gym radiating jake style positivity instead of feeling too scared to come back. thank you so much jake!

my housemate (f) and i (m) are looking for a gym together (for the classes). looking to trial a few classes.  we both wrote to member services asking for a trial. she was offered a free 3 day pass. i was told they don‚Äôt do trials and to purchase a membership.  i wrote back with a screenshot of the divergent responses and was told that the difference in treatment is because she either is or was a member, and i was not.  my housemate has in fact never been a member of puregym, she is only joining because i am. i have been a member for years so i pointed out my membership details and the same ‚Äòmembership‚Äô based trial is now not on the table for myself.  now the only apparent differences between myself and my housemate is that i am male with an asian name, while she is female and not of an asian background.  as everything else is equal. i can only conclude puregym members‚Äô services, in my case, are discriminating on the basis of either race and/or gender.  now puregym will come back with the obvious ‚Äòwe treat everyone equally‚Äô but as with everything in life, actions speak louder than words.

Review Title: Full of kids on their mobile phones
Review: full of kids on their mobile phones, weights left all over the floor.staff non existent and poorly maintained machinery

Review Title: dishonest reviews from some about southampton shirley
Review: i read some of the reviews just to be nosy n some are so rude!!! the staff are all very friendly so i dont know what theyre on about plus its clean enough for me?! i think maybe some of the customers are a bit up themselves as not everyone of the people that walk through those doors are nice people anyway?? some of the blokes stare u out n give u filthy looks, which makes it pleasant- thats the only downsside?! its affordable n there are loads of classes to join!! the manager is managers are very nice too so in response to that review i think possibly the person writing it was on her period or something?.....

Review Title: Good friendly atmosphere and plenty of‚Ä¶
Review: good friendly atmosphere and plenty of equipment readily available, clean and tidy facilities

Review Title: Just with it was 24 hours and open‚Ä¶
Review: just with it was 24 hours and open weekends and had a sauna or steam room, but i still love it there. only you can do it burn fat and turn it into muscle. and this is the place to do it
i really enjoyed my time there - specially due to my sessions with robbie butler. the guy is fun, cares about you and make you sweat during the pt boxing sessions. really recommend!

pure gym hayes : once was very well managed but now suddenly constantly doing down. alots of equipment not maintained / damaged. shutting down of gym without notice / email / sms which they were use to do before / as of 11/11/2023 15:54 gym is closed until further notice , didnt received any notification at all when we went there found is locked and closed with notice on . really !! wasting our time and money. thinking about to leave .
great selection of equipment. i only use the treadmills and there‚Äôs plenty so i always get one, unlike other gyms i have used before.
excellent staff, great vibe around the place and i felt comfortable.

i just want to share since training with dave now for a year, i have grown in confidence and can see the massive improvement with my fitness plus my technique.  i feel welcome in the gym and the other pt‚Äôs are very friendly and polite as well.  i would definitely recommend him as your pt, he is very approachable, he drives success and encourages you to strive for more. i couldn‚Äôt ask for a better pt at all for the journey that i am on.  thank you dave for your support and commitment to me this past year.

Review Title: The worst customer service I have‚Ä¶
Review: the worst customer service i have received in a long time. i recently joined the gym and wanted to change my direct debit date to my payday. so i emailed as the number for customer services doesnt work. bearing in mind i joined on the 27th of september and emailed on the 3rd of october to request my direct debit date change. i was sent an auto-response about receiving a response and never received one. i then tried to change the app and online but no good. the date now comes for the direct debt to be collected and it fails. i received an email about logging into my account and that i now have late fees and admin fees. i tried to log in and even respond to the email they provided to talk with customer services, but again no answer just the automated response asking me to log in to my account i tried this but now my account is blocked and i cannot log in. i am appalled by the lack of customer service i have received. if someone had simply done their job and responded to me all those weeks ago, as they tried to collect the direct debt at the end of october i wouldnt be in this situation. they also cancelled all my classes from the 27th october and i only found out through the app, no email correspondence.

Review Title: A lot of equipment broken and run down.
Review: a lot of equipment broken and run down. i know puregym base themselves on being the cheaper alternative but i expect to at the very least be able to use what is in the gym. all the steppers in york are out of order (odd that all 3 are broken), a lot of the running machines were too. a lot of seats are no longer adjustable. i have been to other gyms in the area and i dont recall ever seeing some many things broken or not in use.
many times there is no liquid in the spray bottles for wiping down the machines!!!!! disgusting! in case there is a liquid, out of 4 bottles 1 will work‚Ä¶.. again: disgusting!

Review Title: I had the unfortunate experience of‚Ä¶
Review: i had the unfortunate experience of being a member at pure gym, and i must say that the staff at this gym is good at most times however one staff in particular left me very disappointed and not pleased as i have typically had a good experience at other puregyms. its not often that i feel compelled to write a bad review, but my encounters with this staff member were consistently disappointing.  first and foremost, the customer service she provided was abysmal. she seemed disinterested and indifferent to the needs and concerns of the members. it was as if she were going through the motions without any genuine care for the people they were supposed to be serving. i never felt welcomed or valued as a member, which made my visits to the gym a truly underwhelming experience.  additionally, i found her be unprofessional in her behavior. there were instances of her engaging in personal conversations on her phone, often ignoring the needs of members who required assistance or had questions. its not unreasonable to expect a certain level of professionalism and courtesy from the staff at a fitness facility. additionally i overheard her a few times making fun of the members as theyve walked away making inappropriate comments and who is to say she hasnt done the same for me.  i am unable to get the woman name but she is the manager which makes it exceptionally worse she is a short middle aged african woman and i would like she be dealt with immediately as she is ruining the experience for us.
not bad for the price, on certain times of the day it gets pretty crowded and a bit annoying to have to wait to exercise. cleanliness should emprove.

my friend and i have just had the most disgraceful experience at the canary wharf gym. we booked onto the learn to lift session with what they call on their website ‚Äúa fitness coach‚Äù. the app told us to wait in the functional area, so we arrived there 10 minutes early.  at 18:05 - 5 minutes after the 30 minute class was meant to start, he saunters over and starts to go into the men‚Äôs changing room. another pt we spoke to earlier called him over and he looked at us and asked what we wanted. we explained we were there for his class. he then proceeds to look at us like a piece of dirt, and passively aggressively explain he‚Äôs been waiting by the tables at the entrance. we explain the app told us to wait at the functional area and he proceeds to say ‚Äúno, you need to wait at the tables you know what tables are, i was there that‚Äôs where you need to go‚Äù. his attitude and attempts to mansplain what a table was absolutely disgusting. he then goes to walk away and we asked whether he was taking the session. he said he would come back later.  this experience felt incredibly misogynistic and as two female gym goers has knocked our confidence in ever coming back to puregym if this is how women are treated. his attitude towards the very fact we weren‚Äôt waiting for him where he was, whilst we were in the right area, was disgusting. we‚Äôve cancelled our memberships as we don‚Äôt feel comfortable around him in the future.  the gym has asked me to remove his personal details so unfortunately other women gym goers can‚Äôt be warned about him. would be good to hear back from the manager on this incident but alas we‚Äôre still waiting.  edit: have seen the reply. the same reply i received on google and twitter. i got in touch with the manager previous to writing this review, still no response ‚Ä¶

Review Title: Very busy, mostly for weight training.
Review: gym is very busy even at off peak times, most the equipment is for weight training and attracts that kind of clientele. not a gym for a new gym user at all.

if i could give zero stars i would. since lockdown its gone down hill and stayed there. staff have changed and they dont know how to run a gym. its filthy whenever i clean down the wipes come back black so unsure if any cleaning takes place. ive witnessed pts leave weights out on the floor setting a great standard for others... i tried emailing my concerns after being inappropriately approached by a trainer and they stopped replying when we were meant to arrange a talk. i then walked in last week and voiced my concerns to the person i was with which the manager overheard and said yeah and laughed. so ive cancelled my membership. laughing in the face of a customer that has concerns about the gym is absolutely disgusting.

Review Title: Terrible first visit not sure I‚Äôm returning
Review: today was my first day and really let down. recently started working in coventry but home is sutton coldfield. was going for the off peak membership as i wanted to do 6.30am classes before work but as i wanted both gyms had to pay the higher membership, which is fine. i got up at 5am today, got ready, drove to coventry to do the class i was booked onto. i was then told that as i was the only one booked on he cancelled the class!!! i asked if they had sent an email or message telling people and he just said no we don‚Äôt do that. i said i‚Äôd got up at 5am to get there and he just said ‚Äòoh right‚Äô and walked round pointing machines out to me. not exactly sure how that is acceptable as he is paid to be there and i‚Äôm paying to do the class. whether it is one person or twenty the class should be taught. so now im left having paid for this and not getting what i‚Äôve paid for. i only joined for the 6.30 classes as it‚Äôs the only time i have but am i now expected to turn up at 6.30am n hope that i might actually get what i‚Äôve paid for? really, really disappointed. it‚Äôs taken me so much to get in the right headspace to get back to the gym n having to work around my diary and split time between birmingham and coventry and getting up super early to do so, only to be let down. very bad service and not sure i‚Äôm going to go back. sad really. only expect the guy to do his job and what i‚Äôm paying for.  9/11/23 with regards to your response, yet again i‚Äôm am being shown the lack of interest in customer service or satisfaction. instead i‚Äôm being told to contact other people and (as you mention in your reply) it would be easier to include all my information. all the information is in the original review/email! i told u which gyms, what days, what time and you have my name! seriously how difficult can it be. this place is just making me more and more angry. stay away from puregym - you can see from start to finish the way things have been and how they‚Äôve been dealt with. dont waste your time and money!!
great class again with dan, however the studio was pumping out warm air - not what you want when youre working out!

Review Title: Great improvement,  It lovely to see staff helping others
Review: wow ,  massive improvment in pure gym stratford upon avon .  there lots staff about,  it lovely seeing them helping others so they can reach their goals.  i was happy how clean and tidy the enviroment is .  didnt have to wait long to use the equitment.  well done stratford upon avon. great improvement , keep it up

Review Title: No parking - members are fined for parking
Review: as several others have mentioned, members are never told to register their car reg every time they enter the gym. as a result several members have received parking charges of ¬£85. the management never took responsibility when it is clearly evident that 1) no free parking is allowed at the only available access to the gym and 2) no mention of the parking situation is included in the joining instructions and terms. instead, when the problem emerged, management silently added a4 paper with warning about the need to enter the car reg at a tablet that is almost hidden behind a wall. do not waste your time, money and above all sanity to become a member. i am cancelling mine.

paul, spin on a monday morning and tuesday evening are amasing. so incredibly kind and welcoming. paul took the time to answer my questions at the end of the class and offered to give targeted advice now im back at the gym following giving birth to my first baby. i would definitely recommend, amasing classes and amazing pt. challenging and rewarding classes. super friendly. thank you.

i‚Äôve been doing regular boxing with robbie since june. the sessions have been really fun and it‚Äôs rewarding to see the progress i‚Äôve made with the moves. working with robbie has really helped me keep in shape, improve my cardio fitness and kept me motivated with my overall fitness routine. the sessions are a good mix of cardio and core work, with changes/options for the session which keeps it interesting.   robbie is encouraging without being pushy which gets the most of each session. he‚Äôs friendly, brings energy, and has a sense of humour, which is a bonus! i‚Äôve really enjoyed working with robbie and would throughly recommend!

Review Title: Feedback on Pure Gym at Greenwich, London, SE10
Review: first and foremost, i appreciate the positive atmosphere and environment at the gym. its a welcoming place for fitness enthusiasts like myself.  however, there are a couple of aspects where i believe there is room for improvement: shower facilities: the water temperature in the shower facilities has been somewhat inconsistent. it would be beneficial if the water temperature could be more conducive for a comfortable post-workout shower. this is an essential part of the gym experience, and adjustments to improve it would be greatly appreciated.  wifi connectivity: ive noticed that the gyms wifi is often unreliable, making it challenging to stay connected or access online resources while at the gym. a more stable and reliable wifi connection would greatly enhance the overall experience, especially for those who use fitness apps or prefer to stream workouts.  i believe that addressing these two issues would significantly contribute to an even better gym experience for all members. i understand that improvements might take time, but it would be wonderful to receive updates on any plans to address these concerns.
excellent class with excellent instruction from chris. showers and changing rooms are clean.

its too hot. i appreciate the outside temperature is dropping but the temperature in the gym is far too high. if the gym is a bit cold, well you soon warm up when you start working out. but its so hot that im sweating before i even start. it is hotter than i have my living room at home. if it doesnt change im going to have to find another gym as its intolerable at the moment. also, i cant help but think it would save puregym money to turn the heat down.

very nasty gym! the staffs are so unprofessional, uncivilised,jealous and racists toward people of colour. ive seen many white folks workout with bare foot and nobody ever told them nothing but when i did,it was a problem. go back to school you mf uneducated poor things! would you worked out with alexander mcqueens shoes if you had one?! you guys are same as police officers, whenever they see a black person drives a good and expensive car its a game!   so your policies have to be followed by certain groups of people only,innit?! strange!  listen yeah! i said what i have said due to my experience! i have things to do in ma life either mr/madam! and working out is one among them!  my time is golden to just go gym and start arguments with strangers! huh!! im not that kind of person at all! im the one who was been picked on and harassed by your staff at d first place. we all know exactly that people like you, always look for a chance to act accordingly plus im not even your gym member anymore! there are plenty of nice gyms out there for me rather than being in yours that makes feel attacked,disrespected and harassed... i literally do not tolerate disrespect and embarrassment! i take that sh** seriously either!  it was only my second week since i joined. but because of the worst experience, i immediately removed my fat ass out of it and not interested at all love!!ngl its the nastiest gym in derby!

Review Title: Rochdale puregym Great PT Charlotte Mangan
Review: after training on and off over the last few years then hurting my shoulder, i decided it was time to work with a professional. i aimed to rebuild my confidence, strength and correct my form so i started looking at the personal trainers at pure gym. i joined in on a few fitness classes with different personal trainers to see how they worked and motivated the class. charlotte was great, not only did she motivate the class but she noticed my weaknesses and pushed me harder. ive been having pt sessions once a week with charlotte for a few months now and im really pleased to see how much my body has changed for the better. im getting stronger and fitter at the same time and have dropped a few inches off my waist. if im ever unsure about an exercise its very easy to speak to charlotte and she always makes training a good laugh and enjoyable, while keeping an eye on my form and pushing me to do that extra rep or two. i would highly recommend charlotte mangan to anyone

this is more of a personal review aimed at a personal trainer rather than the actual gym, but i can‚Äôt recommend charlotte enough! literally goes above and beyond to make each one of us feel comfortable and confident in the gym. shes doesn‚Äôt only help us in the gym but arranges get togethers outside of the gym. she‚Äôs always there to message if you need motivation, advice or inspiration with workouts or food. i get a specific workout plan set for me every couple of months based on what my goals are whether it‚Äôs weight loss or toning up!  she‚Äôs really helped boost my confidence in the gym and i genuinely can‚Äôt thank her enough!!

Review Title: Puregym Mansfield is a welcoming, safe place

Review Title: Pure Gym is an outstanding fitness‚Ä¶
Review: pure gym is an outstanding fitness facility located in a convenient spot. the gym offers a wide range of top-notch facilities that cater to every fitness enthusiasts needs. what truly sets pure gym apart are the exceptional classes they offer; they are not only engaging but also highly effective in helping you achieve your fitness goals.  one of the standout features of pure gym is its unwavering commitment to cleanliness and hygiene. the gym is consistently well-maintained, and you can always count on a spotless workout environment. moreover, the staff at pure gym are friendly, approachable, and always willing to assist you in your fitness journey.  i have thoroughly enjoyed my time at pure gym and have seen significant improvements in my fitness and overall well-being. if youre looking for a gym that combines great facilities, fantastic classes, cleanliness, and a supportive staff, pure gym is the place to be. its an excellent choice for anyone committed to achieving their fitness goals.

Review Title: Hope you like Avicii at 250 dB
Review: ive taken out an off-peak membership for the winter months, purely to use the treadmills so my marathon training doesnt take a hit.  i cant complain about the machines, they more than do the job. the times i visit are quiet enough with lots of space.  the only downside is the music volume in the classes. if i cant hear anything from a headphone that is millimeters from my eardrum - then maybe your music is too loud? doesnt help that the music is atrocious but thats neither here nor there.  god help those who regularly use the classes - fitness with a side of tinnitus?  a few of the lockers are in need of maintenance, locks do not close properly because the frame of the locker has been bent and damaged.

the actual gym was fine but the customer service (or basically total lack of customer service) was unbelievably irritating. i a few times had issues with things that didnt work properly on the app like class booking errors and when i tried to contact anyone it was impossible. there is no phone line and when i emailed or sent a facebook message i got taken through a massive loop of replies from bots and then when i got through to a person they didnt seem to have all the information id already sent and then each reply was from a new person who also didnt seem to understand the the previous conversation. i got very general copy and paste replies that didnt have any relevance to my questions when i had issues or questions about the gym. the final straw was that when i tried to cancel it was impossible on the website and app as the instructions for how to cancel just took me in a loop and it had a very scammy feel. the instructions for how far in advance you need to cancel are also very different in different parts of the app and website.
