Review Title: No staff around, equipment not cleaned
Review: the equipment seems to no longer be cleaned and wiped down by actual cleaning staff. i used to see staff and cleaning staff around before covid but now theyre nowhere to be seen. now i see lumps of dust sitting on all the treadmills and the changing room looking shabby. i think they have the mentality of expecting members to do the cleaning themselves, and if the members arent going to do it then tough, so be it. really disappointing as the standards were very good before. i used to love that they kept it clean and offered a ladies only section but it feels icky to work out there now.

unfortunately i was left no choice but to leave a bad review!  over the weekend there was flooding, toilets was out of service and the showers wasnt working. i understand things can sometimes go wrong but we should have got an email about this or have access to other gyms!  a few days later i noticed they fixed the problem but i see mould and maggots on the side of the shower!  i tried to email them directly about it but i got no response. very unhygienic!  i really hope that start taking this seriously because this is quite serious!

recently joined this gym after leaving jd round the corner..i have to say im disappointed‚Ä¶ ive worked in gyms over the years. the gym its self is spacious and cool air con works..i dont use changing facilitys so cant comment on this‚Ä¶.there is a lack of equipment especially stack machines which are located upstairs, the staff although friendly seem to gather round a bar type seating area in the middle of the gym‚Ä¶there gym bags, water bottles food, are all there, they seem to be laughing, at one point playing paper aeroplanes, i find this very unprofessional and intimidating, of all the gyms i have worked in and worked out of i have never seen this happen, do they not have a staff room to do this in, it really puts me off going to the point of returning back to jd, pure gym you could do better.

Review Title: Sort out the ventilation problem please
Review: puregym witney - big problems with air con. always too hot. even in winter. beware

Review Title: I've been a member for over a year...
Review: ive been a member of this puregym for over a year now and i would never go anywhere else now. spacious, plenty equipment, smells nice and its clean and most of the staff are friendly and nice. amazing gym!! i love it!!!!

Review Title: Great gym equipment and staff just busy‚Ä¶
Review: great gym equipment and staff just busy at times i like to go

Review Title: The environment is excellent and the‚Ä¶
Review: the environment is excellent and the gym is well equipped

Review Title: I love puregym however the gyms need‚Ä¶
Review: i love puregym however the gyms need more investment. some gyms have broken equipment that still has not been fixed yet.
very clean good selection of equipment not clicky

Review Title: No improvements for years and years
Review: no improvements for years and years some equipment either dont work or have missing parts to it the staff turnover is regular, so our membership fees do get used partially, but the equipment at the gym never gets maintained or fixed

Review Title: I had an induction Ella was lovely and‚Ä¶
Review: i had an induction ella was lovely and explained everything really well she understood my needs as i have balance issues but was very patient and understanding this is going to be a long journey but one i am looking forward to.

overall a good gym environment. as a regular gym goer seeing a few pieces of equipment out of use for long periods of time is not very helpful when you want to use that machine. one of the adjustable benches needs a refresh and one of the cable machines has been out of use for sometime. i question whether the ¬£35 a month is worth it.

terrible gym. visited 3 different sites in the south london area. various machines out of service , no air con on so the whole gym is like a sweat box and on one location, the front door was off the hinges and da homeless person sleeping in the entrance hall. the price you pay is not worth the service it offers.

joined pure gym solihull (sears park) last week. visited this morning at 6am and no members of staff were there to open up. waited 20 minutes in the rain and then went home.  whilst in queue, i spoke to a group of people who told me the gym not opening on time is not uncommon.  i would avoid this gym as it‚Äôs amateurish and badly run. i plan on cancelling my membership.

i just need a gym temporarily while were in the wet and cold season. so for me a flexible arrangement i can cancel when i choose is imperative. this is my 1st restatement of my membership with this gym. the prices are good too.

Review Title: Freezing cold changing room and shower
Review: the issue i am referring to pertains to the unreasonably cold temperature in the shower rooms designated for women. it appears that the air conditioning is continuously left on, resulting in an uncomfortable and unpleasant experience for gym members. the excessive coldness makes it challenging to have a refreshing and satisfactory shower, subsequently impacting our overall gym experience.  what concerns me the most is the dismissive attitude displayed by the staff when i have voiced my complaint. instead of actively addressing the issue, they have merely laughed and nodded in agreement, which is deeply disheartening. as a loyal and dedicated customer of pure gym, i believe that our concerns should be treated with utmost importance and professionalism.i kindly request that pure gym take immediate action to rectify this situation. it is essential that the air conditioning in the shower rooms is adjusted to ensure a comfortable environment for gym members. additionally, i urge pure gym to address the attitude of the staff towards customer complaints, emphasizing the importance of providing a supportive and respectful environment.

Review Title: Good place to get fit with friendly atmosphere
Review: great place to train friendly atmosphere. staff only to happy to help

Review Title: Still can queue to get in or out
Review: a good gym but following recent heavy rain it has knocked out one of the two entry/ exit doors which can cause queues when busy. manager today let us out of fire exit

Review Title: Staff are really friendly and they are‚Ä¶
Review: staff are really friendly and they are happy to help you if you need it the only thing that less it down is the showers are not really clean they is hair on the walls and in the floor of the shower and the sink smell of drains that is the only thing that

Review Title: Wow what a class with Matt
Review: absolutely amazing halloween lbt, well done pt matt and paula,  you smashed it tonight

Review Title: Been a member of pure gym for a little‚Ä¶
Review: been a member of pure gym for a little while now and found it exactly what i want apart from the lack of cleanliness which they are now addressing . however over the weekend they have turned the water temperature down and  showers are now very unpleasant. i use the gym before work and it‚Äôs essential the gym i use provides shower facilities.  i now feel i have to change gyms as cold showers are not what i signed up for .  very disappointing.would appreciate pure gym replying to this review, as they have a 5 star positive review further down this list of reviews!

been a member of this gym for the past year and the experience has been okay its busy at peak times (as to be expected) great early in the mornings but not many cleaning stations nor kept clean in the changing rooms and worst of all i got multiple parking finesfor using the gym that i already pay for and puregym holds no accountability for doing business with the horrible gansters over at euro car parks...
the gym felt airy and clean when i visited today and karis always has smile

nice gym, but parking is a scam. been member for 6 years at orpington, but used crayford as one off whilst refurbishment being carried out. was not aware you needed to put in registration number to use the members car park. got fined for 100 quid. pure gym wont help. the only thing left to do is let people know they down care about members who theyve had for 6 years. will be cancelling my membership.  update 07/11/2023. resonse for pure gym below is standard cut and paste. they send this reply on all formats. going to the gym should be an enjoyable, relaxing experience. if you are going to a new gym in your lunch hour and anything like me, you are rushing and dont have time to look at tiny wording on small signs or an ipdad in the gym to put your car details in. sorry pure gym, you did nothing to intervene. just standard responses like below just like all the other cases where members have be fined and you did nothing. how any gym can allow members especially long term ones like me to get fined for a having a workout is beyond me. but all i can do is cancel my membership as you clearly dont care about members.
great staff. great equipment. always clean and everyone is kind. the staff are very friendly and the equipment that is provided is very resourceful.

Review Title: Joined after a 3 year lay off
Review: joined after a 3 year lay off, found the gym clean equipment was good, staff were available if needed, only moan would be some more leg machines ? leg extensions and another calf machine, seated or standing one , other than that very happy

Review Title: Good gym no complaints from me friendly‚Ä¶
Review: good gym no complaints from me friendly environment

Review Title: It was my first visit to this club
Review: it was my first visit to this club. i came on a scooter and i left it in the male locker room on saturday evening. as i returned to the locker room to collect the scooter at 11 pm after my workout the scooter went missing.  there was nobody around to report about the event. i sent emails over the weekend but nobody returned them. the phones did not respond.  on monday i reported a crime to the police. the police assigned a crime ref. number and i sent this number to the emails provided on the site. it was at this point only when somebody finally contacted me by phone.  the manager said the club can do nothing to help me other than wait until the police does something. i was not offered any apologies or a refund.  the place looks more like a ghost house full of criminals than a sports club. i regret i paid that visit.  leonid

Review Title: Why was I charged double for 1 month???
Review: i was just charged for 2 months even after freezing my membership, i have ignored some other issues but i can‚Äôt let this go and can‚Äôt reach anyone.
nice, clean, lots of parking space

Review Title: PT - unprofessional, bullying and defensive text in response to feedback
Review: the pt i complained about and provided with feedback has contacted me directly with a long defensive and aggressive text message - distorting the truth to cover his own back. his text was made up of calling me names and distorted scenarios to protect himself - scenarios he has never mentioned until ive raised this complaint. the fact these scenarios were never documented or raised shows that this is a false narrative being used to protect himself.  this shows the inability to receive feedback and respond professionally. the professional and correct response wouldve been to apologise, raise it with his line manager or address the refund.  i have contacted the cluster manager again with a screenshot of his text messages. along with the truth about these false allegations hes using to justify his unjust behaviour.  i hope puregym deal with this unprofessionalism and bullying appropriately. i advise all members receive professional training on customer service, and diversity & inclusion (which covers discrimination and gender equality). i feel as though a lot of this was driven by x (pt) perceiving me as a young black woman he could take advantage of, and did not expect i would escalate appropriately.  i will continue to feedback any negative experiences from x or the general gym staff here and escalate to the regional manager - no paying customer should be treated this way, and i hope this doesnt happen again.
staff and other members made me feel welcome and helped me when i was struggling

Review Title: Best PureGym in the area                        I used to go to the Fareham PureGym‚Ä¶
Review: i used to go to the fareham puregym because of the large workout space and ease of parking. having used the gym over a long period i noticed a decline in equipment maintenance, cleanliness throughout the space , including badly maintained upkeep of the changing rooms and showers. i then moved to north harbour,the difference was vast. north harbour,clean tidy, well maintained equipment, friendly atmosphere. the number one puregym in the area. well done,keep up the great work.

Review Title: A good gym but equipment downstairs i.e‚Ä¶
Review: a good gym but equipment downstairs i.e cardio machines are awful and about broke. water is warm and pressure is awful for drinking.

Review Title: Tony is such a vibe honestly
Review: tony is such a vibe honestly, whenever he‚Äôs in nothing can go wrong, always tidying up the whole gym tryna keep it clean for all the gym users, plus helps a lot whoever needs it. really nice person.

Review Title: Highly recommend the classes and staff are brilliant
Review: i have been attending the classes at puregym in banbury for 6 months now, i had never joined classes before. but i must say i have noticed a huge difference in my fitness levels and appearance. the classes are easy to book and i now often do 2 classes in an evening with each class being 30 or 45 mins there is a wide choice of classes available and all the personal trainers are just brilliant, although i would like to mention rebecca, freddie, stephanie and gemma in particular for their help, advice and friendliness
great friendly gym to workout.always clean. went at a later time than normal & it was just perfect

Review Title: Always clean inside and plenty of‚Ä¶
Review: always clean inside and plenty of parking.
nice trainer, nice environment and the gym has been refurbished well.
good facilities, the only criticism i would have is the showers are not very clean or worm.

Review Title: Top staff, Top kit, maintenance issues.
Review: the best thing about puregym waterlooville is the superb staff - friendly, professional and always helpful. the pt standards are excellent and they run the classes to a high standard. i‚Äôve observed this gym to be very welcoming, pretty diverse and inclusive. high quality equipment and most of it works most of the time. the only let-down is the lift access has been out of order since forever and this may impact some people with mobility issues who want to use the gym facilities. i don‚Äôt think this is the fault of waterlooville, i suspect puregym have a naff corporate maintenance contract. if they can fix that then it would be 5-stars!

Review Title: Modern gym, good value for money
Review: modern gym, good value for money, 24 access.

Review Title: The facilities were great the place is‚Ä¶
Review: the facilities were great the place is spotless. easy access

Review Title: No interest or help from staff member.?
Review: email sent twice to customer services and still waiting for response, nearly 4 weeks later ??? .......  dear sir/madam,  ive recently joined the puregym at westwood gateway retail park in broadstairs, kent on 2nd october. having not been to a gym for quite some time, i was both happy and excited to see that you offer a "get started " induction class, to help and demonstrate the facilities and safety at the branch. i booked this straight away for this weekend as i wanted to feel more confident when using the gym equipment. my booking information was confirmed in the week (please find attached)  i arrived approx 10 mins early but unfortunately, my pass code would not work for entrance to the gym. i managed to get help from another member who let me in and i was going to bring it up with the (staff member) during the induction.  she wasnt at the entrance as stated, so i took a seat on the nearby benches. about 3:10pm, nobody had arrived, despite saying there was only 2 spaces left on my booking. i gave it till about 3:20pm and went upstairs on the mezzanine, which i thought there maybe a staff member, but the offices were all shut. i rechecked my emails and it was definitely the right time/date.  i looked over to the corner of the gym and saw a lady with what looked like a puregym uniform on. i approached her and apologized for interrupting and asked her about the class. she replied with that she was (staff member) and the class should not of been booked as she doesnt work saturdays? she kept blaming the management for the mistake? i asked her what can i do, as id taken the afternoon off work to attend the class and she said you can try and book again for next weekend, but itll be no good as nobody works here at weekends??  i found her very strange and unhelpful as she was actually there working, despite saying she doesnt work on saturdays??  i left the gym feeling quite deflated and confused about the whole situation and lack of empathy from (staff member).  for this reason, i really would appreciate for you to arrange a refund on my opening account fund as i dont think i want to carry on with being a member of puregym. ive enclosed my receipt email for that too. please advise.  yours sincerely, sl  ive obviously not enclosed the staff members name as advised by trust pilot, but really disappointed about the whole situation and the fact the staff member was not interested in helping me in any way (ie) informing the gym manager or advising me of what to do ?

i‚Äôve been attending the gym at borough for almost 6 months and have been truly impressed with kassidy chaplin.  the way he conducts training sessions are very well thought through, he‚Äôs always 100% present and makes sure the form is correct, be it 1-2-1 sessions or group ones. he really stands out as someone who‚Äôs not only in great shape himself but is also a great teacher. apart from that, kassidy has a caring personality, is great fun to be around and makes me literally run to the gym to be part of his classes!
very helpful, friendly staff at a clean, well equipped gym.

Review Title: I love the Zumba classes at purley pure‚Ä¶
Review: i love the zumba classes at purley pure gym. they are very energetic and fun.
gym was decent, first time in years i have been years to a gym. took the 30min bootcamp class was a good class
good staff, classes, facilities and value for money
clean gym.   helpful staff.   plenty of equipment, really enjoy going to puregymn

Review Title: Tidy away your toys ,Im not your mother
Review: due to work schedule i use the gym in the early hours of the morning when it is less busy and enjoy the peacefulness. the overnight supervisor paul is always very helpful and keeps the place very clean indeed considering the amount of people through the door. just a message to some of the other members would be to clean up any mess you make,whether its in the training area or in the shower areas,and put the weights back when your finished with them. its called gym etiquette.
excellent customer service and good condition equipment
amazing gym , a lot of equipment especially for the calisthenics department. great staff too
i love the classes, especially the assistant manager karis
good atmosphere, the staffs are friendly, quiet and tidy.

Review Title: Large variety of machines and very‚Ä¶
Review: large variety of machines and very spacious building with a friendly atmosphere

Review Title: My bicycle was stolen yesterday in the‚Ä¶
Review: my bicycle was stolen yesterday in the facilities of this gym. and apparently, as one of the staff told me, bicycles and electronic skates had already been stolen before. and sometimes they say they cant do anything about it. so at least they should put a notice in the gym that they are not responsible for bike thefts. since in theory we are their clients and they are their facilities. i hope they can do something to solve my problem.

barrys personal training was an absolute game-changer for me! hes not just incredibly knowledgeable but also super approachable.  as a total newbie in the gym, he helped me feel at ease and took my squat form from shaky to solid. his guidance didnt just build my skills; it boosted my confidence, turning my gym jitters into a real sense of belonging. hes a gem!
relaxed and friendly place
good gym with decent equipment. barry has helped me out from a beginner to someone who can just turn up and use the equipment correctly and work on a set of work out for a session so really useful!

the toilets are dirty during the evenings. bad behaviour of members with weights, throwing them on the floor (lack of supervision),threatening other members. not a safe place at all. no wifi to see the training program on the basement floor or listen to music online. action is needed on that.

lots of people looovveee ahfreens thursdays 18:30pm burn it class in hoxton. pure gym hoxton needs to do more circuit style classes in the evenings. ahfreen and vincents was the best . please put ahfreen aktar on more evening and weekend classes because her classes are the best. however all her classes are the morning very early which no one can attend.  also vincent metcon class is very good however the times are random time during the day. please make some of them evening. vincent is also a great instructor.  robbies burn it classes are also very good.  one negative: encourage members to clean equipment after using esp after classes because people sweat over the equipment and just put them straight back and its unhygienic. also more cleaning stations in the gym with actual wipes not the spray. so people are encouraged to maintain the cleanliness of the equipment.
this is a great gym, just enough people for a good atmosphere. no issues with getting onto any equipment. all the equipment is in great condition and overall a good gym to attend.

Review Title: Good facilities and not too busy on my‚Ä¶
Review: good facilities and not too busy on my visit
the gym is clean . good hygiene and very helpful staff.

Review Title: Great, friendly local gym, with excellent classes
Review: a really friendly, and very affordable local gym with a wide range of classes and a great mix of age groups. consistently fun and well taught classes, friendly and responsive management - just an easy environment to go and get fit in. particularly love the post workout massage chair!

Review Title: So enjoy the class that Karis did this‚Ä¶
Review: so enjoy the class that karis did this afternoon and overall all her classes are amazing

Review Title: No EV charging point so I had to leave
Review: had to leave because this pure gym doesn‚Äôt have an electric vehicle charging point(s) so i found one that did. didn‚Äôt really want to tbh.
friendly atmosphere. secure entry. staff always available. good quality machines

a good gym! has everything from equipment to changing rooms to staff etc. the ladies section is an amazing addition! members of staff are very helpful and friendly and their pts are professional and well trained. parking access is fantastic and free!

Review Title: I love the employees and they make me‚Ä¶
Review: i love the employees and they make me feel great one of my reasons as to why i come everyday! community vibes!

i recently joined pure gym in park royal. i absolutely love the facilities. the classes are great and so motivating. i am a covered woman who wears hijab so its a massive plus for me that they have a ladies only gym as well. ive tried many other gyms in west london with ladies only gyms and the equipment is very limited. however at pure gym park royal they have everything and more! it a very decent size as well, doesnt feel cramped at all. its also a very clean gym which i love, the changing rooms are bery spacious as well. definitely the best gym ive been to in west london. highly recommend!
great gym! happy with how the gym is being maintained
well equipped and comfortable environment to workout in, the only problem i have with our facilities is that the men‚Äôs changing room appeared to be duty

ive been going to puregym in basingstoke road for a few years now. i really like the atmosphere there, and staff are very friendly and professional. im not giving 5 stars though because im very disappointed that they have removed the boxfit session on mondays with kamil. in my opinion it was the best class and it was always full. so please bring boxfit back.
competitive prices, good range of machines, couple of nice touches re massage bed and drinks dispenser.

the team is amazing here. everybody is so welcoming, lovely and helpful. the gym is very clean including the changing room, which is always spotless. i love the new edition, the sport vitamin water machine. the flavours are delicious. as for classes my favourite is the spin class and no matter which team member holds this class its always amazing. i highly recommend this gym.

i‚Äôve been with dave a couple months now and feel amazing, i feel so much more confident within myself as i have gained muscle and definition and i can‚Äôt wait to keep training and get my dream body as i know dave will help me achieve this! x

they lie about parking, they say 7/24 free onsite parking. but after 12.01 am parking control fine you automatically. and pure gym does not help at all to remove this fine. i paid ¬£170 to the parking fine 2 times, ¬£350 in total. before paying these, 3 times i went to pure gym, told that i am a member, 1 time called the solicitors, mailed to uk parking control. no one did anything, they just forced me to pay the fine.

ive an outstanding personal trainer, ray, which is why ive been a member of puregym kentish town since it opened in 2016.  rays got my fitness level to the highest ever, taught me to maintain a healthy diet and kept me on track to reach my target weight. rays motivated me so that going to puregym and focusing on my fitness and health are now very much my way of life. had a great session yesterday having just got back from holiday. hghly recommend ray.
lovely gym. filled with good equipment and lovely staff.

Review Title: Pretty awful gym to be honest- went‚Ä¶
Review: pretty awful gym to be honest- went today having bought a day pass; put my belongings in a locker which was dented, trying to shut the door and saw 2 employees laughing at it. not good. gym equipment is ok bit battered, but not a great deal- very dark aswell as underground. plenty of better gyms in the city centre, wont be returning

i sometimes do spin classes in the morning with no issues. this is my second spin class that ive attended at lunch time and on both occasions the cleaner has saw fit to mop the floor just before the class starts causing a breach of health and safety. the manager apologised last week and assured us that it wouldnt happen again and yet here we are again!!!!! not happy!!
roxana, dan‚Äôs and craig‚Äôs classes are great.

lovely gym and facilities. downside is too many people sitting on mobile phones taking up kit when people wish to use them. also some taking videos which isn‚Äôt ideal when trying i just want to work out and not worry about getting into someone‚Äôs video!

ive been a regular at this gym for quite some time now, and i can confidently say its my go-to spot for a morning workout. the fact that theyre open 24 hours is a huge plus for someone like me who prefers avoiding the crowds. the gym maintains a clean and tidy environment, which is always a welcome sight, and theres no shortage of equipment to choose from. so far, ive encountered no issues or inconveniences. its the perfect place for those early risers looking for a hassle-free fitness experience.

Review Title: Cheap gym - get what you pay for.
Review: usual. far too busy. can‚Äôt use equipment. young men hogging equipment whilst on their phones.
well managed gym with great environment. very good equipment and everywhere nice and clean. all in all very good value for money.
ive been using the gym for 2 weeks and ive already received an ¬£85 parking fine. now they ask members register the car reg every single day to avoid parking fines, thats ridiculous.

puregym gives me virtually everything that i need (sauna would be great) at a price that is far more manageable than the gym prices that i was paying previously at a local gym and i like the independence to do my own thing

Review Title: Equipment is good just cleaning is in‚Ä¶
Review: equipment is good just cleaning is in order as gets very messy

the staff are always friendly and helpful! upon signing up, i was warmly welcomed by the co-manager lara who is often available on the gym floor. i have already recommended this gym to two other people who have since become members. its a very well-maintened space with a plethora of equipment. i use both the main gym floor and the womens section - ive never felt more safe and comfortable in a gym as a woman. in particularly, the ladies only section is one of the best spaces i have ever accessed due to the machines, equipment and free weights available. there are plenty of classes going on throughout the week as well. i am thoroughly impressed! not to mention the parking is 10/10. as someone who previously found gyms daunting, seeing my pt karis who is a co-manager of this gym is now the highlight of my week!
the gym is clean and tidy and the staff are great. it is still missing essential equipment not enough cable machine attachments and requires another leg machine and abdominal machine.
it had good facilities
great tidy gym - great access and value

i‚Äôd like to personally thank (c)karis she went above and beyond to meet my needs, all with a kind smile in toe. this encounter occurred at 6am which in itself warrants merit as i‚Äôm not a morning person but karis appears to be. all round the gym is great, large spaces 2 floors, open 24/7, has a plethora of equipment and is managed by great staff. only downside is that there are not enough weight plates to go around so at times when the gym is busy (peak times) you find yourself wondering the abyss for days trying to find weight plates to get those gains. my rating is (a-). ps who does not love free parking, thanks again karis.

Review Title: Had a brilliant Box Fit class with‚Ä¶
Review: had a brilliant box fit class with samuel dennis! as always, injuries were asked about and i mentioned my finger injury. he knew exactly how to adapt the session for me with loads of fun boxing combinations and quick steps. he combined lower body workouts between upper cuts, jabs and hooks. thoroughly enjoyed every minute of his motivating class!

Review Title: I joined the gym to attend the spin‚Ä¶
Review: i joined the gym to attend the spin classes and every time i sign up they get cancelled.

Review Title: THe gym has all the equipment could‚Ä¶
Review: the gym has all the equipment could possibly need and it always works. the staff are friendly and helpful. changing room and showers are clean. the toilet never has anywhere to dry your hands.

Review Title: Nice big gym with best Deep Personal trainer
Review: nice big gym with free parking,  i have been training with deep pt for last 8 weeks and managed to lose 9kg, staff are amazing
great gym, lots of equipment and lots of classes with fun staff.

puregym derby showers are substandard. they are not cleaned often enough and usually smell like rotting cabbage! this is unacceptable. an otherwise decent gym is spoiled by dirty showers and changing rooms in need of refurbishment.
lovely gym brilliant instructors especially dean who has helped me loads. classes are amazing

Review Title: I don't know why there are so many‚Ä¶
Review: i dont know why there are so many negative reviews, gym is great. go to other gyms in kent or deeper in the country side, you will see how bad things can really be. overall 9/10, what can be improved is people behavior in the gym, they could be a bit cleaner and not leaving equipment everywhere around after using it (weight, dumbbells ect.)

Review Title: It always suits me to go to pure Gym‚Ä¶
Review: it always suits me to go to pure gym because of the flexibility of the hours being retired, the staff are always helpful it‚Äôs really agreat experience

Review Title: The trainers are all friendly and super‚Ä¶
Review: the trainers are all friendly and super helpful. they take a personal interest in the members. i have also seen the trainers advise people using equipment while they are passing in the gym

Review Title: Pure gym is nice and friendly open‚Ä¶
Review: pure gym is nice and friendly open 24hrs lots of equipment to chose from good quality too you dont feel intimidated friendly atmosphere and cheap membership .very clean

Review Title: Great gym nice spin class with nice‚Ä¶
Review: great gym nice spin class with nice bikes and nice gym are with lots of equipment and very clean friendly staff and all good at this gym

Review Title: Chose this gym because of the range of‚Ä¶
Review: chose this gym because of the range of weekend classes that were available as i am unable to attend during the week, very disappointed to now find that there are no suitable classes at weekends and no sign of anymore classes being added to the timetable  i‚Äôm now considering changing to a different gym that has a more varied timetable

classes have gone downhill - we loved sams classes on a saturday morning and since she has left, there are now none at suitable times for us. we are unable to go to weekday classes due to full time work and family commitments. very disappointed at the lack of classes at the weekends.

Review Title: There is always something wrong with‚Ä¶
Review: there is always something wrong with the bathroom. but it has been more than 1 momth since the drinking water tap is not working. water is somethig that is a mandatory thing in the gym. people are bringing there own bottles but sometimes one bottle is not enough when you are doing heavy workout. this is a careless behaviour from the.management that they are not fixing this problem
its a nice and modern gym clean with friendly staff

Review Title: Reliable and convenient with helpful staff
Review: reliable and convenient with helpful staff @ lewisham high street se13 5jx

way too hot!!! they put the heating on in the cardio area when its 17 degrees. people are hot and sweaty working out... we dont need air conditioning blasting hot air at us. my husband feels the same way and ive heard others say the same.  also, cleaning is very poor, i never see cleaners actually cleaning machines or weights. one treadmill has the same piece of food and tissue stuck in the drink holder for weeks. one guy working here walked up to one single window panel and rubbed the glass with a dripping wet mop and walked off.. i dont think they know how to clean properly.  good equipment but its not clean. i moved nearest to this gym, my old gym had a ladies only section which i liked. i feel like after 6pm this gym is full of young lads hogging all the weights so im not confident to use that section when its busy, but thats just my feeling and the gym is not in control of those situations.  i want to do my cardio without sweating before ive even started.

Review Title: From the couple of times i have been‚Ä¶
Review: redditch‚Ä¶from the couple of times i have been, the gym is as i expect from a commercial gym, the cardio section though is the most uninspiring section i have seen in any gym. 90% of machines facing a wall, i don‚Äôt expect much but even mirrors so i can see my bloated red face would be better, don‚Äôt understand how that was deemed the best lay out??

Review Title: The gym is what someone would expect‚Ä¶
Review: the gym is what someone would expect from a pure gym type of gym. it has most of the necessary equipment and it is clean enough. two things that are worth noting are that for some unknown reason the studio is constantly locked when not running a class. this may be a small thing for some but as a woman i would rather prefer to use that space in order to do some of my exercises in peace and comfortably. all the gyms i experienced before (even ones with way worse services and lower prices) keep the studio open so that people can use to feel more comfortable either because the gym could be busy or just because they want to avoid being stared by other members. last, there are quite a few corners into the gym (especially most of the lower floor) that i have absolutely zero signal. i have checked with other people as well and it is not a personal issue. it may be a generalised area issue but it would be easily resolved with providing a simple wifi connection to the gym members.  the outcomes: the gym is in a pretty good state and its efficient enough. just leave the studio open like most gyms please. a wifi network would solve the signal issue in no minute.

Review Title: Air conditioner only blows HOT air!
Review: was ok during the summer now this gym have started to turn off cool air from the air conditioning and instead turn on hot air! in a gym! so when you are sweating you have hot air blowing in your face ! this is a health hazard. i‚Äôm surprised trading standards haven‚Äôt been called! sort it out! we want cool air , stop this hot air ! because of this i will be quitting my membership and will go elsewhere .

usually happy with the gym although the changing rooms have been closed for around two months now. supposed to open today but still closed. rely on going during my lunch break so i need shower facilities! not happy and considering moving!

Review Title: This is the gym that is located in the‚Ä¶
Review: this is the gym that is located in the heart of london. i am a member for the last few years and i can confirm that the internet doesn‚Äôt work in half of the gym at all times ! how this is acceptable in such location in xxi century ?? i‚Äôm not sure‚Ä¶ @puregym can you please do something about it ?

*as per the email i sent to group and colne*  please can you register this as an official complaint.  can you please put in a request to turn the temperatures and water pressures back up in the showers at your gym.  i was disappointed when your group issued the order to turn them all down, and it was intolerable a few months ago when the weather was warm. now it is winter it is unbearable. you come out shivering, unclean and i‚Äôm sure will end up getting a cold/flu eventually.  it is so bad i am actually actively looking at moving gyms.

less than 1 star!!! they‚Äôre not only horrible customer service but they lie about being an affordable service, they literally scam u to pay more no customer service line so everything is via email and it‚Äôs actually nonsense don‚Äôt waste ur money or time with them

good little gym however hygiene still needs to be improved! upstairs opposite the leg machines there is a constant strong smell of urine which seems to be in the carpet. also staff hygiene needs to be addressed!!
beat gym, great experience
amazing best gym in town, brilliant managers and top team very helpful üôåüèª

Review Title: A good cost effective solution for gym ‚Ä¶
Review: a good cost effective solution for gym membership when travelling. i return to the uk for a few months annually and pure gym memberships are perfect for maintaining training while in blighty.

Review Title: Clean safe environment to train with‚Ä¶
Review: clean safe environment to train with trainers available

broken equipment never gets repaired have to wait months, ladies showers smell filthy always cold lots of members complied about how cold the showers are but got ignored..  showers are not 33oc no way!!! they are very cold the gym staff lies to you they are never going to fix the cold shower issue, will find an alternative gym. sick of the bull#### used and alternative pure gym in dudley and the showers were not cold so it goes to show the ones in tipton are freezing and they refused to turn them up!! staff at tipton waste of time!!!!!  update no response from gym they gym is cold you know the heating wont come on, and the showers are still cold saving money at our expense.

in two years of going to the gym its has got worse over time and not getting any better and im looking for a new gym to go too. they promise wifi never happened and never got it in two years. but yet the staff have no issues getting online with the gym wifi?! no proper climate control. the main air con has been broken for the last two years and instead of fixing they try using portable units that dont do the job so in summer its to hot and in winter the hot water temp is set to cold in the showers. the showers, sinks and drainage stinks and gets blocked all the time. so the drains need sorting or fixing. i now see more and more machines out of action and when there is only one of that machine it can be an issue to peoples routines. the flavour water dispenser seems to run out of flavour all the time or be out of order. there is damaged flooring stuck down with tape and silly stuff like that. so they charge you and make promises of things they dont deliver and the gym is literally falling apart and it seems the company or management dont care. so why should i pay a gym that dont give what they offer or take care of the gym and do repairs like they are meant to. so other than friendly staff and a lot of nice people that go even though a lot have stopped going. i dont see any reason to go to this gym.

i been coming here for a while, this gym is filthy, barley any cleaning supplies, hardly seen a cleaner. all the equipment all over the place. no health and safety care. machine are too close together waiting for an accident.

Review Title: It is good Gym, very comfortable

Review Title: Gym is always rammed with unemployed‚Ä¶

hi  i have been coming to the puregym in hammersmith for nearly a year. the gym is well looked after and clean, and the staff is very friendly and supportive. there are people from all ages. classes are great, but my special thanks go to my pt, mel, who has motivated me to not give up and helped me to enjoy exercise in a healthier way!
rude staff, no space at the gym, toilet hand dryers always out order. staffs eyes always on you, making feel uncomfortable!!

Review Title: APPALLING VOLUME OF RAVE MUSIC EARLY IN THE MORNING
Review: this is the third complaint i have written about the appalling volume of music in pure gym in salisbury. it is simply not acceptable.  i have spent over ¬£200 on two sets of noise cancelling headphones in order to drown out the rave music being played at a high volume on a sunday morning! i was the only person in the gym at 4.30 am and it felt as though i was going to a rave!  after my second complaint i was shown where the volume control was and so i was able to turn the volume down myself, however this now seems to have been over ridden. may i respectfully ask why people want to listen to music at this level when most of them wear their own headphones anyway?  if there was another 24 hour gym in salisbury then i would immediately leave pure gym and join somewhere else.  i get up early to work out early for my own well-being before going to work. i run my own business and listen to my clients and find it appalling that pure gym do not take notice of negative feedback.

the gym is big, well equipped, clean and has a great range of equipment and classes. everything works as it should and is well laid out making for a more comfortable and less claustrophobic workout experience
good equipment and lovely, friendly and well motivated staff.

Review Title: It is not honest about membership‚Ä¶
Review: it is not honest about membership pricing  at the start of the membership subscription page it will tell you no joining fees and as you click and proceed at you are last page suddenly they increase from ¬£ 26.99 to ¬£33.99 without any plans change or any other additional perks. this is customer cheating, even i saw on billboard that no joining fees but when subscribing it is where you know it is not the truth. im unable to upload screenshots to have shown this.

godfrey classes are always energetic, fun, challenging and i come away feeling great! he makes sure to encourage everyone, regardless of their fitness level and also puts a big smile on your face! can‚Äôt recommend enough!

the facilities of the gym are ok, but they seem to not have any consideration of the customer. they choose to do deep cleaning of the locker rooms at 8:30 which is the time where people are rushing to get dressed and get out, no consideration that a girl cleaning male locker rooms at this time might not be ideal; last week they decided to move the equipment down the stairs- again at 8:45?! people queueing at the stairs to get out of the gym- in a 24 gym surely there is a better time to do this. this morning again 8:45 one pod out of order, the second pod was slow the manager woman as usual sat on her bottom, just shaking her head, no assistance offered. she could have got up and let people in or out through the disabled door but that would require getting up. the management is at fault here, but if you spend all day sitting there doing nothing what do you expect?

Review Title: Most ghetto gym I‚Äôve ever been to

Review Title: Spin bikes not in good working conditioncono
Review: last time i had a spin class i was not able sit in on all the session because 3 of the bike was faulty so i more or less missed out on a class session. i was not very happy.. i have to book on a class i expect the bike to be in working order and good condition.
not enough weight training machines, too much cardio

received my ¬£85 parking fine today!  i have since realised that you have to enter your vehicle details on a monitor mounted to the wall behind you as you walk in (yes im being serious). no signage as you walk in reminding you where and how to do this of course. its poor from puregym, they would have known this was going to be an issue but it appears that they have made no effort to support members. i am expecting the usual cut and paste reply, something like: "the car park is operated by a third party and therefore has nothing to do with us blah blah blah"  if my appeal is rejected, i will be cancelling my membership. the everlast gym at victoria retail park (less than a mile from puregym) will be my new gym as there are no parking restrictions there!

Review Title: I may have to find another gym

poor show from pure gym. posted on social media 5 times a day for 8 weeks trying to get people through the door stating free parking at sainsbury‚Äôs and forgot to mention the caveat that you need to put your registration details in. no signage to state this just a small pad not easily on display if you aren‚Äôt looking for it and no communication via email. 12.99 a month sounds fantastic until it‚Äôs 85 quid to park. should have put a bit more focus on your social media/ communications in emails to let customers know, quite clearly reading the reviews and on facebook this is a communications issue from pure gym and quite frankly customers should be reinstated for your lack of communication

Review Title: Don‚Äôt bother if you have anxiety
Review: booked for an induction to the gym as i have pretty severe anxiety with these things, turned up 10 minutes before the allotted time and waited outside the pods like the email instructed me saying there would be someone there to greet me earlier than the allotted time, waited for 20 minutes for no one to appear, staff weren‚Äôt useful in the slightest and ignored me, just don‚Äôt bother if you have any anxiety

Review Title: No hot water for the showers for over a‚Ä¶
Review: no hot water for the showers for over a week. it took 6 weeks for a new aa battery to be replace in the clock in the change room -this now has been amend, but the cleaner had been told twice in the 6 weeks by me, not sure about other people, out of 4 hair dryers - 1 doesn‚Äôt work at all, 1 will start to work then cut out all together and you can‚Äôt start it until the hair is cold again, only for the same thing to happen again, 1 hair dryer works and i am yet to discover what the 4th one does, but not holding my breath. this has been amended but ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ the male cleaner just walked into the female change room without calling out first before entering and no signs are out to let you know a male cleaner is in the female change room until your in the change room and see them. when complained about this, the response was, ‚Äúoh well they don‚Äôt really speak english and don‚Äôt understand they have to let you know they are coming in‚Äù. no female staff on sight or if any, very little. on the positives the male head manager is very friendly and easy to approach and the complaints to him about the male cleaner and clock battery were amended straight away. it is always the usual complaints from staff, like in any big company - the small branches receive complaints all the time, the users are told they are passed onto head their managers who seemed to do bugger all, besides collecting their pay check. if you complain to head office they only pass you back to the manager of the small branch who tells you we have passed on your complaints to our managers and no point in complaining to head office as they don‚Äôt do anything. then you send out rating scores like this. what‚Äôs the point. maybe pay head office staff less money, employee english speaking or someone who can understand english for staff - if male staff can‚Äôt understand the simple basic manners of calling out as they enter the female change room, what hope in hell do females have if the cleaners come across an emergency - they can‚Äôt communicate on basic issues. maybe employee managers who can cut out the rubbish and get straight to the point and listen to branch managers who are passing on the information as there job tells them to. the branch manager is the reason why you go into this gym, he is really friendly and helpful. i do feel for him being in the position he is with the above complaints

mihaela‚Äôs classes on a friday at pure gym enfield are brilliant. she is always on hand to demonstrate and give advice. she pushes you to do your best and i always leave her classes feeling great. the stretch class is such a fantastic way to start the day especially after the bodytone class. the gym itself is full of very friendly down to earth people & i always feel comfortable there. a really good affordable gym that i would def recommend.

Review Title: Air quality very humid ,as an asthma‚Ä¶
Review: air quality very humid ,as an asthma sufferer i notice it immediately near the end of the treadmill area when a class is being taken .also walking through to the functional area ,air quality could be better as personal hygiene of some members isn‚Äôt taken into consideration..i know it‚Äôs a gym and people sweat but i know the difference between fresh sweat and stale body odour!

firstly the gyms, the machines are rusty, dumbbells everywhere. in london, good luck getting a machine you need.  for some reason puregym academy is not on here, but its a scam. they dont tell you that on successful completion of the course, the job you get is paying them. its 12 hours a week plus giving them rent, which is deducted from pay. at the end of each month, this means you pay them ¬£90. you have to work for free and make back a wage from your personal clients. this is not mentioning that the qualification is a joke and not going to look good against other pro pts, who of course mop up the clientelle.  once i found out this hidden information i tried to get even a partial refund (the course is 1600), and despite being only 2 weeks into the course, they say no refunds. absolute misrepresentation of everything.  scam artists, avoid at all costs.

hi team,  my name is shebin and ive been part of pure gym birmingham for about 4-5 months.  firstly, let me just say that im really happy to find a gym that is open late hours. considering my work schedule, its really hard to take care of myself from time to time when gyms close early. so, really happy.   however, my gym membership is suspended for 4days now and ive been trying to resolve this issue to the best that i can. the reason- not stacking the weights after the session. i completely understand the importance of safety and the health hazard this causes but ive been trying to work this out with the assistant manager of the gym for couple of days now. unfortunately, to no good end. im sure the gym realises the importance of maintaining good healthy lifestyle and how daily workouts impact the mental and physical state of a person. this issue is really saddening as being at the gym has taken a very good space in my daily routine and puregym has played a major role in it.  hopefully we can get this resolved soon  thanks shebin

gym is fine showers need to be hot not luke warm especially the the price there charging my have to find another gym that can provide hot shower . if i want a shower that‚Äôs luke warm that i go to council gym and pay less money

Review Title: The Pure gym business model is great.
Review: the pure gym business model is great.. however, as a paying customer, user, client even, i do not feel i get what i pay for, there are sometimes, several pieces of equipment out of commission, and they stay that way for days/weeks and even months, i totally appreciate, equipment, from time to time, will breakdown, need servicing etc, however, as a business, where by accessible, well maintained and functional equipment, equates to a better gym experience. the guys at park royal pure gym, who ever is in charge of the upkeep of all the equipment need to seriously get ontop of this, the multiple gym access, absolutely great and ideal for me and my lifestyle, however, visiting some pure gyms in east london, wow, absolutely disgusting, dishevelled changing room, equipment all over the place.. my gosh.. not naming (stratford) but man.. and can we do something about the unhealthy smell of certain people, like a promo body spray free give away.. i would love to be involved with that, istayfreshuk is a company that promotes freshness.. they sell bathrobes, mens underwear sets.. pure gym, you guys should contact them istayfreshuk "its not just a brand, its a lifestyle"

dated equipment, no machines updated since opening - when equipment breaks seems to take an age to get repaired - i visit a couple of different gyms (different operators) every week and this one is very "blah".

overall a pretty average experience. the equipment is a bit dated and not very well maintained. there is a lot of equipment, but since it is always busy, the availability of the equipment is not great.

in reality, they are not high in expectations for me, there is a lack of weight-lifting pulley machines, there is no wifi, so everything else is perfect, the place is clean and the staff is very friendly and attentive.
felt good following exercise routine

in the gym, there is a staff nick templar is always smiling and friendly. talking about the gym .....i think that there is no proper ventilation system. the inside when is summer is boiling and winter too hot. i can see a lack of legg equipment..there is only 1 legg extension, 1 leg curl, and so on for the daily busy time for the whole gym. i saw that are missing loads of snap hooks on the machines..you have a machine available but, you have to wait for a snap hook...would be amazing if we could have more straight bars and more rope for triceps for the machines. a v handle with rubber protection for row seated... because the ones we have are hurting our hands.

Review Title: Stretch class with Ifran and Spin Class with Josh
Review: honestly loveeee these classes! i try to go to ifrans class every week, as the class helps with slowing down, and my anxiety. the sounds of water and music he plays in class is always calming too, and he explains each mover very carefully.  josh‚Äôs spin class was also a favourite of mine, i used to do it quite a lot on thursday night but he recently changed his timings so now i need to try me get to his morning wednesday class as he is very encouraging but also pushes you to do your best, whilst giving a break on certain sets if the next round is due to be harder.  the gym itself is very good, quite spacious and there‚Äôs definitely a club like spirit which encourages me to workout more. really glad i joined as i‚Äôve been better with my consistency in the gym.  peak times are a bit hectic with machines but it‚Äôs great that it‚Äôs 24/7

i attended a pump class which was fully subscribed (24participants). unfortunately there was not enough equipment to accommodate the numbers. in particular weights & barbell safety clips. i brought this to the attention of the class instructor who said ‚Äúoh, there should be enough. i‚Äôm not using any clips. just be careful when you load your bar.‚Äù i was then forced to complete the class using a weighted barbell without safety clips to prevent the weights falling off. due to the number of participants there was not enough room in the studio to maintain a safe distance between each work station during exercise. on several occasions my bar clashed with the bar used by the person alongside me. to conclude, this class was poorly organised, over crowded & lacking enough equipment for a safe work out. i raised all of these issues with the duty manager who stated they had no choice but to deliver classes as directed by the group manager.

there isnt really anything to criticise.  its got a lot right.  machines for every body part, heavy enough dumbbells, enough equipment and space in the gym, 24 hour opening times, classes for every goal, an app that gives you everything from workout routines, training plans and even recipes, nutritional advice, and mental health/wellbeing tips. i have been using the personalised training plan feature for a few months and im probably in as good a condition as i have ever been, or close to it.  they do occasional challenges in my local gym which are also interesting to those who are competitively inclined.  the value for money is pretty much unrivalled in the fitness industry.  there are cleaners around the place on a regular basis and unlike alot of other (even big chain) gyms they have managed to keep they changing rooms and toilets in good working order and clean which makes for a more pleasant experience.  the staff are friendly and helpful and not pushy about selling pt services which is definitely a plus but they are clearly knowledgeable. the location of the gym itself is very convenient and parking is ample in capacity and free to use. overall it would take something phenomenal for me to consider moving to another gym but for now i remain a very satisfied customer. it wont let me choose the tamworth gym specifically but thats my local gym.

Review: the recent update at the finchley east end road gym has been well received, however my only two gripes are,  why on the first floor have they decided to shoehorn most of the weight machines into such a small space when there is such a large room adjacent. it really doesn‚Äôt make sense ?  there is so much wasted space.  the weight machines being on top of each other isn‚Äôt pleasant or particularly hygienic given the recent worries with covid.  the air conditioning is also never turned up high enough i think if they review these two faults then that would be a great improvement. the staff are helpful and friendly and the gym is good value

Review Title: PureGym is excellent value for money
Review: puregym is excellent value for money, in comparison, i recently visited a nuffield gym in london on a guest pass, and was shocked at the monthly fees they charged, on top of this, the gym itself was poorly equipped, in complete contrast to my puregym experience. the puregym i attend in bristol eastgate is very well equipped, with two floors, and other areas included for spin classes, and another separate room for stretching and such things. in addition, it has various toilets, and changing rooms, i would not change to anything else. brilliantly equipped, with all the machines and weights one could ever hope for.  i would highly recommend puregym in eastgate bristol!
equipment at exeter doesnt work. and it is smelly.  very rude personal trainers...they dont put customer first.  exeter needs to improve.
friendly staff, good equipment and clean gym

the whole pure gym makeover and all the new equipments are top notch! thank you to pure gym finchley and to all the helpful, polite professionals trainers esp dwayne and naemi! pure gym is my second home! not forgetting to mention the environment is very clean! there is a big car parking space! pure gym is absolutely my second home!

Review Title: The gym is neat and comfortable for‚Ä¶
Review: the gym is neat and comfortable for users

i am attending pure gym hammersmith and i have a multiclub membership too. i think there are good classes and instructors, however some of them are repetitive and could be more motivating. workouts should change every now and then. the facilities need to be cleaner and more cleaning products available for the members specially with covid.also i spotted since i started they reduced some of the classes on the timetable that i used to attend. i think they are okay but definitely room for improvement.
spacious, reasonable amount of equipment, good staffs and variety of optional activities.

Review Title: No air con in a gym?
Review: the gym is spacious and has numerous pieces of equipment with friendly trainers. but i cannot understand why a gym doesnt have air con. the air can get stuffy and after working out to state the obvious youre hot!
sometimes the gym is very messy

it‚Äôs a good location and some staffs/instructors are very nice. although, the power plate machine has been taken away, which is a great equipment i regularly used after exercising. the time table, lunch time ‚Äòish‚Äô is not good. the hygiene of the gym overall is average. i would still go there though. as previously mentioned, it‚Äôs a good location.

Review Title: Flexible times and gym your way
Review: been looking to join up with a gym for a while and exploring options, love the fact that this place is accessible 24/7, in my experience most dont open till 6am week days and 8am weekends which doesnt fit my schedule. good membership options, and value for money uf your experienced with gym/gym equipment. training sessions are extra, which doesnt bother me but may be off putting for others (although there are workouts available in the app, they cant tell you if youve got the right technique/right weight/right exercise for your needs). only negative for me is how busy the place is at even 5am! can sometimes be difficult to get on the equipment with others around, so need to modify plans some days. would like to see a couple more bikes as well (there is one regular bike, one recumbent and 2 spinning bikes) but overall happy with the gym and gives me what i need right now.

Review Title: All the Puregym Team in Hitchin
Review: all the puregym team in hitchin, nadine, sean, gareth and alex bring a wealth of experience, knowledge and vibe to each class that makes it a fun, safe and happy place to workout.

puregym is a reasonably priced gym which comes with quite a lot of varied equipment - great for all applications.  staff are friendly enough and there are plenty of classes (and a good variety too).  equipment is reasonably new and of good quality.  toilets are kept clean & tidy (the mens anyway) and the gyn itself is normaly tidy. there are individuals at this gym who leave weights around and dont put them away. not an issue with the gym itself more the clientele.  the only drawback i can think of is if equipment ends up being damaged, it can take a while for it to be repaired.

the gym is fine generally, however the times during the week when its convenient for me to use are peak times, which makes some equipment restrictive & increases the amount of time you need to do what you want / need to.

always dirty finding tins of sardines in toilets and smeared over sink. smell in disgusting treadmills so outdated and facing a wall so depressing very dark and dingy no boxing bags which is so frustrating this gym has so much potential but the company just can‚Äôt be bothered the advertising on tv is definitely not what we have

bath victoria park is by far the best puregym in the bath/bristol area and thats almost entirely down to its cleanliness. its the cleanest, most well-maintained puregym ive been to. its light, airy and spacious. equipment quality is good and damaged items are repaired quickly. plenty of lifting platforms which is a massive bonus. staff are very friendly. clients in the morning and daytime are friendly and courteous - i wouldnt advise going in the evenings though as this is where the more inexperienced, antisocial crowd arrive. music is terrible, of course, as its a chain gym, but not obnoxiously loud like others. they could benefit from having a glute-ham raise machine (niche complaint!) but otherwise has everything youd need. definitely well worth the price.

Review Title: I have been training in gyms for 30‚Ä¶
Review: i have been training in gyms for 30 years and pure gym grantham is the unfriendliest place i‚Äôve ever trained. when there are trainers at their station/podium you have to walk past them to get the the changing rooms upon entry. the only one that greets you with a smile and hello is mike, everyone else either doesn‚Äôt look up from their phones or has a face like a wet weekend‚Ä¶‚Ä¶including the manager adam mee. the equipment is amazing but the environment is unwelcoming

Review Title: I've been to quite a few PureGyms‚Ä¶

Review Title: Staff has no idea how to talk to the clients
Review: i have been a member since the opening in crouch end. i had my exercise and my husband (he is also member) was standing with me while i was working on the equipment. as he was not supposed to do sports, he was in shorts and a shirt with swim sliders on his feet. the manager guy came to him and asked (staff generally never say hello) "what are you doing here? you are not presentable, you have to wear proper training shoes." my husband replied back: i am not exercising, just standing with my wife and chatting with her. he kept his rude attitude towards us, kept his angry talk. i dont know what is wrong with that guy but i am so disappointed.  i hope you can give proper training to your staff. in the gym area you will see ‚Äúeveryone is welcome‚Äù but no, this is a lie.

Review Title: Things have not gone well from the‚Ä¶
Review: things have not gone well from the start. i have been in email contact with marc irish and katie patterson to resolve the membership which since purchase has not been used.  i purchased a membership for my son to use.  the purchase was for the monthly plus which i believed that if the primary gym chosen was newcastle eldon garden it would give him access to more gyms than if newcastle st james was chosen. newcastle st james is the one he primarily attends. i have paid for a yearly fixed membership with effective start date 31/08/2023 however when he came to use it for the first time last saturday (2nd september 2023) was unable to do so and had to pay for a daily pass.  what do i need to do so that he can access the newcastle st james gym without having to pay for daily passes there?  katie patterson supplied a link for member services, however need to speak to someone to resolve.

Review Title: Is this what gyms have become?
Review: in all my years of training i have never experienced such a horrid gym. its rammed full of large groups who longer around equipment, no matter the time of day it just seems swamped. worst of all, you dont seem to be able to move without bumping into a full video production setup of camera, tripod, mics and even on one occasionally a video light. cant people just crack on with a workout that doesnt involve filming for ticktock, the last thing i want is to be in the background of some video as im sweating and grimacing my way through a workout or being given dirty looks because i have walked into frame of some wannabe instagram model sticking her rear end into a camera.

Review Title: There is no much to be said

the company have a very stupid system where if multiple subscriptions are linked to the same bank account. they will close down your accounts even though you mention to the staff ahead of time, resulting in losing all data from the last 10 months. needing to re-join and pay the joining fee again. this system is stupid and should not exist. if people have 6 or more accounts i can accept such steps need to be in place but not for 3 accounts. this is perfectly normal for the main income holder of a household to pay for himself/partner and son from the same bank account. it also means the fob that cost ¬£6 is disconnected and needs to be re-connected to the new account. fix this puregym and you would easily have a 5 from me

Review Title: Lee‚Ä¶macnamara is the best personal trainer
Review: i do personal training with lee macnamara. he is great at encouraging and explaining things in all my pt sessions. if i dont get things right the first time around he always remains patient with me and we figure out different ways to achieve accomplishing what he wants me to do. when i do well in my sessions he always tells me i smashed the pt session. this a great boost to my confidence.

Review Title: You get what you pay for
Review: i paid for the higher package, it was a waste of money. the higher package is supposed to give you the option of booking the next week classes in advance. as i only do classes and classes are cleverly 30mins majority. (usually book 2 a day to get 1 hr exercise) which means.. 1. 20mins exercise by time warm up is over. (two classes actually only work out 40mins in the hour. 2. max classes you can book is 8, which means i couldn‚Äôt book the week after, even though i was paying more.  to enter the gym you use you app pass to get in. well it wasn‚Äôt registering me correctly, so even though i was in class and got ticked of a paper registrar, they accused me of not turning up to class via email. consequently blocked me from booking classes and cancelled all my classes i had booked. i direct messaged the gym, they said they would fix it. 1 week later, i messaged again to say i still can‚Äôt book, i just got a response 9 days later (yesterday) saying please come in and we will try fix it again.  too late‚Ä¶ i‚Äôve already registered with another gym and cancelled.  also zumba, pilates, yoga is an extra cost. this is good to know before you join.  there was only one changing room in whole gym for the ladies and two showers (of which one started dribbling half way through and had to change to the other one to wash soap out of hair). they make it so small and hard work on purpose, so you won‚Äôt use the services.  the classes are a joke, non experienced instructors, disorganised, waste of time.

Review Title: Needs more weights upstairs and certain machines need to be altogether
Review: i know all gyms are different and they all have different ways of doing things, but i find everything is all scattered randomly for example all upper body machines is all over the place and upstairs, the lower body machines not all by the other lower body machines. it doesn‚Äôt look like it‚Äôs cleaned thoroughly‚Ä¶ the one day i was there doing my session there was finger prints all over the mirror upstairs there‚Äôs hardly any staff about no matter what time i go and it‚Äôs always at different times of the day and different times depending on my work. there‚Äôs not a lot of weights upstairs either where you do your ab workouts. when a class is on downstairs it‚Äôs so loud as the instructor has a microphone on and i have to turn up the volume on my earphones. also the classes upstairs aren‚Äôt that private and it‚Äôs not that sound proof either so you can hear people who are working out and it‚Äôs not very relaxing when you are doing a yoga class. it needs to be more sound proof and private for that. a window would suffice as you can see on the timetable what‚Äôs on and if youd be interested to join that class in the future. for me genuinely it has a lot of things that need to improve and need more weights upstairs as sometimes you can‚Äôt go in to the gym classroom where the classes are on as some instructors board up the door to stop entry.

ive been a regular at puregym for some time now, and i feel its important to share my experience. while the gym has many positive aspects, cleanliness has consistently been a concern. the equipment is well-maintained, and the staff is friendly and helpful, which is why im giving it 3 stars.  however, the cleanliness issue is hard to ignore. ive noticed that the cleaning and sanitization of the premises could be improved. sometimes, the sanitation stations are either empty or not properly stocked. its vital, especially in the current climate, that we have a clean and hygienic environment to work out in.  i believe with a little more attention to cleanliness, puregym could easily earn a higher rating from me and many others. its a fantastic place to work on your fitness goals, but i hope the management takes this feedback constructively and makes the necessary improvements.

Review Title: Make it brighter, and appeal to older age groups more!
Review: i am 60, joined this summer and like it better that i thought i would! however it‚Äôs noisy and dark which makes communication a bit difficult, and a more open, inviting, inclusive, less macho, aesthetic would be an improvement.  it would be better‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¶if it was brighter and lighter ‚Ä¶if it was quieter, and looked and sounded less like a night-club ‚Ä¶if it had better music, and not so loud! ‚Ä¶if the machines were numbered so i could remember which ones i need to go on easier ‚Ä¶if the decor wasn‚Äôt so relentlessly, boringly, macho ‚Ä¶if you had a bar somewhere to give support when doing stretching and exercises ‚Ä¶if you had a low balance beam to walk along and improve one‚Äôs balance ‚Ä¶if you had poster suggesting stretching exercises etc ‚Ä¶if you offered classes in yoga, and more dance based classes ‚Ä¶if more effort was made to consider and accommodate the needs of older people. ‚Ä¶and it could be more fun!! my dream gym would have large hula hoops, skipping ropes, and adult size swings, with more of a trendy coffee shop with good music taste vibe!  attracting older age groups would be good. older people have way more to gain, in some ways than the younger people. you should encourage them to bring their parents along and sign them up! it was my adult daughter‚Äôs persuasion that made me give it a go, so i don‚Äôt end up as disabled and immobile as her grandmother, my mum, is, at 86.  (i though it was pure gym was asking me for feedback, not trustpilot! ah well, i‚Äôm saying it all anyway‚Ä¶)

Review Title: Who knew gym could be so easy? - Jemma!!
Review: i‚Äôve been with jemma for a year now (our anniversary was just last week ha ha!!). what can i say! jemma‚Äôs been so lovely and supportive. our sessions are always something else and there‚Äôs never a dull day with jemma. starting off a fitness journey can be scary, and people often fear judgement, but jemma makes it all so easy. jemma‚Äôs core principle is confidence. this time last year i struggled with nutrition and low self-esteem but ever since i embarked on this journey with jemma there‚Äôs been a change. i‚Äôm less nervous at the gym, and more confident in doing workouts alone. whilst helping to achieve your goal/goals, jemma also makes sure you‚Äôre building confidence and feeling comfortable in your own skin/body. jemma takes things at your pace but she‚Äôs sure to push you to achieve more, even beyond what you thought you were capable of! every achievement is celebrated with jemma, be it big or small. even if you feel stuck, jemma is always so supportive. if you‚Äôre thinking of starting gym and feeling a bit lost, i would really recommend taking on jemma as a pt.

lazy staff  ive just cancelled my membership as not for the first time, a class has been been cancelled. i was told when i arrived by a manager that he would not be taking the class as i was the only one to show up and "its just not worth it"  allowing me to come to the gym and cancelling on the spot because he cant be bothered.  previous occasion the pt was downstairs while 10 of us were in the room, he rushed to take the calss so a member ended up taking it. i have the written apology for this one but a second time is just an insult.  membership cancelled  edit, thanks for your reply. i was offered a free month by customer services. ive declined this as i went the next day for another class. surprisingly as only two of us turned up this was also cancelled. the reason being that if three or fewer people show up the management has instructed the trainers to cancel the class and focus on cleaning.
great gym open 24/7 , lots of different equipment & friendly people.

where do i start‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.it was between 2* and 3* it seems to go through stages this gym gets a new manager or deputy manager ( not sure who they are now ) in and it seems to get clean again and the equipment seems to get cleaned and maintained then it goes down hill again.  a lot of the machines and maintenance is seriously lacking, things need updating and it‚Äôs not been kept on top of the equipment is not kept clean or maintained.  the cleaning is hit and miss there is cleaning stations for you to wipe down equipment but upstairs is always hit and miss no spray or towels when the cleaners are not there.  downstairs there are weights left out all over even though there are plenty of staff which should be asking and ensuring these are kept in place .  there are loads of personal trainers if you want to hire one but seems to be lacking on the core staff walking around seeing if the gym and it‚Äôs customers are ok and the gym is clean and tidy and the maintenance of the equipment is kept up.  all in all if you just want a gym to go which is open 24/7 and go in and do what you need to do with no extras then it‚Äôs good

Review Title: There need to be more variety of classes
Review: there would need to be more variety of classes, always the same. otherwise its a good gym.

general feedback, the review responses by puregym are generic and usually incorrect.  many responses state feedback is taken onboard or pure gym take this feedback to inprove for their members. sadly this is not the case. usually the feedback is ignored or changes are not implemented.  it‚Äôs also clear this is a generic response team that don‚Äôt know the local gym environment why are commenting on, or making excuses for.  just another disappointing reason that puregym is not number one for its members :(

was in the beaufort park gym tonight but it was extremely warm in there. i noticed a member of staff from the class section that was going on came out to ask another member of staff to turn the air con up as it was too hot during the class. the cleaning stations were empty although there was sufficient paper towels there werent any sanitiser to wipe down some of the natural greasy/sweat marks this added with the heat made it slightly uncomfortable tonight. busy gym though and seemed friendly enough in there.
