great gym  plenty of equipment and weights of good quality. the app steps you through gym routines so it would be great if they had a phone holder in the equipment so you could see the countdown counter whilst doing the displayed exercise. .

Review Title: Is this gym 24 hours as I got a email‚Ä¶
Review: is this gym 24 hours as i got a email saying its unstaffed from 12am till 6amand can still use the facilities? but in the reviews it says opens at 6am?

Review Title: My first time in a gym at 51 yrs age ‚Ä¶
Review: my first time in a gym at 51 yrs age  and was helped with what machines i need to my tailored needs

Review Title: The ideal gym. I recommend it without hesitation
Review: fully equipped gym, very clean, comfortable and friendly environment and staff ready to serve you. the prices very affordable. open twenty- four hours a day, seven days a week.

too packed , since the renovations which was supposed to improve the gym, they made it worst and more cramped, they actually made the free weights area much smaller!! it‚Äôs now a health and safty risk and hazardous, with weights all over the floor and never on the rack, and it‚Äôs super tight so you‚Äôre having to step over people whilst they train ‚Ä¶.it‚Äôs mad dangerous now !!  treadmills either face the wall! or the at the immediate entrance - so as people enter the gym they walk in front and behind you! feels and looks awkward. it‚Äôs now all disjointed and messy.  atmosphere has become dead too, many of serious people that used to train at pure gym have now left leaving by in large mainly school/college students training socially and in large groups, each doing their sets, so equipment is never available when you need it.  managers don‚Äôt really care. i and others have raised it numerous times with them. and likely pure gym will reply to this review with some generic template, ( of how popular and busy they are!) ‚Ä¶ not bothering to tackle each point raised‚Ä¶ so nothing will ever get done about it. sorry for the rant, but most regular gym goers i have spoken to largely feel the same. would i join this gym as a new gym goer, save your yourself the disappointment. there are other better gyms. only good thing about this gym, parking and location‚Ä¶nothing else.
excellent clean facilities. staff always helpful, informative, knowledgeable and understanding.
good tuition , friendly people and quality machines

Review Title: Crayford Puregym Parking Scam to make money
Review: ¬£100 parking fine for not registering my vehicle in the crayford gym. a response to a review written just 8 hours ago says "speak to the gym manager to resolve", but they say they can do nothing and have no relationship with the parking company. you write responses thanking customers for their feedback - just make the 2 main signs at each entrance to the car park clearer that registration is required as they do not make that clear. and how about an email and a warning in the app when you pull up your login pass?  seems this issue dates back to early 2022 as reported in a newspaper article but still going on now with the gym doing nothing to resolve. disgraceful.

Review Title: Can wifi problem be solved please as‚Ä¶
Review: can wifi problem be solved please as phone signal is bad inside
ashton under lyne gym needs to make sure the water pressure in the male showers is adequate.
thank you marco, you are the best!!!

i missed a payment and now im unable to contact you or pay my bill through the app. mg account is blocked and the money i owe keeps creeping up. this is really bad service on something thats meant to be a rolling month to month contract with no ties.  david spinks 00397601
good value, no nonsense gymn.  nice friendly atmosphere, plenty of equipment, easy access.
excellent kit good atmosphere

pure gym arcadian is great. always clean, wi fi available,  lots of space and equipment, never have to queue for a machine. great amount of classes to choose from. love the lgt and pump ones; got great results already in just 2 months! instructors are very friendly, encouraging and personable. great atmosphere

its a rubbish gym, racist manger is there and few pt smoke weed and they stink of it. they dont repair machines for at least over 2 months, i have had enough, you be better off in pure gym in ashton-under-line or gym-etc in stalybridge, plus all male pt go in ladies area because they are all perverts

no punchbag available and won‚Äôt be made available after request. no wi fi,  no equipment cleaning product, background music is unreasonably loud. not everyone on enjoys having their ears blasted out. other than that pretty decent if you go at a quiet time. hope this helps.

Review Title: Ive just joined this gym and at least 2‚Ä¶
Review: ive just joined this gym and at least 2 of personal trainers that work there are extremely rude, on my first day i asked one of them for help and he told me to go and ask someone else and on a different day i asked a different member of staff for help and he told he couldn‚Äôt do anything to help me!!! no one seems to be able to help in there, as there is not many personal trainers around either. i‚Äôve always used gyms to work out and never been in a gym like this

Review Title: Never pay a PT upfront for sessions if‚Ä¶
Review: never pay a pt upfront for sessions if the billericay gym is anything to go by! they will cancel sessions an hour before and agree to pay  money back and then when you cannot rearrange will say ‚Äòpt‚Äôs don‚Äôt have to refund‚Äô. management did nothing to help our daughter with the refund so do not trust  any pt at billericay with advance payments.

better than expected. pleased with my gym having just started. friendly staff and like minded people. very clean environment. i also like the app and scan option to get in and out. just got to remember to charge my phone fully and to bring charger with me, just in case. i am a early bird gym person, always have been with the exception of the weekend. i joined completely blind with no visit. it has been the best investment to date with my self, did weight watchers prior it worked, great results but 3 years later weight back on. what has always worked and allowed me to eat what i want is the consistency with the gym and walking. back to basics, pure gym allows this at a good price. however if there were to be increases i would need to reconsider. i will say this, noticed pure gyms vary in price. i chose the one that worked for me with the location although others would have that are cheaper it was in the opposite direction to where i needed it to be, so paying more, but no complaints so far.  showers temperature not great in ladies, luke warm at best, much more on the cooler side, also appear to have been bitten again while in studio for classes on both legs during floor exercises with classes. this is my only gripe.

Review Title: Zero compassion customer service, unclear terms, and pricey late fees
Review: i froze my membership one day before the direct debit was due to come out because i realised i could not afford to pay that month (cost of living crisis is hitting hard and im only on benefits due to being mentally and physically disabled). i checked to see any info saying it would take longer than that for the freeze to take place but could not see any. i was then charged ¬£45, which is the monthly fee + ¬£20 in late fees because the dd was unable to come out of my account. i asked for a refund since id tried my best to stop the dd coming out and since im clearly really struggling at the moment but received absolutely zero compassion or help in the reply. no empathy for a fellow human being struggling to eat now because the late fees i tried to avoid have taken me way out of budget. this has affected my mental health hugely and i cant believe there was literally zero compassion shown towards me for an honest mistake.
great spacious modern gym, staff were helpful and friendly,

your website boasts free parking. i wrongly made the assumption this was for members and not for people using it as free workplace parking and football parking not for gym members.  fed up of queuing whilst watching people return from work to their cars, and then witness people parking and walking out to the leicester stadium for an evening match.  why why why not get anpr or are puregym that strapped for cash that they cannot support members use there free parking.  soon it won‚Äôt be worth being a member if all i‚Äôm doing is paying for people to park their cars for free and not be able to use these facilities

Review Title: Good Gym but Restricted Car Parking
Review: while im happy with the gym and have been a member since it opened, ive been fined for parking in the car park at night after 11:00pm. the puregym web-site mentions that its a free car park, indicating restrictions. however, as mentioned on the car park signage, its for use by shoppers in the retail park. puregym is not a shop/retailer and ive been fined for that and also for exceeding two hours. thus its misleading of puregym to say its a free car park. i have additionally scanned a qr code in the gym to use the car park. this has made no difference. i have long-term health issues including musculoskeletal conditions and it takes me a while to warm up and cool down before exercising and that pushes me to the two hour limit at times. on top of this there are repeated messages in the gym saying that everyone is welcome. i dont find this to be true, its not inclusive, particularly if i have to park elsewhere and struggle to access the gym. puregym should be working with the landlord to address restricted parking for puregym members. i and others should not be facing fines, and i shouldnt be paying a fine.  im not sure why i should be continuing with membership, or how i can.

Review Title: Kassidy Chaplin Burn It and Step‚Ä¶
Review: kassidy chaplin burn it and step classes  really dedicated to making sure we get the most out of the class in the time that we have, really makes us work for it and we are grateful for that!  thank you for all the brilliant classes!

been a member for a few years. would give five stars but most of the treadmill don‚Äôt switch on never mind how long you press the on button. the exercise bikes all have broken foot straps except two which are always in use at busy times. it‚Äôs sad to always see the members trying to find equipment to work.
i‚Äôm so apsed !! i apply to freeze my membership,cos i was been 3 months away,and they send email is done,but when i check my online banking,they took the money üò°üò° really bad üò°üò°üò°üò°
nice gym, nice personal that work there atmosphere in gym when i attend is great, has good equipment but it could do with a few extra bits in there.

Review Title: Unpleasant Experience Due to Poor AC and Closing Time Policies
Review: the air conditioning in the gym leaves much to be desired, making workouts uncomfortable.  over the past few days, ive noticed an issue with the closing procedures. approximately 20 minutes before closing time, a staff member goes around to remind everyone of the impending closure, and 3 minutes before the official closing time the same staff member insists that everyone leave immediately. even when we politely mention that there are still a few minutes left, she remains persistent until we vacate the premises. this has made my gym experience quite unsettling and far from welcoming. unfortunately, there is no apparent means of contacting the gym manager to address these concerns, which is disappointing.
great range of equipment, clean and helpful staff, looking forward to trying the classes too.  great addition to the area.

first time in london wall gym, overall experience is good, clean restrooms ( didn‚Äôt use showers) and good equipment, i just didn‚Äôt like that since the gym is underground there is no signal which leaves you completely unconnected. i would recommend to install wifi in these kind of gyms to be used by members. also from my previous experience in different puregym branches i noticed that they kept improving the gym by changing machines, i believe this gym lacks better benches since the ones they have are too tall and too complicated in comparison with other benches (matrix).

i would have liked to rate the gym much higher because i am really enjoying it but the car park scheme they employ is a fraud. there are big signs all around the parking area saying you have to be a member of the gym to use the car park. i have parked there 3 times since i registered only to get 3 fines. now, after calling the parking company they tell me i have to register my vehicle in the gyms tablet every time i park there and that i should have read the signs in the notice board in the gym that tell me to do so. are they kidding!  this is not acceptable and if it is not resolved (both for the fines to be lifted and for puregym to make it much clearer to everyone how the system works) i will do whatever i can to organise people against such an adverserial system and see where realy bad publicity can take us.

Review Title: Recently joined and really enjoying it
Review: recently joined and really enjoying it. have a great pt who is helping me to train and progress. the gym itself is an amazing space. its really big with plenty of machines, apparatus and equipment. you feel very secure there and the facilities are great for the membership price. there is an app which is also really good. would highly recommend!

i have recently had sessions with hayley a personal trainer at the gym , and she was amazing really loves the work she does and listens to what you want to get out of the experience and tailors your plan to all your needs. i would highly recommend her if you are looking for a personal trainer, not only is she professional she is a great person.
good range of equipment, good hours but the only thing i dont personally like is too much people, well healthy nation

Review Title: The manager was very nice to me and my‚Ä¶
Review: the manager was very nice to me and my sister in law! he made a presentation to the hall before we started, i have no words! congratulations! the hall is very big and vast and very clean, i have no words! congratulations

decent range of equipment. some of it showing a little wear and tear. not too busy if you use facility during off-peak times. also its cheaper, reduced membership if you can use 1200-1600 weekdays with anytime friday/sat/sunday. staff friendly and let you get on with it. parking at ml1 facility can be hit or miss. again more spaces if you go off-peak. some incentives to introduce a friend.

this was my first visit, and the gym certainly had the wow factor, staff were very friendly and the equipment first class.  the gym was clean, overall an excellent experience.  would definitely recommend this gym.

i am a regular member of puregym bromley, the gym equipment, staff, members are all fantastic.  the main problem with this gym is the lack of hygiene.  on a regular basis there is no soap, no paper towels, members going to the toilet and can not wash their hands then touching all the equipment.  at present there is no running water in the gym! i hope on this occasion it is a priority and is fixed asap. we have been offered other gyms to train but these do not work for some of us who travel to work in the bromley area.  there has been times when the hot water has not been fixed for over a week.
love this gym, staff are friendly and it is always spotless

pretty basic, small and mega busy all the time. been a member for 3 years and only seen about 3 pieces of new kit in that time. no reinvestment into kit, poor use of space and no consideration for membership number. ¬£28.99 a month is over priced for this gym
nice new gym.  wasnt overcrowded and plenty of equipment.  great body tone class yesterday with kelly - loved her encouraging, friendly approach. will definitely be back!

ive recently signed up at warrington north and found the personal trainers in attendance friendly and willing to answer questions. the gym equipment is well-maintained and spaciously placed to not feel cramped at peak times.

attended the pure gym in newport and it was atrocious.  the gym is much smaller than it is made to appear in photos. as well as this half of the machines were not working, neither was the yanga water dispenser. the water dispenser also looked dirty.  the gym was not at all well maintained and the atmosphere was threatening and unwelcoming

Review Title: Nice and big with plenty of classes of offer.
Review: upon arrival, i was impressed by the fairly big car park, the cctv, the entrance pods and the car reg entry. i liked the size of the gym and the lockers available near the entrance which we used before our workout. i was disappointed by the loudness and littering by some of the gymgoers but i cant blame puregym for their behaviour. there were plenty of bins and cleaning stations around the gym. some equipment was well used but it all seemed safe enough, it was mainly the missing cup holders and frayed bike pedals that i noticed. the historical sports photography on the walls was a nice touch to the minimalistic decor. the cycle class was very good with the very enthusiastic and friendly instructor matthew moss. post-workout in the changing rooms, i found the showers weak and they cut out very fast which meant getting washed took me longer than i wanted after my workout. leaving through the pod was easy enough and i left feeling well worked after my cycle class but excited for the next one, i will make sure i leave a bit longer for showering next time i visit though.

ive been a member of this gym for 2 years and its really gone downhill in that time. half your time at the gym is finding the equipment you need as people are always moving things and not putting them back. some signage telling people to put their weights back are needed. they also do not have enough equipment for the cables. they need to get more ropes and straight bars as theres never enough. its also incredibly busy, understandably this isnt something that theyd want to fix but id be checking the cctv at the entrance from 4-7 and seeing how many teenagers are entering on one account together.

Review Title: Pure Gym Need tougher rules on people who don't replace their weights!
Review: i find the staff to be professional and friendly but instead of the need to "police" the gym during busy times pure gyms head office should seek to use more visible reminders for members to be considerate and make sure they replace their weights after use. that way there would be a better culture instead of the current "whack a mole" approach there is at the moment. there is a small but very determined (ignorant) minority that dont put their weights away after they finish.. pure gym head office needs to address this over the tannoy instead of these incessant messages about how we are all welcome. we already know we are welcome or people of all races/ ethnicities wouldnt be there!  then there is the "strike out harassment" message. how many reports of harassment does pure gym get on a daily or weekly basis? how many times has someone complained of racism or exclusion from the gym based on race? as a black man that joined soho gym in 2004 and been with pure gym since it took over the site in 2018, i have never experienced any of that. meanwhile what i do experience every single day is weights being left by members who are too lazy to replace them after use. i see trip hazards by way of dumbbells and kettle bells and mats being left in the leg press and hamstring curl training area. i see people leaving loaded barbells on squat racks and have seen ladies who have to unload multiple 20kg plates off the leg press or squat rack left there by some inconsiderate member. (these are then taken off and left on the floor). i see plates leaning up against the weight racks as though lifting them onto the rack was a bridge too far for whoever left it there. all this makes your "train safe" message sound like a joke. repeated behaviour like this does not match your "train safe" message, it makes a mockery of it! your obligation as a company is to educate people to show basic levels of gym etiquette and consideration to their fellow members. i even printed off more of your miniscule notices that are hidden from view in corners of the gym. no one takes any notice of those messages so i printed 15 copies to be put in more prominent parts of the gym but was told that head office stated that only 4 posters can be allowed in the gym for fear of "offending" people. i couldnt believe my ears. at best this policy is a negligent lack of duty of care to your members and at worst it is a policy that displays stupidity of galactic proportions because pure gym head office prefer to use their email and media resources to remind us black people that we have a history and lgbtq and non lgbtq communities that we are all welcome in a place where we already train happily together! but you fly 2 rainbow flags and 2 large "everybody welcome" flags and send us black history month emails when you could easily use the same resources to educate the small but determined ignorant and inconsiderate members that leave their weights all over the place for your staff and me to put away. how does that make any sense? why not use a flag or banner as big as the current "everybody welcome" one to say a simple message "please replace your weights after use. repeated failure to do this will result in pin suspension" who could possibly get offended by a simple reminder to show basic levels of consideration to their fellow members? we really do live in very strange times! instead of treating this gym like a creche full of toddlers that may have a tantrum when politely reminded to be considerate, try leaving messages that educate this minority instead of incessantly reminding us of things we already know ("everybody is welcome"). i really do hope someone in head office reads this and uses basic common sense because this is a problem that you really need to address instead of all this "safe place to train" nonsense. a safe and judgement free zone? give me a break! people are being judged for their lazy inconsiderate behavior! regarding your "safe place to train" nonsense i can assure you ive not been bitten by any snakes or had an attempted kidnapping so yes it is a safe place to train! now try living up to your duty of care by making it a considerate place to train, you might find theres more harmony. tell us what we need to know not what we already know (that everyone is welcome and its so safe). im told there are rules in which this is mentioned. the problem is no one takes any notice so make them bigger and use more of them or announce the message over the speakers! its not rocket science is it?

the gym is good but like a lot of reviews have said in the past, the air conditioning is still really bad. i know it isnt hot weather anymore but when youre working out, getting hot, having bad air con can affect someones health. theres big fans in the main area but there isnt any at all in the female area. sometimes there is but for some reason they keep removing it? the air conditioning seems to be a big problem looking at the reviews, yet still hasnt been sorted out.
decent gyms. parking is a pain when you have to register every time. puregym need to have a facility to register your car so you dont have to register every time you park

really enjoy this gym. the gym is well equipped and a great place to train.  i have seen reviews commenting on gym cleanliness. from what i have seen this is down to some members who frankly dont have the decency to clean up after themselves. there are cleaners and also the trainers are often cleaning the gym and equipment.  i do a lot of classes as well and these are always excellent.

i‚Äôm retired so this is my get up to go place.  it‚Äôs a good price, excellent equipment and great trainers, approachable not stand offish like a lot of gyms. main thing is it‚Äôs great for mental health, i see people whereas if i sit at home i‚Äôm alone.  give it a go.
gone downhill, have been going here for <5 years but now cancelled my membership due to poor cleanliness and poor management. seriously disappointed, would not recommend.

Review Title: One of the worst unreliable gym Walsall‚Ä¶
Review: one of the worst unreliable gym walsall pure gym , it‚Äôs stated 24 hours gym on paper but while reach there 3am the door won‚Äôt open , once u contact emergency line they will inform that gym won‚Äôt open for a day due to bla bla .. , they don‚Äôt even bother to inform us through mail or text . it‚Äôs happen to multiple times ( latest today 3/10/2023) , still u need to pay the car park otherwise penalties. this gym inside is very dirty always , wifi is like they using from 20years before one , management is totally unreachable. in my experience overall the worst morning nightmare. this branch is shame for pure gym franchise. i know you people won‚Äôt publish this feedback because truth always hurts isn‚Äôt . thank very much for nothing

they lack the variety of machines which back-street/independent gyms offer, i really wish they would invest more in a wider array of equipment but they do provide the basic necessities. id enjoy it if they implemented some boxing equipment into their gyms too.  that being said, overall puregym surpasses any gym ive ever stepped foot inside. ive only been to a few of their many locations but cleanliness is never an issue, its 24/7 and has affordable membership options to suit everyone. im a core member, currently ¬£20.99. my gym partner has a plus membership which offers additional benefits (i sometimes use his code for free yanga water ü§´üòâ). they even offer an off-peak membership if youd rather avoid the crowds during peak hours! and the fact its attached to a sainsburys is a bonus.

been coming here for years. great location and friendly vibes.  not keen on the new layout where most of the machines have moved upstairs. it‚Äôs made downstairs look even more empty.  i‚Äôve noticed as of late‚Ä¶ the carabiners for cable machines keep going missing. so quite often i‚Äôm having to search the gym for spare carabiners. they cant be that expensive to obtain spares?  the free weights room could do with more benches. quite a few people use benches for storing their bags but not use it for exercise? which defeats the purpose. perhaps posters advising people not to do this would be beneficial?  more cable machines would be great as they‚Äôre very popular and i often have to wait to use them.  more dipping bars would be great as there‚Äôs only 2.

i like it here. there will be some people doing inexplicable exercises and the odd person doing 100 sets of hip thrusters on the smith machine -what‚Äôs that all about-, but you can ignore it and get on with your workout. friendly gym instructors, clean, good equipment. recommended.

great choice of equipment and good availability for peak times. extremely friendly and helpful staff and a pleasant environment to train in. great access (24/7 opening) and excellent value for money. highly recommend!
shocking service. you cancel the membership, it doesn‚Äôt cancel, take payment, then try to cancel again but they physically make it impossible to cancel so you have to just cancel your direct debit.

arrived on a monday at 3 o‚Äôclock so gym was relatively quiet. was very clean, good temperature, lots of equipment. not sure how it will be in busy periods though, same as all other gyms i expect. nice staff too.

i joined when they first opened with an opening offer. 6 months later they started taking a much higher amount from my direct debit, many many many phone calls later, popped in 4 times (manager never there and never calls back, none of tts staff were the original staff so they didn‚Äôt know what had been on offer), all totally frustrating and on principle i cancelled my contract. only then did they admit their error. too late for me, which was a shame as it‚Äôs so close to my house

this is a great gym, large two tier car park, loads of floor space with very high ceiling, so plenty of space to train comfortably in, certainly the largest gym i have ever used, good selection of machines, free weights and aerobic equipment such as exercise bikes, steppers and cross trainers. really enjoyable gym experience.

be warned!!. i recently experienced a serious injury and so had to end my membership. a payment was taken from my account at the start of the month which i requested be refunded as i dont use the service. their response was that this isnt inline with their policy and that no refund would be issued. to my mind this is technically theft. be careful when dealing with them also as they have no means of contact other than email etc.

Review Title: I love puregym the trainers are really‚Ä¶
Review: i love puregym the trainers are really nice the gyms clean i stopped going to the gym as i have bad health but one of the trainers asked me about it and said he would help me as he also knows i have anxiety he really has helped me because if it wasnt for him id not have signed back up to pure so thank you

Review Title: Been going to this gym for few years‚Ä¶
Review: been going to this gym for few years now and have seen the downfall of the management here, have told managers for the last few weeks that the yanga water which i pay for has no flavour as they are to lazy to refill the liquid, the male manager rudely says that i am just trying to get free drinks rather then being helpful when i am paying for this service. machines are out of order for weeks and don‚Äôt get fixed, water pressure in the showers are always low and cold water. overall bad experience since the last manager has left for the last few months

faulty equipment is not fixed for long periods of time despite telling staff about it. changing rooms stink. assistant manager is extremely rude and not helpful at all. manager is not helpful either. staff overall is rude.
well stocked, clean and lots of space

friendly staff, i never once feel judged or under pressure from anyone there. good space, good equipment, and gets me out the house everyday for an hour. deffo worth the money, if you struggle with anxiety and going outside, it gets me out the house for at least an hour a day and that makes me feel really good. additionally, if you do not enjoy speaking to others socially, then its really nice as you just put your headphones on and zone out.
lovely and clean, spacious, great equipment selection, easy and free parking, friendly staff. i used to go to puregym in portishead and really missed it when i moved here. hooray for this new gym!

Review Title: Its a great local place that is accessable
Review: its a great local place that is available any time which is great.

Review Title: I couldn't connect to a WiFi in the gym‚Ä¶
Review: i couldnt connect to a wifi in the gym as i like to listen to my own music whilst working out. it says on the website it connects to o2 automatically but the only wifi available is a staff one with a password. can anyone help please

only giving 1 star as there is no option for zero. bought a day pass for my grandaughter for this gymn. she travelled 30 mins to get there and on arrival the pin number they sent her would not work so she couldnt get in. she rung the bell several times as online it said if pin doesnt work ring bell and a member of staff will let you in. after 1 hour of trying to use the pin and ringing the bell, with no staff appearing, she gave up and went home. no way to call them as when you call the number that is online an automated voice tells you that you can only make contact via social media. would advise if you are looking for a gymn do not use puregymn.

Review Title: Please fix the app and website
Review: omg please fix the website and the app. you operate only online and no phone customer service, so when your website and app crashes the only way to contact puregym is through facebook, twitter or email. how does that work when you have customers that do not use social media and the website and app are not working simultaneously? i cant access the email address because the web page wont even load.

after weeks of going and only using machines i knew of, i finally built up the courage to ask a staff member how to use a hack squat machine (in case it killed me). im a very anxious person so this was a huge step for me. i thought i did everything right, i looked for a person in the uniform, i checked to make sure it was a quick question that could be done throughout someones rest set, id heard this guy talk about how much money he was making so didnt think he would mind much. i stumble out "hey sorry could you help me really quickly" and he looks at me like im scum of the earth, his client told him i was just asking for help. he asks very aggressively "what kind of help do you need with that? (not in the "ill help you" way but in the "how could you not understand this you idiot" way) . at this point, im shaking and almost crying and he tells me that hes not actually on shift, just wearing the uniform?? i suddenly realise that my 2 seconds of a quick guide to not injuring myself was such a terrible waste of his time and ran to the other floor. xcite would never treat me like this. this was truly an awful experience.

i use this gym 4 times a week and although the staff seem nice, some of the other members have no consideration. ive watched people leave their weights on a barbell and move on to another station, put weights in the wrong place and leave stuff at equipment so that no one takes it, even if they arent using it. this week someone set up their phone on the barbells and went live on instagram - whats that all about? fair enough if you want to video yourself but dont set it up in a communal area where other people are also going to be videoed. i wish staff could enforce some rules around all of this because its a disgrace

good gym, lots of equipment, two floors, including classes, which i dont attend, however i see they can get popular for people who enjoy them.  i like the gym because its pretty spacious, and has all the equipment i need for a great workout.

Review Title: Liked the interiors and quality machine‚Ä¶
Review: liked the interiors and quality machine like open space and when not to busy
lovely gym. great staff.
good equipment, friendly staff.
nice small intimate gym, very tidy and close to me
paying off the month access with yanga water, but it still out of order for more than 3 weeks. it is not appropriate in this case of paying and not get full refund. please take care of it.
great gym, i joined a couple of months back and so glad i did! the staff are friendly and nothing is too much of an ask! gym classes are amazing and really upbeat! worth every penny

the value for money is exceptional. 24/ 7 and a good variety of machinery and free weights. plenty of space to work out so you dont feel over crowded. would recommend to anyone looking for a well priced well equipped gym

Review Title: Maximizing Fitness, Minimizing Costs: Why PureGym is Your Best Value!
Review: i believe that the reasonably priced puregym offers the best value for money in a market with multiple competing no-contract gyms because it allows me to focus on my fitness goals without the frills and unnecessary costs, ensuring my hard-earned money goes directly towards my health and well-being. my only doubt is about parking. recent rises in parking charges mean that my monthly parking bill is about 150% of my gym membership fee. i appreciate this situation has not been created by puregym.

Review Title: Good gym equipment, very inconsistent hot water, do I have to pay extra for hot shower as well??
Review: good space, good gym equipment, i wont complain about the toilet use bc thats hard to control when you have hundreds of god-knows-who people flocking in everyday. but why is the hot water so inconsistent? i paid for the membership that includes the shower and often gets cold water, or if im lucky, a stream of warm water followed by cold water. do i have to pay for a hot water hours as well???? its seriously annoying

Review Title: Was taking a shower walking back to my‚Ä¶
Review: was taking a shower walking back to my locker and a female member of staff just walked into the mens changing room un announced no apology. if a male member of staff had done that in a female changing  room they would lose their job or be reprimanded.  every fifteen minutes we are constantly reminded on the speakers of company fire & safety policy yet they cannot train their staff to ask if people are clothed before entering into a changing room. trust pilot is my only way to make my feelings heard as pure gym have no complaints department on their website. the gym is good but the protocol training is none existent .

in andover there is a good quantity and quality of equipment with most being available when needed, all at a competitive monthly cost. it would be even better if the cleaning station on the first floor was repaired and was more regularly restocked - too many times it is either out of paper or cleaning solution
i raised a concern with the management via email and the response i received was rude, unprofessional, and didnt even make sense.

pure gym ravenswood ipswich is by far the best in town. it‚Äôs exceptionally clean and is equipped with all machines, weights, dumbbells etcthe classes are fantastic, all fitness instructors liam, shannon p, hannah, stuart, chris and the managers reuben and shannon are very kind, friendly and approachable, they are there to help you and nothing is too much trouble .. i have found that after a busy stressful week the ‚Äòmeditation‚Äô class held by liam on fridays  at 6pm really helps you to unwind and set you up for the weekend and following week ahead  a sort of ‚Äòme‚Äô time ‚Ä¶ why not give yourself 30 minutes of peace and relaxing after all you deserve it .... it‚Äôs suitable for everyone male and female so, if you have thought about it, wondering what it‚Äôs about or just curious .. why not come an join us and see for yourself ‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs time you put yourself and your well-being first ‚Ä¶
great gym with excellent quality machines, friendly and supportive staff and a great manager. very clean and today and you are always made to feel welcome and part of a team.

Review Title: Pleasant gym very clean and friendly‚Ä¶
Review: pleasant gym very clean and friendly staff members.

possibly the untidiest, most poorly equipped puregym i have ever been to.  weights all over the place and not put back. grubby equipment and benches. the place also looks like it needs a nap its that tired.  the manager wasnt particularly helpful, and seemed more interested in chatting to the personal trainer than helping me out on my first visit there.  i will rather be driving into the urban exchange gym that i usually go to even though i live in ashton.

massive thanks to philchester * assistant manager * he understood my needs and pointed me in the right direction and match me to a pt. your kindness and understanding towards myself were top quality today, and for this, i thank you x üòä

Review Title: It‚Äôs open 24h so exactly what I was‚Ä¶
Review: it‚Äôs open 24h so exactly what i was looking for. lots of equipment and space  available

Review Title: Is it just the male changing rooms that‚Ä¶
Review: is it just the male changing rooms that don‚Äôt have showers? or are the female and disabled ones also in the same state?  feels quite discriminatory.

under new management,  the managers chris & jo seem to be doing a great job at walton, both very welcoming when you arrive or leave and they are both very friendly and approachable people. they both also know their stuff so any questions you need answering they are always on hand to help you. i always see jo mucking in with the team and getting stuff done even with the cleaning she get in and dose it too.  she is very helpful and chatty too.

i‚Äôve not been to a gym for 20+ years so thought that before i do anything, i‚Äôd book myself on an induction/getting started session.  booking the induction in the app was easy and i received an email as follows:  ‚Äúyoure booked onto your get started session on the 28/09/23 at 16:00; youll be met by me, anthony, in the entrance of the gym (outside the pods). i will be in a teal top, and ill be there a little early to meet you when you arrive.‚Äù  i arrived a bit early at 1545 to use the toilets. i quite clearly looked lost trying to find the toilets because i hadn‚Äôt been here before. no member of staff approached me to ask if i was ok.  i found the toilets and then returned to the foyer/entrance to the gym ‚Äúoutside the pods‚Äù. i was there about 1550. by 1600, nobody in a teal top was anywhere to be seen. as such i went inside and waited for a further 10 minutes. staff members walked past and blanked me. nobody asked if i was ok, not so much as a smile.  by 1610 i just left. i‚Äôll be changing my home gym to somewhere else where hopefully the staff will be a little more friendly.  update in response to pure gyms reply:  there is sufficient detail including my name, date, time and location for you to be able to deal with the issue from here. you‚Äôll see me on the cctv. i can‚Äôt give any more information. i was considering changing the home gym, but i decided against it and just cancelled my membership today.

disappointed. ive been going to this gym for years and have always enjoyed my own workout space, plenty of room and doesnt feel like its over crowded. all the machines have moved upstairs making it now feel the opposite of this. i try to go on a back machine and ive got now groups of lads standing around and over me. im 46 years young and this makes me feel really intimidated which i never would feel like in this gym! in the process of looking for another.

things are getting worse since i left my last review. hand dryer in mens changing rooms - it has been out of use for 3-4 weeks maybe longer.  i was training legs and wanted to do calf press - this machine is out of action, so then i went to leg press machine near it to do it on there, also out of action!!! it seems like management do not have the resources to fix things - i pay good money to use the facilities but its not fair that machines are out of action or things dont get fixed quickly.  unfortunately, if the situation does not improve soon, i will have to look at alternative gyms in ipswich.

Review Title: I have been a member for years & love‚Ä¶
Review: i have been a member for years & love going to kellies spin class & metcon she pushes you to your limits you feel the benefits of it i can not rate her highly enough she good at her.

Review Title: Male changing room - not fit for purpose.
Review: been a member for sometime now, before joining andover gym, i did research and read the reviews of which there seemed to be only one consistent and major complaint - the male changing room facilities and primarily the showers. the changing room constantly wreaks of urine and the showers just simply don‚Äôt work. i‚Äôve had one hot / warm shower in over 6 months while attending the gym approximately 4 times per week. complaining to the ever rotating staff is utterly pointless as they simply don‚Äôt want to hear it anymore as they‚Äôre simply ignored by management, of which they freely admit don‚Äôt give a toss. management are a disgrace, never seen any regional or above personnel visit the gym, it simply operates on a pay your money, we don‚Äôt care basis. it‚Äôs a well supported and busy gym but the disdain of which users are treated or considered is unacceptable. if there was a relatively similar alternative i‚Äôd be off in a shot, which is similar opinion held by the majority of users. on the basis of the above i can only rate the gym / company 3-10. note. the response below by pure is comical, no surprise they clearly have not read my review with any seriousness.. and is as i expected. say what you like about your intent etc.. the reality is at andover..the showers do not work and the changing rooms stinks of urine.
following complaint on 21 sep....yet another week and the stepper is still broken. no update, no feedback

i want to thank the pts and manager who supported me when i had a seizure. the pts who were there at the time could not have supported me the way they did and promptly followed procedure. after the incident, i have been checked on, all have been gentle, mindful, and caring. much gratitude to the amazing team! x

Review Title: Would be great if other trainers could‚Ä¶
Review: would be great if other trainers could do morning classes instead tom thompson.
a nice place to be, good equipment, friendly staff. excellent services

showers are not working. all reports are ignored. terrible terrible service by gym management and the feedback on their social channels.  stop with the promotions and start fixing this poor poor state in this gym

Review Title: The shower temperature is too cold‚Ä¶
Review: the shower temperature is too cold after you have had a workout you need a reasonable water temperature to properly wash yourself@ pure gym eccles

Review Title: Lovely gym at a good price
Review: lovely gym at a good price,  down side gets to busy on evenings
mangers are great, but really needs to be bigger, need more machine etc , gets very busy.

i have always been nervous about attending a class but decided to take the plunge today. to say i was surprised is an understatement! i attended the strength class run by foad and it was really good. he could see it was my first time and really went out of his way to make me feel at ease. the class was hard but that is what i wanted and foad knew exactly when to push everyone. he is a real asset to the gym and i will certainly be taking more classes now.

Review Title: Gym is good and friendly clean and tidy‚Ä¶
Review: gym is good and friendly clean and tidy most people clean the equipment after but a hard core few dont bother and leave bodily fluids all over the equipment

Review Title: Manager Jo and all staff are so‚Ä¶
Review: manager jo and all staff are so friendly, helpful and nice

motherwell puregym.  gym is always very clean and tidy as are the ladies changing room and toilets. staff are really friendly and helpful and ready to help out or give advice on any exercises or equipment. classes are always well attended and instructors so nice. lauren, naomi, martin, emma and paul are the instructors on the classes i attend and cannot praise them enough - they always encourage you to do your best.
a good gym with knowledgeable, friendly staff but half the machinery is faulty. great classes & it is fairly clean.
good small gym close to home, can get busy in the evenings

Review Title: I attend my first spin class with‚Ä¶
Review: i attend my first spin class with kelvin pt trainer since returning back to puregym birmingham west since convid. class was brilliant workout excises.  the classes held here are good with the current pt trainers if you wish to tone up i would recommend this gym.

what‚Äôs with the new layout? the gym has went downhill over many months, broken machines, lack of tidying, cleaning etc.  new layout change is awful, hopefully only temporary. icing on the cake of a good gym gone bad. disappointing.
stockport north gym loos absolutely stink and they have removed one of two sanitation points, to replace with a spray and blue roll balanced on a bin.

Review Title: Does not take responsibility for own's staff mistake.
Review: the company does not take ownership of mistakes done by their own staff. not taking responsibility does not support trusting a service provider. i incurred travel costs which would have been avoided if they did not do the mistake in the first place and refuse to acknowledge it and provide reimbursement. only trying to sell more memberships or upgrades. its a shame theres such a bad customer services as the facilities are somewhat nice/decent for the price. edit since reply: i already emailed the customer service for this issue, hence the "trying to sell more". edit 2 since further exchanges with co. representative: it feels the review here changed something in the way they were initially handling the situation, as ive had a partial reimbursement of the expenses incurred.

Review Title: Really good gym, friendly and accessible.
Review: good equipment, friendly gym members. staff are great, they listen and action any questions. 24/7 access is perfect for peoples availability. feels very safe environment.  i would just like more cleaning equipment not less please. covid and winter colds & flu are on the rise.

what you expect from a puregym and nice and quiet in the morning. dont use the changing rooms or showers so cant comment on those. one major improvement needed is a bike storage solution - this gym has loads of space in the foyer but nowhere to safely secure bikes.
good clean gym , everything you need for a good workout üòä

fist session in pure gym, and i must say i very impressed, you sometimes find these big fanchised gym let everything go a little but not here very friendly atmosphere and clean and plenty of equipment, always something to use

Review Title: Manager friendly and smiled as i‚Ä¶
Review: manager friendly and smiled as i entered the gym‚Ä¶my visit only let down by an unpleasant smell in bathroom
hygienic stations. clean temperature is right machines never last long without fixing them as soon as possible. thank you.
super gym does it all for a competitive price
great gym. its clean, has lots of great equipment. nice friendly members and staff too
like others have said. showers need fixing. cleaning needs to be better
friendly staff and atmosphere, lots of equipment
good value, local and friendly

ladies area is cramped, only 3 treadmills, really hope they would put more in, and always a long line of women waiting. zee is really rude, told me to get off the machine because her client is waiting, told her im nearly done, but she kept pushing that i need to get off. very humiliating.  positive side, gym is clean

i had the pleasure to attend foad‚Äôs strength 30 class over a year ago at a friend suggestion. his attention to our form and how he made us push hard was one of the reasons why i began my journey for increasing my muscle mass in the first place. the class has an authentic vibe - the music is perfect for the type of exercises and you can tell that everyone is giving their all so you automatically start giving your well too. what i can say is that this class has been running for a long time and it has been fully booked every week. his dedication and drive to help everyone get in shape are a few out of many reasons why people love this class!

i have been a member of the gym for the last couple of months now and would highly recommend it.  it‚Äôs open 24 hours always clean and tidy and lots of equipment to choose from.  i would highly recommend you try strength 45 with foad he certainly knows his stuff and ensures all participants know how to get the best out of the class and spends time with all participants on a one on one basis making everyone feel included and welcome

Review Title: This is shocking service ...i am from‚Ä¶
Review: this is shocking service ...i am from essex and have a ¬£30 nationwide membership at pure gym ..i have had this nationwide mem ership for at least 4 years . i have just tried to visit the puregym in witney as i have done many times over the last 4 years , but i now cannot gain access to this gym ..the message says my (membership does not cover me for this gym ) this gym is no longer on the list.. i was always before able to use this witney gym and i have been witney gym ..now witney has been removed and i cannot use it ...existing customers who use other gyms should absolutey be able to continue using a facility that was available when they joined the national membership .. service and consideration to its clients has become awful...to add to this i have had quite a few fines in billericay gym car park (my home gym) ..the fines i had were for either forgetting to sign in on the login machine or the machine not logging my number plate properly im not sure but ..several time i have proven to smart charging ( the car park owners) that i was at the gym during those hours but they still dont cancel the fine ...and all pure gym say is its not our problem and wash their hands of the it..there are so many people complaining about this parking at billericay .. ..surely puregym have some duty to their clients to try and sort this out ...i have been a loyal member or 5 years and they really dont give a damn...i will be cancelling my membership forever

i‚Äôve been attending gym classes for more than 1 year and all my friends are shocked when they hear me say i‚Äôm looking forward to them. a positive and motivating trainer can make a significant difference in how much you enjoy your workouts!  foad is putting a lot of effort into ensuring the classes have different exercises to target various muscle groups and prevent boredom and that people have a correct form throughout the session. the classes have a great atmosphere (and music) and lots of people are attending, creating a sense of community and support which keeps us all engaged. constant full attendance is testament to how much people enjoy his class. thanks for encouraging us to be more active and making class more enjoyable!

Review Title: The gym has gone down hill
Review: the gym has down hill but increased the fees , it sad to say but the whole experience of this gym has gone downhill since lockdown. before lockdown the change of management and the majority of the instructors  the classes used to be pretty good -fully of energy and most of the time the classes were full ! most of the classes now  as i haven‚Äôt been to all are  the same-ish although they call the classes a different name , (pump, body tone , lbt..) these class are ok but not so inspiring and can be repetitive ,at times  boring . they use to have a great spin instructor on a tuesday and wednesday evening (monday spin )class was always fully booked )‚Ä¶.the instructor had good energy and motivation , changed her playlist and routines , which made her class fresh and inspiring to want to go every week  .the step class with her was also pretty good .. bootcamp at pure gym which is ok  it is what it says it is - (haven‚Äôt been to all classes / instructors due to the time‚Ä¶) ‚Ä¶.needs to be revamped more energetic,  and move with the times .aerobic type class like body attack, or kettlebell class .. maybe a step class again ‚Ä¶  , again with the price increase we shouldn‚Äôt have to pay for additional classes like yoga, and i think i saw zumba on the timetable for about a week . but the last instructor  looked as is she was just dancing on her own in front of her bedroom mirror, and wasn‚Äôt  really teaching .the ladies only section - again is dead !!needs upgrading  it needs a smith machine . chest press , leg press .. women are getting stronger , they don‚Äôt just want boring ab machine from back in the 80s and the other machine next to it . that whole wall of equipment should be thrown away . and  possibly could fit a smith machine where the mats are . get rid of the power plate machine .who uses it ???  take away maybe one of the bikes and add a leg/hamstring press machine. ..  get some good air con - as it gets hot and stuffy in there too ....and to top it off every time you enter the main entrance of the gym it sinks!!

we the members are getting frustrated and fed up with the lack of action with the men‚Äôs showers specifically failing to repair and failing to clean them. this is firmly with pure gym hq and team‚Ä¶ we have complained in the gym, we have raised concerns about the green mould and smell. we have written reviews and we have contacted the gym directors in leeds. every single request has been ignored.  we have taken samples of the mould this evening and sent them to environmental health.
the gym was the perfect temperature. really clean and spacious. friendly atmosphere.
let me put it in these simple words.  there is no better way to use your free time than in a pure gym
thank you, previous issues resolved and this has elevated the gym back to a fully deserved 5 stars. thank you.

Review Title: Online company that can't provide an online service!!
Review: im a current member and i wanted to add an additional gym to my membership. the app states that i can not do this via the app and to contact customer service. can i resolve this straight away by speaking to someone on the telephone? no, online only.  if you you run a totally online operation then make sure its fit for purpose. i.e customers can make the necessary changes online!!!

Review Title: No paper in the weigh machine and staff‚Ä¶
Review: no paper in the weigh machine and staff have been told about it.  come on people are monitoring their weight. staff are lovely though

i‚Äôve been a member just under a year now and i couldn‚Äôt be happier with pure altrincham. staff are brilliant, friendly, supportive and take time to get to know you. special praise and gratitude to dolla, james, eve and dec. huge range of classes through the week and overall brilliant value for money. wouldn‚Äôt want to go anywhere else - thanks!!  a separate note to pure hq, some of the equipment is getting tired now and needs investment and replacement. spin bikes especially- at the time of writing there‚Äôs about 3 out of action and faults are common. the staff do their best with what they have but they can only do so much!

ladies section!!!! just wow. this review is specifically for saint georges way in leicester ( not sure of other pure gyms) when i started this gym there was no section just for ladies and i was not comfortable using weights as it was highly dominated by the men however now they have made a section for ladies only and its fairly big - has all the equipment and an area to get changed. i love it! im more confident and super comfortable now.

gym-well equipped and friendly, but whats best abaut it is an exceptional personal trainer- godfray. he is one of the best personal trainers i have ever met. he is an amazing young man with great knowledge, passion and a unique approach to the client. he loves what he does and can inspire everyone. with him every training session is an adventure and ends too quickly ;) he is very client-focused, perfectly adapting the workout to clients expectations and capabilities, very skillfully and constantly raising the bar. in addition, godfray has the unique ability to establish a special relationship with the client. he has an incredible sense of humour which definitely helps you overcome your weaknesses and achieve intended goals. meeting him is sheer enjoyment. im always exhausted but happy because thanks to him i do what is best for me. i love it :). i 100% recommend

garbage. moved to this gym cuz other one had no parking. the parking is ridiculous here and unsafe first off. secondly the company that deals with the parking are a nightmare to deal with!! they‚Äôll take anything off you even after you used the voucher the gym gives. my case has gone one since may and now had to give up and pay ¬£170 cuz the machine didn‚Äôt work. gym staff are useless like their class sessions. manager classless. office guys make the big decisions to move gyms so their also fools. garbage gym absolute horrendous.

i have always struggled having the motivation to go to the gym, but after going to kellies classes i have found that you can have a laugh, and actually enjoy exercise. kellie is an asset to pure gym and cares about every one of her members. her motivation of infectious and the only reason i actually turn up and dont make excuses!! thank you!!!

would recommend pure gym, staff very welcoming, plenty of classes to choose from.  pt kellie jones, pushes all who attend her classes which are tough, you feel the benefits the next day....... classes never get any easier, despite kellie saying there easy.

i cannot speak highly enough of max ramirez pt.  after some health complications‚Äîi knew it was time to make some lifestyle changes, the gym being one of them. i had never stepped foot in a gym so i sought out a pt as i would‚Äôve had little to no idea what i was doing.  max worked with me over the next three months. his professionalism, dedication and attention to detail was of the highest degree. not only did this involve putting together detailed workout plans, but also bringing me in for sessions to ensure that technique and form were on correct.  after three months of working with a max i noticed considerable changes in strength, weight and body fat %. even more importantly imo i parted ways with max with a more positive mindset with regards to the gym and achieving my goals.
friendly and helpful personnel available at all times and with a smile on their faces.  good atmosphere for beginners to pro‚Äôs.   spacious gym with new equipment.
clean and friendly with excellent equipment
class! lovely staff
switched from another gym to this one for the new women‚Äôs section. great space with most machines that you‚Äôll need. good atmosphere too

Review Title: Really friendly and show u how to u‚Ä¶
Review: really friendly and show u how to u what to do

Review Title: Chris Hucker is the best PT in the‚Ä¶
Review: chris hucker is the best pt in the southwest  great advice and i‚Äôm all already feeling the benefits
i had a great "burn it" class with mark this morning. we had a good variety of exercises so we could work out different areas. overall, i enjoyed the class and ill definitely be back :-)

Review Title: I've been a member for a few years but‚Ä¶
Review: ive been a member for a few years but started training with kellie once a week around 12 months ago. i cant rate her highly enough. its not just a one-hour workout - kellie checks in throughout the week, gives meal prep suggestions, workouts to do at home, and is genuinely invested in helping you achieve results. the range of equipment and facilities are excellent for the membership price, and classes always seem popular.

inputting registration as most people forget to enter their registration as they just want to work out straight away just like the other day how i got a parking fine for only being 50 mins at the gym on the one time i forgot my registration

dont like how only two of the women clean the gym .. like classes held there no air con running properly in the ladies only area and ladies toilets as well as the terrible sewage like scent on a daily basis only a few of the staff conduct themselves in a professional manner

great gym, really convenient with loads of parking. i haven‚Äôt always been the most confident with exercise, but feel comfortable and safe in this gym. shout out to kellie‚Äôs spin classes in particular. thanks!
great classes. easy to book in. friendly staff.  there have been maintenance issues with some of the equipment being out of order for months.
the classes are amazing. especially the spin class. i make sure i‚Äôm booked on kellie‚Äôs classes they are hard but u see results and they are fun.!!!

Review Title: Really enjoy going to Brunswick pure‚Ä¶
Review: really enjoy going to brunswick pure gym. really enjoy kellie‚Äôs classes, always a really good workout and pushes me to get the most out of the class! also done some pt sessions with her, would definitely recommend!

the location is the best thing about this gym for me personally.  there is usually issues with weight machine availability, there is only one of each with a few exceptions.  it is incredibly hot inside, the air con is woefully inadequate.  the female cleaner that is constantly wondering round the male changing rooms is also an irritation.  some customer wi-fi would be nice too (customer wi-fi now available) üòâ  edit: the only hand dryer in the male changing room has been broken now for over a month (hand dryer now fixed) & it‚Äôs still too warm in the gym

Review Title: Great gym and great location plenty of‚Ä¶
Review: great gym and great location plenty of parking outside makes it so convenient! plenty of machines and equipment for you to have a great workout. a wide range of choice of classes also to take advantage of. pt and instructor kellie is a great asset to puregym brunswick. she will always make time to help advise even during class if youre getting it wrong she will make sure you do get ot right. love her spin cycles they are a must each week and leg bums and tums. thank you kellie for always being encouraging

Review Title: Best gym I‚Äôve been to in a while!
Review: absolutely love it here, everyone is so friendly and helpful. gym facilities are amazing, 100% recommend. the pt sessions and classes are next level too :)
great place, great staff and a great atmosphere.

Review Title: Couldn‚Äôt fault the gym at all
Review: couldn‚Äôt fault the gym at all, lovely staff, nice and clean and tidy. great location.
absolutely love the classes at pure gym with alan. iv met some amazing people in the classes too

Review Title: Really good facilities in the gym
Review: really good facilities in the gym. love the new classes program real good variety to choose from, love kellie‚Äôs classes she always delivery‚Äôs a good class. thanks kellie

Review Title: PT‚Äôs are fantastic and a great‚Ä¶
Review: pt‚Äôs are fantastic and a great environment to train in.

after going to several gyms in liverpool brunswick was my favorite.  my personal trainer kellie helped me not only train, lose weight, and get stronger but also gave me great mental help during a trying time in my life.  strongly recommend! would only note as a minus that some of the classes have really loud volume.

Review Title: the ladies room is a plus
Review: i like the ladies room, so you don‚Äôt have to be stared at or intimidate by all the guys in the gym. i will say some of the equipment in the ladies area are a bit ‚Äúbeaten up‚Äù but they still work so that‚Äôs what matters. there‚Äôs a lot of equipment in general and workout options too.  one of the downsides to the gym is their staff, quite rude and lacking customer service skills. that‚Äôs one thing the gym is doing better at. anyone with common sense knows how hard it is for people to feel encouraged and motivated to go to the gym and the staff just make you want to cancel your subscription.  on top of that, their worst downside is their classes, while there‚Äôs plenty to book, the classes are not beginner friendly and the trainers leading these classes don‚Äôt care to check in with everyone‚Äôs level. my first class was cycling and i felt like i was racing lance armstrong, and injured my calf. so i tried something different this week and did a hiit class on monday, it‚Äôs now thursday and i can barely walk. safe to say i won‚Äôt participate in any lessons and it‚Äôs a shame as the program looks decent and i‚Äôve been gyming and working out for a few years now‚Ä¶ imagine!

Review Title: Lady‚Äôs toilet is a constant of male‚Ä¶
Review: lady‚Äôs toilet is a constant of male members coming in even when there is female members working at the same time. the lady‚Äôs toilet have got a fire exit which leads to other doors for staff and i see using that door in the lady‚Äôs like a corredor to go to other places. totally not private enough to be there getting ready to have a shower.

Review Title: Minor issue is that cannot find on any‚Ä¶
Review: minor issue is that cannot find on any website instructions for the various workouts shown by icons on the treadmills.

i joined this gym after following/messaging cat on instagram. shes very approachable and knowledgeable. i had my get started session with the manager rob. he didnt know how nervous i was but he put me at ease straight away. he gave great advice and made me feel confident to get started. this is a lovely clean gym with lots of space and plenty of equipment/machines even when busy.
gym is clean . air con is sparse.  equipment is good . hard to find help  struggle to find available staff
great gym and lovely staff

the new layout is horrendous, anyone wanting to do cardio, find an alternative gym. all crammed together in the corner, all machines right next to one another, never any spaces, running machines facing walls 30 cm from your face. suggest the layout plans are changed. will not be continuing my membership.

Review Title: Generally a good gym and good value .
Review: generally a good gym and good value . however- air con is never on, maybe to save money during the high energy costs, but either way its boiling hot during the summer. also machines are quite old, and when one is broken its broken for months. eg pull up machine was out for ages and the seat on the diverging row machine has been broken for as long as i can remember.

good value for money but still comes with more faults than the value for money. aircon rarley works and with the surronding windows its like a greenhouse. when aircon is switched on there is so many leaks its like a workout navigating the numerous buckets on the floor. gym smell sweaty and damp. changing rooms are very dirty with left over items under benches amd lockers, showers are rearlly cleaned with then flooding due to blocked drains or plugholes with no equipment or squiqqiges or mops for gym goers to use to clean the floor before use.  water machine has been broken last few days and along with that also the yanga machine. one small water dispenser on the side nearby which has been empty on more occassions.  the gym reguallry under goes refurb, following this layout always changed and machine move closer together making it more cramped.  free weights section is very small and cramped. with no proper ventilation causing bo smell to worse. eveyday.  staff are friendly enough and are approachable.
good equipment and friendly people

Review Title: It's ok for the price but they should‚Ä¶
Review: its ok for the price but they should hire cleaners. sometimes its really dirty.

Review Title: To Rebecca Passmore and UK PureGym HQ team
Review: puregym management i.e rebecca passmore and your uk team, support this gym fix the problems that members report‚Ä¶.. no generic response about sorry it‚Äôs 1 star, or contact gym manager‚Ä¶. it‚Äôs clear that they don‚Äôt have the resources or approval for the cost to fix these problems (which isn‚Äôt their fault)‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ you have increased cost of gym membership yet you cannot provide a clean, safe, enjoyable place for a workout.  list of things to resolve as a priority  - mens showers - fix all showers, remove the mould, smell and fix the water pressure - clean the gym better - dust everywhere - police the car parking use anpr if required - fix the many machines that are constantly break   also on a side note, the other puregym in leicester is looking great, well kept, invested in. replicate this at walnut street. doing the above and giving it a lick of paint and update it. might actually make members feel they are getting value for moneys
good combination of classes and exercises on fitness machines.

Review Title: All the best instructors always leave‚Ä¶
Review: all the best instructors always leave and are replaced with ones of a far inferior standard. hence the reason i dont bother with classes much now
good gym, great choice of equipment and friendly and helpful staff

Review Title: The Gym is very well equipped
Review: the gym is very well equipped, with free weights and machines. there is a good number of treadmills, step machines and rowing machines, just to name a few. sometimes it can be a bit crowded and some people tend to hog the machines while on their phone.. (argh) however i do find it a good reasonably prices place to work out.
loads of equipment, friendly atmosphere, womens only area, clean

gateshead gym,had problems, but have now been resolved, spoke with the area manager and the gym manager,they were both great and listened,and things have now been put right. so i will say to others out there, before leaving a negative review, speak to the managers first, and give them a bit time to resolve things.{ i did and it worked} puregym is a great no nonsense gym. { fact}

Review Title: Thanks Pure Gym I was late for work‚Ä¶
Review: thanks pure gym i was late for work yesterday evening because you‚Äôve not bothered to fix the showers for months. so not only do i have to wait for the car park but now have to wait to shower. just get a plumber!

Review Title: The fitness team are helpful and‚Ä¶
Review: the fitness team are helpful and patient. they challenge you to do more.
just love going helps so much with my mental health and wellbeing
fabulous gym, the classes and staff are brilliant

Review Title: Plenty of high quality equipment so no‚Ä¶
Review: plenty of high quality equipment so no waiting about. plenty of room so no-one should feel crowded. also the whole place is kept very clean. i feel very comfortable at the gym.

Review Title: I really like their classes timetable
Review: i really like their classes timetable, plenty of classes to choose from that can accommodate everyone schedule. all the people are lovely there, always ready to help and answer all the questions you may have.

Review Title: It is a great gym with some really nice‚Ä¶
Review: it is a great gym with some really nice instructors, great cycle class and strength 30 class, they instructors do correct your position and encourage you to do better and try harder. and the water machine has flavored sparkling water which is really good. strongly recommend the coconut and pineapple one.

Review Title: Was a bit busy but got on all machines‚Ä¶
Review: was a bit busy but got on all machines i wanted

been going to puregym for 3ish months and it‚Äôs definitely one of the best gyms i‚Äôve seen. very clean and tidy lots of space to work out lots of machines and a variety of weights. good air conditioning and most of the people are super friendly and nice. only problem is the gym can be a bit busy but i‚Äôve never found myself waiting for long although this will depend on the time you go.
good gym and facilities, but the free weights aren‚Äôt organised at all they‚Äôre not even paired up

great gym with a range of classes that will suit all with various abilities. all the trainers are helpful and friendly, especially foad who will always go above and beyond to support you and delivers fun and challenging classes each week.

i always find i can get on any equipment that i want to use. staff are always on hand, helpful and friendly. i do personal training also , and its helped me physically and mentally able to do more than i ever could before. great place for me .

Review Title: More expensive than any other Puregym‚Ä¶
Review: more expensive than any other puregym in the midlands yet we only have a fraction of the listed services that we pay for gym is clean and tidy but boiling hot as we can‚Äôt have the air conditioning on to save money and there‚Äôs no wi-fi despite it being included in the membership
very poorly organized, lack of equipment for the number of customers. i used to go to the wandsworth gym and its very well organized there, i moved to wembley and im not happy with the wembley gym.

Review Title: Perfect when able to visit off-peak
Review: very nice for functional workouts. a fantastic large studio there that is often free in the afternoons. avoid like the plague at peak times.

Review Title: Cannot access Wifi, extra security why??
Review: i have been trying to access wifi for two weeks as changed access by verifying phone number which does not pick up phone number on account which is the same, checked numerous times, so frustrating!  this really makes a difference to the enjoyment of my workout.  one of the cleaning stations has been removed and not replaced and despite the signs and warnings people are not putting back the weights....again frustrating!
helpful instructors comprehensive machines and good weight racks, bars and loose weights and 24 hour opening beats the local competition.

Review Title: Only gym I stuck too for over 8years‚Ä¶
Review: only gym i stuck too for over 8years scott liz ryan or grace are amazing pts always listen and tailor to their clients needs wouldnt go anywhere else
i love all about puregym except the opening times. it is so full at times and i would apreciate if it would make it 24/7 or at least open 5 am and close midnight.
they steal from children by abusing thier lack of knowledge in the technical world of money

Review Title: Not enough equipment or to many members
Review: each and every time i go to the gym there‚Äôs little or no equipment available to use unless i go after 9 pm and this isn‚Äôt very good for me due to being up for work at 4am each day

Review Title: It was supposed to be my induction day‚Ä¶
Review: it was supposed to be my induction day on 18 september 6.30 pm when i reached there literally there was no one to give induction. it was my first time to a gym and it was the worst experience i had.and i dont want to join in any gym

Review Title: Can‚Äôt believe I actually enjoy the gym
Review: really enjoyable, very friendly and not judged for not being active which is a relief to know! all of the staff are so lovely and friendly!

this gym is great! a convenient location and very good value for money. the classes are always really well organised and never boring. there is also a good variety of cardio and weight equipment / free weights.
great environment, but air con could be better! staff amazing

Review Title: Deliberate cold showers to save on‚Ä¶
Review: deliberate cold showers to save on money (confirmed by puregym).  why are we paying our fees if it doesn‚Äôt cover hot water? will update when they update the boiler settings

Review Title: The gym manager has an appalling‚Ä¶
Review: the gym manager has an appalling attitude members, rude, aggressive and abrupt. its a shame because the gym has good equipment and the personal trainers are friendly enough. i have trained in gyms over 20 years, never been spoken to like that. due to this shockingly poor customer service i have no option to cancel my membership. i did put a complaint in, heard nothing back, which say it al really.

firstly i have to say how clean the gym is which is expected becasue it‚Äôs very new. i like how it‚Äôs big and open it is.  you will struggle to find plates. i wasted my time walking around trying to find 5kg and 10kg plate. then when benching people would just come over and take them.  the benches have no safety bars so if you bail, it‚Äôs going to be a struggle. they tell you there are safety bars but the sit far too high for bench press.  i suppose you get what you pay for, that‚Äôs why its a cheap gym.
