i am writing to express my dissatisfaction with the behavior of one of your personal trainers, foad, during my recent class at your gym/studio.  today, i attended a class led by foad, scheduled to start at 9am. however, to my disappointment, foad left the room shortly after the class began and chose to prioritize a personal training client instead of teaching the class. this not only disrupted the class but also displayed a lack of professionalism and commitment to the participants.  as a paying member of your gym, i believe it is essential that instructors, like foad, fulfill their responsibilities and commitments to their students. this incident has left me feeling frustrated and disappointed with the level of service provided.  i kindly request that you address this matter promptly to ensure that such incidents do not occur in the future, as they affect the overall quality of the experience for members like myself. i hope for a resolution that ensures better accountability and professionalism from your staff.  thank you for your attention to this issue, and i look forward to your response and actions to rectify the situation.
gym is always well kept staff always around to help and polite a range of equipment is available for use
spacious gym, different zones, lots of machines.‚ò∫ pts are very friendly and highly professionalüôÇ. no contract options üôÇ .

great gym with great people , classes are also very friendly with the trainers taking care to make sure you are comfortable with the routine, can‚Äôt fault anything about it, i have used other gyms and nothing compares to puregym durham
good gym, lots of space in the mornings, the ac could be a lot better not much airflow shower drains can be pretty smelly

Review Title: It‚Äôs a great gym all of the equipment‚Ä¶
Review: it‚Äôs a great gym all of the equipment what you need to train and a friendly place to be definitely recommend

gyms clean and welcoming. equipment feels minimal. curl bar for example‚Ä¶only 1, yet it‚Äôs increasingly popular. machines like incline chest press and tricep press, but i understand it‚Äôs space dependent. prices seem steep too, ¬£25.99 for a working class town when puregym in central london are ¬£27.99, seems like more than property rent inflating this price. i‚Äôd expect it to be more competitive when the local leisure centre gym is only ¬£15 a month. overall it‚Äôs a good gym, but could be better.
very friendly staff great classes clean

pure gym binley ,coventry good gym open 24 hours ! only complaint really is that if you go late then the music gets turned right down which can effect your motivation. turn it down i agree at that time but dont turn it right down! üëç
always clean. range of different equipment is in good working order. vending machines always stocked

Review Title: The gym suffers from trying to do too much and doing nothing well.
Review: the gym suffers from trying to do everything for everyone, and ending up doing nothing especially well. great cardio equipment, but under equipped with free weights, benches and cable machines. its in a prime location with too little space, so at peak times you wont be able to do your planned set. the equipment isnt very good. hack squad machine will hurt your shoulders, pull up bars are too low, the push up station is for dwarves.  vending machines dont work with google pay and the car park tokens are faff. poor ventilation means the gym stinks of bo all the time. its not a place you should go out of your way to join. im now switching to ftc

Review Title: Excellent gym well run and very‚Ä¶
Review: excellent gym well run and very friendly staff
simple question...why dont puregym employ someone to keep the gym, the functional zone in particular tidy - especially at weekends?

Review Title: Superb workout environment and staff team.
Review: a very professorial personal trainer i liked the music played. very accessible- clean and readily available equipment and premises.

the instructors are great! so knowledgeable and friendly. they acknowledge the fact you are new and help you. the classes are so good and very motivating. i like the early ones and they are perfect at 6:30 there is one every weekday just before work. its always so clean and tidy even though its so busy.
great gym , plenty of equipment,  always clean and tidy, staff friendly and knowledgeable, willing to help.  showers clean. good parking

Review Title: Only 2 of us shown up for burn it with‚Ä¶
Review: only 2 of us shown up for burn it with jamie from warwick retail park gym coventry he comfortably put us through our paces explaining everything very happy with todays session

Review Title: Not impressed with the classes or‚Ä¶
Review: not impressed with the classes or instructors taking the class

Review Title: Dave Fuller is the ultimate PT
Review: dave fuller is the ideal personal trainer. weve been working with him for 10+ weeks, and it has felt like a breeze. he is dedicated, compassionate, and a consummate professional. he has developed a personalised workout regime to suit our goals. we leave every session feeling positive and empowered.  dave offers group and individual training. we come in a pair, and dave ensures our sessions are accessible, balanced and flexible, establishing solid fundamentals before introducing more advanced movements.  he is highly knowledgeable about workout techniques and all of the available equipment, which makes it easy to challenge yourself with confidence. we are focused on resistance exercise, and dave has seen huge improvement in our abilities week-on-week.  daves infectious positivity is a highlight of our week. he elevates the gym to feel like a friendly and welcoming place.
pure gym is great. in a good location, always clean and a lot of variety of classes and equipment.

pure gym giffnock  this is a good gym with friendly staff and good selection of equipment and weights. disappointed to see that some machines are broken already and dont seem to be getting repaired. bike on the ground floor has been broken for about 5 weeks, stair master upstairs about 3 weeks and cross trainer upstairs about 3 weeks. the sports water machine downstairs has also been broken for a few weeks too.is there any timescale for these machines being operational again? putting that aside, its a good gym with a friendly feel about it.
uncrowded, clean and able to achieve what i wanted.

this gym really needs to address the phone zombies who spend more time staring into their phones instead of concentrating on their workout.  several times i‚Äôve asked someone if they were nearly finished after waiting ages. they said another rep and go back to their phone. 10 minutes later i just left without finishing my set as they were still sat there on the phone.  this frustration is shared by many members who just want to get their sets done and go but they‚Äôre constantly held up while people watch videos.  puregym needs to address this growing problem by placing posters asking people to not use phones while on the equipment and be mindful of other users. before long frustration will boil over into bigger problems!  also, flickering lights and showers that smell like a urinal isn‚Äôt good either!

great gym and good equipment. would like cleaning stations not only for infection control but also to clean sweaty equipment. showers far to cold and so are the changing rooms. not sure if i would stay over the winter for this reason.

Review Title: No accessible tap water on the main‚Ä¶
Review: no accessible tap water on the main floor ‚Ä¶ tap is broken for over two weeks and nobody care ‚Ä¶ bristol harbour‚Ä¶ i‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs required by the law to provide the water

i like pure gym, it has good equipment and it‚Äôs safe and clean. just one niggle, during the refurbishment most of the treadmills and cross trainers have been positioned so they face a blank wall instead of the 4 screens on the wall behind! annoying and baffling.

Review Title: Pure Gym HQ - please give your support to this gym manager
Review: pure gym hq - please support this gym manager and deputy manager fix the showers.  more and more members are becoming unhappy about this situation (and also fed up of waiting for a working shower to be available, often being late for work).  surely it‚Äôs not they hard to get a maintenance team in or a plumber? you‚Äôve managed to refit the other leicester gym. but this one you cannot even provide a cleaner and a team to fix all the showers.

over half the lockers in the men‚Äôs changing room are broken. the toilets ( there‚Äôs only 2) in men‚Äôs changing room are very dirty and bad smelling. and there was no wi-fi available. a very basic gym and lots of broken equipment and lack of staff to make complaints or ask questions. a reception would make a huge difference during the day. very average but for the price it is fair. but  there are better gyms in the city. hope the lockers are addressed and hygiene in changing area‚Äôs improve.

Review Title: Had to cancel my membership after just‚Ä¶
Review: had to cancel my membership after just 1 week, this is not a gym it‚Äôs more like a school playground , kids running around , play fighting messing about chasing each other , zero gym etiquette at all and nothing said by staff not for me .. gym group just up the road much better

customer service is non existent. the gym is ok but there‚Äôs no way of contacting the central organisation when there are account errors or erroneous communications received. it‚Äôs disappointing as the lack of customer service is why i‚Äôm looking at alternatives. it‚Äôs ridiculous to run such a large organisation while pushing away the customer to avoid contact. also means that when they make mistakes on membership/account issues, you can‚Äôt use the facilities or resolve the problem so they‚Äôre taking money and not providing the product because they‚Äôve messed something up.

thank you for the generic response. i think you are missing the point, why cant the cleaning station by the free weights be moved closer to the cardio equipment more importantly why cant it be stocked. i beg to differ about the equipment being cleaned, if you mean with a feather duster yes orherwise an emphatic no. this is the second time puregym have been less than helpfull or understanding..... time to move to a gym who care about their customers not just the money they can get from them. can only speak for longbridge gym - dirty, cleaning station close to treadmills removed, one by free weights, otherwise of gym left there. cleaning stuff from upper cardio removed, now have to go to studio to collect stuff to clean machine, management said its because of cutting back on waste. hence cardiac equipment very rarely gets wiped down after use.

visited the site today and was not impressed, limited kit and uninterested staff- found it laughable during my session with the ‚Äúmanager‚Äù crumpling paper and throwing it like a basketball at the bin was just as funny when finishing my session and heading up to the shower he was more interested in watching tiktok than doing anything else. i‚Äôd almost guarantee that there was better more productive things he could of been doing.  don‚Äôt get me wrong gym was clean enough- now i know puregym are taking away the cleaning stations but to have none and not have someone cleaning the kit down has made me fee uncomfortable about this and many other sites. showers could of done with a decent clean.

if you sort the showers out ill give you 5 stars! but the ice cold showers and the stench coming from the sinks is a real issue. please sort it because i like everything else about the gym! ps. showers are regularly an issue...this isnt new

still no change here. pg seem to just copy and paste responses to silence negative customer feedback. spin bikes need maintenance work and class availability needs to be reviewed. are these not standard practices for running a gym?
the facility and the equipment received was great. the staff was respectful and helpful. the environment felt safe to work out in.

where is the gym managers? the showers have been out of use for months, apart from 2 dirty ones that are also broken (at least usable). never cleaned. there is no communication on this issue or presence from gym management. please own this issue? or is this gym closing down ?

Review Title: Not worth it for the price
Review: the gym needs more equipment. the heaviest dumbbell is 16kg which is mind blowing and to make it worse there‚Äôs no barbells, weighted plates or even a bench press. for ¬£38, the gym is way below par.

Review Title: Been coming here since January and I‚Ä¶
Review: been coming here since january and i don‚Äôt have much to complain about. i‚Äôve heard this location is better than most in terms of equipment, unfortunately it seems word has spread so the gym has become more popular but that‚Äôs not in anyone‚Äôs control, and there are still quiet days. in the past few weeks i am sad to say that the general & cleaning staff haven‚Äôt been as great. i never see cleaning staff no matter the time of day or week i am there, and there are no facilities to clean the equipment yourself so when a situation arises like today where a member used an apparatus and left it completely covered in sweat, it isn‚Äôt useable of course this comes with a host of problems. a week ago i spilled my water and tried to clean it with some tissue to no avail, so i told the only member of staff on duty and he just said ‚Äúoh i don‚Äôt know what to do, if you can find a cleaner that would be great i‚Äôm not sure where there is one‚Äù. anyone that knows this gym knows it‚Äôs not big enough to lose another staff member in, and as the one supervising the gym i thought surely they would know if a cleaner is in at the time or not? i saw him wandering around for about an hour and considering i spilt the water within the first minute of getting in, it was only when i had finished my workout, got changed and was heading out the door that i was asked by said staff member if that was the water i had told him about, to which he then said he will put a sign out or something‚Ä¶i‚Äôm not sure why it took him over an hour to do this as i could‚Äôve told this man how to handle the situation from start to finish.  overall i have a level of concern for the hygiene/cleanliness and safety of the gym at the moment as no one seems to be proactive enough in supervising the gym and ensuring the days run smoothly on their shifts.
overcrowded... very good gym, but you cant use any equipment. they have taken far too many members.
spin bikes are long overdue for a service, seats at odd angles, straps are loose, speedometer rarely works. please look into this asap!

small, dirty, ridiculously loud.  attended at a non-peak time and yet still could not find more than 1 free piece of weight equipment.  changing rooms smelt, drains definitely need looking at. broken lockers, main changing room door didn‚Äôt even shut properly.  music from a spin class was so loud people in the main gym had to shout at each other and i couldn‚Äôt hear my own music on max through head phones.  luckily i‚Äôm only here visiting as in the area for a few days. would be cancelling my membership if this was my local puregym.  will not be back.

the staff should monitor the lockers being used as people are now leaving their stuff in the lockers preventing other people to use it. i normally go to the gym at 6am and all the lockers are full while the gym is almost empty. it is so ridiculous and disrespectful to the other members.  on the website it says that it is against the rules to keep the stuff in lockers overnight, but the management of ilford puregym is clearly not monitoring it.
what a disgrace of a gym! the cleaner at 1:15am taking photos whilst im on the treadmill! shouldnt be taking any photos whilst people are around!!

Review Title: If you read one review, let it be this‚Ä¶
Review: if you take one review literally from this website, let it be this one and sign up with max cooper for pt sessions. i originally found max on the puregym website and although at first nervous and hesitant, i decided to book with him as he was the pt closest in age and aligned with the goals i was looking forward to make in the gym. as i had little/no gym experience, he was there for me every step of the way - making sure i felt comfortable and in a safe space learning about the gym when i was under his presence. he took his time and patience with me ensuring i was taking all of his long-standing knowledge on board. but aside from the gym, he was a genuine friend to me and supported me through all the tough times i was having and was a truly friendly face i could talk to about absolutely anything going on in my life. he‚Äôs an amazing guy and i can guarantee first hand from my experience he will nurture you towards your goals and ultimately become a great friend to you along the way.

Review Title: Puregym Northwich has to be the worst‚Ä¶
Review: puregym northwich has to be the worst gym i‚Äôve ever been in 35 years of training !!!! machines are always broke dirt and grim everywhere people not training and on there phone only to be told by management they will do nothing dirty looks from staff my girlfriend who was called ‚Äú a f‚Äîcking moron by a pt for just training !!!! i reported it nothing backing back yet at least 30 people have had the same dirty looks and abuse of this pt my girlfriend has competed in the bnbf natural bodybuilding and come 2 nd overall and is in the british finals not even a well done from no one well apart from one pt surly this makes the gym look good very very poor management but everyone says that at the gym they turn of air con when red hot outside !!! constant smells the worst music i‚Äôve ever heard terrible rust and caps missing on allot of equipment which was reported 3 years ago !!!! still not fixed i would give it zero if i could poor management and poor attitudes off allot of pts yet warrington and the new one at crewe great atmosphere great music and vibe too pts and zero dirty looks . zero at northwich needs a total overhaul immediately iam affraid but strangely enough you cannot go above the management at puregym northwich no contact number no email !!!!

Review Title: When I chose to join puregym Muswell‚Ä¶
Review: when i chose to join puregym muswell hill, it was firstly and the main reason and still is the classes. the pts were very good and knowledgeable and made the classes enjoyable so much so that i was able to see the results of my hard work from the classes(im not that disciplined enough to train on my own) the problem is and has constantly been consistency of the classes and pts, i was doing 4  sometimes 5 or 6 classes a week 4 of them were after work monday to friday. as of today there is only 1 i can make (from the classes i did)and the pts of the classes when they was on, were not around long before they left. the others have either been stopped (due to no pt to take it) or the time has moved and im unable to attend. and as for the management well the latest manager (i dont actually know her name) stormed into the class before it started and told a client to go and put her coat in a locker as its a trip hazard which was fair enough but the way she said it well put it this way her people skills need a bit of working on.and iv never known a manager that doesnt actually take a class either.all iv seen since she has been the manager is puregym lose good pts and classes disappearing.

gyms decent however the manager was doing a spin wheel raffle game , i won a free pt session, the pt trainer that contacted me i found him very arrogant so was reluctant to do anything with him. next minute he turned round and said pt ain‚Äôt free i said but i won a free session from your manager but you want to charge me. yeah that just put me off completely, ain‚Äôt been back since.

i moved here when my previous gym closed following complaints (im led to believe, although the manager always maintained i was the only one with a problem).  ive only been once and it was just for a shower. the water was luke warm. i mentioned in a feedback email and am advised the showers are at 33¬∞ to reduce energy consumption. this is despite the recommendation from dermatologists that the ideal temperature is 37¬∞ or so, with an upper level of 40¬∞.  i have no way of knowing how warm it was, but on a sunny day, the unheated water at home is a comparable temperature, cos the sun hits my kitchen and bathroom.  i think i prefer a few degrees warmer...at least another 5-10¬∞!!!

Review Title: Staff not friendly and not available
Review: staff not friendly and not available, send them to leeds ls10 puregym gave experience . definitely they are smiling (at least) with selective people only. check your cams.

Review Title: They are happy to employ someone who‚Ä¶
Review: they are happy to employ someone who was sacked for dealing drugs to prisoners whilst he worked in the prison service. they are fully aware of his drug dealing past and are still happy for him to work with 16 year olds on a daily basis, this is quite frankly sham  i have previously contacted pure gym head office and they do not give a monkeys theyre safe space code is nothing but lip service

Review Title: Well equipped and good value, but‚Ä¶
Review: friendly staff, open 24 hours, good selection of equipment, not as intimidating as some gym spaces, and good value. the only real downside to things is equipment hygiene. during staffed hours you do see staff occasionally coming round to clean equipment, but often, especially during unstaffed hours because it‚Äôs a gym and folk sweat, you can find yourself using equipment that‚Äôs ‚Äúgreasy‚Äù. hygiene stations are standard in most gyms for this very reason, and have been standard equipment in gyms long before the pandemic. puregym deciding to remove hygiene stations and using the end of the pandemic and being ‚Äúmore sustainable‚Äù as the reasoning seems either a tad disingenuous or worryingly short sighted.  other than the hygiene issue it‚Äôs a good gym with friendly staff that‚Äôs suitable for all abilities.

i first met chloe in a personal training session and she made me feel comfortable with my surroundings straight away i am a 60 yr old and haven‚Äôt been to a gym for many years so i was extremely nervous and worried what to expect but chloe was amazing with her understanding nature she knew what i needed after the first session the 8 week plan she had for me worked!!! i‚Äôm now 16lb lighter lost inches and my confidence has gone through the roof i have even started classes with chloe i couldn‚Äôt be more impressed she is a kind and lovely person who knows her stuff !!! and when ever i‚Äôm in the gym she will always come over to see how i‚Äôm getting on which is lovely i honestly cannot praise her enough i am so please with my results and i‚Äôm going from strength to strength üëçüòÅ

i wanted to take a moment to express our gratitude to bradley copus not only for his high professionalism, but also for the dedication and guidance in helping us achieve our fitness goals. his knowledge and expertise have been invaluable to all of us. his positive attitude and encouragement have also been a tremendous motivator. bradley is very attentive to each of us checking how correctly we perform the exercises and managing to come up to each of us during the lesson and correct. he always made sure that everyone in the group was able to keep up with the pace of the session. his consideration as well –∞s exceptional service and commitment to our health and wellness is greatly appreciated. overall, we found his training to be very beneficial and  are feeling more and more confident in our ability to apply the knowledge he has been sharing with us.

brilliant value for money this company far exceeds any expectation - the machinery is modern and just as much of it when comparing to other more expensive gyms. who needs the wet soggy and time consuming additions such as pool, sauna and steam room at extra cost when there is this.

Review Title: Edinburgh Craigleith Great Gym but the studio is too dark and claustrophobic
Review: the gym is clean with lots of new equipment and easily accessible. the trainers are friendly and helpful. however, its ground-level studio, where group classes are held, is too dark and claustrophobic. perhaps, the management could provide adequate lighting.

on my way into the gym this week (hottest week of the year!) i was told by a member of staff that the aircon wasn‚Äôt working. i then followed him into the ladies changing rooms (he was doing a cleanliness check) and the smell üí© ewwww. the ladies toilets were not working (never known them to be working since i joined in august). but the smell mixed with the heat in the gym was not motivating me to workout. i left after 45 minutes of cardio dripping with sweat and feeling slightly sick from the smell. not in a hurry to go back so membership fee wasted. shame as i really wanted to do this and felt motivated after struggling with mental health issues for years. wouldn‚Äôt recommend at the moment, not until they get the toilet problem and aircon sorted. have sent an email asking what they plan to do and after five days, not had a reply. going to cancel my membership and find an alternative gym. being over 50 myself, a working toilet is a must!

i mainly joined because of the frequency of spin classes compared to my previous gym (an even lower budget gym in leeds city centre). however, i would otherwise much prefer to have remained there. i don‚Äôt like essentially being in a cave when i work out, without any natural light or phone signal - the fluorescent lights and typical gym smell that hit you as soon as you get in is pretty overwhelming. it also feels quite packed and chaotic when you walk in, and is very much like a fishbowl, with nowhere to hide. compared to my former gym, there seems to be a much higher percentage of ‚Äògym bros‚Äô parading around, and i find it quite intimidating that they‚Äôre allowed to sit on the bikes behind the instructor on their phones for the whole spin class, not actually participating but watching the rest of us (i was even getting paranoid one was taking photos). the very fact that the spin classes are right in the middle of the gym with everyone watching is in itself daunting. as a whole it feels very impersonal, and the instructors seem great but there just doesn‚Äôt seem to be a culture of communicating with each other in classes (possibly due to the transient nature of such gym memberships, with people coming and going). it‚Äôs quite nice to be able to slip in and out unnoticed, and i can certainly see the appeal of anonymity when looking and feeling at your absolute worst, but eye contact and a hello/smile/getting to know the names of regulars doesn‚Äôt go amiss. i realise a lot of this is down to personal preference, so i don‚Äôt expect the gym to be able to do much about this.  however, in terms of improvements, things i would ideally like to see are proactive efforts to make it more inclusive (this worked really well at my former gym - it doesn‚Äôt cost much to stick up some posters etc making it clear that people of any shape/size/background are welcome, as well as making women feel safer in what is quite a testosterone-fuelled environment), and practically, a bit of a service of the spin bikes (some of the screens don‚Äôt work, foot straps are loose etc) and an improvement on the availability of cleaning products (e.g. spray and paper - the bin never seems to get emptied and they‚Äôre always running out). in an ideal world i‚Äôd also love to see a bigger variety of classes.

caroline lofthouse yoga teaching is first class. very well instructed to all levels of ability. caroline is helping me develop my yoga practice. the improvement in my practice in a relatively short amount of time is great. caroline is patient, client focused and offers a well guided practice.

it‚Äôs odd. every year in the summer when there‚Äôs a heatwave, the air con breaks. then in the winter, the heating breaks. so yet again the air con is broken, staff state it will be fixed next week after the heatwave. don‚Äôt join if you want a pleasant workout
still under 16 using the gym despite this being mentioned a few months back. shouldn‚Äôt be down to me to inform management. management need to be checking 13/14 year olds using the weights!!!

i enjoy using the gym, however, im left frustrated by the following points, which i dont believe justifies my ¬£29.99 membership cost.  1: air con the gym temperature makes for an awful workout experience, its simply too hot. i see in other peoples feedback youve mentioned the temperature is automatically controlled, which might be true in the cardio section of the gym, as that is always refreshingly cool. however, the free weights area and immediately to the left as you enter, it needs addressing. the air con is not functioning in these here, and hasnt done for years. previously, ive just got on with it, but its beyond a joke now, members deserve better and shouldn‚Äôt have to work out in a pool of their own sweat.  2: the time it takes for equipment to be fixed ‚Äì an example being the cable machine upstairs. this is now approaching months out of action, which isnt acceptable considering how busy it can get  3: lat pull down attachments - can we have some more up-to-date attachments please (i cant insert the url, but google "mirafit gym cable machine attachment set - 5 handles" and youll know the ones im referring to). the gym used to have one of them, but that disappeared a few months back and hasnt been replaced  finally, a suggestion box is mentioned by yourselves in the previous reviews, which is a good idea. but i havent been able to locate it? if its in the office, i think it should be moved somewhere else to allow people to provide constructive criticism without having to speak to a staff member, it might reduce some of the negatives reviews you have here, as members are frustrated by issues they would like to be resolved, but dont have a way to report them

i do love the gym but when the mostafa as himself as pt trainer showing off his body and  walk topless at the gym my mother cant  do workout because she too shy to see mens naked body. but because  of that he encouraged  other young kids and guys showing  off they body and they  do  take a pictures themselves in the big yoga room where you have a lots of mirrows. i am not going  anymore to gym because, it is like topless show and my mother as well. we changed the gym because of that. if you want walk topless or naked and show off your body i believe gym is the social  place it is not the place to do so. there privet places where you can do it so.

the puregym in camden (london), its small, the equipment is ok. the showers and changing room is to small and gets cramped, at peak times. the toilets are tiny and dirty. the staff are quite and keep to themselves, but they are friendly.

Review Title: Equipment is terrible worst gym I have trained in. ‚Ä¶
Review: equipment is basic which i understand for a corporate gym. the problem is there is so little of it. due to the high intake of clients it is broke often. at the moment broken equipment is cable machine, lumbar extension, leg press, leg extension. only 1 of each item so no other equipment to use the same. i have to now pay to go another gym at weekends to get a full training session. there is multiple treadmills broke. some equipment is dangerous as missing safety caps for eg pec dec. the equipment takes months to be fixed and loads of other equipment on its way out, completely rusted. air conditioning is turned off a lot of the time now in hot weather. tvs are not allowed to be switched on now. music was even off for a bit. worst gym to be in at present. very dirty in places. there is no action when feedback given by management at all and i have held back on a review for so long. it is so un motivating to train in. just lack of gyms in the area. no 24 hour ones either which is the only positive point i can give. looked for headquarters email and asked for contact details in the gym - none found or given. if you are into your fitness/weight training this is not for you. if you wanna go to chat or sit on your phone maybe it is. double your training time as queues for equipment as so little of it. in need of a total refurb. pure gym warrington and crewe are üíØ better with motivated staff so not all are as bad as northwich.

4 stars because theres always room for improvement. however, i would give my pt charlie bishop 5 stars. i only re-joined this gym so i could train with charlie. i had been to her classes before so when i needed a pt i messaged her. in the last 7 months or so she has helped me recover from a major surgery. i was in constant pain and now im in no pain. i also find training with her really fun. its a space where i can play and be silly and get fitter at the same time. the other staff that ive met have also been great. thanks lads.

tuesday 5th september 2023 another no show at the 9.15am cycle class. no instructor üë®‚Äçüè´. no staff members,. just disappointed members. pure gym needs to sort it out and provide alternative cover if staff members are on holiday. this is totally unacceptable.

Review Title: Hednesford pure gym is like a sauna
Review: hednesford pure gym is like a sauna, the air conditioning hasnt been working since around may. i have put plenty of complaints in regarding the air conditioning since may and nothing has been done. im really considering moving gyms as its way too hot in there, i understand when doing a workout that you will build up a sweat, but i can run for 1 minute and the sweat is pouring out of me and im quite fit! please get this air conditioning sorted as i feel customers will also be moving to a gym that has air conditioning just like this gym should have! im going to be getting in contact with health and safety as this is not safe as customers could pass out due to fitness and how hot it is in the gym

Review Title: Its good but could be perfect with a few tweaks
Review: not to bad for the price but its is missing a few key pieces of equipment such as the seated leg curl which has been proven to activate 50% more of hamstring when compared then the conventional flat hamstring curls. theres no hack squat machine which for me is a necessity to really hit the quads hard and theres also no weighted ab machines. the only option we have for the upper abs is crunches on the functional trainer but for some strange reason theres is a notice on the functional trainer which states not to do ab crunches on it. if you follow the rules youd have no equipment for upper ab work.

i really like this gym. there is a really relaxed feel about it. i never feel intimidated and even at points where footfall is high, it never really feels super busy. there is a good amount of equipment and the whole thing just feels slick and well thought out.  as a female i am however worried about my attendance to this gym over the winter period. i can only really attend pre-work between 5-6am(ish) and at the moment its light enough to feel safe walking from the car park if you move quickly. once the clocks go back i cant see myself confidently walking from the car park to the gym at this hour, unless i wait in my car until i see another person who looks like a gym-goer but thats not ideal. this isnt necessarily the gyms problem (hence no drop in stars) and i cant think how this can really be rectified other than perhaps the gym discussing with the council and seeing if anything can be put in place to make that walkthrough feel more secure. im really keen to give it a go and just hope the lighting is enough to make it feel safer.

rules from their own general gym rules that no one follows (found below, if that matters at all) www[dot]puregym[dot]com/gym-rules/  might as well just remove this from your website because certainly none of these are followed in east india gym!!  ... bring and use sweat towels ... ... bags are not permitted onto the gym floor ... ... clothing such as ... flip-flops/sandals ... are not permitted. you may not use the gym whilst under the influence of alcohol, narcotics, tranquilizers or any medication or other substance ... ... ensure that you put your weights back in their original place ... ... do not misuse the weights by dropping them on the floor ... ... only use the lockers for the duration of their training session ...
easy to sign up, just as easy to cancel if need be. customer service team always happy to help

Review Title: Good gym but hammer curl machine has issues
Review: ive been going to this gym for 2 weeks now and im happy with the gym, however it could do with thumb print entry instead of pins and qr codes just incase i dont have access to my mobile phone for the qr code or pin, also the hamstring curl machine has an issue where when you lie down on it, theres a bump where it inclines causing pain and discomfort on the quads due to the pressure put on them when lieng down, i have to put my jacket on the bump to reduce the pressure on my quads. ive been to simply gym,snap fitness and area 51 and never experienced this problem before, but aparts from that its a good gym overall
melanie is a very motivating coach who is very passionate about what she does. she really helped me boost my confidence about myself, cannot recommend her as a pt enough!! 5/5

Review Title: No working air conditioning yet again‚Ä¶
Review: no working air conditioning yet again for the hottest week of the year. complaint raised with pure gym via twitter who are adamant it‚Äôs working when it‚Äôs clearly not, i‚Äôve put my hand in front of the ac vents and it‚Äôs pumping out warm air! utter joke.

i have been training with luca for several months now, having previously trained with other trainers in other gyms. luca is absolutely the best trainer ive trained with. his expert knowledge of positioning to avoid injury and hand placement has taught me to be confident in the gym when going by myself. in fact, he is the only trainer in 5 years who has got me to a point where im confident to go to the gym on my own as well as train with him. i saw a big increase in my strength whilst training with him and would highly recommend him. i honestly wouldnt train with anybody else anymore, he really is the best and i speak from personal experience. hes very professional, knowledgeable, friendly and easy to chat to. you wont go wrong training with luca and it wont be long before you see a difference from your training..

Review Title: A car crash of a gym being run to the ground
Review: puregym muswell hill has consistently dropped in quality of management, equipment, classes and pts since i moved to it a few years ago. the latest management seems inadequate frankly, creating a hostile environment and causing a number of the best pts to leave. i have to say that some of the pts left behind are as bad as the management. one pt, a certain female that this review won‚Äôt let me name, screams across the gym at people, sits on equipment and prevents others from using it, does tarot cards in the middle of the gym and is rude and obnoxious. another pt, toby blasts music so loud you can hear it wherever you are in the building, smashes bikes in his spin classes so hard that the ground below him shakes and a light fitting over a treadmill is almost ready to drop, and seems to spend much of his time ‚Äúon shift‚Äù actually just on his phone or on the massage beds. the management also has no concern for the standards within the gym - it stinks, the toilets are disgusting and the gym floor is always a mess. what‚Äôs more, there‚Äôs always groups of teenage boys hogging equipment and being generally loud and obnoxious. i really do not understand how puregym head office is letting this all happen. the talented staff are leaving, and the customers will follow. i‚Äôve cancelled my membership to this gym because it‚Äôs not a place i feel happy or comfortable being in anymore.

Review Title: This gym is amazing for space
Review: this gym is amazing for space, equipment and quiet areas. the huge let down is how hot it is always seems to be in the morning time. the air conditioning is really bad literally to the point you sometimes feel quite faint while working out. i don‚Äôt want to leave as it is a great gym and close to me but it‚Äôs ridiculous how hot it is in there. it is a 24 hour gym so the air conditioning should be on at all times not just at day/peak times. it‚Äôs difficult for people with astma like my sister to go also attends. really hope this problem could be addressed as i have really settled here, also the workout mats in the studio areas are really filthy. they always leave marks on my leggings/knees. if they air conditioning was better quality and on during all opening hours it would have been 5* from me.

Review Title: Lovely gym but not the cleanest
Review: lovely gym but not the cleanest good classes and equipment but perhaps a bit more attention can be paid at the cleanliness/hygiene in showers and wc its progressively getting worse with each week. thats the only bad point

Review Title: Love how friendly it is the staff are‚Ä¶
Review: love how friendly it is the staff are amazing and helpful  last few times ive been in not seen the manager assistant manager however looks burnt out and in need of time off  best gym to still go to

Review Title: The gym is useless borough / London‚Ä¶
Review: the gym is useless borough / london bridge branch  - since the new management took over, the gym has been unable to open on time (again). i am on my third visit and the gym has opened late. please do better. in the event that you cannot open on time, you should offer discounts on memberships.

Review Title: The worse pure gym I've ever worked out in
Review: first visit to this gym and what a joke, very disappointed with this gym. most of the lockers were out of use, the machines have not been maintained. the hygiene left me feeling like i was going to pick up some bug from how unclean the place was. freezing cold showers, no staff about it when their was they were not very friendly the cycle room was unsafe as the instructor kept the light off id have cancelled my membership of this was my gym. i know the area is rough but you could take better care of the place

Review Title: Been a great gym for years
Review: been a great gym for years, but some of the machines a looking tired, could do with upgrade, and also clocks on the wall please to check the time, as the tvs are all switched off, as a cost cutting exercise, üò©

after reading some of the bad reviews i felt like writing one myself, nothing is perfect and for what we pay the staff and trainers do a fab job. the trainers are not there to pick up after members where they leave equipment, this is down to users to place back, my experience at puregym has been positive the trainers are knowledgeable and push you beyond what you thought was possible. i have been using this gym now for 2 years and i‚Äôam the strongest and healthiest i‚Äôve been since children and probably even before, the trainers are friendly and supportive in classes the trainers make the gym one of the best ones i‚Äôve been too,

Review Title: Love my PT sessions with Kellie
Review: i love my sessions with kellie she is amazing and i always feel amazing after! friendly vibes from staff and other members, it‚Äôs clean and tidy!

i use multiple puregym locations due to travel for work and staying at my partners in the south side. recently i have started using the newly opened giffnock branch and the comparison is horrendous. robroyston is in dire need of a refurb / upgrade. not a single thing has changed or been upgraded since it opened years ago. it‚Äôs not big enough for the level of use - especially at peak time. it‚Äôs not up to date with the changes to the fitness industry and the type of equipment / attachments that are now available. it‚Äôs pretty shameful that there are members who will pay the same for this sub par gym compared to those that have cleaner, newer and better facilities. absolutely dread when i have to use this location now.

dear puregym, ive been a member for a while and every visit has always been an amazing experience. the gym is well equipped and the staff is always kind, helpful and knowledgeable. im a regular participant of the bootcamp class of finchley on tuesday evenings, this classs been the core part of my weekly fitness routine. or i have to say it was, as the classd been removed from the timetable, which came as a shocking surprise last tuesday. im extremely disappointed with this decision. it was a popular class and theres not even a similar one on the timetable. please consider bringing this class back, i recon im not the only member who would like that. thank you.

unfortunately now, the gym is walking on the edge of unusable.  the gym for months now has had over  5- 8 pieces of equipment out of order reducing what you can do.  whilst i understand equipment will go down, having it out of commission for months with no end in sight, it now appears pure gym just do not want to get the companies in to fix them and pay the bill.  all the while still collecting the same gym fees, which feels like a con as a premium member as i am paying for something i am not getting.  at this rate i maybe forced to moved to jd gymupdate: as of september 13th from 1 star to a 2 star.credit where credit is due, the very next day after writing the original review, they had a couple guys in and fixed approx 3 machines.  there are still some out and the main issue is that the machines that are out are the main stays for most people, so would be nice if this was rectified, but they have come in and repaired about 40 percent now, so its a step in the right direction.

Review Title: Too busy and badly laid out
Review: far too crowded at peak times, between 5-8 its so busy you struggle to get on weight machines or benches. full of kids, sorry but the age should be put up as theres just groups of young lads who have no idea what theyre even doing and will end up hurting themselves most likely. quite small compared to other pure gyms..on a retail park and cross trainers and stepper rammed into the front window/corner so everyone stares are you when theyre out doing their shopping. no cleaning stations. would be good if they sorted out the lay out and upped the age to enter, plus added cleaning stations, all just seems rushed.

Review Title: First day at the gym and very‚Ä¶
Review: first day at the gym and very disappointed, no cleaning stations and only limited sets of equipment due to gym being so small. it was quite so the limited equipment wasnt a issue. it would be a nightmare during busy periods waiting on equipment. i hope cleaning stations are put in place quickly as i will be leaving if it doesnt happen. nobody wants to excersise on sweat covered wquipment.

over the past few months i feel that standards have slipped at the luton and dunstable gym. there are constantly issues will the ladies toilets, whether that be no toilet roll/soap, toilets out of order, hand dryer out of order, sinks flooded and today no not water. the soap dispenser is broken and when you push it to get soap out the front of it falls off. i‚Äôm also uncomfortable with how much male employees go into the ladies changing room. they do open the door and announce themselves but it‚Äôs not very nice if you are in the middle of changing. i have used this gym for many years now and it‚Äôs not as good as it used to be. the air con in the ladies only section didn‚Äôt seem to be working today, it was very stuffy and almost unbearable. the changing rooms and the rest of the gym seemed to have air con. there doesn‚Äôt seem to be as many classes on the time table, especially spin. i think there are only 3 outside office hours on the time table.

this gym needs more equipment one preacher curl ? 3 benches at dumbbells isn‚Äôt enough very expensive for a small gym in comparison to other larger pure gyms so much wasted space pure gyms are generally excellent imho but this needs worked on inside , it‚Äôs handy for quick workout but disappointing overall the smith machine seems cheap in comparison to other pure gyms ? also the benches aren‚Äôt the same quality just seems a bit of a rushed gym this one to get opened . will use occasionally on way to work but disappointing

been attending this new gym for 4 weeks now.  very impressed so far.  all the instructors are great - full of encouragement and motivation.  only do the classes as dont really understand how to use the machines in the main gym area, but i can always ask if i really wanted to know!  being of menopausal age, and not having done any classes for a few years, it was a big leap of faith joining this gym but im so glad i did.  the endorphins that now charge through my veins at full speed after every class have completely changed my outlook on life and i am so much more positive and motivated as a result.  just wish they had a personal trainer who specialised in menopausal women!  but you cant have everything!!

puregym is my go to. it has a good community and even thou the ladies toilets get blocked i still wouldnt go elsewhere. great pts and classes are varied too. my pt fraser is the best. he truly amazes me with new routines from his classes kickboxing glutes metcon and wod. in my pt sessions he pushes me showing me what im capable of. truly has changed me physically and mentally for the better. thank you fraser for your professionalism. your like a wizard conjuring new ways of keeping fitness challenging but fun.

Review Title: I work out with Richard who is a PT‚Ä¶
Review: i work out with richard who is a pt there, he does an amazing session each time, one of the best pt trainers i have had and i am achieving the results i wanted.. amazing!!! .

Review Title: Cold showers that reek of pee
Review: the showers are like a roller coaster of sadness, tepid to freezing and using the excuse of saving energy isnt going to stop me from finding a gym that lets me have a decent shower. if you really care about improving your carbon footprint put in some solar panels etc so there is actually some hot water.  also the changing rooms have been reeking of pish for months now. either your members are spray and prayers or you have a pretty serious sewage problem

i have been training since last 3 years elsewhere and moved to pure gym burnham late last year. i started training with richie since january 23, this year and had an absolutely amazing transformation not only physically but also mentally, training with richie has made me feel more confident and strong both physically and mentally. he is very focused in sessions, listens to you and his training is tailored for individuals as per their needs. his sessions and classes are always very different and he always pushes you out of the comfort zone, he is very dedicated towards the gym and his clients. i also feel majority of the members actually train with him, which is a very big reason why people come to burnham gym including myself. i say this, as gym could do with some improvements around building management i.e. toilets are always blocked, very frequent leaks,some equipments need replacing, etc. overall positive atmosphere and great helpful team like jelena, harry, eddie, fraser, brilliant interaction and classes from them too, thank you :))

money snatching pt do not use any of the personal trainers at the gym! i had a private lesson with christina harris and she never showed up and hasnt paid me back. shes a scammer and the gym have taken no responsibility for it. they have refused to pay me back and offered me zero compensation. do not waste your money on this crap excuse of a gym theres gyms way better than this.

Review Title: I loved my first day in the gym
Review: i loved my first day in the gym. i tried out one of their circuit classes and really liked seeing a mix of people in the class and not just a load of really fit young people.  i found the size to be comfortable as i was nervous going into a large gym with loads of equipment but found my way around there no problem.

Review Title: OK if you enjoy the smell of urine
Review: this gym is ok if you enjoy the smell of urine. as soon as you walk in you‚Äôre hit in the face with the smell of urine which is quite unpleasant. as you enter the female changing rooms it only gets worse. not to mention the lack of cleanliness and poor facilities. half the machines throughout the gym are becoming broken and music from the classes during the day is unbearably loud. i actually hate it here.

Review Title: Mihaela such great PT I love all her‚Ä¶
Review: mihaela such great pt i love all her classes specially the cycle she does pushes us to our limits, shes a great motivation.

seriously guys you need to get some active professional customer service. you can‚Äôt speak to a human. messenger takes 10 hours to respond. then have to email of which was done 2pm yesterday and still no reply. can‚Äôt access gym now for 2 days yet you have taken my money. spend some money on decent customer service where people get a quick response
member of staff was rude, and his breath stank of alcohol. made me feel very uncomfortable.
changing rooms smell like pee - broken toilet door locks - inconvenient layout of the space - too bright - most machines are broken ‚Ä¶

Review Title: First Gym ive tried so far so good no‚Ä¶
Review: first gym ive tried so far so good no problems , friendly staff overall a w

Review Title: Max is a fantastic personal trainer!
Review: max is a fantastic personal trainer! i struggle with motivation and sometimes find the gym overwhelming but ever since i‚Äôve been training with max it has been super enjoyable and i look forward to our sessions. he listens to my goals, knows my limits and adjusts the training to my preference. hes very passionate for his line of work and contagiously cheerful.

im a member for over 2 years. i attend classes and have pt sessions. pt is the main reason that im coming to the gym everyday. my pt is richard and i couldnt have asked for a better one. pushes you to your limits, believes in you and just when you think you cant do anything else, you still get up ready for more. really difficult to find such a dedicated trainer. 5 stars easy classes with him are very one of the best ones you can find. always high level of work but thats what we need. note to the management: please reinstate sundays sweat 45 class. these were life saver for people working full time and having time for crazy workout only on weekends.

Review Title: I just finished using my 3 day pass and‚Ä¶
Review: i just finished using my 3 day pass and really happy to finally have a ladies only space that has decent equipment! can i please request us ladies to have a cable machine , lat pull down, steps, ab balls ! this would compliment the space nicely and it will be a more all round functional space !

i love puregym. such a positive environment. super clean and classes are great.  richard is the greatest trainer out there. i suffered back pain for nearly five years. chiro, osteo, pilates, yoga‚Äînothing helped. i‚Äôd be lost without him. i can actually live again‚Äîpain free!

Review Title: Pure gym Cardiff bay,clean gym staff‚Ä¶
Review: pure gym cardiff bay,clean gym staff are very friendly and helpful my only frustration is cancelling classes at last minute ,has happened 3 times in last week for me , know lack of staff at moment,but cancel classes mid morning all the time,need to sort it out , today i had 2 classes cancelled on me. i dont like like weights all the time i like the variety of classes and i dont want to do them early morning at 7 or late at night, its always mid morning classes cancelled so please sort it out soon.

Review Title: Loving the new women‚Äôs only section
Review: loving the new women‚Äôs only section, i can‚Äôt tell you how refreshing it is to see women being taken seriously in the gym, being given our own equipment and a nice decent space. i am so psyched to see more women pick up that barbell and realise their potential, it‚Äôs life changing!the space and equipment are varied and can accommodate many different types of training.  i wish that women‚Äôs only sections existed years ago when i was brand new to the gym and feeling intimidated and out of place, especially as a smaller woman who absolutely doesn‚Äôt look like a fitness model. lifting has transformed my mental and physical health, and i‚Äôd hate any woman to miss out on that due to not feeling safe or comfortable in a mixed space.  i do sympathise with the negative review, the gym can certainly be an intimidating place for men too. however women have long been pushed out of the heavy weights section. if you look at how health and fitness are marketed to men and women differently, you can see that we still have a long way to go in achieving true equity. glad that pure gym have taken real steps to address this. if you‚Äôre a woman unsure about starting or coming back to the gym, pure gym offers a welcoming, calm and judgement free women only space. come in and try it out, you won‚Äôt regret it!
flexible clean and good variety of equipment

Review Title: Best PT and supportive gym environment
Review: i love this gym and have found a very supportive community within it. richard has been my pt for over 2.5 years and i can honestly say that he is amazing! i get easily bored, but no two sessions are the same; they are always varied and really full on which i enjoy. i am an older client, but i get stronger and fitter everyday, and enjoy training hard most days of the week. richard is one of the most kind, inspiring and motivational people ive ever met and he has had a massive impact in my life. richard has allowed me to achieve things that i never thought i would be able to do. i only wish id met him sooner! if you want a supportive and encouraging pt, richard is the one for you.

Review Title: You get what you put in
Review: you get what you put in , but what helps are the people around you and in short the trainers that help  i have been with one particular trainer who has helped me find my passion and enjoy this gym in every way  always enjoyed doing my training here . staff are always happy to help.

ive been a member at this gym for a year now and have pt sessions with richard - he is the best pt ive ever had! i lost 1 stone in 3 months and hes very good at holding you accountable, he put together a meal plan and i have set workouts to follow too with regular weigh-ins! richards classes are a killer but you feel amazing by the end of it!! best pt ever and i couldnt have lost the weight without him!

amazing pts. have been training with ritchie for about 9months now and he‚Äôs been amazing!. super knowledgeable, dedicated, and have really helped me transition into the right path in my fitness goals. highly recommend!" üåüüí™

Review Title: My rating is based on my trainer‚Ä¶
Review: my rating is based on my trainer ritchie who is incredible. to train with ritchie i am prepared to overlook the the questionable cleanliness, the frequently blocked loos and rain buckets for leaky roofs. i only go early and think there is a good atmosphere, friendly people no judgements, good community. that said,  if ritchie wasn‚Äôt there i don‚Äôt think i would be either and my rating would drop to 1. tom, eddie and harry are great, always helpful, good classes and friendly/professional.

boxing with robbie has been instrumental to my fitness regime. his enthusiasm and technical ability is a great combination that enables him to deliver super enjoyable and effective sessions. my cardio has improved and the sessions are always fun. could not recommend robbie and his boxing sessions more.

Review Title: I am unable to park my car and wait for‚Ä¶
Review: i am unable to park my car and wait for sometimes over half an hour

ive been a member since puregym opened and pts come and go but rich is an extremely motivating and focused trainer. his classes are high tempo and not for the faint hearted....you get out what you put in. his pt sessions are hell but the confidence he has in pushing your boundaries is second to none.....i opted for pt thinking it would be for a couple of months and 18 months later im still hooked. its bizarrely the one point of the week i look forward to whilst dreading what on earth is he gonna subject me to this week.....absolutely amazing

gym is stuffy at times and can get busy but does not cause me any issues the staff i know are  richard and tom i do richards classes they are awesome and he pushes you to exercise to the best of your ability.as a personal trainer he is kind and motivates me to achieve the best i can for my physical health and mental well being richard is friendly and i always see him helping others

Review Title: Great but busy classes with very‚Ä¶
Review: great but busy classes with very helpful instructors such as richard cephus.

being member since it opened, the gym is fine it has almost everthy i need apart from punch bag, but my only complaint at the moment is that the website, use to, but it doesnt show anymore,  how many people in the gym at the time, so you can come at less busy time, and also doesnt show your activity anymore..how many session you did and time and date and length of session. hope you bring back these on the website. thank you.
poor parking around gym

Review Title: Cancelled after on month of use
Review: cancelled after on month of use  i went once a week for a month to try it out.  visit 1: did a hiit class and the class was basically 30 minutes of one circuit. no breaks and rotating through 4 movements. by far the worst class ive ever been to.  visit 2: workout in general weights area was fine but no hot water.  visit 3: emergency evacuation to gym due to lack of power. gym went completely dark mid workout. insufficient emergency lighting. still no hot water to showers  visit 4: still no hot water, spin bike i tried to use had a loose pedal crank and was rattling so i couldnt do the desired workout.  also, no phone reception down there and connecting to wifi is a very annoying process.

pure gym is overpriced and overrated... my membership was frozen 4 days into signing up, i was locked out of all gyms without warning, and email flowed several hours later stating training concerns....as i had only signed up 4 days previously i asked them to cancel my membership and give me a refund... i received less that half a months payment back for 4 days out of the 30 i was intending to use....i got ¬£32....ever heard of a seven day trial period ?
the gym is small, but well appointed for its size, equipment and facilities are clean and well maintained. can‚Äôt really ask for more.

Review Title: Real let down with the classes
Review: real let down with the classes, 6/10 instructors not available, fail to notify on the app, extremely short staffed, dont bank on the classes, its been like this all year. see for yourself, dont say i didnt warn you. keep saying theyre going to improve but as i said, its been like this all year with no warning on the app.

Review Title: Don‚Äôt feel comfortable as a woman
Review: don‚Äôt feel comfortable as a woman. men stare at you like dogs the second you walk in, as you must pass the entire gym to get to the changing rooms. has most machines for a small gym however not enough space in free weights room- can fit 9 people max, so not worth paying ¬£28 per month. staff are alright and location is convenient though

Review Title: Couldn‚Äôt find the manager last few‚Ä¶
Review: couldn‚Äôt find the manager last few times i‚Äôve been in. trying to report the showers. they keep going very hot and then very cold.

hi ive recently joined the gym at eastgate. ive been going to a lot of classes which i am enjoying. however, the studio where the classes take place is really dirty. after every class my hands are filthy and the water is black when i wash them. do you clean the studio and the exercise mats? it doesnt seem like they are cleaned regularly.  i am also shocked at how filthy the water fountain is, last time i went to use it, there was old hair and lumps of something brown in the drain. it was really disgusting. people will get sick if it remains that dirty.  can you please reassure me that there is a regular cleaning service at eastgate gym, and that they will step up their game to keep the gym users safe and healthy?

was a member for puregym for a good few years but realised that they had started keeping the ac off due to the cost of "energy crisis" witch is an absolute joke for one of the most successful gyms on the planet.  i asked a member of staff if they could switch it on but they said it was internally controlled & theres nothing they could do. so myself & quite a few friends it turns out had the same issue so we all left for new gyms. its a shame you used to be able to challenge & push yourself there for a good workout now after 5 sets you need a 10 minute break outside because its to hot & the air is stale dam shame theyve let themselves go in standards.

Review Title: Please can we have our classes back
Review: dear pure gym management i‚Äôve been going to pure gym finchley east end road since january 2023 and really enjoy my experience every day i attend a few classes a week which i thoroughly enjoy! coming to the gym has not only been amazing for my physical health it has helped me with my mental health too. it‚Äôs an amazing place to come to let off steam and take my mind off daily stresses and work stress ! i got into a real routine weekly which has made such a difference to my life. the staff are all so helpful and polite. unfortunately this week all that has changed with the switch around of classes due from next week ! the classes i enjoy box fit and  boot camp on tuesday and burn it on thursday have completely changed and has left me quite upset that my structure is gone ! these are such popular classes and i really can‚Äôt understand why there was a need for any change! everyone in the class was so disappointed! please can we have our classes back again? this makes such a difference to so many of us who come from near and far for these classes we are all so disappointed at the changes and can‚Äôt fathom a reason for it and a lot of the classes on a friday are exactly the same it‚Äôs really ruining my experience hope this will be taken into consideration distraught member

Review Title: I have been a member since June and‚Ä¶
Review: i have been a member since june and love the classes. peters classes are great and really hard. love the boot camp classes the finishers are brilliant and dofferent each time to keep us going and bring us together as teams is great to meet new people. i always feel ive had a good workout. shame peter monday classes have been taken over as liked them ones. i like other evening class too. only down fall is the toilets are not always clean.

Review Title: PTs are so friendly and supportive
Review: pts are so friendly and supportive! keep up the great work‚Ä¶  shame it‚Äôs let down my dirty machines, toilets and dust

Review Title: Pure gym ignore feedback and complaints‚Ä¶
Review: pure gym ignore feedback and complaints - specifically pure gym walnut street which has so many long standing issues. doesn‚Äôt matter if you speak to them directly (if you can find a manager), suggest online or write reviews.

Review Title: I‚Äôve been using PureGym Grimsby now for‚Ä¶
Review: i‚Äôve been using puregym grimsby now for 10 years and i still wouldn‚Äôt use any other gym in the town. dave and caine are a fantastic management team, extremely helpful, friendly and knowledgeable if you are unsure of anything, nothing is too much trouble for them, or the other pt‚Äôs on the gym floor.  the gym/changing rooms are always clean and tidy‚Ä¶jack you do a great job.  there is plenty of equipment for everyone to use, sometimes you do have to wait a little while if someone else is using it but there‚Äôs enough kit in there to use something else.

Review Title: Lucy Rogerson is the best coach/PT I‚Äôve‚Ä¶
Review: lucy rogerson is the best coach/pt i‚Äôve ever met. her classes leave you feeling motivated and strong. she‚Äôs super friendly and you can really sense her enthusiasm when it comes to helping you reach your goals. cannot recommend her enough.

edit* response from puregym we do regular maintenance, and wait for engineers? did the engineers take over 2 months to replace the batteries in the broken clock? routine checks? funny. because them cross trainers have been broke for months!!! do your job or leave!!! you dont even put a sign on the broken machines. should legal be involved if a person gets injured from your lack of intelligence? you do nothing, and let your customers use broken machines because you dont care  only having 2 cross trainers is bad enough for a gym. but then when one of them stops working you do nothing. also pt tom will happily take your money, and now for over a year still owes me lessons. dont bother. this location is run badly, and equipment including the clock is left to fault like the fates of the management here

non-existing customer service over the phone if you want to cancel and refund you have to wait ages for the automated response to get back to you. unacceptable for such a high price you pay for a average gym.

ive been enjoying nathans classes lately because he makes the effort to push each individual out of their comfort zone. he pays attention to everyone even if youre at the back. he takes time helping you correct your form/technique without making you feel embarrassed. he has improved my confidence & helped me build my strength massively. nathan puts a lot of effort into his classes always pushing for maximum effort from everyone ensuring you leave feeling like youve worked out. he also has a great sense of humour and never fails to make me laugh through the class which definitely helps ease the pain. i always look forward to it each week no matter what class it is.

the gym is incredibly busy, even in the evening from 8-10pm. i am surprised that there are barely any staff present and so many people are squatting on the power cage despite no safety guards being available - especially after the death of justyn vicky (bodybuilder who died after failing a squat and the barbell breaking his neck). barely any point signing up to the gym unless you are a fan of queueing for equipment. on top of this the weights are never put back in the right rack even if they are available. worst gym i have been to by far, its a shame because there is a tonne of space that is not being utilized - ridiculous when the freeweights area is packed full of people tip toeing over one another - causing even more safety issues.

so disappointed. puregym muswell hill have cancelled another class?? please can someone explain what has happened to this gym?? pts are dropping like flies and there are barely any classes anymore. monday 6pm pump with murat was my favourite.

please puregym livingston bring back wash stations for equipment! this is a major step backwards and one where people will leave. no wash stations to wash dirt equipment is a major negative! treadmills are sodden with sweat and stains, fixed weights much the same.

Review Title: Used to be great - pure gym muswell hill
Review: i used to love this gym, having been a member here for almost 3 years. promises of a gym refurbishment which hasnt happened, poor management, and high staff turn over. air con is v bad and there is always a smell in the gym. groups of young guys hogging all the machines. murat leaving is the icing on the cake. he was my pt for two years. he will be a massive loss to this gym. my husband and i have both cancelled our memberships

Review Title: No available parking, No available showers
Review: i find it really hard to access this gym due to people using the car park as their workplace or home parking. i often attend after work and appreciate it is peak time but when you witnesses the same people week in week out walking from work to their car or others who manage to park walk out of the car park towards the city it‚Äôs unacceptable. the car park is never policed. just get anpr and give people 2/3 hours of free parking. surely it‚Äôs not a hard fix to a large long standing problem.  similarly with the showers. long standing problem, easy fix. either refit the showers to a good standard and keep them clean or just fix them and clean them up. i usually have to stand after a workout waiting for one of the two showers to become free.  it‚Äôs very frustrating that pure gym management constantly ignore the issues that are raised or don‚Äôt bother to fix the ones that are so clearly viable to them. or maybe they haven‚Äôt observed the long standing car parking issues or inspected the showers in months to note that all but two are out of order.  or specifically on the shower issue it‚Äôs just a complete lack of communication on the plan to resolve the issue. who knows ?

puregym lambeth is very well equipped, clean & really friendly. i‚Äôve been training with a fantastic personal trainer there (owen harradine), i highly recommend owen. he makes training fun but is also very effective, knowledgeable and really listens.  all the staff are very welcoming.

my happy place! the staff are always great here, friendly and helpful. their organisation around reading festival weekend was excellent and made sure that local members were unaffected by what could have otherwise been chaotic. keep up the good work!
broken gym equipment, minimal equipment for use so good luck if it‚Äôs busy? tried out to see if i liked it before fully joining but a big no from me. plus the music is sh1t3

great gym. clean and lots of equipment. only negative side is that because it‚Äôs not open for longer hours , can be extremely busy . almost every equipment taken around peak times or around 6-8pm. i just go later. apart from that spot on gym.
convenient and near to work. the staff are most helpful

just had my first ever circuit session sweat30 at tamworth with annie power.  just wow!! absolutely off the scale. great facilities, brilliant instruction and great training as a team.  cannot recommend it highly enough. a fantastic gym with amazing facilities, and annie and the manager on hand with friendly advice.  thankyou, first session of many.

Review Title: Two days in a row no one bothered‚Ä¶
Review: two days in a row no one bothered showing up for my get started session. i was no nervous about joining a gym and this has completely put me off. i emailed them after noone showed up for the first session. the apologised and booked me onto one the following day. well no one showed up to that one either. i wont bother trying again.

gym is good but showers are disgusting!! mould growing all around the edges, clogged up sinks, shower gel/shampoo holder rotten, flooded shower base with stinking dirty water and cold water coming from shower. not good!!
unfortunately the manager darren and now the assistant manger andrew have both left this gym .these two people where very helpful to me .i just hope the new management team are as good .

do not use this gym on a day pass, despite following all the rules they issued me a ¬£60 parking ticket. absolutely scummy behaviour, tantamount to extortion using the legal system as a vehicle to shake down visitors to the area to milk some quick cash. as an online only company there is no recourse to contact anyone and fix the issue. absolute bullies and abusive of customers.

Review Title: please, please, PLEASE just fix the showers
Review: please just sort the showers out. it‚Äôs beyond a joke now. 2 working showers. of the working 2, both stink and are moldy. me and many other members are completely fed up with the lack of action on this issue.
kass has helped me perfect my form and has shown me how to make weight lifting fun! he‚Äôs friendly and personable, always on time and makes the most out of the one hour sessions we have.

my determination to exercise came after a very bad pandemic. i visited bristol pure gym on may 2022, and met petko who is my personal trainer. with his encouragement we carried out systematic exercises for 11 months. after months of exercising, my body has obviously changed dramatically. although our language is different ( mainly my english is poor) but during the training process, petko proved that i quickly understood the essentials of the movements. big thank you very much for petko‚Äôs patient guidance and i highly recommend this handsome and powerful man!

Review Title: Moved from tops,the lady that did my‚Ä¶
Review: moved from tops,the lady that did my tour and showed us all the ins and outs was lovely and really helpful

Review Title: The staff are professional and always‚Ä¶
Review: the staff are professional and always available to assist üëå

Review Title: Only gym with enough equipment during‚Ä¶
Review: only gym with enough equipment during busy hours
very bad management nasty and political staff place is unclean most pts rubbish and good ones are got rid of please please please get rid of manager
simple and cheap!  just what you want from a gym, use the ravenswood ipswich puregym and cannot fault it.

sexual harassment at puregym edinburgh craigleith retail park. females beware - sexual predators are infecting this 24 hour gym. my 20 year old daughter was subjected to horrendous sexual attention by 4, yes 4, eastern european men when she attended the gym at 9pm. these ‚Äúmen‚Äù ranged in age from mid 20s to mid 40s, so not stupid kids. they surrounded the machine my daughter was using pointing at her and making lewd remarks. she was petrified and tried to ignore these people. luckily there was still a trainer on site and he came and stood with her. he said that the gym was aware of the problem but could do little as they were scared of being labelled ‚Äúracist‚Äù! what is happening with this company when the sensitivities of people like this take precedence over the safety of young women? my wife just happened to pick my daughter up and these ‚Äúmen‚Äù were still outside waiting in 2 separate cars. god knows what would have happened if my daughter was forced to walk home through what is a dimly lit walkway with these predators there. when she arrived home she burst in to floods of tears. i am calling on puregym to show zero tolerance to people like this and cancel their membership straight away. they were caught on the cctv so the evidence is there. i am waiting to speak to the manager, once he is available that is, and once my daughter feels confident she can face it. the trainer that helped her knew this was a problem so it‚Äôs not as if the problem will come as a surprise to management. i also want to involve the police if my daughter is agreeable as i don‚Äôt want other young females to be subjected to this appalling behaviour. come on puregym, sexual harassment in your properties is never, ever acceptable. also, there were a number of male gym users there when this was happening but they never said anything even though they were aware it was going on. if you see it, call it out. if you‚Äôre a bit apprehensive then call the police, you could help a young woman out of a terrible predicament. puregym - zero tolerance of sexual harassment now.

Review Title: Working with Jemma changed my life !
