Review Title: If anyone is looking for a friendly gym‚Ä¶
Review: if anyone is looking for a friendly gym this is the one for you. the staff are so kind and approachable and will help.  there is a nice mix of women and men in the staff team which helps as i previously felt overwhelmed at gyms when it is mainly male

matt, hayley, elroy & karen are fantastic instructors and are alway friendly and fun. hayleys lbt class is a must, hard but brilliant. matts bootcamp is great and really varied each week. elroys - metcon is tough but he is really motivating.  my issue with the gym is the aircon, the gym is essentially a box (no windows or natural airflow) so it can smell quite fusty and is also really hot. the aircon should be used more frequently. i feel like the fact it isnt used enough will put people off and go to other local gyms that do have natural light, and decent airflow. come on puregym its not like you cant afford it :-)

Review Title: Classes included in price and PT‚Äôs are‚Ä¶
Review: classes included in price and pt‚Äôs are friendly and provide a good workout.

Review Title: I didn't find any reasons to give this‚Ä¶
Review: i didnt find any reasons to give this gym less than 5 stars based on my one time visit. for gym rat like myself, size of the gym, range and availability of weights and machines and above all attitude of members matter a lot and i found all these factors in puregym.

Review Title: Good mixture of people very friendly‚Ä¶
Review: good mixture of people very friendly and extremely clean
excellent gym.. with great equipment and professionals.. i truly enjoy the saturdays class with mihaela.. üòäthanks guys! keep it up!
sometimes i found some of the equipments with dust,in rest is a clean area and clean and fresh air

Review Title: This was a good gym,but within the last‚Ä¶
Review: this was a good gym,but within the last six months has really gone down hill ,long periods of time before the machines are fixed ,the cleaniness of the gym and wash rooms has deteriorated, and unfourtantely has made me now train in a gym down the road for the majority of my training schedule ,real shame as this was a good pure outlet and at one stage management were pro active and demonstrated great customer service.

coming here has improved my mental health massively! i feel so much more confident. everyone is friendly and non-judgmental. plenty of space and machines to use, my only issue is sometimes when there‚Äôs classes on i can‚Äôt use the private bit with the mirror to do some of work outs like hip thrusts

Review Title: clean and spacious gym with great‚Ä¶
Review: clean and spacious gym with great equipment. however, with the warmer weather the downstairs free weights area has gotten quite stuffy and humid.

one star ‚≠ê for the friendliness and professionalism of most of the staff. one star ‚≠ê for the classes i attend because those instructors are just brilliant. no star for the cleanliness of the entire gym, including changing rooms, toilets and showers. the only time the changing rooms are clean is around 10-11am on week days as i can see a cleaner working. no star for lacking the disinfectants and paper towels for wiping an equipment after workout. no star for the ac in the changing rooms not working as a heater during cold months or cold days. no star for resetting a shower temperature to cool (summer-warm) and reducing the time of running water to half of the time (approx.7sec before it turns itself off) since the british summer time in march despite there was no sign of warmer weather. i was told by the managers that they couldnt do anything about it as it is a puregym scheme trial in all gyms and that i can contact the company myself, but with no specific contact details provided. to me it looks more like saving on energy bills for obvious to all of us reasons! (im sure this shower temperature changes are not listed in the "terms and conditions"). i joined the gym shortly after it was newly open but if there will be no changes to my "no star" reasons in near future, i will reconsider to join somewhere else where i feel comfortable, cold free and my money is well spent for. what is the point to get fitter when my health is jeopardised by catching a frequent cold from using no warm showers, being surrounded by dust mites or catching germs from an undisinfected equipment. well, what wont kill you, will make you stronger would not quite apply here.

i have just recently retired from working in a gym, joined pure gym for convenience and value for money. my first visit was today, took part in a zumba class, excellent. great variety of equipment. was dissatisfied with the showers, dirty and hair everywhere. otherwise brilliant centre.

Review Title: Gym offers good classes at times‚Ä¶
Review: gym offers good classes at times accessible for members.  pts are always friendly and encouraging.

good selection of good quality kit. some members need some lessons in gym etiquette and some members are clearly not 16 or over and mess around when youre trying to train. showers are dirty and the cleaner in the gents often sits on his phone in the changing rooms.

Review Title: Excellent pump class but dirty toilets and cold water in the showers!
Review: i recently attended an excellent pump class that left me feeling strong and accomplished, but unfortunately, the dirty toilets and cold showers detracted from the overall experience.  the class itself was led by a skilled and motivating instructor who pushed us to challenge our limits and achieve our fitness goals. i appreciated the variety of exercises and the emphasis on building lean muscle and burning fat. however, i was disappointed to find that the toilets were not clean and well-maintained, which made the overall gym experience unpleasant.  additionally, the cold showers were a letdown after such a challenging workout. i understand that facilities can sometimes have maintenance issues, but it would have been great to have warm water to help soothe and relax my muscles after the intense workout.  despite the cleanliness and shower issues, i still enjoyed the pump class and would recommend it to others who are looking for a challenging and effective workout. i hope that the gym can address the cleanliness and maintenance issues to create a more enjoyable experience for all members.
friendly atmosphere; good range of free fitness classes all included in the membership fee. wide range of equipment, all in good condition. all clean & tidy.

Review Title: No staff to assist I have lost my‚Ä¶
Review: no staff to assist i have lost my locker key  , very frustrating and no emergency number to contact that works either.

Review Title: In all an excellent gym but if you're‚Ä¶
Review: in all an excellent gym but if youre looking to lift weights or deadlift best to avoid at busy times.

Review Title: I have been to other gyms before but‚Ä¶
Review: i have been to other gyms before but never felt comfortable going to them but going to puregym is so different i can go in and feel comfortable and confident that i will be able to catty on going

Review Title: Out of five cleaning roll dispensers‚Ä¶
Review: out of five cleaning roll dispensers only one had towel in and the cleaning solution was only in two of the guns, you need another station at the end of the gym where the studios are

bicester puregym has an area with 6 squat racks, three deadlift platforms, loads of pullup bars, barbells, weight plates etc. its a lifters paradise. good vibes, good staff, clean equipment. i love bicester puregym

Review Title: Every Sunday for the past 2 weeks there‚Ä¶
Review: every time the gym is unstaffed for the past 2 weekends  there has been young kids aged around 12  in the gym.using all the equipment and mirrored area.

Review Title: Great atmosphere to get a good workout
Review: great atmosphere to get a good workout. plenty of space and lots of equipment even when it‚Äôs busy.
love ashleys lbt class on a sunday morning 10:15. good tunes, good vibes,  great workout. highly recommend. üôåüèªüí™üèª

Review Title: Everything I go they staff are always‚Ä¶
Review: everything i go they staff are always happy and cheerful and always have banter  if you are struggling they will.help micheal is always there to give advice

i had to walk out of the studio because it was overcrowded. people that have aigned up for the classes cannot attend them because others are just walking in, without having signed up. it is not safe to lift weights and/or jump when people are literally on top of your back. the staff is not doing anything about it despite members complaining. the air-conditioner is not turned on, despite requests to do so, just quite unpleasant.

Review Title: Repair your equipment  as soon as‚Ä¶
Review: repair your equipment  as soon as possible. we have to wait too long to used equipment

Review Title: Definitely recommend and can't wait to be back!
Review: when i stepped in, i immediately loved the atmosphere, open and welcoming and fills you up with energy! the class was great, very friendly instructor (ben), great directions, and easy to follow. i felt like it pushed me to do a great workout but it wasnt too extreme that i couldnt follow it. definitely recommend and cant wait to be back!
great experience, been a customer on and off for years! always end up coming back!
facilities are good. the wifi is my main problem, whenever i try to connect to the guest wifi it says no internet connection and the signal doesn‚Äôt reach well upstairs

Review Title: Good gym but tricky when it's busy
Review: good gym with lots of equipment but quite difficult to use specific equipment at the busy times and i have some concerns about if there is a first aid incident and there are no staff present

Review Title: Great gym but no WIFI even though it is advertised
Review: i have been a member since the gym opened.  equipment is new and there is a good selection.  classes are great and easy to book. the downside is the wifi.  it is advertised as having free wifi but there is none.  i have contacted customer services and they told me to speak to the manager on site (not great customer service!).  he has told me that they are on a waiting list along with 40 other gyms and cannot give an update to when it will be available.  i really do not think it is acceptable to advertise something that is not available.

Review Title: Quality and variety of equipment is‚Ä¶
Review: quality and variety of equipment is good!
great gym, clean, friendly atmosphere and lovely staff

Review Title: Parking ticket alotted for not parking at the premises
Review: please provide with the name and email address of pure gym northolt manager so i can contact as per your advise regarding my parking issue

Review Title: The management at prue gym Sevenoaks‚Ä¶
Review: the management at prue gym sevenoaks are outstanding. they set the standards for the rest of the team. the complete team are very inspiring and helpful. the environment is happy and if you‚Äôre feeling a little overwhelmed they will guide and put you at ease. the classes are brilliant. you will walk out feeling good. the staff go above and beyond. safe and happy place. if the team are not on the job of cleaning they will be on hand to help and advise. there is always a member of team available to help. well done guys . this is what it‚Äôs all about.
absolute quality gym, very spacious and plenty of equipment every time ive been ive not had to queue for any equipment. its clean and friendly.

in october 2022 i decided to start going to the gym. i attended a gym tour which was done max. i then asked max to be my personal trainer as he was friendly and approachable. i really enjoyed the few months training with max and have seen an improvement in my posture, physical strength and confidence in a gym environment.  max is very knowledgeable about physical fitness and set a routine for me which included a variety of exercises for lower body, upper body and core. he also gave advise on diet.  our sessions were fun. max is a genuinely lovely person and easy to talk to. he always encouraged me every session to reach pbs. he was able to notice areas of weakness e.g my squats and identify the issue and give me excersises to help me improve.  pure gym hemel is a very good gym with a wide selection of equipment and a calm atmosphere.

Review Title: Having never used a gym before I‚Äôm
Review: having never used a gym before i‚Äôm very impressed with tyldesley - very comfortable atmosphere with everyone on their own fitness journey & nobody judging. my negatives‚Ä¶ some classes suitable for myself with health issues are held when not convenient due to work/travel etc & too many sat on equipment not actually using it i would like the option of using different branches ie when holidaying in uk or when my chosen gym is busy without having to upgrade

Review Title: Would recommend this gym to anyone
Review: would recommend this gym to anyone. lovely team of personal trainers who are always welcoming and always happy to help should you need them. the atmosphere is great and you don‚Äôt feel intimidated. all levels of fitness welcome and it‚Äôs a fun environment! recommend the personal training sessions( definitely worth the extra money). they have everything you need to tailor to your own individual needs. not yet tried a spin class but it looks fab!

Review Title: good gym but locker rooms and showers‚Ä¶
Review: good gym but locker rooms and showers need better cleaning.  often the stench from the toilets and dirt in the shower is disgusting.
great classes with really motivating instructors. doesnt feel intimidating like some other gyms do. really relaxed and friendly atmosphere.
great gym, good staff, lovely equipment and kept very clean and never too busy üòÅ

Review Title: Birmingham west is a nice gym with new‚Ä¶
Review: birmingham west is a nice gym with new machines and with a good car park

unfortunately, not all employees of this gym are nice to customers, strictly speaking all personal trainers, im not talking about talking to them, but i think that a simple hello to the customer would be nice, not looking at the customer as someone who is not welcome.  apart from the trainers in this gym, everything is great and the other staff is very nice and very helpful on puregym ashton under lyne.

terrible place. no hygiene standard and nasty, negative personal trainers, one woman pt is particularly aggressive and can be heard making snide remarks within earshot of guests. i left and now go to absolutely fitness where staff are polite and the space is hygienic. i heard a member who i trained with a couple of months ago was recently bullied out by jelena, who i suspect is the female pt i heard making snarky comments. this gym is gaining a terrible reputation for bullying members including a vulnerable young adult with autism. avoid.

been going for a while now and i  love the gym itself but has gone slightly down hill recently. the women‚Äôs toilets are nasty. they‚Äôre dirty enough but then women leave empty water bottles in there after washing themselves which i understand for religious reasons but leaving the water bottles in there is unhygienic. they need a sign in the toilets that says ‚Äú please don‚Äôt leave your empty bottles in the toilets‚Äù.  could also probably do with lowering the limit of how many people can enter at a time as it just becomes a social club for strange men that  end up way too close to you as they stand around equipment conversating and stare at the women. the equipment itself is great and all placed in good areas, the gym is a good size and the staff have always been super friendly and helpful but the atmosphere and hygiene could be better.
regularly inhaling vape odour  while trying to work out in stirling branch
excellent gym and great pts, calum amira  and others all very knowledgeable and a friendly gym environment
the gym is spacious, plenty of space and equipment however alot of equipment is part broken or fully broken and worn which is disappointing

Review Title: Absolute joke - fraudsters who keep taking money
Review: absolute joke! i cancelled my membership in march, only to check my bank account this month and realize that payment had still been taken out twice in april and may. went back to my app profile to find membership still active and cancellation option blanked out. looked for contact details for a direct phone conversation - theres none. went through twitter in the end just to be connected with a bot that told me it couldnt follow my request and that a member of staff would get in touch. this actually did happen, but the outcome was an absolute joke as i was told that it was basically my fault/ my banks fault that the direct debit had not been cancelled. a refund would not be issued. dont join this gym, and especially do not trust their own cancellation policy/ app. just cut payments off with your bank. i will report them for sure.
great strongman training area. great bodybuilding and powerlifting area. cv excellent. air conditioning is superb. best gym ive trained in in over 35 years of training üí™

Review Title: Fantastic Gym - Chris Cachia is amazing!
Review: great gym!  fantastic staff too.  chris cachia is my personal trainer and i owe my good physical/mental health to his expert knowledge and tailor made workouts.  not only has chris made me really enjoy working out, it is clear that his science based approach really helps to individualise exercises to all abilities.  his friendly gregarious approach to all people in the gym makes it a total pleasure to workout in the banbury puregym.  great environment for all.  thank you.

some further enquiries maybe?  over a difficult time with a lot to deal with treated staff, members, facilities with respect.  everybody welcome confidence not harassment - not so from one of them.  while unintentional sleeping - no effect on anyone else such as the regular unpleasant and sick making effect of smoking and drug use - several more episodes than those reported, in a place for health improvement and partners british heart foundation!  poor show to remove chair from under persons legs trying to ease severely swollen feet/lower legs, unintended sleepness, also effect of prescribed medication. good reason to suspend membership? 5/5/2023. end

fantastic gym - best place to come to work out and have your own time and be respected with your own time.  pt is amazing! - people respect your space and dont chat to your pt hell of a lot better than some gyms ive seen
i really enjoying mihaela classes especially friday lbt and yoga on friday
the staff are friendly helpful and understanding to my needs
had a great workout at the angle pure gym, great customer service too! christopher was very professional and friendly. love the gym just what you need for workouts in between working hours.
the gym was lovely and friendly the staff on duty this morning shauna was great lovely and helpful, approachable 10/10 for my whole experience this morning.

Review Title: Need sanitizer and wipes around gym
Review: need sanitizer and wipes around gym. all of the gyms in stratford still have this in place.

Review Title: The only reason for 3 stars is rowing‚Ä¶
Review: the only reason for 3 stars is rowing machines are always out of order otherwise 5 stars  after feedback all machines were workingüëç

i have been a member of puregym sutton coldfield from when they opened the temperature of the showers is tepid warm at best plus there are only 2 supposed hot showers and 2 cold showers which never get used so at busy times we are queuing to get a shower i mentioned this to them and they said it will be staying at that temperature a lot of the members i know are not happy with this we dont expect to have a more or less cold shower after a workout unless this changes me and a few other members will be leaving its not good enough so unless you like a cold shower dont join this gym as they are not interested in looking after you ,very poor

Review Title: This branch is very handy to get to‚Ä¶
Review: this branch is very handy to get to being close to the interchange for buses and metro. the gym is very well equipped with  many machines and free weights on many floors. it does not get overly busy compared to some others. the staff are knowledgeable and friendly. the building is very secure with spacious changing rooms and several toilets. there are cleaning stations on all levels for good hygiene.

Review Title: Welcoming atmosphere with state of the‚Ä¶
Review: welcoming atmosphere with state of the art gym equipment.

Review Title: You could do with more updated‚Ä¶
Review: you could do with more updated equipment ,smith machine is dated ,need more accesories on cable crossovers and lat machines ,no hack squat and tbh some staff do not replace weights in morning every free weight station should have at least 100 kg most have none so you spend half the workout carting weights around
accessibility and facilities fantastic. very inclusive and friendly. excellent core values and principals.
there isnt really anything bad at all, it was my first time going to the gym, and i really enjoyed it.  they have good facilities, good hygiene, lots of space and a plethora of work outs to do.

Review Title: Not Pure Gym - It's Pure Zoo.....
Review: just joined after cancelling a month ago as there was an offer of ¬£0.00 joining fee and half price for the 1st month.  having visited this evening, i will definitely be cancelling the membership as the gym has now turned into a zoo... too many members using peak and off-peak. the gym smells of bo everywhere, theres no cleaning equipment, ac is almost always turned off, wifi needs verification every time you need access (last thing you need when working out).  this place has gone completely down hill.  i have better standards and will be looking elsewhere! perhaps the smelly teenagers can thrive in an overcrowded, unsafe environment to save a few pennies.

honestly would not visit this gym, the smell is so bad i thought i was going to be sick i actually contemplated leaving my workout. pure gym are obviously aware due to the number of plug in air fresheners dotted about. also if you‚Äôre a women stick to the women‚Äôs area if you want to workout without being hit on or stared at

Review Title: Feel of the gym i.e atmosphere ‚Ä¶
Review: feel of the gym i.e atmosphere  professional/ friendly staff.
thanks for the service it was nice clean and enjoyable

Review Title: I joined this gym in 2018 for my‚Ä¶
Review: i joined this gym in 2018 for my physical and mental health. it was brilliant when i first joined and was there for years, until recently. a gym is supposed to be a safe space for people to go who need to focus on their health and mental well-being when life takes a toll on them. i am so disgusted and appalled to say what has been going on in my local puregym. i will personally not recommend it to anyone. it has been managed without a doubt disgustingly, with people who have their own agendas with either staff and members at the gym. 0 stars if i could.

staff and facilities are great, however the decision to close some of the showers for environmental reasons is madness i understand this is a head office decision. queueing for over 10 mins after a class to wait for a shower is not acceptable, users are queueing in their gym gear which means they spend more time in there, i understand staff check showers regularly but cant clean them well because they are always in use, so they are often dirty. closing 2 of the 5 the showers will not negate the need for people to use them, and i can only assume that the decision to turn the water temperature down is in the hope that people spend less time in them! whilst i applaud the sentiment you are severely frustrating your valued members. please reverse this decision!

Review Title: Tragic.The gym was ok until last week
Review: tragic.the gym was ok until last week. they changed and replaced some machines for new ones, with cheap finishing which not doing the "job"as previous ones and some of them already broken and out of service. congrats! some of machines not even been replaced but there some brand new which no one want to use as they really unnecessary . i think there must be someone in heat office making this "glorious " decisions but in real life probably never been at gym and not really understand peoples needs . instead of that changing room, mens shower and toilets in tragic shape and thats the main place which need serious work asap. constantly leaking urinals and terrible smell all over the changing rooms , thats what you will experience most of the times. this is ongoing problem there and no one cares . i thought in this days every company wants to gain new customers , members- pure gym doing opposite -with that unnecessary changes they made me leave and also couple more customers with me as they were unhappy of ignorance and cheap changes made . that was a nice place some time ago . i remember well as was also member of soho gum there before . however me and 4 more colleagues just signed off and we have new place where customer service listen peoples needs . congratulations of fantastic ideas ! shame they not that what really need to be done there !

the gym is dangerously hot. full aircon is stated to be provided as part of the membership for this gym - this is not true. pure gym have not provided an explanation, warning or compensation to gym goers.  update - i have received an email from puregym confirming the air con has not been working. this is not acknowledged as part of their response to this message.
good facilities, clean,friendly staff

Review Title: I like the gym but am very disappointed‚Ä¶
Review: i like the gym but am very disappointed that the promised upgrade has not happened. we have not been told why or what will happen to this gym in the future. in fact we have had no communication at all!

have pt sessions with gary. he‚Äôs so good and upbeat. i‚Äôve benefitted from his sessions. men‚Äôs toilets smell a bit ‚Äúcheesey‚Äù which could do with some pads in the urinals and that would make a difference to the smell.
excellent experience. our instructor, stephen, for our introductory session was great and very friendly and informative. got us off to a good start. lots of equipment and very clean.

Review Title: The pure gym app is wonderful
Review: the pure gym app is wonderful. i can plan my workouts and it‚Äôs very easy to understand. well equipped and friendly environment.

gym is usually well organised. however the standard of the showers at present is unacceptable, both cleanliness and temperature of the showers. cleanliness is not a big deal but the temperature of the showers is not acceptable. went to use the showers and was met with a blast of ice cold water followed by luke warm water, i even had goosebumps. showers were perfectly fine before so dont get what has changed, and if it has changed it needs sorting out otherwise i will pull my membership and go somewhere where facilities are clean and are above body temperature!!
great classes but cleaning of the gym, studio and changing rooms is sadly lacking.
very nice gym, clean not massively busy in the am. very satisfied
i enjoy going to pure gym as staff are friendly and helpful.

Review Title: The pods that you go through to enter‚Ä¶
Review: the pods that you go through to enter pure gym i found made me feel a bit claustrophobic, my induction was booked for 30 minutes i only received about 5 minutes of the staff time, only shown how to use the treadmill any further questions i would have liked answered i had to keep walking round the gym to find the member of staff
jessica at pure gym heanor is amazing, always goes above and beyond for everyone!! her legs, bums and tums classes are amazing as well!!
nice friendly big gym ,loads of equipment and variety of classes for all abilities.

Review Title: Refitted recently so new equipment is‚Ä¶
Review: refitted recently so new equipment is great.

i have been a member of this gym since 2017 and over the past year i have noticed a decline at this location ranging from broken equipment, to cleanliness: - broken machines take a long time to be fixed (laying leg curl machine has been out of action for at least 2 months), which can be frustrating as you can be wafting a long time to use some equipment. - resistance bikes have broken/loose adjusters, treadmills out of order - small things like carabiners are hard find (i have taken to bringing my own). - the sports water machine frequently has a fault stopping you from using it. - the personal trainers can be frustrating, when training clients i have seen some stood chatting to another trainer while the client is sat on the machine with their phone. i understand they may take longer, but taking up a machine for 15 minutes and only exercising for 5 minutes and not interacting for the other 10 is a waste, especially at busy times. my last visit was extended by about 30 minutes in total because of waiting for equipment to become available. - the male changing room showers facilities need attention, at least 3 showers are out of order and one of the working ones only produces cold water, not to mention the smell of backed up sewage. (cannot speak for the female facilities)  it is clear that they are trying to cut costs where they can, but now this is impacting the quality of the gym. paying the premium membership is not really worth it any more in my opinion as you dont get what you pay for anymore.

Review Title: I would give 0 if I could‚Ä¶.
Review: i would give 0 if i could.fully paid membership every month, yet in april an extra ¬£12.99 was taken from my account without authorisation after paying the membership in full via direct debit.to top it my gym membership got suspended‚Ä¶can‚Äôt make this crap up right??!oh and none existent customer service only bots so can‚Äôt get any answers or my money back nor accessing to the gym‚Ä¶an utter joke!! spend your money elsewhere
great gym . easy equipment to use . no hassle using the app

worst puregym ive encountered . booming music from a class,  far too loud even with earbyds in. leg press, lat pull-down not working. staff member holding early morning class (thursday 4th may 2023) thinks she owns the place instead of us fee paying customers. non existent wifi. avoid this gym
it has nearly everything i use, kit it great, space to get training session completed.  good environment, friendly, clean

Review Title: The best staff and very friendly and‚Ä¶
Review: the best staff and very friendly and very helpful and very good experience

Review Title: Fine if you have zero issues or‚Ä¶
Review: fine if you have zero issues or questions at all but good luck getting in touch with customer service. they will take 3 days for reply, and when they do, it will probably just be a generic email or copy paste of their faqs with zero relevance to the question asked. when you finally get in touch with a human, the deal you asked about has expired and its passed the date that you needed to cancel - how convenient. do they care they you emailed them five times and sent them dms on all social media sites (their recommended way to contact them) before the deadline? do they f***.
staff are lovely; having pt with chantelle, she‚Äôs great fun, easy to get along with and pushes you, to reach your goals.
great gym, clean and maintained on affordable prices.
have very misleading t&c, convoluted to cancel membership, rude staff and poor facilities, do not recommend.
the equiment range is great, access is easy and unlimited, the staff are friendly and compared to other gyms its great value.
great gym to train at, staff are really friendly. really nice equipment, reliable and well looked after.

Review Title: I‚Äôm going to give this gym 2 stars
Review: i‚Äôm going to give this gym 2 stars . the 2 stars are for the cost and for some of the great trainers there -  eddie , richard , laura and harry . i enjoy their classes and they are all lovely people . i‚Äôm afraid what isn‚Äôt right at this gym is the management and the politics . there is a trainer called fraser that runs private sessions and many people at the gym have been aware that another member was ‚Äò pushed ‚Äò out of this group and she was always a really positive member of the gym and helped others there . i recently wondered why i had not seen helen for a while and i was told she had knee surgery recently but this isn‚Äôt the reason she hasn‚Äôt been at the classes . i have heard that the gym ‚Äò wanted her out ‚Äò for a while and the manager charlotte didn‚Äôt like her . i have no idea why as i have trained with helen for many years and she was always a friendly well liked member . i hear she made a complaint about a trainer jelena and i can understand why she did as her classes are not popular and she can be very rude to members . i think helen has been treated appallingly by this gym and you should all be ashamed that such a nice person has suffered so much at the hands of management and other members. very bullying culture . if you read this - helen get well soon .

Review Title: Great gym for those who are just‚Ä¶
Review: great gym for those who are just starting out and those who are highly experienced. clean, tidy cant go wrong.

workouts are very good and staff are doing a brilliant job. would have given a 5 star ‚≠ê ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê but the showers are not warm enough, compared to better gym. but still way ahead of better gym for workouts.
such a great gym, its clean and there is loads of space. 100% recommend. the staff are friendly and always happy to help.
brilliant friendly hassle free atmosphere

a huge shout out to laura, the pt at holborn. despite not feeling well on friday and barely having a voice, she still came to work to be there for us and gave the best classes ever - i appreciate it so much. she had the same positive and motivating energy as always, which in my opinion makes her the best trainer at puregym. laura is so passionate about what she does, wants us to push ourselves to our limits, and she has a huge amount of knowledge. we love you laura, you go girl!

ive tried for the first time today finsbury park gym. air con wasn‚Äôt working on the first floor and ladies area and that made my workout terrible! i just couldn‚Äôt wait to get out from there .. it was almost like a sauna! please repair asap. overall gym is ok.

absolutely rubbish company.... they have taken sum of ¬£45 from my account for new membership.... they did not give me a confirmation pin or any email apart from the recipt of the transaction.... i have emailed them, no response. i have facebook messaged them, no response. i went to two gyms beckton and stratford and they couldn‚Äôt help and said wait for the email! this is absolutely disgusting! and now i am just hanging here waiting for response which god knows when i will hear from them!
great atmosphere to train and the staff are friendly and helpful

totally scammed by puregym, do not trust them. joined up for the most expensive membership because it said could bring a named friend with me unlimited times. weeks after i joined it changed to bring a friend 4 times a month. totally dishonest and sly, both myself and my son paid for the best membership because we were interested in the bring a friend unlimited deal. we are going to cancel our membership and join a different gym! we will never use this gym again. emailed them but not helpful at all.

i have been having pt sessions with chloe since jan 23 and she is fab. she took the time to get to know what i want to achieve from my training and works around my injuries. she knows when to push me and my strength is improving week on week which i love seeing.  would highly recommend.

Review Title: No Frills gym just don't expect it to‚Ä¶
Review: no frills gym just dont expect it to be clean! gym does all the basics of a gym with cheap running machines. free weights are excellent with good space but everything else is basics, cheap and not worth the money. only ever seen 1 member of staff when training and that was my first attendance at the gym. sadly no cleaning products available and when asked about this on twitter and via email response was due to saving the world with less paper towels but dont worry we clean when and if we feel like it. so im sweating like a pig on a running machine and i cant clean it for the next person or vice versa. ive gone to go on a machine seen it was drenched in someones sweat but i cant clean it as there is 0 cleaning products. im pretty sure if they want to save the work with paper they could atleast leave cleaning spray and change towels regularly. i find it odd that we had covid and become clean again to then go back to being dirty slobs (not the people, every person says the same thing) this is by far the dirtiest gym ive attended to in caerphilly and theres quite a few gyms and they all have cleaning products apart from this gym.

Review Title: Best puregym in UK and best gym in Walsall
Review: been using puregym‚Äôs all over the country, probably pushing 40+ different gyms for nearly 5 years with the nature of my job. this is hands down the best one, always clean, tidy and great atmosphere.  natalie really cares about her gym, members and all the other staff are always friendly, the difference it makes walking into a gym with ‚Äúhey‚Äù and smile. 10/10
great place to do workouts. clean and safe

Review Title: Good budget gym, clean, friendly and good range of classes
Review: puregym is one of the budget gym chains which survived into the post covid-19 era.  flexible modern memberships available for single or multi-gym access at reasonable rates.kit at the blyth gym works as expected being brand new (q1 2023), and while the gym gets busy, the app lets you plan your best visiting times.  if youre a class person, there are a range of classes available from staff and freelance instructors which are safe and effective.  pts are around during staffed hours but had no experience of their knowledge, safety or coaching skills. changing rooms (as youd expect new) are basic, clean and in good condition, with padlocks needed for lockers if you opt to use them.  my only negative is that the showers are set so hot they practically burn and you end up sweating more after a shower than when you started.  team: turn the temp down - they would still be hot enough and the club would be more eco-friendly and save more on energy use!
for the first time going to pure gyms, i finally come across one that was immaculately clean, all the weights put away, and the staff consciously making sure they were.
very good gym that has everything i need and friendly staff.

Review Title: Overall a good gym but massively let‚Ä¶
Review: overall a good gym but massively let down by the complete lack of cleaning supplies available. machines are often left with sweat or grease on them as there is literally zero cleaning spray or even tissue available. either bring your own or try another gym is you‚Äôre concerned about germs.

Review Title: Such a grate gym has everything you‚Ä¶

3/5 stars. the gym is good value for money, that being said it‚Äôs at a higher price than the ashford for example. with the core membership, you‚Äôd expect access to both, however because maidstone is more expensive you are forced to pay more per month to access both gyms even with the core membership.  i wouldn‚Äôt go here after 4/5pm. but if you‚Äôre an early gym goer like myself then you won‚Äôt have any issues.  there seems to be a lot of teens, which i think is a by product of the price point. those complaining about this, need to realise the kids probably can‚Äôt afford the more expensive gyms out there.  all in all it‚Äôs an okay gym. the only big gripe is when a class is on, the music from the class is so loud you can‚Äôt here yourself think, often rendering my earphones useless, this is something those holding classes need to be more considerate about there‚Äôs no need for them to have the music so loud at all.

Review Title: really good gym, poor customer service
Review: the gym itself was really good and had everything you could possibly need. however, the customer service and staff were of no help. when in the gym toilets i had a member of staff talk very rudely towards me over getting mud all over the floor when it was not in fact me and i had clean shoes on. furthermore, when i contacted customer service due to breaking a bone and the website not letting me cancel my subscription, i had a response of ‚Äútry the website‚Äù which was obviously very unhelpful. after sending 3 different emails on different consecutive days i finally got a reply along the lines of ‚Äúplease don‚Äôt email lots of different times, instead email in a chain‚Äù not sure why they couldn‚Äôt of just sent a helpful email instead of wasting time sending an email on how i shouldn‚Äôt email. anyways, customer service never helped me resolve this issue and i had to contact my bank instead who sorted the issue immediately.

Review Title: I am gratefull for the use of the‚Ä¶
Review: i am gratefull for the use of the gym..however there are individuals who appear to equate working out with the necessity to make as much noise as possible by clattering the weights against machine and ground and throwing equipent around. could you inform clients to not do these things and respect equipment and other gym goers.

excellent quality if equipment. reasonable price (bear in mind, im cheapüòÇüòÇ). didnt see any staff on the floor tough, didnt bother me but something to consider if you are new and need help with using the equipment. i love the app, lots of workouts available from day 1 without having to pat extra. all in all, not bad.

Review Title: It‚Äôs great social place for young‚Ä¶
Review: it‚Äôs great social place for young people and has been a total godsend for my daughter. thankyou pure gym.

this gym is 4 floors underground. i took advantage of the 3 day pass in january, (unfortunately they are not 24 hours so when i signed up just before midnight id already lost a day) i then signed up for another month cancelling after this as i found the atmosphere very weird and a number of staff seemed to be obsessed with my activities and whereabouts. i couldnt use my pin at the front entrance, which i think was done on purpose so i could give the staff something to do. it too weeks to rectify this, the tanoy system was sometimes put on very loud, which was quite offputting if you were "getting in the zone" music was controlled by staff seemingly so either on the treadmill or the mat. it is a very big gym, and with the membership price being the lowest on the market you really have to push through (being of a shyier nature) just to get past (some of)the staff. generally other gym goers are very respectful, keep themselves to themselves and the gym is big enough for there always to be a space for what you want to do, but i get the impression staff have to like you for you to be allowed to do what you want to do.  i then restarted my membership, for half the price, and no joining fee, and then paid for another month. for the last week i have been purchasing day passes until friday there was a leak and so it was a bit of a waste of money as the gym was closed because a massive section of the floor was completely flooded of sewage water into the female changing room and a section by the running machines. why this wasnt closed prior to 6pm or shortly after when id arrived i do not know - clearly it had not just started. i recieved an email at 10pm - 3 and a half hours after purchasing my day pass, 2 hours after being thrown out the gym, that it would work at other pure gyms unfortunately by 3pm the next day this feature was taken off.  the cleaner i met when i first joined was quite bolshy in the changing room, she was later hovering by the running machines, there are probably a few, generally the changing room toilets were always very dirty, i often saw toilet rolls were just left on the floor - whether you are a personal trainer of a cleaner, - i dont think they are cleaned regularly, but if you are working for an establishment at least take some pride in the facillities which are a)paying your wages b)being used by paying clients showers are clean but this is more from them not being used than anything else lots of the lockers in the female changing room are either broken, nearly broken or used without a lock, so when you are rushing and trying to find a space to put your stuff - good luck! i went into the mens on friday after arriving and the females being pretty much out of order, and they are far cleaner, bigger and of a general better condition. it is student led and i think the staff are comfortable with this. being from a dancing/fitness/performing back ground i really have to work hard in the gym and i also like to keep myself to myself i have found the staffs obsession with what i am doing both off putting and upsetting. there are 4 gyms in liverpool (puregyms) but as this is right in the centre by both liverpool lime street and central it is very easy to get to. i also kept initially getting my timings wrong, and instead of a member of staff just saying oh off peak is from 1.30, (i went at 1 one day) i really had to go into the app / website - the pods are tiny, its a struggle to fit in if you have a rucksack on your back, also if you are a bit claustrophobic but after being rejected access through the main door i got used to these pods- when my code actually worked. i think some staff have to remember they work for puregym, (and not the other way around) - unprofessional, uncooperative and lazy pts

Review Title: Once you get in the gym and start using‚Ä¶
Review: once you get in the gym and start using the equipment, your frustration levels are easily settled (maybe due to physical exercises) and you can acknowledge that this gym (pure gym london borough) is a decent average gym. actually getting there (and literally into the gym) is a challenging but rather annoying hurdle one must overcome. this gym is often unstaffed, that means: no one at reception, no one answering your phone calls or messages. you cannot get basic information from the generic website. the lack of staff can make this an affordably cheap gym, but perhaps human support would be worth the extra penny. and bring a bloody lock for your locker as there is absolutely no information about this on their site. all in all, after my initial experience the good quality of the gym equipment is an undeniably strong plus.

Review Title: The convenience and simplicity of access to the gym
Review: after a long break, i decided to rejoin the gym. i was excited to learn that a new puregym was opening in my neighborhood; the fact that it was only a two-minute walk from my house bolstered my motivation. so i signed up online, and it was incredibly simple to do so. the app was also quite useful, with a lot of extras like workouts and instructions on how to utilize the gym facilities.  the gym is nice, and for the fee,¬†you get everything you need to accomplish any workout. i havent tried any classes yet, so i cant comment on those.  the fact that i may use the gym 24/7 is important to me because it is tough to establish a decent pattern for my weekly workouts owing to work commitments. i also dont enjoy peak hours; i prefer it when its calm and peaceful, and puregym accommodates my requirements.  so far, i am pleased.

the 24/7 system is the best but the shower facility is bad it stop working again at one point they say it was the demand over the period were people was showering to save money but after it was fixed it was good but short live this sunday morning just a few people and the shower was broken again.

Review Title: Pump class with Warren is amazing
Review: pump class with warren is amazing. he is an excellent instructor and for someone who doesnt like doing classes he has made the class very enjoyable. thanks warren

i like the gym as ive been using it for exactly 10 years,since its opened!i think it says a lot... ive seen plenty of managers and pts there and i accept we are all different. however,i do not understand why something needs to be changed what obviously worked really well for the members! specifically im talking about changing the timetable!we/members after a long day at work try to fit in classes we like or prefer and it has been brilliant in the past couple of months but now it looks like will be changed from next week. i know im not the only one,so probably more feedback on the way from others but i just want to express how disappointed i feel! i love the evening circuits classes, especially owens!his classes,the vibe,the intensity and himself just truly brilliant!!need more pts like him! unfortunately,from next week it looks like no more circuit on thursday and the tuesday one seemed to be shortened for some reason! i can only use the gym on those days and to be honest i specifically joined those circuits but i just feel put down and disappointed,as it wont happen any more on thursday and the tuesday is only 30mins:( can i ask what is the reason?? once again ive been using pure gym lambeth since it has opened!!!

Review: my buns feel as firm as two boiled eggs in a handkerchief after this visit today. no pervs and felt reasonably safe today so it‚Äôs a thumbs up from me

Review Title: Pure Gym Wincheap is an increasing‚Ä¶
Review: pure gym wincheap is an increasing disappointment and i have been a member for several years. class timetable is virtually non existent, the equipment is tired and decidedly dirty, the environment is similarly unsanitary and the staff are basically in a rotating door. the new staff are virtual children and have little experience and no expertise in social skills, let alone teaching skills. this can mean that health and safety is an issue, as the necessary checks, demonstrations and correction of how to use equipment etc is not happening. the staff spend most of their time looking at their phones, even while running classes and virtually have no engagement with the customers at all. the model employed by pure gym does not work. as the instruction teams are quickly [mostly virtually] trained in a short time frame, thrown in to a site, they have no experience and little confidence, are desperate to get enough pt sessions [of which there are not enough to make it viable for most of them] and therefore they very quickly end up leaving. management is often poor and the sites are often neglected; dirty changing rooms, overflowing sanitary bins, lack of cleaning equipment, no toilet rolls ‚Ä¶ despite raising concerns over and over again and even meeting twice with regional management ‚Ä¶. it is the same old story. once kingsmead reopens in their updated and upgraded building .. i will be returning there. by the way, several other members [and exiting staff] share the same, if not more scathing views of both the system and the club. really a poor choice, if you are considering joining.

Review Title: I have been coming to pure gym‚Ä¶
Review: i have been coming to pure gym stockport for about a month now, myself and my friend do the legs bums and tums and the hit class with mateusz, omg he‚Äôs amazing, he‚Äôs full of energy, keeps the classes fun, his music is amazing and makes you feel so welcome, i travel from urmston to do these classes even tho there on at my local gym because of how fun but hard they are, i couldn‚Äôt recommend his classes highly enough

Review Title: Great Zumba¬Æ  Class at PureGym TCR
Review: great zumba¬Æ class at puregym tottenham court road last night with becky crawford.  after having been with puregym piccadilly since 2016 i have now cancelled my membership, due to the class timetable being dreadful.  at one point the cycle classes were at 7am monday to friday and now they are at 6:15pm monday to friday. not all members want to do a cycle class 5 days a week.  would have been great if the zumba¬Æ, dance, and yoga classes were not going to be charged at ¬£4 per class, meaning this has taking these classes off the timetable due to cost and lack of attendance.  it would be nice if the gym would schedule their class timetable around those who enjoy attending them.  i appreciate the country is currently in a cost of living and energy crisis affecting business and having to make cut backs, my loyalty is now with the gym group, as they are providing a better service at this time and have been attending classes with them since february 2023 when i joined.  the gym group class timetables are scheduled at the right times across a number of branches and also saving myself ¬£7 month.

good gym with good facilities. however, wish the gym opened at 6am on a saturday as tesco is open from 6am and the gym is inside tesco. the drinks machine has been broken for ages and the showers are always cold so if that was remedied i would say 5 stars. the classes are good.
the staff are very helpful and friendly and pure gym motherwell has helped me physically and mentally
great place, friendly environment where you wont feel intimidated. very clean!
friendly, professional staff.  clean gym and equipment.  a well managed gym.

Review Title: A very clean gym with a lot of‚Ä¶
Review: a very clean gym with a lot of equipment which all works. 2 floors as well which gives you lots of space. the studio is also a decent size.
great facilities,  good vibes , all good.

its a small box gym, which normally would lead me to minus points but i just cant because the staff more than make up for the size.  i just had the induction today with mark. have had many inductions over the years but todays was hands down the best i have ever experienced. waay beyond the usual "here are the toilets, now buy my package" induction ive had in other places, mark took the time to show exact optimal placement of the pads for each set of equipment. he not only demonstrated, but also got each inductee to have a go, so he could give pointers that ensured they would get the best from each piece of equipment.  it is thoroughly clear he knows his stuff and is generous with sharing his knowledge. he even went back to check on inductees who decided to use the gym after, which was a really nice touch.  the atmosphere at the gym is awesome. for us oldies i can best describe it by saying it reminds me of the family feeling in the awesome gym from 90s comedy "dodgeball."  whoever is in charge has built and maintained a great team at hereford. you can tell all the trainers enjoy being there and working together. while i was there the trainers made a point to greet or exchange a few words with every single customer - and not in that creepy "fitness first style way, but in a genuinely warm and friendly manner.  there is an almost tangible positive energy that flows directly from the coaches and straight onto the gym floor. this makes newbies feel warm and welcomed and cuts through all self-consciousness.  hats off to the hereford team. i have had a fair few different gym experiences in my time but cannot remember the last time i was so impressed by the atmosphere and energy that the staff bring to the workout space.

Review Title: It‚Äôs a good gym with very friendly and‚Ä¶
Review: it‚Äôs a good gym with very friendly and helpful staff. i feel safe when using the facilities and they are looked after nicely. the place could do with a bit of improvement but on average it‚Äôs alright.

Review Title: I'm pure gym member for long long time‚Ä¶
Review: im pure gym member for long long time and im paying ¬£18  so i can technically use all the pure gym however recently ive been asked to upgrade my account so that i can use the one which is in city cente in hope st where i always go so as a result ive cancelled my own and also my wife direct debit so we will not go to pure gym anymore so we will join yo the gym which is cheaper and much better than pure gym . its very interesting that my wife also pay ¬£18 so she can use the gym where is in the hope st but i can not and we both pay the same amount.

after being a member for a couple of months now, honestly the staff are amazing, i have a pt, harry, who is encouraging and can have a laugh and a joke with whilst pushing to gain personal bests.  the main staff that i‚Äôm more relaxed around are becca, rich and of course harry. these guys i can have conversations with without feeling like i‚Äôm being judged or criticised, probably the most honest and genuine people i actually know.  the staff are more than happy to help and support each member of the gym, when they‚Äôre not with clients.  the gym itself including staff is very accepting and supportive.  the only downside i can think of about the gym, is the members not following the simple rules; having bags on gym floor (despite the notice‚Äôs around the gym), wearing unstable footwear whilst training.  this point is mainly towards the members nothing about the gym or the staff, hence why it‚Äôs still 5 stars.

this pure gym is quite small but offers a lot of cardio machines: bikes, treadmills , cross trainers‚Ä¶ they have the whole second floor dedicated to it! however the gym is quite small so there is only 1 of each machine such as a smith machine so when it is busy it is hard to get on equipment. the machines are good and all work well and are looked after as you see staff cleaning them and putting equipment away. however, there is a lack of variety in the machines compared to other pure gyms as there is no : hack squat, t row, hip thrust machine‚Ä¶.unfortunately the lift has been broken for weeks even months‚Ä¶ and there doesn‚Äôt seem to be any fixtures any time soon. this obviously limits disabled members or members with additional needs which acts as a barrier to the disabled community . furthermore, it proposes risks if someone was to get into danger on the top floor.the toilets are mostly clean with air fresheners but do have quite a stench‚Ä¶ it might be the confined space but a regular clean would be appropriate to prevent this. the gym has a good atmosphere and most instructors seem welcoming however a ‚Äúhello‚Äù or a smile would be nice! the changing rooms are clean and there is help buttons available which is comforting.

Review Title: Been a member for years but now‚Ä¶
Review: newtownabbey: been a member for years but now reconsidering. equipment not properly maintained. agree with mrs annette steenson, (march 6) the latest new layout downstairs is appalling. the equipment squeezed into 1/3rd. of the area nearest the entrance leaves little to no personal space between machines - and its so easy to bump into others whilst moving around. spacious it is not. the middle 1/3rd. area is a rarely used waste of good space. can also only agree with david (december 19) about new colour scheme - walls painted in single identity colours which when together make it a cold house for people from a unionist tradition. asst. mgr. very helpful. good to see managers available on the floor at the desk. thomas

Review Title: Air conditioning & hygiene is not good
Review: air conditioning is not good , the gym always smells bad and the toilets always smell bad. also the seats of the women toilets are all wobbly for months but no-one seems to bother there is no clean station upstairs , so the one disinfectant spray bottle always runs out and it doesnt get replaced for hours. not being able to apply our hygiene before and after using equipment although its basic and absolutely necessary,  it is not supported sadly.location is bath.

Review Title: Sutton gym has gone down hill.
Review: sutton gym has gone down hill. only 4 showers 2 of which are cold and 1 of which is not working the remaining one is meant to be hot but is cold to. the changing rooms are cold with the aircon on. the rest of the gym is fine but showers are c##p, i went to the warwickshire retail park one the other day so much better 6 hot working showers, fab refunds should be given for members of the sutton gym

karen hunts classes are the reason i go to this gym. she is amazing and such a great motivator.  for a long time, i have struggled to get myself to the gym and find the motivation to get fit. karens classes (from legs, bums and tums to cycle and circuits) are always amazing and i always leave feeling great. she always has great energy and i throughly enjoy her classes. this in turn has encouraged me to change my lifestyle and enjoy coming to the gym.  she has a true passion for her job which shines through. she is always so helpful, not only in classes but to others using the equipment in the gym as well.

as an old client of petko i learned a lots of things about fitness and how to train without having injuries, i learned to be patience in archiving my goals, because one day i will arrived. i learned that if you are stuck with one exercise and don‚Äôt see any kind of progress, you can change with another one and after few weeks come back on that exercise. i am happy that he gives me good advices when i ask or when i am in a moment of stagnation in my training routine. and for new members i recommend him you won‚Äôt regret it.

puregym is a great place to work out but recently they started to compromise on hot water, i dont like to shower there anymore, ive been going to puregym for 5 years now clean, friendly and safe place. but people getting naked and sitting around for so long is something i would rather not see, so annoying.

Review Title: Showers disgusting and unhygienic - risk of Legionnaires
Review: showers disgusting and unhygienic  hopefully this is not going to get another pure gym thanks for your feedback we take all feedback on board generic response, because this is important.  the showers are not cleaned, many are out of order. there is layers of mold around the seals and on the ceiling tiles. there is a real risk that from this gyms compliancy around cleaning and maintenance that legionnaires disease could form and harm members. i request that pure gym take this on board and get adequate testing and cleaning undertaken.  as others have already mentioned, the showers in the male changing room are also either out of order, or of poor quality. currently 3 are out of order with no eta on fixing, with out of the remaining 4, 1 is of satisfactory working, the others do not spray water properly, and is often cold.  parking is also another problem, again pure gyms generic response is that they are working on it. how hard is it to put or pay for a parking eye or other devices. or a member of staff going out every 4 hours and noting number plates down who have been there.

the gym is always clean and tidy,i feel so safe working out hear,i take a class on a wednesday morning bodytone with lauren beattie she is a really good instructor and her classes are always fantastic.

Review Title: I go to PureGym Derry and am in my‚Ä¶seventies

Review Title: I‚Äôve previously done reviews sort it out pure gum on here‚Ä¶
Review: i‚Äôve previously done reviews on here regarding ‚Äúpure gym‚Äù i really enjoy my gym time, however of recent i‚Äôve noticed a massive influx of teenagers in their that are most definitely not 18!!,. they sit on the machines not using them but playing on their phones, many of whom are wearing ‚Äúsliders‚Äù and generally just messing about!!,. i feel the staff need to get on top of it because it‚Äôs really annoying! take sunday a kid no older than 15 was messing about on the treadmill in sliders than bare feet! staff said nothing, i find it off putting if this continues i shall be joining somewhere else as very disappointing

although this is a large and well equipped gym, much of the equipment is old, some remains out of order for weeks and that which works like cross trainers for example all need a service. the wifi is patchy with areas with no coverage. it gets worse in the changing rooms where the showers are cold, lockers broken, blocked urinals and all very dirty.

Review Title: Low cost gym offering premium services
Review: at finsbury park pure gym is always improving but one drawback is that the equipment on the top floor is too close to one another otherwise everything it is  great place to train.

i like puregym. its not the staffs fault, but it drives me mad to see the amount of 72 plate posh cars in the disabled bays.

i have been going to castle mall‚Äôs puregym since early 2020. the gym there is absolutely fantastic, excellent atmosphere, high-quality equipment and people.  as a very happy customer i decided to add a secondary gym to my subscription as the one in riverside is now closer to where i work.  unfortunately to my surprise all the machines (cables-pulleys) are of a different brand than the ones in castle mall. older, of lesser quality and with heavier weights. now, this isn‚Äôt the end of the world and i know that different brands have distinct mechanisms/angles/calibrations making them feel different. however, when i subscribe to another puregym i expect the same level of equipment and quality, not a downgrade.  this probably happens in a lot of other puregyms across the uk, and some people might not mind it, but for me it really throws off my routine and makes it hard to focus on improvement. what‚Äôs the point of paying for a +1 access when i have to change my whole workout schedule/weights as the machines feel like they belong to a complete different gym chain.  i think it would be beneficial if puregym could provide a more consistent experience across all its locations. that way, i can rely on the same weights and machines, and i can focus on improving my shape instead of wasting time trying to adapt to different equipment.  i honestly feel torn to write this dissatisfying review as i will happily remain a pure gym customer, however i will not visit again nor recommend the one in riverside over the one in castle mall. especially to someone like me who wants to use both/switch.
the classes are amazing üòä instructors are fabulous üòä

Review Title: Worst Puregym I've visited in MCR
Review: after 5 years as a puregym member, this is the third puregym im a member of and by miles the worst one. ive been here for a good few weeks and apart from in classes (that are ran on the middle of the floors as there are no studios), im yet to see a staff member. the gym and the equipment is outdated and doesnt allow for much flexibility or variation in your workouts. no kettlebells, no slam balls, no prowler sled, no room to do weighted walked lunges or barbell hip thrusts, no skiing machine and whoever planned the layout of this gym did not think it through at all. you cant bring weights around so if you want to do weights, youll be crammed into a tiny space downstairs where theres about 5 benches as theyve decided to cover the top floor with cardio equipment and make it lool like theyre still practicing social distancing - the use of space is that poorly planned. even if its cheaper than both market street and exchange quay which i have previously been a member of, its not good value for money like the other 2. market street feels smaller but its much better equipped and always has staff around. i went for this one as ive always been very happy at puregym but will now look elsewhere in stretford as this gym is so limited. i like to do my own circuit training and combine weights and cardio but its not possible here. its weights downstairs and cardio upstairs. very poorly planned with little innovation. its old school and doesnt have the best room for a fun workouts.
brilliant first time experience couldnt ask for more
a good spacious gym  ,  great staff , good classes ,  and local .

Review Title: A lot of people are entering the gym‚Ä¶
Review: a lot of people are entering the gym without being members which is annoying as they occupy equipment that paying members could be using and we as paying members should not be penalised because of others actions

Review Title: Too many people on phones not working out taking up space
Review: pure gym is cheap and there are branches everywhere. this is the positive.the negative: having been to leeds, liverpool, twickenham, reading, and a few more there is one consistency: poor maintenance, and poor ventilation.  i am also fed up with people coming to the gym with a tripod to not work out but to flex on social media. this isnt policed, and the staff dont care. i do as its not legal to film without consent and when someone is pretending to lift, and filming me actually sweating, it gets on my nerves.  i have mentioned it to managers but they did not know that it is in fact illegal. pure gym, its time to educate staff, and kids who go to the gym to watch youtube on the bench should get a new hobby.

this gym is really smelly, always overcrowded, there is always something or the other that‚Äôs broken or non functional. the washrooms are right in front of people working out it‚Äôs so unpleasant. i wouldn‚Äôt recommend to anyone, the hygiene of this gym is really poor.

Review Title: A few machines have been out of order‚Ä¶

Review Title: "PureGym in Central Brighton: Affordable and Well-Equipped, But Brace Yourself for Crowds and Ego-Heavy Staff"
Review: if youre lookin for a gym in central brighton that wont break the bank, puregyms the one you want. for only ¬£22 a month, its decent value.  but heres the deal - it gets busy, and i mean busy. if youre the type that likes their space, you might wanna think twice about puregym. plus, some of the staff aint all that great. they can be a bit rude with egos the size of a bloody house.  now, enough of the negatives. lets talk about whats good about puregym. the equipment is spot on. you got everything you need to get fit and strong. and the size of the place is just right - not too big, not too small.  sure, some people might moan about the crowds, but what do you expect for such a cheap price? you gotta take the rough with the smooth, my friend.  so, if youre lookin for a budget-friendly gym in central brighton, give puregym a try. just be ready for the crowds and the odd snotty staff member.
friendly pts, nice atmosphere and new equipment :)

Review Title: The gym equipment is of good standard.
Review: the gym equipment is of good standard at most gyms, the gyms are usually very busy, you will have to be patient when using equipment. a few things i have found in multiple gyms are as follows. staff interaction is limited unless you‚Äôre taking classes. the spray bottles and blue roll is not of enough quantity or well stocked (used to clean down machinery). the water machine isn‚Äôt refilled that regularly. some equipment needs a refresh (usually grips are well warn on most items. a big issue is the lack of carabiners, having to take ones from other equipment.  otherwise you get what you pay for. cheap gym membership, very busy most of the time.

Review Title: I have been making regular payment to‚Ä¶

Review Title: Very disappointed with the refurb at  Gloucester
Review: very disappointed with the refurb, after weeks of disruption, it is finally finished. there is now no obvious route to walk to get to the change rooms. you now have to negotiate around weight machines and folks waiting for the machines, not a safe environment, especially for visually impaired folk. the best cross trainer machines, with the variable footbed angle, have all been taken away and not replaced. the remaining machines that are upstairs face the wall by the entrance, creating a cramped, uncomfortable exercise experience. as has been previously mentioned, there is no privacy in the change rooms as its now open plan, and in the name of reducing energy consumption (reducing costs) the temperature of the showers has been turned down to the point that they are cold ü•∂ and almost impossible to stand under after a workout. pity they didnt have a deep clean during the refurb. oh, please stop leaving the covers off the drains in the showers ü§¢

Review Title: I am writing this review regarding jack‚Ä¶
Review: i am writing this review regarding jack the pt  ,he was my pt for almost 2 years, it was going well till the last december i stop going with him for a bit then i started again with him i call him to go back he said ok then we have a meeting of what i will like to achieve then i paid for weeks session with him , he said that he will do a plan for training and food plan i went away for 2 weeks when i was back not plan yet , i went to a session with him and he said i promise i will have the plan and everything done by next week and i said ok cool , i book a nanny cause it was half terms for my kids and he text me an hour before to cancel cause he haven‚Äôt been able to do the plan cause he been too busy with this it been 3 weeks delayed but i have already pay him so i said i keep chasing you and he said i have to check the text from the client that pay me more first and i said ok but i don‚Äôt think you are caring about my gold as a client so i prefer to stop here cause you don‚Äôt even want to do a plan and he said ok but the money is not refundable and i said how come cause here you are the one that haven‚Äôt done my plan you are the one that cancel my session last minute so i don‚Äôt think you should stay with my money when you didn‚Äôt care about if i feel bad or not just cause i pay you before so after 2 years paying him following him around he do this and stay with my money just like that very disappointed big disappointment üò§

london woolwich. the gym is quite new so it wasnt listed. i have been a member for years on and off, i find puregym the best gym group among all the others. there wasnt any puregym near my area before so when this particular branch opened i was happy. you normally have really good floor plan and good equipment so i did not hesitate to sign up. upon my first visit, i felt disappointed. this location is very busy, so i expected a much bigger space to start with. its really small, machines are packed everywhere, there is barely space, and when it gets busy its like sardines in a can not to talk of you cant use any equipment because they are occupied all the time. there is an extremely small area for body weight training or exercise on the floor, its ridiculous and its facing the street and road so when doing abs or any other positions the whole street is staring and watching even from the cars. there is a studio room which is good size, thats where i normally get all my body weight exercises done, however if its busy because a class is going on, then only that small area is left to go to. some equipment is missing from this branch that i was using when i was in greenwich, i guess no space for them. the female changing room is ok, there are 2 toilets and showers, clean, however on many occasions there is quite a lots of water on the floor due to washing hands as the hand dryer is not right next to the sink but across on the wall. also, when someone showers the steam doesnt escape right away and the changing room gets real humid which is unpleasant and i have not experienced this in other branches. i have only seen 2 staff so far, spoke to only 1 and babatunde always has a friendly approach and a smile for everyone. i saw him cleaning the equipments the other day which is really good as some other branches lack this step unfortunately and equipments are filthy. overall, this branch is a let down for me, and if i had a better option near my area i would change. 5/10. to add, your orpington and greenwich branches are amazing, 10/10, i truly miss working out there.
