great gym, with lots of equipment, and affordable membership.

Review Title: Plenty equipment, nice and clean and still has the new gym smell.
Review: the gym is nice and clean and plenty of equipment. the body composition machines could do with an upgrade for more accurate and digital results sent direct to my phone rather than a recipt print out. i would prefer less stair machines and more exercise bikes and the air con is always hot..at the time i go anyway which is early 4am/5am perhaps it changes during the day, i dont know. overall my biggest quarrel is the composition machine in the changing rooms. apart from that great gym, great staff and great equipment! definitely get your monies worth.
equipment available  staff  visible if i needed assistant. gym was clean good background music playing

felt the need to leave this review after complaints to the (very friendly) staff have all resulted in nothing being done - all the staff are aware of the issues and aware theyre problems but are also aware that theres no action being taken to resolve any of them.  the positives:  1) just had a refurb 2) the new kit is great (always having to hunt down plates though) 3) the new flooring and free weights are are also great 4) the staff are friendly, knowledgable and approachable  the negatives:  1) air con leaking (and has now for 2+ years) in the free weights area, despite this being an issue before the refurb nothing has been done about it  2) changing rooms arent locked.. ever  3) damaged / poorly maintained older equipment, older machines have been poorly maintained and some are borderline dangerous due to issues such as grips spinning when theyre meant to be rigid  4) repair times - equipment and facilities are frequently broken, repair times take anywhere from 1-2 weeks to 2+months a recent example would be the only disabled toilets/shower room which had no lock for approximately 2 weeks.  5)mens locker rooms: a) broken lockers - id estimate at least 30% of the lockers are unusable due to damaged locks or frames b) damaged and poorly repaired urinal - the urinal fell off the wall and hasnt been properly repaired, this is still leaking and has led to the changing room frequently smelling quite badly due to this. c) changed shower temperatures and timings recently, they are now barely warm with frequent blasts of cold water to encourage you not to use them. d) 2 evenings in the last month the entire toilet area has been completely flooded  ive been a member off and on since this gym opened and it has slowly gotten worse, i would recommend using a different site.  **update**  a month and a half on, nothing has changed, staff are still great but its obvious the owners arent interested in putting any money into fixing anything. would still advise using a different site  **update #2**  another month on, still nothing changed, more equipment broken awaiting repair, shower temps still low and swing wildly between cold and hot
beautiful clean peaceful fabulous fantastic friendly perfect heavenly good atmosphere.

Review Title: Where is the Yanga puregym Heanor
Review: visited puregym heanor for the first time today as it is now more local then the previous one i used. all the equipment is good however i was disappointed to find out there was no yanga sports water machine. i expect this to be at every puregym however this is the first i have found without it. it is one of the reasons i purchased the plus multi access membership which is considerably more than a standard membership. also a little niggly comment that there was only one entrance and exit which was very busy and caused queuing.
clean, slick gym. new equipment and weights are decent. six deadlift platforms.... perfection.  decent gym for the cost, can do all exercises you need to do.
the gym is very welcoming, the equipment is always clean and the staff are very friendly. they have a different range of classes with support throughout.

been going to pure gym since january this year , clean , tidy lots of equipment always in good condition and plenty to go round , when things do go wrong they are quickly fixed or replaced decent price for what you get happy customer!

Review Title: I enjoy doing excersise at my own time‚Ä¶

the gym itself is a good size, easy location and clean. i‚Äôve trained with max cooper since summer last year and honestly working with him has been a game changer. mentally & physically i‚Äôve seen so many positive changes since we started training. he‚Äôs an all around great guy, super passionate about his work and really easy to get on with. as someone that was a little apprehensive about the free weights section he helped me feel comfortable and confident in that space. working with max helped take my overall lifestyle choices to the next level and my results have been speaking for themselves. couldn‚Äôt recommend max more. he is great with beginners but anyone at any stage of their fitness journey would benefit massively from his expertise and personal fitness story.

Review Title: ONCE AGAIN, DO NOT JOIN THIS PUREGYM
Review: in response to previous review - totally just ignore i stated that 95% of the lockers were broken and the ac system. you could have got in someone during the 6 days that you were closed to fix all the lockers and anything that needed maintenance... instead of charging your customers ¬£18+ for most of the equipment and facilities being knackered and broken.

car parking charges.  i‚Äôve recently just joined and just received 8 parking charges.  i‚Äôve tried to get to speak to someone at puregym about it and there‚Äôs no phone number.  i believed it was free onsite parking at portishead.  is this not the case?

Review Title: Having never ventured into a gym‚Ä¶
Review: having never ventured into a gym before, i find it much less intimidating than i imagined and having been there a few months now, the staff and users are all super friendly.

Review Title: I joined pure gym cardiff western‚Ä¶
Review: i joined pure gym cardiff western avenue, back last summer before they actually opened. i try to go 4/5 times a week, as a shift worker, the nights/early mornings are awesome, i pretty much get the place to myself. i cant imagine a gym having more kit than this place, the price is cheap in comparison to lots of others, cleaned around the clock almost. if i had to list a few niggles ( no place is perfect) id say the mens changing rooms are too small, for me the showers are too hot, the temp cant be changed, ppl are leaving empty shower gell bottles and even razor blades in the showers, people are not putting dumbells away or removing plates from machines after use, but none of this is pure gyms fault, my ocd sees me put loads of kit away for ppl when i go in the small hours .
visiting as a tourist, i was happy with the service. the rates are good and i liked the ambiance and customer service. the gym members are also cordial and friendly.
there are instructors to help with everything. you are not left stranded. different classes are also available according to your plan. generally, it‚Äôs a safe haven.

Review Title: Recommending Dave Fuller for anyone interested in PT
Review: i‚Äôve been going to this gym since 2019 and absolutely love it! i‚Äôve been to various different puregyms all over the country and have yet to find one as good as skydome. there‚Äôs a great gym community and all the pts are wonderful, especially dave fuller who i started pt with around 3 months ago. as a regular gym goer who felt confident in the gym and didn‚Äôt lack the motivation to be in the gym 5/6 days a week already, for me getting a pt was about pushing myself beyond what i was able to achieve on my own. in just a few months dave has transformed my workouts and the weights i‚Äôm able to lift are flying up week on week, while by myself i had reached a bit of a plateau. dave makes every session fun and is so supportive and easy to get on with. i cannot recommend him enough!

Review Title: Best gym with the best PTs, namely Dave!
Review: i‚Äôve been going to this gym for nearly 2 years as it‚Äôs by far the best gym! all the staff are amazing and so friendly- everyone is so approachable and have helped me so much throughout my gym journey. special shout-out to my pt dave fuller who i‚Äôve been with for a year now, outstanding in every way; he goes above and beyond to tailor programmes to fit my needs and my goals- and i‚Äôm happy to say within this year i have reached and surpassed many of my goals, something i never could have done without him! i would highly recommend dave as a pt, he‚Äôs not only helped me reach my fitness goals but has helped me so much with my nutrition, and with my confidence both in the gym and in my body!!
clean and tidy , enough space,  quality equipment.
good equipment, great classes, local and friendly

always good, i feel comfortable, and not bothered about young bodies all around me. .   love the fact a lot of equipment is sitting, therefore i don‚Äôt have to worry about my balance. it definitely helps me get stronger. i‚Äôm going to have to go forever. .

Review Title: I would love to say this gym is perfect‚Ä¶
Review: i would love to say this gym is perfect but it‚Äôs not, no gym is. unfortunately there doesn‚Äôt seem to be a limit to the amount of people on the gym floor (excluding classes), it‚Äôs impossible to plan a routine as you can‚Äôt get on the equipment required, for the size the max should be around 90-100 max, anymore and it‚Äôs a nightmare, majority of people train when they finish work so yes i generally train at peak times but you shouldn‚Äôt feel like you want to turn around and go home.another thing is the environmental control, quite often it‚Äôs too warm.

i like the anti harassment policy in force. i hope puregym enforces it i personally suffered this which kept me away from gym for 10 years after inexperienced staff could not resolve it
good gym. quality classes .

great gym overall, one of the best in the area.  decent kit, lots of options of machines, clean and 24/7.  really good value for money.  just lost a star because it could be so much better. as others have mentioned they could do with adding more kit. doing so would elevate the gym massively.  like a previous poster has a poster has mentioned the crossfit/functional area is very large. it would perhaps be better to use some of that space to house some of the current equipment in order to make room for more stuff. for example the fixed weight barbels and the ab bench could both be put in that area. which would free up room in the free weights area for additional benches and perhaps a hack squat and even additional rack or other plate loaded equipment.  space is taken up by massive cleaning stations which could easily be affixed to the wall, like they are in the studio. again opening up space in both the machine weights/ cardio area and free weights for additional machines.  the stretch area near the studio is also much too large for its purpose. and again could house extra equipment, or move current equipment into there to create room elsewhere.  finally it would be really useful if the blk box racks had spotter arms  overall the gym is fantastic but it could be a lot better, its not fulfilling its potential.

although i‚Äôve just recently joined, i‚Äôm really enjoying puregym. lots of good free weights/machine‚Äôs and decent cardio equipment too. also good to see plenty of concept 2 rowing machines. it will take a while to navigate it all but it‚Äôs something to look forward to. a good atmosphere, which is so important. the spin cycling class was awesome, cheers danielle! more classes to try out in the future. value for money? 100% cheers to craig too for giving me a tour of the gym before i joined.
reasonably priced. good equipment and open 24/7.
open 24hrs, very safe and clean.  very well equipped and laid out spacious. changing area always well cared for and clean, shower area always tidy and clean. 1st class, very happy member.

Review Title: Good gym only thing that would be good‚Ä¶
Review: good gym only thing that would be good if it open earlier then 7am

please can you put mirrors back in the ladies changeroom?? its not enough to only have the one small one when so many people use the space!!  i also agree with the previous comment about making use of the window space for cardio machines. i would also add that the smith machines were better downstairs since you can work up from smith to olympic bar that way instead of changing floors.

enjoy the gym location near my home, flexible opening times, and excellent range of equipment. however sometimes the st albans gym air conditioning is not working and it‚Äôs too hot and uncomfortable to work out in so the air not very fresh. today no one to follow it up with on duty being a saturday morning.

Review Title: Easy access friendly staff  and other‚Ä¶
Review: easy access friendly staff  and other people in the gym

Review Title: I am a new member so far so good
Review: i am a new member so far so good, all fine, no complaints
hi team! it is much cleaner than it was before, but there should be a lot of equipment , because it is difficult to wait for those ,when i go to work after workout.

Review Title: Out-of-town guest is impressed by West Brom
Review: i bought an out-of-town guest membership at west brom. he was knocked-out by how good the gym was. hed never seen such a huge gym and thought the equipment was wonderful. his only disappointment was that he does not have a puregym near where he lives -- in darlington.

Review Title: Pure Gym Angel is fairly priced
Review: pure gym angel is fairly priced, well equipped, clean,  and under the new manager a friendlier better place to work out

Review Title: It's a no fuss approach to the gym
Review: its a no fuss approach to the gym. help is there if required. there is a broken fire door in the shared area of the building which has had an awaiting engineer notice on it since before christmas 2022. pure gym should be putting pressure on their landlord to get it repaired.

Review Title: Lots of equipment and good variety
Review: lots of equipment and good variety. plenty of space and no need to wait to get onto equipment

Review Title: Smells, no air con, not clean!
Review: - women‚Äôs changing rooms really smell of drains! - broken cubicle (falling off the wall) - showers not clean - the air con doesn‚Äôt seem to be on and so it‚Äôs impossible to workout as i‚Äôd like as it‚Äôs far too hot! i can only imagine what it will be like as it gets warmer
clean, well stocked and not too busy.
i like this gym! but you have to teach people who exercise at night - the culture of putting dumbells on racks

i joined puregym in november 2022 in newcastle, knowing i was relocating soon.  i was reassured i could attend any puregym in the country.  when i moved in january 2023, i eagerly went to worcester puregym.  all seemed well, until i received a head office email saying i would need to upgrade (pay more) to use worcester!  i cancelled due to their disingenuous attitude‚Ä¶ btw cancelling is like solving the krypton factor.  funny, now they are sending me ‚Äúcome back‚Äù emails.  classic head office too far removed from their customers. be warned!
good equipment great staff lovely atmosphere

such an amazing gym! all staff are amazing and approachable, the manager luke evidently works really hard to make this gym a fantastic place for its members! the classes ran by the team are amazing, in particular, the instructor agas classes always stand out to me, i wish i could attend them all! great gym, great location, and great staff!

one big thing puregym can and should improve on is customers communication. there is no phone service and the online chat is automated so the query never gets answered and you still have an issue. it‚Äôs really really annoying. and when you email, no one ever reply. it‚Äôs now 2months and i‚Äôm still waiting ( i bet you will give the rubbish reason that it‚Äôs a busy period like you always say). it‚Äôs disappointing and frustrating to have a business care so like about there customers and make up excuses.

open 24/7. an app which among other things, provides live information of how many people are currently in the gym. relatively cheap membership. lots of equipment and plenty of space. all of the equipment i have used has been in perfect condition.  the only negative i can say is in regards to the dumbbells. every time i go, they are in complete disarray. in all the gyms ive been in, ive never seen it as bad. when you want a pair, it wouldnt be uncommon for them to be situated on opposite sides of the free weight area (possibly on the floor).  that being said, i do not hold puregym accountable as this is during unstaffed hours and the weight racks have clear numbers on them for specific placement of all dumbbells. this is purely the result of inconsiderate gym members.

Review Title: I couldn‚Äôt of ask for anything more‚Ä¶
Review: i couldn‚Äôt of ask for anything more friendly atmosphere and it was clean and tidy.

ive been a member here for many years but its no longer the great gym it once was. while the gym still has some really great pts (anthony, wayne & deano), its frustrating how much equipment is completely worn out. steppers, rowers, bikes and spinning bikes are all on their last legs. if the new kit promised for april doesnt materialize, ill have to think about going elsewhere. i also believe that several parked vehicles have broken into recently, which makes me think twice about late evening visits.
great gym , fully loaded with high quality equipment. best to go after the 5.30 - 6.30 pm rush hour as it gets very busy.

Review Title: PureGym is great value for money
Review: puregym is great value for money, even on the basic package you get alot of good hours to do a workout, a good variety of equipment and helpful staff. i enjoy my time there and have had no problems with other members.

Review Title: This gym is always so messy
Review: this gym is always so messy. weights everywhere. i regularly turn up for a class and it just doesn‚Äôt happen. moving gyms because i can‚Äôt handle how much of a mess it is anymore

Review Title: A fantastic gym with the best staff who‚Ä¶
Review: a fantastic gym with the best staff who are extremely knowledgeable and friendly, always there to help.they run some of the best classes and i have tried lots of other gyms that don‚Äôt come near the standard of classes run by puregym edinburgh west staff.
i gave five stars because the gym caters for all shapes, sizes and abilities. the atmosphere is great and there is plenty of equipment that is in good working order.

Review Title: For the price I can‚Äôt fault PureGym‚Ä¶
Review: for the price i can‚Äôt fault puregym grimsby. currently had a refit which is improved the gym. staff once again i can‚Äôt fault very helpful. very friendly

Review Title: I visit early morning like 5am and‚Ä¶
Review: i visit early morning like 5am and there‚Äôs lots of equipment to use - it‚Äôs clean - friendly- also has a ladies only area which is great - changing rooms are very clean there‚Äôs lockers but you need your own padlock - there is parking- all in all a great gym

Review Title: Excellent clean gym with plenty of‚Ä¶
Review: excellent clean gym with plenty of equipment to use alongside great staff always willing to help.
great gym, friendly helpful pt‚Äôs and generally a good vibe.

Review Title: Big shout out to Kailey you are the‚Ä¶
Review: big shout out to kailey you are the best!!! her classes are tough and super intense but worth it! make sure you try it! thank you!
amazing staff and equipemnt. cheap ¬£20 per month premium price. access to all gyms nationswide, daily classes, 24/7 hours, electronic entry, my guests enjoyed the experience
just love this place.(yeovil somerset) i have been using gyms for 50 years and this is the best. friendly staff and clients . clean , comfortable and well equipped. keep up the good work

i think that pure gym is excellent value.  after my first visit i was shocked to see how little equipment they had. it wasnt until my second visit that i discovered a "hidden" door that revealed the upstairs and all the gear i required.  since then a bit disappointed at the amount of time faulty equipment is left unrepaired.  not a major problem for me as i either go on something else or their are duplicates.
great facilities good atmosphere friendly staff
quality gym, excellent instructors. really good value for money üòÅüëå

shout out to aga pt, a wonderful pt so knowledgeable and hard working! invests so much time in her clients and so approachable! her classes are on fire too! thank you for making the gym so much fun, hard work and rewarding!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
my local gym that i use weekly

Review Title: Not good Tried to switch from my pure gym to a‚Ä¶
Review: tried to switch from my pure gym to a different one which was more convenient to get to.  i was told i‚Äôd have to pay extra per month, despite the gyms having the same monthly cost.  jokers.  had to leave and join another gym.  well done pure gym.  i was a loyal customer for years. tried talking to people but just got the same automated message on email as i did on their instagram page.  what kind of business sacrifices ¬£450 per year for the sake of an extra ¬£45 per year.   i can‚Äôt suffer greed, pure greed, nothing else.  the gym was good though, was run well, i will say that.

Review Title: We are new to this gym & have always‚Ä¶
Review: we are new to this gym & have always found the staff very friendly at puregym park royal. the people & atmosphere is pleasant
great staff, excellent and tons of kit to choose from and also some other very helpful gym members to give advice on some training

Review Title: 24 hour gym with lots of equipment and‚Ä¶
Review: 24 hour gym with lots of equipment and trainer led classes at a low monthly cost.

Review Title: Plenty of good equipment to use
Review: plenty of good equipment to use, parking is great, price of membership is reasonable and no contact, very friendly staff as well ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶üëç
gym great, filthy car park,a problem they are well aware of but choose to ignore.
nice gym and very clean

my husband and i have used the gym for a few years now and we were always impressed by the standard of hygiene and cleanliness, however this has recently taken a noticeable decline. the toilets are often grubby and untidy and the showers need a good clean. there is also a lack of soap dispensers in the toilet with only one shop bought soap dispenser available between all the sinks. it is really disappointing because pre covid we were always really impressed by how clean everything was and it was the first thing any visitors we took along always pointed out. the first floor also seems really crowded with equipment whilst the top floor seems quite empty. it is such a shame cause we really did love the place and now we are not so sure.
excellent space!! over three floors, huge cardio and weights areas and even a crossfit style area upstairs

Review Title: Great gym but men‚Äôs showers and toilets‚Ä¶
Review: great gym but men‚Äôs showers and toilets need a better cleaning regime they are constantly dirty .

Review Title: Can't get on machines or benches
Review: there are groups of teenagers who congregate at machines and stand around talking. seem to treat it as a social gathering. very annoying when you want a serious work out. no one seems to be tackling this. not even any signage relating to hogging machines and benches.

gym keeps getting closed ‚Äúuntil further notice‚Äù. this is not conveyed through email as puregym standard but simply through a note taped to the doors.  this has happened several times now, and the ability to ‚Äúuse other gyms‚Äù is not very helpful if your travel was to this gym and all other gyms in b‚Äôham are 20min (snowhill) or 30min (5 ways) away.
for 24 hours access, can‚Äôt go wrong.
very good atmosphere, clean ‚Ä¶ thanks
i like the classes, and atmosphere and people there... the building could be more spacious but its the best we have in the area of southgate right now... the classes make it all worthwhile

Review Title: A great gym with lots of equipment and‚Ä¶
Review: a great gym with lots of equipment and classes.  the staff are approachable, friendly and very helpful. the gym is used by a wide range of people, ages, abilities and find it female friendly.

considering its only been open for 4 months, hygiene and cleanliness is really really disappointing.  the cleaner ive seen seems to be on a jolly, and hasnt grasped the job title yet.the websites not being updated with the correct staffing and managerial information.  god knows how the place runs, theres no staff there half the time, and i feel sorry for the ones that are present.  shoestring springs to mind!  plus, staff quality is questionable!  everybody that goes is a pt training their clients, when their own staff have to pay a fee, and people using others key fobs!  its going to be a matter of time before somebody suffers a serious injury from one thing or the other. disappointing overall, especially with some other longer standing and experienced gyms in the area, including the far more reputable university gym (maes glas).
great gym and lovely staff. only downside is too many slots for classes and then you have no room to move. they need to reduce the amount of people allowed in each class.

Review Title: Emma aerobics class is excellent but‚Ä¶
Review: emma aerobics class is excellent but really could do with zumba class or gym cardio class or body combat class!!!

joined puregym tonbridge only for it to close indefinitely. want to switch to sevenoaks but the app won‚Äôt let me. tried to start a new membership but again the app won‚Äôt let me. emailed puregym and got a generic reply which did not help at all - absolutely no customer support whatsoever!

Review Title: What was once a great gym is no longer great‚Ä¶
Review: what was once a great gym is no longer great as its now unfortunately so incredibly busy. i am wasting the membership as i am put off from going. both car parks are often still full at 8.30pm at night & this week all treadmills & all benches were taken pretty much from 8-9pm. people stood around trying to figure out what they can actually do. so disappointed. too many new members allowed to join which means existing members like myself are having a poor experience. and this is not about limiting numbers in the gym at any one time, as this would again mean long-term members would suffer. i sense i would better off paying more to go elsewhere & am considering this if it continues.

Review Title: Very easy to sign up and there was a‚Ä¶
Review: very easy to sign up and there was a special offer of no sign-on fee. monthly charge was reasonable and equipment is modern and in good condition

ive found puregym to be the best gym chain but its still far from perfect. i wish you could access all puregyms with one membership even if you had to pay extra, but thats not too important. since its targeted for beginners, it has matrix equipment which is pretty bad but still better than technogym haha. overall good enough for me for the price.

Review Title: Amazing and well looked after gym
Review: amazing and well looked after gym. i go for the classes and highly recommend. for anyone of any fitness level. super friendly staff and welcoming !

Review Title: Really good but could be better
Review: having recently joined this gym after being to a number of other gyms in the past year, the first thing i noticed is that the weights (other than the dumbells in the free weights area) are very rarely put back in the right place, meaning that a good chunk of your first set is spent looking for the actual plate or kettlebells. this may just be poor etiquette by gym users and may be because i am there early and no staff are there, but i have been mid-day and early morning and each time i had the same issue. perhaps a member of staff could be dedicated to going round regularly? signs could be put up to show proper etiquette? maybe label specifically where the plates and dumbells should go?  my only other gripe is that there is a lot of wasted space in one section of the gym, which is the open area to the right of the stairs on the ground floor. i am aware that classes take place here, but i feel that this can be sectioned off more efficiently i.e. the area behind the pillars in this room could be used to put a strip of astroturf for a sled to be used, and perhaps this could also accommodate more kettlebells to make it a functional training area? i just feel that the amount this area is used for classes and the area used up vs what could be put there whilst also accommodating the classes is disproportionate. i‚Äôm not sure how this would be implemented and even if my suggestion could be heard, but it just doesn‚Äôt really make sense to waste so much space.  other than the above, the staff are great, the equipment is great and i would recommend the average gym user to come here.
nice friendly clean environment with plenty of equipment for all levels of weight training and fitness

Review Title: Be the best train with the best at the‚Ä¶
Review: be the best train with the best at the best gym...

luke and his team make going to the gym a very welcoming experience. i‚Äôm not a confident gym goer, but the fitness team are friendly, willing to help and all want you to achieve the best in your fitness goals.  the gym is kept very clean and tidy. i‚Äôve attended a range of classes which are all led by the fitness team who welcome everyone regardless of ability, supporting and encouraging each and everyone to push and do their best.  i‚Äôve never been to the gym as much as i have and enjoyed it, since joining puregym great yarmouth and that‚Äôs thanks to luke and his team for creating an environment where you feel supported, welcome and encouraged.
friendly venue, helpful staff and great spinning class.
had a fabulous stretch class with philippe davis. excellent teacher - polite and professional. thank you üòä
great place to get stronger, faster, fitter when i 1st join all i wanted to do was improve on my fitness and health and this was the gym for me it has everything amazing thank you

Review Title: Brilliant Bodytone class!!! Thanks David S!!!
Review: i decided at the end of last year that it was time to get fit again and to get the body i wanted. i was pretty rubbish and a little daunted when i started classes but with the help of all the instructors, but in particular the encouragement and attention to detail from david s, i am gaining confidence and now think i can do it! the classes are great! thank you!

not a bad gym, can get a little busy at times, which i guess is expected.  unfortunately the showers in the last couple of weeks have been cold, luke warm at best, (you actually dont feel clean after showering anymore) and the shower trays always tend to be full of little hairs, i actually wear slider when showering now becuase of this.  it no longer feels like a gym that only opened around 3 months ago - real shame.  (lincoln carlton centre)

i‚Äôve been going semi regularly for the past three months, and the amount of things i see is unreal.  i‚Äôll start by saying the good points;  they are a 24 hr gym, which suits my schedule well.  they have free weights that are monitored to an extent.  there is an overflow car park which is free (even for the locals to dump there car in).  now for the bad;  there is no limit on memberships, causing the gym to be extremely busy. having to wait for equipment is normal in any gym but it‚Äôs unreal the amount of people sat on the machines doing nothing for 10 minutes or taking selfies.  the men‚Äôs locker room is too dirty, there needs to be a cleaner coming in halfway between shifts. after the night clean it‚Äôs great but just before that there is rubbish everywhere, bottles left out, urine on the floor etc. also, during the evenings the smell of weed is sickly. i‚Äôm not talking about a little bit either, it hits you as you enter the locker room.  lastly, i have had sixty pound taken out of my wallet which was in my pocket inside a locked locker! the padlock just left on the side, how they got in i have no idea, but be careful and use a key padlock and not a coded one.

Review Title: Popped in today to have a look
Review: popped in today to have a look. lovely space, really helpful staff, they‚Äôve made good use of the space. smaller than other puregyms i‚Äôve been in but at no point felt crowded. equipment well maintained and clean space.
great people east and cheap, perfect for my needs.

i suffer from extreme stomach cramps during my menstrual cycle and it is very disappointing that i get penalized for being a female and have to cancel a class at less than 4 hours notice!!!  i am aware of the policy!!

Review Title: Looks cool, its affordable and has loads of classes
Review: honestly, you cant go wrong with this branch in angel. its clean, looks cool, affordable and has lots of classes.
amazing team of staff, really friendly and approachable. gym class‚Äôs are absolutely fantastic! great fun to mix up your workouts.

**** cold showers ****. ridiculously cold showers in an effort to squeeze even more profits out of its clientele. manager gave some nonsense about the reason for turning down the dial. the area manager told me that it would be investigated. a day later it is colder than ever. nothing has been done.  mailbox to the bath, victoria gym is non operational. emails are bounced back. impossible to get through to puregym.

Review Title: I love the new Pure Gym in St Ives
Review: i love the new pure gym in st ives, cambs, i have attended on two consecutive nights with my son. the facility is so well equipped and spotlessly clean. my only suggestion in terms of feeling more comfortable as a woman visiting at night is about feeling safe. i would be happier if there  was a member of staff present but failing that it would be amazing if there introduced a buddy system that people could register for to enable them to bring a friend (member or non member maybe for nominal fee) in order to feel safe late in evening. also first night struggled to operate exit system and if in a hurry or worried i felt this difficulty leaving would make me uneasy. however on balance absolutely loved it.

Review Title: Long term member - run down gym and lack of care
Review: long term member - gym has been ran down for a while, spacious gym but the equipment choice is outdated, smaller gyms with less income have been refurbed before this one (aintree puregym or widnes as an example). lack of variety of equipment in comparison to these ie. plate loaded machines.  not sure whats taking so long but decided to finally leave until a face lift has been done and join the gym group across the road which has multiple of pretty much every machine, cheaper and more variety as well seeming to care more about their members (6 cable stacks just being 1 example) so youre never really waiting for anything.  put some money back into your busy gyms! itll help everyone from pts having members coming in and increasing revenue for themselves by getting new and returning clients, members having a better time training there and pure itself.

Review Title: The staff did not know how to talk to‚Ä¶
Review: the staff did not know how to talk to its clients the janitor was rude and told me she didn‚Äôt care that i lost my card(i simply asked her if she saw it and she said she threw it away because she didn‚Äôt care) although i understand i should take care of my belongings is that any way to talk to a client who has been going to this gym for years very disappointed,the toilets are also rank , sink smells like sulfer and eggs, weights are always scattered everywhere, studio is always taken up , always changing monthly prices higher , machines always broken and so on i only still go to this gym because me and my friends go together and it‚Äôs closest to my house . fix up
staff were fantastic, very friendly gym.

terrible service. quick to take my money for a pay as you go trial. never received a pin number to access the gym. emails been going back and forth showing bank statements. still not concluded 4weeks later‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..never again!
great quality experience and equipment. feel confident to do my own thing and not get judged
great gym , nice and clean and open 24-7
wery nice gym, good quality and you can get a towel if are a member.

Review Title: Always great to be back in Marylebone‚Ä¶
Review: always great to be back in marylebone gym. even at full capacity, there will be a corner where you can exercise and you will always friendly members ready to share space/equipment with you. friendly staff ready to encourage and help anyone in need.

Review Title: This gym used to be great to train in
Review: this gym used to be great to train in.  lately however, it is so overcrowded, machines are broken, people mess around on the gym and don‚Äôt train, the lower floor is still closed off and there are leaks everywhere when it rains which causes a smell in the gym. the changing rooms are not clean etc etc  what a shame when the pt‚Äôs are so great. what can anyone do when pg continue to put on offers that then lead to an overcrowded gym! people treat it badly, take so long on the machines, don‚Äôt put equipment back the list goes on‚Ä¶. it‚Äôs endless. i‚Äôve never had an issue with getting on equipment at certain times but this is now ridiculous. i have to train at that time as it‚Äôs when i pass after work.  also, the app no longer shows me how many people are in the gym. it‚Äôs a guessing game. it‚Äôs so disappointing for the regular gym-goers. i, along with others an considering to join a new gym‚Ä¶

Review Title: Despite there being maintenance at the‚Ä¶
Review: despite there being maintenance at the moment any disturbance is kept to a minimum. it is still a great workout experience ü§†

Review Title: I love this gym so much
Review: i love this gym so much. everyone who works there is lovely. the classes are great, availability is generally brilliant. aiysha the pt is excellent. would definitely recommend as a gym!
very friendly gym, loads of kit and always clean
the price is very good. the staff is friendly, the equipment is of good quality and the temperature and cleanliness are beyond perfect.
great gym! everythings brand new so obviously very nice.

great kit. friendly staff. clean environment but the loud music is seriously off-putting. most people are using headphones of some kind so lower the volume - not everyone needs it to be blasting out to enjoy a workout.

Review Title: The staff are very friendly and‚Ä¶
Review: the staff are very friendly and understanding i‚Äôve never been to a gym before and after my first visit i feel very welcomed by everyone, i look forward to my next session  ravenswood ipswich

i have been a member of this gym for a few weeks.  i initially chose it for location and value for money.  having used the facilities and met the staff i can now say it‚Äôs the best gym i have been to.  the staff are friendly and helpful, being disabled this means a lot.  i do not feel uncomfortable at all, the atmosphere is just what you want, other patrons get on with their workouts but are respectful and polite too.  the equipment is well maintained and i believe checked regularly, faults are quickly fixed.  the variety of equipment is good for everyone from beginners to the more seasoned gym goer.  the ladies changing room is always spotless and clean, as indeed is the equipment.  if you are looking for a gym in hemel hempstead, i cannot recommend this gym enough.  go for it!

Review Title: Great gym been a few times
Review: great gym been a few times, but get very busy with students from lincoln uni sometimes 4 people waiting to use the equipment

Review Title: I would like to provide some feedback‚Ä¶
Review: i would like to provide some feedback for puregym, as i have had an excellent experience with their facilities and services. one of the things that i appreciate most about puregym is their affordable price, which makes it accessible to a wide range of people. despite the low cost, the equipment is top-notch and always in good condition.  in addition to the equipment, i have also found the classes to be reasonable and well-taught. there is a wide variety of classes available, and the instructors are knowledgeable and encouraging.  overall, i am impressed with the value that puregym provides. the combination of affordable price, high-quality equipment, and excellent classes make it a great option for anyone looking to get in shape and maintain their fitness. i would definitely recommend puregym to anyone looking for a great gym experience at a reasonable price.

Review Title: A little more love to the branch
Review: gents changing rooms need improvement. you definitely should add a shampoo/body wash dispenser. nuffield has much better facilities in that regard. no water bottle filling machine, just the sport drinks but only for those who pay

great gym. the staff are super friendly. the manager sam & his team are always really efficient and happy to help with any issues around the gym. it‚Äôs clean and tidy and a really comfortable place to workout.

firstly need to apologise to the gentleman who saw me.  arrived to see if i could have a quick look around and was told no as a class was about to start and would take 45 minutes. i guess this is spent trying to get you to join. shame really i was in a positive mood to leave my current gym and potentially join.  but after that brief visit and the rubbish traffic to get there i need to remember the saying the grass is always greener. this is the not a reflection on the member of staff who looked awkward sending me away.
i visit this gym daily very friendly staff and other gym members. good selection of kit and lots of it

this gym could easily be 5*. and actually the gym is well equipped and the gym area is clean. the staff are friendly and approachable.  the issue with this gym is the shower area. it absolutely stinks of urnine. its not a faint smell, but an absolutely overpowering stench. at first i thought it was just the cubicle i was using. but all of the showers stink. ive only been twice, but i asked an old work colleague that i bumped in to and he said its always smelling. you need to stand outside the showers and turn them on just to wash away what evers on the shower base because they just arent clean. i tried messaging the gym instead of leaving a review but the facebook page doesnt help at all and the email on the broadstairs page doesnt go to them and all you get is a generic reply about emailing the gym manager, but when you follow the instructions it just gives you the same email as before. they really need to be disinfecting the showers a few times a day. and they need to make the local contact information easy to find.

Review Title: When I joined it said there was no‚Ä¶
Review: when i joined it said there was no joining fee. but i was charged for this. everytime i attended the gym, there was a notice on entry to say this gym was unstaffed. i would have thought there would be one staff member on reception at least during daytime hours.

Review Title: Facing the full length windows while on‚Ä¶
Review: facing the full length windows while on the cross trainers was brilliant regardless of the weather outside! now,  only treadmill face the windows. may as well brick yhem up! grrrr

the gym smells. as other people have written in here, the gym is not well ventilated and really smells. it was not like that a year or two ago. it makes you feel really uncomfortable. you guys got to do something about it. it is actually discussed between members in the gym during sessions how humid the atmosphere is and how bad it smells.

so this can be great as long as there isnt a class on. there are a couple of gym instructors who turn the music up so loud you cant even hear your headphones. i have politely asked a couple of time if they could turn it down but generally the response is pretty rude. this morning an instructor was particularly unpleasant hence the negative review. a couple of other people were going to approach him as well however having seen the response i got decided against it.

i‚Äôm a new member at pure gym and today was my first gym sesh there. i was surprised at how clean and organised everything was set out. i participated in rebecca jones pump and burn it (hiit) class and they both were amazing. the energy and vibe was 10/10. rebecca had us working every muscle and i‚Äôm sure i can speak for every one in the class we burned and sweated a lot! a great way to start my weekend! thank you rebecca, i will defo be back next week!

Review Title: My experience is excellent all the time because this GYM LISTENS.‚Ä¶
Review: my experience is excellent all the time because fitness is a number one priority in my "life".pure gym staff at kirkcaldy saved my life,now i have a "life".pure gym staff at kirkcaldy tick all the right boxes,i wouldnt change a thing about the staffs efforts.excellent work,alot of staff should get promoted,but thats just my opinion.

Review Title: Don't buy PT sessions in advance
Review: dont buy pt sessions in advance see response from puregym after the pt carl b. left the business with my money and probably other clients money, they wont get involved, thats what you wont be told when you sign up. this is to raise awareness.  i apologise i wasnt aware of a minimum amount to proceed with the small claims court.    although i understand this is an unfortunate situation, we would be unable to offer a refund as we are not liable for monies exchanged between a client and a personal trainer.    with regard to your question around recruitment, we do carry out relevant criminal record checks aswell as requesting references to build up both a professional and character reference.
friendly and welcoming environment. dont feel judged there.

hello.  im having a problem canceling my subscription.  this month i decided that puregym is not for me.  i enrolled at the gym and went to train 2 or 3 times and the gym was always full.  since then i decided not to continue anymore.  i looked several times in the app how to cancel the plan and i didnt find any option to do that so i withdrew the balance from my account that i had registered in the app so as not to do the automatic renewal.  when the renewal date arrived as there was no balance i believed the subscription was automatically canceled but today ¬£46.99 was debited from my account.i would like this amount to be refunded and my subscription finally canceled and i also request puregym to correct the app to make the cancellation easier for the customer and to insert a customer service field.  so you avoided new complaints like this.  have a great day!i believe that if it was not debited on the date it should already be cancelled.  do you understand that this is a glitch in your system?  i kindly request that my account be refunded the amount of ¬£46.99 debited to my account.

Review Title: If you switch from another gym

Review Title: please repair the showers in the ladies‚Ä¶

i love this gym, there is a great range of equipment and classes and its always clean. i have been having sessions with personal trainer babi and it was the best decision ive ever made, babi has helped me to lose nearly 1 stone in 6 weeks, she has kept me motivated and helped me with nutritional advice, the sessions are always different so they never get boring and there is a great range of different excercises. my next goal is to get stronger and build more muscle and babi knows exactly how to get me there! having the sessions has had a positive impact on every part of my life, not only am i slimmer and getting stronger but i am also more confident, happier, sleeping and eating better and feeling so much healthier in myself. if your unsure about the gym or how to get started as i was then i highly recommend babi, she is very experienced and will help you every step of the way whatever your goals are.

Review Title: ‚ÄúSmartParking‚Äù PCN received and unable to contact anyone!!!
Review: ‚Äúsmartparking‚Äù is very negative. i rejoined puregym nov 22 and hadn‚Äôt realised that i needed to register my number plate when i visited the gym. i tried to appeal the fine, but this was extremely difficult and frustrating as it was impossible to load supporting evidence (photos) to their claim site. it was also impossible to phone them about this! i have received a ¬£170 to park at your gym and is quite a disincentive for a simple error!!!! i am extremely unhappy about this, and they have now taken the parking charge to a debt recovery company. i would like to speak to the billericay manager, but i cannot find the details please help urgently!!!

Review Title: PureGym - Stratford‚Äôs newest teenager social club
Review: i have been using this puregym since it opened in december and i‚Äôll definitely echo some of the points raised in other reviews.  mainly, teenagers - after about 5pm on weekdays this place is a social club/hangout for 15-18s.. i know some of them are under 16 because of my job. i‚Äôm not sure what can be done to rectify this now because they have their memberships but i know people who aren‚Äôt going back there because of this having signed up, i‚Äôm going to do the same.  lots of the lads can be quite annoying, poor etiquette, hogging machines, being silly (i‚Äôve witnessed 4 boys rolling on the floor sparring and play fighting upstairs), some derogatory about other gym users and the girls tend to just wander around in pairs.. my advice would be go after 9pm, weekends before 10am or weekdays early morning or during the day on school days.  on the other hand the gym is well kitted out, you have room to work out on the floor if needed, good stock of weights and helpful staff.

the gym equipment and staff are high quality.  there is no shouting or really loud music in the gym and the gym is big enough so that even at its busiest times you can still find the eqipment you want to sork out on.  the icing on the cake is that it is near to where i live.  walking distance.
always a great welcoming vibe. attentive staff always on hand. good quality and selection of equipment and availability. changing rooms and facilities well maintained. keep up the great work!
decent gym well equipped with easy to use modern equipment...

the customer service for puregym is genuinely something to behold. i just want to change gym. im happy to upgrade to plus. yet, when i try to do this, the website is unresponsive, the help pages route me right back to the unresponsive pages, and the only way to speak to someone is...via social media? are you saying i have to make a twitter account just to get basic customer service?  no. this isnt acceptable. ive always had a decent experience with puregym venue and such. but when you have a problem, theyre subpar at best.

very good gym, good equipment and loose weights, friendly staff. only complaint is the ground floor temperature. the other day it was freezing outside and they had the aircon on cooling - why ?? it was far too cold and people were wearing fleeces whilst training

Review Title: I did a cycle class this morning
Review: i did a cycle class this morning and after legs bums and tums class . both with instructor samantha. she is a very good instructor and is always helpful and happy. she always makes her classes enjoyable. and she is easy to approach if you need advice etc. and saying that all instructors at the gym are easy to approach if you need advice etc.

changing room facilities are unpleasant, especially in the cold weather.....no heating and cold showers. the lack of heating in minus temperatures was awful to the point you had to warm yourself up with the hairdryers, but you could at least have a hot shower. two weeks ago the shower temperatures were turned down so you cant even get a hot shower anymore. if youre wanting to use a gym with hot shower facilities i would not recommend puregym at all.  update: 21/03/23 thanks for the reply, however i have already spoken to the gym manager at fareham and was advised nothing can be done due this being a company wide scheme being rolled out across all gyms. the suggestion was to write a review. going round in circles!

Review Title: Great gym and fair range of clases
Review: great gym and fair range of clases. clean and orderly gym. i was most impressed with the class i did - the friendly and knowledgeable instructor ensured my moves were safe and effective

its an okay gym, but its now becoming overcrowded in the mornings to the point its impossible to complete a full weight workout, machines are constantly out of order and stay that way for months & the broken lockers far out number the working ones. it never used to be like this 4 or 5 years ago byut starting to become worse and worse.

Review Title: i went to Pure Gym Moston yesterday‚Ä¶
Review: i went to pure gym moston yesterday morning. the one and only assault bike was broken, the seat was all over the place and had no computer. there are only 2 ski ergs and both of them were broken and not usable. there was 4 stairmasters and 3 of them were unusable, 1 of them since december. there is countless other pieces of equipment not in use and broken. this is not acceptable and to be honest a disgrace. i understand that it was a sunday and some can break whilst the gym is unmanned but most of the above has been like it for weeks if not months. i have tried to send messages to the gym or to puregym about this being rectified but the complaints side of things is almost impossible. i am on hyrox programme and need these pieces of equipment and want to know when these will be sorted before i choose to take my custom elsewhere.

its a brilliant gym. the monthly membership is the cheapest ive seen. its very clean and has a huge variety of weights, machines and equipment. the staff are always helpful and welcoming.  what would be good though is adding an extra couple of changing cubicles in the ladies changing room. there is only one and most of the time ive been there its occupied.

staff make an effort to bring a positive atmosphere to the gym e.g. they decorate for special days/events and often have useful guests visiting e.g. prostate awareness, free health checks etc.  i‚Äôve also not had any issues with lack of equipment etc & it‚Äôs a pretty spacious gym also.

Review Title: No cleaning stations in the gym‚Ä¶
Review: no cleaning stations in the gym whatsoever‚Ä¶.nothing worse than going to use a weight bench and you‚Äôre presented with a nice sweaty greasy stain on the bench‚Ä¶..no wi-fi either, unlike other puregym‚Äôs

Review Title: Great gym with great friendly people
Review: great gym with great friendly people both working there and using the gym always up for a work in. i have personally made some nice acquaintances and learned a lot.  if you want a good spin class i would go with babi, great tunes with good energy (and great at the bottle flip).  if you want to be worked to the full potential from my experience then go with karl.

Review: great gym equipment great free weights. great atmosphere, very clean and showers could be a little hotter üòÇ but overall a great gym and would recommend to anyone. one thing that would make it would be a boxing bag or some sort of punch/kick area.

Review: stopped being a member at the gym. never cleaned properly, equipment always broke and staff eating mcdonald‚Äôs in the gym.
great gym, people are nice. staff are friendly. gym is clean, good selection of equipment. it‚Äôs always clean and tidy.

Review Title: The 24 hour gym access is paramount for‚Ä¶
Review: the 24 hour gym access is paramount for those like myself who work erratic hours and who may want to go when less people are there. the array of equipment, number of free weights/plates is ideal for the usual busier times. everyone who i have spoke to in the late, very early and early afternoon hours have been friendly. be it asking to "borrow" some of their weight plates or asking when theyre done on a particular piece of equipment.

honestly, the main reason i attend this gym is for the women‚Äôs only section. unfortunately, they don‚Äôt pay attention to any complaints raised - i.e no air conditioning for three days straight, which i can understand if it was faulty or an error but i was ignored when i raised this in an email. ‚Ä®‚Ä®also it‚Äôs very under equipped. you can tell that the focus is on the main gym and the woman‚Äôs only gym is just there which is actually borderline misogynistic and super inconsiderate. ‚Ä®‚Ä®it‚Äôs a shame because i do like the gym in general in terms of cleanliness, but the lack of attention paid to the women‚Äôs only section is quite unfortunate.

Review Title: Well equipped gym rooms designed to‚Ä¶
Review: well equipped gym rooms designed to perform variety of workouts. pleasant atmosphere, friendly environment, great music throughout.

i‚Äôve been training with robbie doing his boxercise classes and i have loved every session. the guy always comes with good energy, good vibes, the motivation levels and that determination to push progress and werk! absolutely loving it having done only 3 sessions so far and looking forward to making these sessions a permanent part of my cardio regime.

pure gym has a relaxed, safe environment 24/7 with ample reliable modern equipment, a cool temperature, lots of space in off-peak hours with friendly staff. always a positive experience and always makes me feel better.

4 stars is for the gym. ill avoid all the usual things and talk about maintenance. i reported the broken lights in the mens changing room about 6 weeks ago. i have reported this to the manager twice now as well as most of the shower door locks being broken for a similar amount of time. the manager assures me they are still awaiting the maintenance team to visit and carry out repairs. whoever is in charge of maintenance is doing a seriously pitiful job. its just 2 light fittings but casts half the lockers into darkness making it difficult to read your combination lock.

Review Title: great classes, very motivating highly recommend.
Review: i havent been a member of puregym widnes for long but the classes i have enjoyed a lot are kirstys step class, marks legs bums and tums and james cycle, every class has been great and motivating would highly recommend.
winter is over, stop saving on aircon. there is nothing to breathe inside.

Review Title: This is an excellent gym in some aspects..!
Review: this is an excellent gym in some respects. equipment is excellent quality (precor & blkbox) and there is a good range of equipment available. all the equipment is reasonably new and the staff do a good job of keeping the gym clean and organised. i have a few issues with puregym abbey wood however‚Ä¶ firstly the gym is often absolutely packed to the point where you‚Äôre questioning safety. the gym is heaving in the evenings and it‚Äôs extremely difficult to follow any kind of structured program without having to adapt a lot depending on what‚Äôs free. showers are a horror show, the individual cubicles are the harbingers of hair, plasters etc..  obviously this is in part due to (selfish) people having no respect for the facilities (or other gym goers) but also down to poor design. i don‚Äôt personally think this is down to lack of cleaning, just poor design. my last issue is that when equipment breaks (which is inevitable) it takes a long time (1 month+) to get it fixed.

Review Title: Variety of equipment to choose from‚Ä¶
Review: variety of equipment to choose from including, access to the gym studio, not to busy at that time 14:00, so i could get on with my workout with out having to wait. the gym is clean and friendly, parking can be a bit of an issue.

Review Title: You are not allowed to miss a payment‚Ä¶

Review Title: Ever since I joined pure gym
Review: ever since i joined pure gym, it‚Äôs been an absolutely fascinating environment. it‚Äôs always well kept and tidy with all equipments arranged to be in the proper place. the staffs / instructors are always very much around and active at the same time. everyone around the gym is friendly and people are most likely ready to support you if you need any words of advice or assistance. the rest rooms are great and well kept as well. my only problem lately will be for the gym to improve the heating conditions because sometimes inside the gym is way too cold due to the winter weather, perhaps more atmosphere heaters can be installed to at least reduce the cold temperatures inside the gym. overall, pure gym is very nice and great. all the ones i have used in manchester have never gone below par. cheers.

Review Title: The ladies toilets were in a bad state
Review: the ladies toilets were in a bad state. wet floor no hazard sign. the toilets were so dirty with faeces all over the underneath the toilet pans. it appears that they have not been cleaned for a while. the sinks look a lot to be desired, no hand wash with hairs around the sink.  i mentioned it to a member of staff who said he will get a cleaner to come round.

Review Title: the equipment is not good enough
Review: i am an elite level powerlifter and love this puregym and the community of lifters within it however ive been to many other local gyms and the equipment just cant compete with them ive spoken to many other who just lift for fun and they all agree that the equipment elsewhere is better and they only go because its closer but many of us are considering switching to other gyms with better equipment and thats not just powerlifters but normal people who just want to lose weight or get a but of muscle

Review: my sister and i have a personal trainer (liam) every monday and every week he changes our set so we are never bored and we are already noticing a difference in our health , shape and our weight. i would recommend anyone starting out to take up liam as a personal trainer we‚Äôd be lost without him, thanks liam

i went to 2 of billys classes today( pump and strenght 30) and they were great. very attentive to everyone, smiling, and helps you with anything you need. i highly recommend his classes! i will definitely come back!! thank you billy

amazing gym amazlng classes amazing staff  personally loving the classes with alan  all in all i wish there was a 20 on this gauge that‚Äôs much i love pure gym brunswick

pure gym broadstairs, what can i say, well its a fantastically modern and well equipped gym, with excellent staff, classes and facilities, its open 24 hours , 365 days a year . theres an app which is great for making bookings for classes up to eight days in advance, and theres plenty of free parking outside too which is a bonus! one happy customer here üòÅüëç

Review Title: The staff are friendly and attended
Review: the staff are friendly and attended. the equipment its in a good condition, also with good space. showers and lockers always clean. i love it in general.

i have been coming to the classes for about a year and absolutely love it. i had never set foot in a gym before this but the classes have made me learn exercises and techniques. so if you are a beginner never be afraid as everyone is there to support one another!  all the staff are so friendly and chatty and its so lovely to have such a great community. i cannot praise the gym more highly!  gordon windebank (personal trainer) does such fabulous classes. he really pushes you as far as you can and motivates you to achieve your goals that you didnt think you were capable of. he really makes sure that his classes are varied and goes around helping with technique. his boxfit, circuits, spin are lots of fun and he is always so happy to tailor exercises depending on your needs. he is really approachable, supportive and gives you time to ask questions and have a laugh! i am so grateful for his help. thank you!  jamal is another personal trainer who does really great classes. he ensures that everyone is motivated and also ensures that everyones technique is perfect by checking on everyone individually. he does lots of the super early classes and is always full of energy and so positive! thank you so much.
the whole experience was great, really enjoyed the whole experience, parking, staff, class workout. the trainer marie was very good.

i mostly book into kays classes because they‚Äôre super motivational and make exercise fun. i recently started pt with him, and feeling so much fitter and stronger, he‚Äôs a really great trainer and super friendly üí™üèº
i love the step class - i try and go as often as i can! sarah, the instructor, is amazing and has so much energy! would highly recommend taking part in one of her classes!

Review Title: The staff are helpful and friendly but‚Ä¶

amazingly good leg session with chantelle today really felt the burn and pushed all the way through the reps. highly recommended for a one to one session with her if your looking to get the most out of your gym goals.

the east end road branch has good vibes. everyone is there to do their workout. fantastic classes all throughout the day which is fantastic, and a vast variety. literally spoilt for choice. i have nothing negative to say, i have been a member since january 2023, wish i had become a member sooner.

Review Title: Used to be great. Needs an update, lacking in comparison to other gyms in the area.
Review: been going to this gym over 18 months and sadly, its going downhill. i dont know if theres a suggestion box, but know a few (especially female) members are feeling the same recently.  the weights area needs an update, especially in comparison to other puregyms and gyms in the area. theres two squat racks, one powerlifting platform, and two smith machines but understandably theyre very popular. theres only four 6ft barbells but they belong to the two squat racks, one powerlifting platform, and one bench press, so you feel bad stealing them. plates are hard to find and usually all over the place. the smith machines are ancient, they don‚Äôt even go all the way to the ground.  theres no hip thrust machine like other gyms or any space if you want to hip thrust or deadlift away from a squat rack. youd literally just be in the middle of the space and in the way. even if they invested in a hip thrust bench and barbell pad it would be better than nothing.  womens section has nothing in it but cardio and abductor machines. if the two spaces by the mirrors and two benches are taken, loads of women just have to workout in the middle of the room because theres a big ab mat holder in the only other decent space.  it has the potential to be an amazing gym but needs to be looked after a bit better, definitely falling behind. lately, there has been 50+ people in there from 7-10am, so gets quite busy which is great for peoples wellness but difficult for space. would be great if staff could consider updating equipment/layout.
this gym was fantastic in helping me build my confidence and strength- especially grace who‚Äôs classes are always fun and engaging!

Review Title: Great gym, only a few issues.
Review: its great that the gym is open all the time, and you dont need to book, it makes fitting in a session much easier. equipment is good, with plenty available. there is lots of space around the machines so you never feel crowded when lifting. my only issue is with the showers. you cant set the temperature and i sometimes like a cold shower after a workout. also they can get grubby later a night. perhaps if they were cleaned just before the staff left, as they are open after the staff leave at 10pm (i think) until 12am when they are locked till 3am.
preston pure gym has a lot choice of fitness classes. the gym is clean & the staff are friendly.

Review Title: Equipment broke in my one and could‚Ä¶
Review: equipment broke in my one and could have saunus

male showers not working again. probably 5th time in the last 6 months and this time its been going on for over a week. i e-mailed members service, their suggestion is they can cancel my membership if im not happy. i wonder why they feel customers of a certain demographic are not worth respecting. maybe if it was another branch in shoreditch for example with certain customer base they would get more professional service.

i have to echo another review on here, i have had few pleasurable experiences at this gym as it‚Äôs constantly filled with 14/15 year olds, you say staff have the right to ask anyone they believe to be under the age of 16 for id, but today at 4pm there were large groups of children in school uniforms roaming around, play fighting, hanging around in groups round the equipment, while i was running on the treadmill upstairs, two girls were on one treadmill filming themselves messing around on all the equipment. really disappointing but if ages aren‚Äôt being challenged and kids are allowed to play on equipment then i think i‚Äôll be going to a different gym in future, which is a shame because the equipment, staff, classes and facilities are all brilliant! would just like to complete a workout without feeling i‚Äôm back in a secondary school playground‚Ä¶

terrible. two weeks of being pushed between two departments. trying to give notice to cancel my membership. given a refund figure and still no refund and now the refund figure has reduced. shocking customer service.. no clear complaints procedure.. no one to talk to just awful!! note added after puregym 16/03/23 08:50pmhollow words!! after begging for info on their complaints procedure i am still waiting!!! shocking.  problem still not resolved.... and still awaiting refund arghhhhhh   ps if i could have give 0 stars i would have

dirty gym, showers have mould al up them, showers stink of sewerage, the mens bathroom goes days without being cleaned i no because there was a snot stuck on the urinal for about 4 days. taps dont work properly, the vitamin water half the time is only water not the flavour, theres a certain member of staff that teachers incorrectly and the client could have injured her knees, theres much more i could say, they charging 15quid for a resubmission of payment. i started a new job got paid days late which i explained on email they still wasnt willing to waive the resubmission so i cancelled it. gyms dirty and rubbish what a waste of money

Review Title: Removal of cleaning supplies but increase in membership fee...
Review: i am really disappointed at the removal of the cleaning station on the ground floor. only one paper towel dispenser has been left at the far end by the free weights. it is insufficient for everyone that uses the equipment on that level and shows no consideration for anyone using the cardio equipment. not to mention can be quite an assault course to grab a paper towel and get back to the other end whilst trying not to disturb, trip over or get hit by people in the middle of their own workouts (the folks using the free weights are by no means in the wrong). i imagine they are just as annoyed by having to watch out for the increased foot traffic.  having asked a few friends who use pure gyms elsewhere ive found this seems to be a hq directive which baffles me. yes covid is now much less of a concern but surely that should have proven how important cleanliness and hygiene is. removing right after announcing a price increase too, not a great look.  please rethink this. its so important to have the ability to clean equipment before and after use.  the gym itself is ok, during peak times there are queues for equipment but nothing i wouldnt expect elsewhere and the staff are very helpful. if i was rating just in those areas my rating would be much higher.

Review Title: The staff at canary wharf PG are amazing
Review: the staff at canary wharf pure gym are so helpful! marina is amazing and her classes make you push yourself while having fun! her classes have helped me stick to going to the gym!  wesley & sara are also very helpful and have great classes. i would recommend pure gym canary wharf to my friends!  im so glad the opening hours have gone back to 24hrs!!

Review Title: Pure Gym just seem to have established‚Ä¶
Review: pure gym just seem to have established a gym thats been missing on the high street which offers great easy and flexible access along with well structured fitness classes.

Review Title: Today the took out the cleaning station‚Ä¶
Review: today the took out the cleaning station downstairs. when i asked the instructor, he said said policy and they still have them upstairs. almost a lie, as the cleaning stations upstairs were empty.  please note there are still 27,000 weekly infections of covid, 6-700 deaths every week in the uk ( covid19 dot who dot int/region/euro/country/gb).  bad policy, what happened to your ad/announcement blasting through the changing rooms, "clean, safe, cleaning stations everywhere, open to everyone, no matter if you are young, old, blah, blah blah.  plus hand-dryer in bathroom broken. accessible toilet in hallway broken. running machines right underneath metal bars upstairs.  another announcement saying gym is now closed, when its still going to be open for 3 hours.  plus telling me they‚Äôll charge me same when i did sign up again, then charge 31.99 instead of the 24.99 before. just found out now, after being charged that amount for how long?  then want to cancel, only see a freeze for membership option in your members area; unbelievable...  what a dump.  peter

Review Title: clean friendly atmosphere with lots of‚Ä¶
Review: clean friendly atmosphere with lots of equipment

i was very pleased to join this gym as it was very close to where i live and this is why i joined. having used quite a few gyms around london , i think it will be really appreciated if you can make the following changes/improvements 1. there are not enough slots for induction. the max people on induction is 2. i am sure that up to 8 people will be fine. 2. improve hygiene standards in the gym. there are no disinfectant spray and blue roll or hygiene wipes around. unfortunately people sweat a lot and there is no means to clean somebodys else sweat before i use an equipment 3. hygiene in the toilet are really bad. please improve 4. the hand dryer in the toilet doesnt work. i need to press the switch on the wall and the switch off the wall with wet hands. health & safety! 5. the floor on the main gym areas is full of dust , i am sure the cleaners can do better. people leave behind their empty bottles and the next day there are still there. 6. your gym classes luck power and the music on these classes do not match the tempo of the class. 7. please fix the assisted chin and dip equipment, so many people would like to use it but they cant. 8. the members of staff are not helpful when i ask them questions and they never smile. 9. your address says london stratford and then stratford upon avon ( miles away!)

Review Title: The best gym I go in the last 6 years

Review: my son has been at the gym for months and parks at the car park which is used for the gym and puts a ticket from the gym in his car every time. there is a new company covering the car park and putting parking tickets on lots of cars using the gym. is this car park still available for gym users and are you aware of this company putting tickets on your members cars. as i think you will be losing a lot of business over this and you stated this car park was free to use while using your gym.

Review Title: Please review who is running classes
Review: recently joined and have been attending classes, majority of which run by ed or chloe and have been great, two really enthusiastic, knowledgeable and supportive trainers. however, have had three classes with chantelle and all have been disappointing.  no motivation from her, stood in the corner clock watching, not participating in the class or even demonstrating the exercises, which does not make you feel either confident or safe, she also forgets how many sets of an exercise we have done and the classes have really repetitive exercises.  it‚Äôs pretty obvious that she is not interested in running classes and only interested in being a pt with her own clients.  general consensus from this mornings class which she changed from pump to burn it at the last minute, was that we wouldn‚Äôt be booking onto another class run by chantelle in the future. which is a real shame as generally the gym is very friendly and seems to have a good mix of people attending classes.

before the refurbishment started the gym was very open and well lighted and a positive place to be after going last night the gym is still half closed off with free weights now upstairs in a small workout area with black walls and zero lighting making it very depressing.. accidents will happen due to poor lighting and how cluttered it is and thats when no one but myself was in there if this is the new look they are going for then i will be going else where as lighting in a gym is important.
