training and equipment-wise, this is one of the best puregyms ive been to  but there is a persistent problem of cleanliness in the mens changing rooms. same issue day after day, and that is there is a really strong dried urine smell. this isnt new, since there are reviews going back months and years complaining about this.  something is therefore going wrong with the management of the gym here. either the place isnt being cleaned properly (in which case management need to action this and change the way cleaning is supervised). or there is a structural problem with the plumbing drainage, meaning things are leaking back into the room (in which case management need to get onto hq or regional managers to fund proper estate maintenance). its been going on just too long. im not very fussy about cleanliness (ive trained in dirty gyms in asia). but i work in healthcare and do homevisits and the smell of the mens changing room is as bad as the home of a vulnerable elderly person who has fallen into severe self-neglect. this sort of smell should not be in a busy modern uk gym, day after day, month after month

i‚Äôve only been a member here for three weeks but i‚Äôm loving it so far. the app is great. the gym is really clean. friendly and helpful staff. the best thing is the selection of classes. i love doing classes and puregym has loads of classes at lots of different times of the day so there‚Äôs something to suit everyone. the best class by far is body tone with rahul aubeeluck on friday evenings. it‚Äôs a really intense session but gives a fantastic full body workout with weights with lots of options for everyone. he works us hard but he‚Äôs so polite (i‚Äôve never heard a fitness instructor say please so often), the music is great for the style of class too. the tempo fits really well with lifting weights. i‚Äôve tried a bunch of other classes too and they‚Äôve all been fab: cycle, pilates, yoga, dance, & pump. one thing that really stands out is that all the instructors take the time to make sure they include a warm up at the beginning and some time to stretch at the end of each class. this isn‚Äôt always the case at other local gym classes. the only downside is that i miss having a swimming pool at the gym but there are several great pay as you go pools nearby. i haven‚Äôt really tried any of the machines etc yet but will definitely be using the treadmills on rainy long run days. one day i might get brave enough to do some dead lifts in the weights room!

Review Title: For the price I think the gym could be‚Ä¶
Review: for the price i think the gym could be bigger and have more weight machines such as more squat racks and a hip thrust machine and more space for people to use free weights. there is currently only 2 squat racks in a gym in the city centre which is not ideal.

Review Title: Hygiene stations are essential‚Ä¶ and not because of covid!
Review: gym is great - good range of kit and never too busy, always feel welcome and great atmosphere. my only complaint is there are no hygiene/wipe down stations, not nice to either leave kit sweaty or know your using a machine after someone else has sweated all over it and not been able to give it a wipe down!  **edit** i‚Äôve lowered my rating as i don‚Äôt get how such a big chain can get something as simple as hygiene and cleanliness so wrong‚Ä¶ it isn‚Äôt covid measures that makes having hygiene stations essential, but general gym etiquette! i haven‚Äôt seen a cleaner wiping down kit after every use to remove the last users sweat‚Ä¶ in fact i haven‚Äôt seen a cleaner on the premises any of the evenings i‚Äôve been to the gym this week?

Review Title: Today was my first visit to my local‚Ä¶
Review: today was my first visit to my local gym. i was made to feel very welcome the staff were extremely helpful and polite. the gym was very well equipped and all equipment very clean. i liked the idea that the cardio equipment is energy efficient. yes on the whole a very good  afternoon had by me...looking forward to my visit tomorrow!

Review Title: Generally good but needs more equipment

Review Title: Dont waste your time or money

Review Title: The staff are super motivating and‚Ä¶

Review Title: not enough classes after 5pm when most‚Ä¶
Review: not enough classes after 5pm when most people can come, gym is too hot.

i went to puregym from december 2022 to the end of january 2023. the set up is good, the machines are great, the membership is easy to manage and was handy for adding a buddy. my problem was one evening a man was staring at me, he wasnt using the machines he just followed me from machine to machine staring. i tried to notify a staff member and the gym was currently unstaffed. i told a pt who happened to be there she asked if it was that guy and i said yes and she said ill tell the manager again. dont get me wrong its a good gym just not for women who workout alone.

the gym is quite big with plenty of facilities. however, there are too many people at peak times. i think it might be better if puregym could do real-time stats on the crowdedness of the current time. besides, it is kinda usually there some of the components of the facilities are missing. i have met several times about that situation. considering price, it is kinda fair price so could not expect too much.
lockers are broken, the changing rooms are dirty

Review Title: I like the fact I can use their gyms in‚Ä¶

Review Title: Hoxton Gym - it‚Äôs a lottery as to when it‚Äôs open!
Review: this gym has been closed for 4 days in feb and was closed for a couple of days in jan due to plumbing. it is constantly closed for a day to ‚Äúfix‚Äù the problem and when it isn‚Äôt closed the changing rooms are out of service causing clients to use the outside lockers.  this wouldn‚Äôt be a problem if you had sufficient space!  however, not everybody comes to a gym in their workout clothes.  what would be helpful is if you had a clothes rack behind the small reception area and handed out tickets like a cloakroom so that people knew their stuff was relatively safe.  your employees suggested that i leave my bag and coat ‚Äúnear‚Äù the lockers or underneath as all of them were full!  this is a great idea, when you clearly don‚Äôt accept any responsibility for theft!!  please look at installing decent plumbing and not just using a drainage company to clear the backlog every other week.  it seems that it takes forever and a day for you to sort out any problems, it took about 6 months just to get wifi set up, and the current ‚Äúsolution‚Äù is pretty shambolic.

it‚Äôs a large, spacious gym with new equipment, albeit some are already not working. (new gym) it‚Äôs very busy 5-7pm and you often have to wait for popular equipment and the parking is a nightmare then too. if you go outside of these times it‚Äôs fine. classes are varied and frequent and the instructors are friendly. only gripe is the aircon. it‚Äôs not cool enough. keep mentioning it and no change

Review Title: Toilets could be cleaner and a water‚Ä¶

Review Title: Lack of gym classes before 9am and if‚Ä¶
Review: lack of gym classes before 9am and if they do have them they get cancelled.

went to gym on 13/2, called into work and left my gym bag in the locker as i intended to come back. unfortunately i had to stay at work due to an emergency so didn‚Äôt get back to the gym until today. after my work out i went back to change and found that tom the manager had cut my padlock off and packed my stuff into a plastic bag. i was told that the lockers can‚Äôt be used for storage and after explaining to tom what happened and it wasn‚Äôt intentional, he really didn‚Äôt care, was completely unsympathetic and was not prepared to give me the benefit of doubt and just kept quoting the rules. i‚Äôve been going to your gyms for years and have never seen any signs in any of the changing rooms informing members that their padlocks would be cut and their personal belongs removed if their stuff was left in the locker overnight. anywhere else would display notices and post a warning on the locker informing members what they would do. this is wilful damage to my property and will cost me money to replace, how can this be fair????

Review Title: The gym is an absolute mess
Review: the gym is an absolute mess! filthy gym , the machines look like they never get wiped down as every time i use a machine they are full of dust and grime. the floor around the machines looks like it never gets a hoover let alone a mop. my treadmill and step mill is always full of rubbish  full of  old paper towel and wrappers. one of the treadmills (the one on the left )stops working if you put the speed up high. the dumbbell area is very dirty, underneath each dumbbell is full of bits and dirt! ive seen other gyms use a steam cleaner on the dumbbell area or maybe just a wipe down would be ok. not enough machines for the volume of members. having one seated leg extension and one hamstring curl isnt good enough. the gym needs more cables as they are very busy and there isnt enough to go round. likewise having just one pec dec machine is ridiculous considering how busy the gym gets , need at least 2_3 of them. since i joined ive noticed a very bad smell near the handwash sink in the mens toilet, this smell is always there not sure if its a blockage or something. i only use this gym as its 2 mins from my daughters school and is handy after school run otherwise i wouldnt train there. before pure gym i trained at the gym group on kingsbury road and they are head and shoulders above pure gym in terms of cleanliness.
helpful staff and very well laid out, very clean environment highly recommend

Review Title: Dont work for or at Pure gym...
Review: as an instructor at pure gym milton keynes winterhill, i find it appalling how i am being mistreated - being ignored when messaging or trying to contact both managers, no response. i have to chase them up literally to try get them to talk to me and sometimes they run off to the changing rooms or toilets to avoid me when i walk into the gym unexpectedly..  the managers cancelled my class with no reason, just because i tried to change the times of my classes due to other work duties that i have, i find this absolutey shocking and unprofessional as this defiantly wasnt my request!!!!!  i havent been properly getting paid for my classes since december, they owe me a lot of money and still not been paid for all my classes yet which i teach weekly..  im truly disgusted with this behavior and lack of professionalism at pure gym in how they take advantage of their freelancers...
well structured
perfect gym, perfect staff, thats all...
clean. we‚Äôll monitored activity and open 24/7.

there is not a lot of weight int this gym for when it is busy especially seeing it is early in the year and is busier than normal. the gym is also regularly shut because of its plumbing backing up i pay for a 24hour gym but don‚Äôt have access to that gym at least once a week but becoming more regular now so now more like 2/3 times a week. they give me access to other gyms for that time but i chose this gym for a reason that being it‚Äôs the closest to me and is convenient. and because everyone at hoxton has been given access to those two gyms they are then extremely busy this is not what i‚Äôm paying for.

Review Title: I've been a member of PureGym on and‚Ä¶
Review: ive been a member of puregym on and off since 2016, overall cant fault them at all gyms are adequately equipped and kept clean and tidy. staff are always friendly and happy to help.  only reason i cant give 5* is the discrepancy in facilities from gym to gym. for instance the urban exchange (manchester) gym is fantastic and its changing facilities really up to a good standard. market street by comparison is incredibly dated, the lockers are almost all broken or locked (can we not get the locks cut off on the lockers that are never available this must be a security issue allowing people to leave whatever they see fit in the gym day in day out), the showers are equally dated and only stay on for 5-6 seconds a time, lack of decent mirrors in the changing room for progress pics compared to other gyms (it has a huge empty wall between the first and second changing area would benefit greatly from a 2m x 1m mirror panel.

Review Title: Spacious and comfortable place for work‚Ä¶
Review: spacious and comfortable place for work outs.

firstly, whenever someone posts an issue why do you insist members speak to the gym manager. this defeats the point of providing feedback. why do the club managers review the feedback posted and respond like they could before you moved feedback to trustpilot. my feedback consists of 3 points;  1. personal trainers not wearing uniform. had the policy changed, i thought they had to be in puregym uniform when training clients. i have recently observed several pts wearing their own clothing when training their clients. i think they should be in uniform especially if you still have a policy of non puregym pt staff not allowed to train clients in the gym.  2. pts not returning equipment. i have flagged this over the years. they should lead by example. i recently saw a pt get a step from the studio and use on the main floor with client and failed to return at the end. this is very frustrating.  3. more often than not the cleaning stations are overflowing, this morning at 7pm the bins were overflowing, only 1 dispenser had paper towels and only 1 spray had the cleaning solution. this is unacceptable. they should be cleaned and refilled at the end of the day.

Review Title: Genuinely never thought I'd be one to‚Ä¶

Review: trainers are great and make the classes fun.  good selection of kit in the gym too.

Review Title: I joined pure gym last year and resumed‚Ä¶
Review: i joined pure gym last year and resumed my membership again this year. i really went for the classes as i enjoyed them and the instructors were motivating, (mainly spin class). however, since coming back this year i have found the new instructors very disengaged and not wanting to be there on two occasions. it really put me off the class and i found it very demotivating. overall i enjoy puregym, the equipment is great
great place, accepting, social + supportive

Review Title: I‚Äôve had some great workouts at PureGym‚Ä¶
Review: i‚Äôve had some great workouts at puregym camberley. elizabeth is a brilliant instructor and has always been so helpful when i‚Äôve asked for fitness tips and advice.

what has happened to this once great company? where to start. reduced operating hours, deteriorating equipment, filthy changing rooms, poor customer service and substantial fees now charged for missed/late payment. all while charging 80% more now than 10 years ago. i once recommended this company to all my friends as being incredible in all the departments i now criticised above. it seems that puregym is now being run on the basis of a financial spreadsheet and the care they once had for their members is now a distant memory. really sad to see this and it‚Äôs why i cancelled my membership. as in so many aspects of life customers are being asked to pay much more for much less. didn‚Äôt think this once great company would go the same way. the future is looking bleak for puregym unless they get back to where they were pre covid.

feedback should be listened and actioned - this does not happen. for example the following should be remediated.  1- guest wifi. simply removing this from the website is not good enough when this was initially listed. wifi already exist at stratford (for staff). all the simply needs to be done is for a requested to be raised by it to add a new ssid. why is this crucial? because you get zero/poor signal which makes it impossible to load the puregym app /workout or sometimes even the barcode. not to mention ability to stream music‚Ä¶  2- not enough lockers! there is never enough lockers, they are always full. a simple fix, put an additional locker request order through as there is plenty of space to put this. it‚Äôs a real pain and you simply have to leave your belongings unsafe.  3- water dispenser another water dispenser should be added - why is there just one water dispenser for the whole gym of potentially 150+ members. another water dispenser is really required - you can spend 10 minutes queuing during peak times.  4- water dispenser pressure for some unbeknown reason the pipe for the water dispenser is 2mm! this means that water literally drip out resulting in an already bad problem (with one dispenser) getting worse! the plastic pipe simply needs to be increase to a standard 20/30mm pipe - this should have been picked up ages ago.  5- additional machine/weights there is plenty of space but not enough machines. for example back/lateral machine can have a constant queue during peak making it impossible to get on. another set of machine would fix this problem. there is plenty of space around the gym. free weight get taken to other areas (mats etc) which can be fixed by putting another set of weights in these areas. otherwise there simply isn‚Äôt enough weights especially the popular or weights of 6-14kg). there should be another rack of this.  6- toilets absolutely filthy especially during peak times. i‚Äôve spent 2 hours in the gym and these were not cleaned once during this time. there should be a cleaning schedule/rota on the door so we know when these are being cleaned and that it‚Äôs being adhered to.  7- secure cycle area. this can either be done near the front entrance or by pure gym simply raising a request via newham councils website (free).  8- communication notice board a notice board with updates from the gym should be put up so its members know what issues are raised and timescales for resolution. this will help with the overall experience.  there is plenty of positives including and otherwise clean gym, staff regularly putting an abandoned weight equipment back but more still should be done to make it better.

Review Title: It‚Äôs been quite good not impressed with‚Ä¶
Review: it‚Äôs been quite good not impressed with people being able too come off a building site and not get changed and use the equipment

Review Title: Too many groups. Not enough equipment
Review: this is not my home pure gym but i use this recently approx twice a month as regular visitor to sheffield. there is not enough equipment to cater for the amount of customers it allows in. there are too many groups of u18s using this gym and hogging the equipment meaning others cannot use it until 3-4 people have completed multiple sets. rethink capacity levels and behaviours for this gym otherwise you will lose customers. the standard of equipment is poor, most cardio machines are very old and the upstairs weights machines have variable resistance (i‚Äôm a regular gym goer and know what my level is). it‚Äôs almost as if the floor space in this gym needs to be completely rethought to best use the space. we all know that weight training is becoming increasingly popular and this gym needs to acknowledge this in provision of space and equipment. i have recently used sheffield city centre which has similar floor space but has much more modern equipment and more weights/cardio provision. one of the benefits of pure gym membership is being able to use multiple locations but the experience is not consistent and as a brand consistency of service is important.

Review Title: Have used the lisburn pure gym for‚Ä¶
Review: have used the lisburn pure gym for literally years now! arrived tonight entered my code and received a red light at the console, retried same thing again. logged into app to scan qr code same thing again!  checked email and received a email: you have received this email because pin number **** etc doesnt allow access to puregym lisburn laganbank. to change that, simply visit the kiosk or visit the website to upgrade in your members area  checked my app it states home gym is belfast st annes square (havent used this gym in about 6 years) no way to change this. no members of staff at the gym to discuss this issue.  i ve had multi gym access from the start of my membership now on the app its looking a further ¬£7 when last week i was at the same gym i cant access tonight as usual without any issues!

Review Title: The gym is okay but if it was really‚Ä¶

do not use the "free" parking!!! i have only been a member since october 2022 & have received 2 parking fines.  i appealed both online as soon as i received them - didnt hear anything back on the first one until i received a letter from a debt recovery company saying i now need to pay ¬£170!!  the second one is now with popla.  the anxiety and stress this is causing far outweighs the benefits of the gym.  as there is no receipt given when you enter your car registration you have no evidence to submit when trying to appeal!  free parking should not be advertised as a benefit for this gym.

the gym has drastically gone down hill in recent months - coincidentally since the beginning of the new manager - dereece. firstly, the gym stinks. there is a foul odour in the changing rooms and walkways. a lot of the attachments for the cables have been missing for weeks and haven‚Äôt been replaced. the hand dryer in the men‚Äôs changing room has broken for months. general mood of people in the gym is much worse than when jess was manager. i‚Äôm strongly considering leaving gyms to go elsewhere unless things start to improve.

Review Title: The staff are always on hand
Review: the staff are always on hand, the equipment is, the majority of the time working and at a good standard.

im not sure why this gym has bad rating. such a great gym, excellent ladies section with most equipment what more can you ask for? not many gyms offer womens section with good equipment, and cheap membership, so thanks for this, 5* from me.

Review Title: Cant really complain about company as i‚Ä¶
Review: cant really complain about company as i go no contract for 16.99 off peak. im using it during night time when there is still around 30 people on average at 3am, wish there were even less people than that, but thats nothing to do with pure gym as understandably they want as much money as they can get to be able to operate. only thing to improve is to have showers and locker rooms functional 24/7 rather than being shut between 3-7am.

first time going today and the trainer (i think it was matthew?) gave me the induction, very friendly and made to feel welcome as was anxious about going, the other staff seem helpful and made sure to check how i was getting on, my only issue is the fan filters on the treadmills could do with a clean, other than that it was a good experience, clean and tidy throughout

the gym is fine, it‚Äôs just the female changing rooms make me want to puke. not sure if it‚Äôs anything to do with the pipes in the showers or not but it genuinely smells like someone‚Äôs ate beans and farted. i can‚Äôt stand the smell. it‚Äôs an on going issue too.

Review Title: Whoever had the idea to trial these new‚Ä¶
Review: whoever had the idea to trial these new opening times, was the worst idea ever had by anyone ever lol

i have a personal trainer called christina fox she is so inspiring and would recommend her to anyone. she is motivational, supportive, has heart of gold and encourages you to push yourself to your goals. i also attend her extra classes e.g. sweat 30 and her own personal all womens class. she challenges us and pushes us out our comfort zone to give us a better outcome and im so appreciative of everything she does. she always replies to me asap making sure i get all the answers i need and knows how to pick me up when i have down days. pure gym wouldnt be amazing without her.

gym is great. pts and classes also great. just need to get your aircon/temperature sorted. its not fun working out when its too cold to take your sweat top off. many people are finding it too cold. you went from too warm to too cold. please can you sort the temperature out. then feedback would have been 5 starts
update wooohoooo  back to 24/7  plus a refit  very very happy. all is looking fresh and i can do anytime!  thankyou for changing the hours back much appreciated
so pleased i signed up, great equipment and staff

Review Title: Lovely gym when is not busy
Review: lovely gym when is not busy, in busy time really would need bigger changing rooms and cleaning more often. to much young kids at afternoons gathering up and taking more space they needed.
helpful, knowledgeable approachable staff. cleanliness. good equipment. larger areas with minimal waiting time for set equipment.
great gym, good classes and good online classes for doing at home which is great for me.
great music and equipment friendly atmosphere. lots of great classes clean and spacious changing rooms

Review Title: Great Yoga with Sama and Siobhan
Review: enjoy yoga with sama and siobhan. thanks so much to both
great place. well stocked, well designed, clean and fresh. busy as its popular

Review Title: Pure gym is always good vibes even if‚Ä¶
Review: pure gym is always good vibes even if your alone at the gym. i wish there was a womans area to make me more comfortable working out. the gym is quite big so i‚Äôm surprised there‚Äôs no women area
nice gym, clean, friendly and good range of equipment. pleased i joinedüòä

friendly atmosphere, plenty of space and plenty of everything. very affordable. but....this gym does need more mirrors as you are not able to form check which could lead to a injury, also no wifi for the customer but they have it for staff? i would recommend this gym.
easy to join, staff are friendly and helpful, its 24 hours and affordable.

Review Title: Guys showers need to be cleaned as they‚Ä¶
Review: guys showers need to be cleaned as they always have a really bad sewage smell when i try to take shower. overall great workout
i felt more comfortable as i was doing the machine
friendly staff and find most of the members the same. tend to go when its not going to be busy so easier to get through my workout.

Review Title: Way more than I pay for
Review: having a honest open conversation with the manager pheobe, letting her know that i feel that i get way more than i pay for , great advert by the way,  staff helpful friendly and knowledgeable, keep up the good work, p.s love bringing you and staff sweet treats to share and enjoyüç∞üç≠üç™well deserved
good space, good music, great equipment great classes
thank you. it look very nice and new and clean the stuff are friendly easy to talk to tham for anything üòÄ.

Review Title: My son attended the gym and had all of‚Ä¶
Review: my son attended the gym and had all of his items stolen within the mens changing rooms. it has come to light that he is not the only one within borehamwood gym that this has happened to. i emailed pure gym to highlight my concern to be sent a generic email back from some automated system. i find this absolutely disgraceful that my concerns about this gym and peoples pesonal property is being stolen from locked and secure lockers, plus the staff really dont care has not been taken seriously. shame on you pure gym owners. its clearly just about money and not your clients!  follow on to reply from pure gym again you obviously didnt read the post. from secure and locked lockers!

terrible. this gym doesnt compete to fire house fitness: its pointlessly spacious, the bathrooms stinks of faeces, some of the machines had a yellow mold, the weight floor had a pointlessly long half wall for no reason. there was only 6 different pieces of equipment for the weight area, most being cable machines, the shoulder machine is uncomfortable. the instructions on the shoulder machine are on the hinge that stands the chair up. the cable machines top hinge is way to short. now the cardio experience isnt as bad, but i did only use 1 machine because of the lack of quality in the weight area. the cardio bikes are just uncomfortable. they are just way too small and with a little weight it feels as if it will just fall flat on its side.  the weight machines had a weird amount of resistance, sometimes the machine would just slide up with little strength needed. even on higher weights that i shouldnt be capable of using, over time the resistance just felt weird, when using the rope for the triceps most of the resistance was putting the weight back instead of pulling it out.  i dont understand the hype, im guessing the reviews are from people that have never went to another gym, so they have no comparison, but even a home gym could do 1 better as at least you can keep it hygienic enough to not have a built-up cheese mold on a machine.  overhyped. if you want to take exercise seriously, go anywhere else.

staff are welcoming & approachable. open 24hrs so fits in around work schedule. parking directly outside of gym making it feel safer when attending outside hours. non intimidating. only negative, is too many people on equipment at peak times.
excellent place for exercise and good customer service

absolutely great gym. lovely team of staff, all so friendly, welcoming and willing to help. classes are great! wide range of classes and always availability. get started and workshops to learn how to use equipment which is very beneficial. would definitely recommend :))

i‚Äôve been using this gym for a while and the staff are very friendly and try their best to maintain the gym clean so as a public member i think it‚Äôs also our duty to return our equipment after using it.
left some headphones. went back couldn‚Äôt find them. followed instructions and contacted the gym multiples time by email and no reply.
busy most of the time full more than the actual capacity

Review Title: Loved it just gets awfully busy and‚Ä¶
Review: loved it just gets awfully busy and cant do anything other than cardio

Review Title: I've had the worst experience in THIS‚Ä¶
Review: ive had the worst experience in this puregym, which is a shame as ive been a loyal member for over 5 years now. the changing rooms are absolutely terrible and in the worst conditions, not to mention unsafe too! the towels are so dirty and the manager is frankly rude. i will defiantly be reconsidering my subscription next month.

at acton puregym spinning class, the loudest music ever i can‚Äôt even hear my own headphones, i had to leave as my ears started suffering. it‚Äôs should be a limit for the noise or have consideration for others. worst exprience ever
great gym, friendly environment, great staff.  owen is a great pt

great gym, great equipment and ive never had any issues with anyone there. everyone ive spoken to has been friendly, its a good atmosphere in general and i like training here. the only thing letting it down are the showers, there is no temperature control and all but one of them are always scalding hot which sounds petty but actually makes a huge difference to how i feel after a workout not being able to have a comfortable shower. the showers are cleaner this year but last autumn they were very dirty and smelly as well, there was a used plaster in one of the showers and i saw it several days in a row showing that they hadnt been cleaned properly in days.

Review Title: The enthusiasm that Susze Knight brings‚Ä¶
Review: the enthusiasm that susze knight brings is what‚Äôs needed .

overcrowded and messy. you spend more time looking for the plates than actually training. i visit a different puregym every week due to work and this is one of the messiest i‚Äôve seen. i get that this is basic gym etiquette but it clearly isn‚Äôt suggested here in any way. lots of cardio machines which aren‚Äôt all used . shame the weights area could do with expanding as you‚Äôre almost cueing to deadlift / find space to hipthrust. upside is people seem nice.

did a pump class at 6.15pm with megan and it was my first ever class! she was really good and very engaging with an entire class full. i would recommend her classes! it‚Äôs a shame i‚Äôm only here for business as would love to go again! thank you megan for helping with the first time nerves!
good gym, plenty of equipment. friendly atmosphere

so when are the lockers going to be repaired??  the response is obviously a generic reply and not from someone from the gym. if you are, where is the suggestion box, as i cant find one. this is brierley hill.    good gym since the refurbishment. but when are the lockers going to be repaired in the mens changing rooms? so many have broken catches and are not useable. this has got worse over the last month. not exactly secure.

Review Title: This gym is far to small for the amount‚Ä¶
Review: this gym is far to small for the amount of members it has - colchester  the last few weeks when i have been in the gym i have not been able to get on anything. i‚Äôve not been able to get a bench in the functional area, weights, a barbell or even dumbbells of the weight i need. upstairs the machines are always busy and taken and there seems to be a lot of youngsters gathering in big groups hogging equipment and it‚Äôs quite intimidating as well. this gym is far too packed for you to be able to do a full session. even going into the classes room, which is lovely, but it needs a bench and dumbbells in it.  in response to the below reply - when you work a 9-5 job it‚Äôs impossible to get to the gym during the day around peak times therefore the fact numbers fluctuate during the day does not make a difference for me as it‚Äôs simply not an option. i check the app every single time i go to the gym and i don‚Äôt think i have ever seen it been below 70 people whether it be during peak hours, non peak hours or over the weekend. this gym is simply not big enough for the amount of members it has.

Review Title: I enjoy coming to the gym and like‚Ä¶
Review: i enjoy coming to the gym and like doing the classes. hopefully when the timetable chyagain there will be more 9.15 classes that i want to do available again.
great gym, but you guys need some more kettlebells and more 1kg to 10kg dumbbells! there always a lot of competition for these!

Review Title: The facilities are always clean and‚Ä¶
Review: the facilities are always clean and well kept. staff have always been very welcoming and happy to answer any questions. you get a lot for such a small monthly fee.
such a friendly accommodating gym whose staff try very hard to please. its clean and well equipped with a good range of classes.
friendly staff, super clean and great location.

Review Title: The staff go out of the way to be as‚Ä¶
Review: the staff go out of the way to be as helpful as they can what an awesome bunch of people.

this 5-star review is all down to pt jack cardy!  he has fixed my knees when no other pt, doctor, physio or chiro could! i am pain-free and stronger than ever. he teaches/supports the importance of mental health and the huge benefits the gym gives this, as well as all-over fit for function fitness. he is totally flexible to your preference and includes huge variety in his plans so youre never bored/overly-challenged. he is friendly, approachable, knowledgeable and the best pt ive ever had. i am a qualified animal physiotherapist and i still learn from jack every week and never plan on leaving him! thanks jack!  the facilities are also clean, very well-maintained and have excellent variety. my only complaint is the hand dryer has been broken in the ladys toilets for a long time now!

Review Title: Plenty of equipment which is really‚Ä¶
Review: plenty of equipment which is really important for a gym always nice and clean, staff really kind and willing to help. i‚Äôve been to pure gym for 2 months and highly recommend.
facilities good and generally clean , only trouble is people that use the changing rooms treating them with disrespect.
clean and tidy gym with good range of equipment.

i am just appalled how you got a staff member who goes by the name christina is going into the back carpark and is smoking weed by the footpath that gym members use to walk up to the gym. it is absolute disgusting and stunk out the whole carpark with this horrible smell. this was around 11.45 on 08/02/23, there is cctv at that location and was right near the fire exit to other businesses at this park. she obviously wasn‚Äôt professional as she was wearing her work uniform  there was actually a member who walked past and had to cover his nose with his clothing. you got members that are experiencing behaviour like this! let me remind you this is a gym where people are working on bettering themselves and fitness yet you have a staff member that is abusing drugs right in front of them. is this what you call professional and a representative to your organisation? is this what pure gym stands for?  this same staff member is loud, extremely rude and has an attitude problem where she behaves like she owns the gym. at first i thought she was the gym manager, come to find out she is just a member of staff that cannot do her job properly or even behave professional as there has been many conflicts or incidents that involve her. other staff members are polite and the gym manager is actually a lovely gentlemen who is very helpful and always there to give a helping hand to members.  it is shocking you have someone like this who is actually taking drugs whilst at work and then working with people around equipment, this is a hazard to workplace as she would not be in the right state of mind. your staff should have a duty of care as you are dealing with people and gym equipment. any mistake can cause fatal injuries.  looking at previous reviews it is clear christina cannot do this job and there seems to be a reoccurring trend.  i do not recommend anyone to train with christina as firstly she does not have the right state of mind due to the influence of drugs and how can you take fitness advise of someone like this and secondly she is not professional so your wasting your money.  also you maybe contacted by the police as i spoke to an old lady who was shopping in the car park at the same time and could not believe such behaviour in broad day light. she has reported this to the police  i would suggest the manager to be notified of this behaviour and kindly ask pure gym to make sure staff members are given random blood test to ensure the safety of their gym members.

Review Title: Pure Gym is a great place to work out
Review: pure gym is a great place to work out! they have a good variety of classes with great instructors. price is reasonable, especially that it includes all the classes. im going there for a few month now about 4 times a week, and im really enjoying it :)

Review Title: AVOID: Taken advantage of and charged ¬£100 for parking
Review: after using this gym for around a year there seems to have been recent changes to parking regulations for the gym. i work out every three days or so and do long workouts so i usually spend 2.5+ hours in the gym.  i recently spent over three hours at the gym for one of my long workouts and have been given a ¬£100 fine for parking longer then 2.5 hours.  there is nowhere to purchase a ticket for longer parking and paying ¬£100 to park at the gym is absolutely inexcusable and i imagine if the gym doesnt do anything about this there will be a significant decrease in the number of people using this gym.  i will be using a different gym that doesnt charge ¬£100 pounds for parking which any reasonable person would agree is laughable, ignorant and greed fueled.  this has never happened before and at the date of this incident i didnt see any signs indicating of this parking restriction and since this wasnt always the case i didnt think to look for signs about parking since before this new "parking charge" was implemented i was able to park for free

Review Title: If you find something in the changing‚Ä¶
Review: if you find something in the changing room, dont give it to staff they keep it for themselves

great staff and great gym. good selection of equipment and fantastic staff who are friendly and more than willing to show you how to use equipment. my pt genuinely cares about my goals and helps me work towards them. manager is always visible, approachable  and not afraid to get his hands dirty.

Review Title: Overall good but one major downfall
Review: we joined pure gym just before christmas as was previously a member of 24/7 fitness when they were there. gym in terms of location and facilities is good, but very disappointed with the opening times especially at the weekend, saturday 8am to 4pm is ridiculous, sunday 10 to 4pm is no better most other gyms in wisbech and pure gyms in the area are open much longer hours some are 24 hour access. we will stick with it for a bit longer but probably will look elsewhere.

great value for money as i‚Äôve managed a ¬£14.99/month subscription as they were just about to open the crouch end branch. clases and instructors are great, equipment and availability is excellent. app works well. very happy with it
would like to see so e if the same equipment you have e in the maypole branch

mansfield gym:-  always plenty of equipment to choose from, in the main this gym is large enough for you to do whatever workout you choose, the only exception is between 5-6pm (when people go after work), then it can be a little bit crowded.  as a female i always feel safe here (which is very important), ive never seen any trouble and other users are friendly.  plus the staff are great, very helpful!  the only minor point i would make is that some people dont wipe down the equipment when they have finished.  there are cleaning stations to facilitate this.  maybe a few notices put up in the gym to remind people to give the equipment a quick clean?  only takes a few seconds.

verry nice experience, neringa give me  motivation to continue training. some weeks it is hard to stay motivated, neringa has really kept me moving. her cheerful attitude makes the training time go quickly.she is always cheerful and while she pushes hard to get us to our goals. puregym team they are verry nice people, helpfull and motivated. mihaela
great work out this morning, (at 9am with abbi) so up beat and energising! he got us all moving and grooving. definitely a great attribute  to the gym team.
24/7 makes this a great gym, as most other gyms close early, and i like to go in the middle of the night.

first time user last night, very easy to use, friendly and helpful members, good range of equipment available.  very clean
lovely gym , nice , new & clean

absolutely deluded by the management of this specific gym. i‚Äôll start static the obvious, it was a terrible decision to go from a 24/7 to a 12/7 schedule, without any notice. your users are severely effected, nobody is happy with it and it feels like a mockery. on top of this, this gym is poorly equipped and whatever gets broken then never get fixed. personal belongings get stolen. the stuff is rude and disinterested. london road‚Äôs gym feel a tad better but not great either.

Review Title: It is spotless gym and very friendly‚Ä¶

very busy, really need to go back to longer hours

great gym, great price and open 24/7

Review Title: Decent sized gym but busy at peak times‚Ä¶

Review Title: Good value for the money paid
Review: good value for the money paid. theres enough machines for every part of your body. cleanliness ‚òë

Review Title: Very disappointed by the decision to‚Ä¶
Review: very disappointed by the decision to make the gym 6-10. the whole point of being open at night is so people go when the gym is less crowded. the same would be for the early morning hours. why was this decision made it makes no sense to my. the fact that there was lower gym usage was the whole point. i will be taking my membership elsewhere until this definition is reverted.

shocking customer service! still waiting over 5 days for a reply/action! dealing over twitter/email is useless where your staff just fob us off! plus the main issue of inducing a sign up before the offer ends only to put a better offer on the next day!

Review Title: Very good equipment and the best staff‚Ä¶

Review Title: The gym classes are so much fun and‚Ä¶

been a paying member here for a few years now and wasnt expecting to be spoken to so rudely today. i went in very briefly with my little one to speak to a member of staff and got rudely stopped by an awful cover manager today. told me that i could lose my membership over popping in for a brief moment just because i had to bring my child in with me. what would you like me to do? leave her out in the cold by herself? i understand that its not a safe place for children but we were there to speak to staff very quickly. you could have been much more polite considering ive been paying and attending that gym for a long time. rude rude rude. life is way too short.. it doesnt hurt to be polite and kind!

not 24-hour !!! i can no longer go when it is quiet. went this evening and it was packed out, so unpleasant and not what i signed up for. i‚Äôll be looking for an alternative local gym. castle marina gym is of no use, i want somewhere i can walk to.

Review: due to the move from 24/7 to limited hours. truly poor

Review Title: Overall good experience at the gym in‚Ä¶

Review Title: I got to Admit the gym staff are‚Ä¶
Review: i got to admit the gym staff are freindly and very helpful and always on hand if needed, however some of the equipment is tired or needs fixing for example the deadlift platform in the gym is a health hazzard and it needs sorting out this was reported by myself 3 + months back and still not fixed yet - please sort this - i would happily give this gym 5 stars 100%

Review Title: Gym closed without notifying gym goers
Review: the equipment is relatively good, but there could be more unites of the popular equipment. a positive is that the gym is open 24/7, but a very negative (therefore only 3 stars) is that the gym is closed (like today) without notifying the gym goers.  reply: in reply to the comment given by puregym, no notifying email was received, not in my normal inbox and not in my spam inbox. i did receive other promotional emails from puregym as recently as two weeks ago. additionally at the time of the closure, no information was provided in the puregym app, it even incorrectly stated that 90 gymgoers were inside the building.

Review Title: This yoga instructor put the volume up‚Ä¶

Review Title: Same sex changing rooms pure gym no‚Ä¶
Review: same sex changing rooms pure gym no thanks

Review Title: gym is pretty good but other‚Ä¶
Review: gym is pretty good but other competitors such as the gym group have brought new boxing facilities which are more adaptable  to the population in my opinion puregym lacks in this department bringing a simple boxing bag or two would fix this issue for the general population of the gym

Review Title: Atrocious bench man what in the world‚Ä¶
Review: atrocious bench man what in the world shaky af i almost throw a 30kg dumbbell on my face it‚Äôs not just with one chair all of them. absolutely atrocious. and the opening hours. false advertisement.
andreas very helpful taking time out to help me with proper technique for weight lifting

2 exercise bikes out of order for over 2 months stench in mens changing room for over 6 clueless arrogant attitude from staff when u pass on feedback cleanliness of mens toilets bad for over 1 year congrats puregym just because you are cheap , u shouldnt give cheap thousands of members/healthyprofits suggests yet another badly run company.
love the classes. andreas is a great instructor , always really helpful, smiling and enjoys helping others üòÑ
the gym is great. the staff are always helpful and fantastic. i really enjoy the classes and the atmosphere. highly recommended

Review Title: I've not had the best experience at‚Ä¶
Review: ive not had the best experience at this gym overall but have been a member for a while because my personal trainer who is employed with them is excellent. over the weekend, my phone was stolen at the gym, i was unable to look at the cctv straight away because there was no manager on site. i emailed and no manager has gotten back to me. you cant call the gym to find out when a manager will be on shift so i have to drive down there russian roulette style to see if i get lucky.  generally the gym is understaffed, the classes get cancelled last minute, the drinks machines dont work. but, they have good pts and decent enough equipment which i think is their saving grace. after this palaver, i am leaving though.

Review Title: Too busy for the size, some have no respect for the equipment and tiktok kids literally running around
Review: gave this a try as it was a 24/7 gym and was ¬£17.99pm for 3 montha and not joining fee. however thats all thags good thing about this gym. now for the negative, during staffed hours its way too busy, you end up waiting for machines as there‚Äôs too many people due to the cheap price, 160 people at one point. when there‚Äôs only one machine for certain workouts, you wait longer for it then you spend it. when the unstaffed hours start however it starts to slow down. until that is, the spoilt groups of teenagers start appearing between 11pm and 1am. what do they do? play hide and seek and chase each other around between the machines. using the equipment like pillocks as they saw another pillock on tiktok. along with the people that just don‚Äôt care about the equipment, leaving weights and benches on the other end of the gym.  in summary, it‚Äôs great if you go late at night if you don‚Äôt mind tiktok kids treating it like a playground and searching for the equipment you need to use.

Review Title: I used to go to this gym every day
Review: i used to go to this gym every day, it was my second home, but unfortunately the opening hours has been changed , sadly it‚Äôs not 24 hours anymore. the gym now is closing at 10pm which is the time i finish work , i can‚Äôt use the one in london road because of the safety , i don‚Äôt feel safe to park my car there.  unfortunately i‚Äôm going to change this gym just because of the time as many people did, will i don‚Äôt like to but i have to .
super aggressive / threatening pt, followed me across the gym because i didnt get out of his way quickly enough.
great new addition. plenty of squat racks. open plan and spacious.  minor quibble with puregym: they seem to prefer the concept bike to the assault bike. that‚Äôs a minor quibble though.

Review Title: No longer open at the time I can go
Review: very poor decision for puregym to remove 24/7 opening gym, (its one of the main reason i joined). and the reason they provided is illogical. if its not busy during the times they say, why does it open even later and closer earlier? make this make sense.

Review Title: I paid for my membership last night and‚Ä¶
Review: i paid for my membership last night and i woke up at 6:30 am to go to the gym and was surprised the gym was closed till ....... who knows
excellent services received by the manager james helped activate my new key fob to access the yeovil gym.  thank you  joe curland

ive been to most of the pure gyms in london and stratford pure gym with ilford ranks up top in my opinion.  on the plus side its big, all modern and fully equipped. convenient and easy access. thankfully so far, people are respectful enough to not leave weights and equipment lying about. i hope management remains strict and on top of this. equipment all over the place is untidy, a hazard, and it becomes annoying to try and find kit if its not in its proper place. theres enough free weights and machines here so that you can always find some time to work on without downtime. but obviously if you work out at busier times your experience may vary.  some minor issues. another previously has already covered cleaning stations, there are none, would be useful. ive spotted people come into the toilets and wrap toilet paper in their hand and use that, obviously making a mess, so some paper towels and gel would be helpful to everyone. the studio at the back is a wi-fi dead zone. its a pity that puregym doesnt provide wifi, but if youre on your phone and trying to track your workout or download some music, walking into the studio in the back means you cant connect to network, so you have to walk back out again to try and connect. a minor annoyance.  lastly, because its all open plan, there not any areas to work on kettlebells or dumbbells that arent enclosed. not everyone feels comfortable working out, in front of everyone. if youre the kind of person that wants to do your thing in your own little corner, youre out of luck. the other day i wanted to work out with kettlebells and went into the studio, but had to leave because a class was starting. i then went onto the main floor and had to move again because a circuit class was starting.  again, just minor issues, i can live with it and hopefully some workarounds or solutions can be found. overall a great gym.

Review Title: Awesome gym, with a great environment :)
Review: the location is great, easily accessible via public transport or car. the machines available are good and are maintained/replaced if and when needed. good range of classes available at different times on different days. staff are helpful and enthusiastic with any questions asked of them. pt‚Äôs are also awesome, with incredible knowledge on different workouts/nutrition to meet whatever goals you have.  it‚Äôs definitely one of the most welcoming gyms i‚Äôve been to and i‚Äôm definitely happy with it.  thank you pg staff for getting me back on the right track again üíö

Review Title: Nice gym but still no cleaning stations‚Ä¶
Review: the gym is new and beautiful but, after one month since it opened, there are still no cleaning stations yet. its also written in their rules, specifically on rule number 13 of puregym. ill give them 5 stars when this important hygiene issue will be solved because the people who work there are very nice and professional.

Review Title: A gym full of potential if it had the‚Ä¶
Review: a gym full of potential if it had the right team to manage it. went to the gym two saturdays in a row, now, and most rowers had no batteries. ridiculous. constantly, machines are broken in this gym, which makes me lose time and make my life difficult as i cant really follow my program properly. the only reason im still coming is because is close to my house but given the time im wasting waiting for the non broken machines, or reprogramming my session, i might as well join a further away one. they simply dont care about anything else but the numbers. stay away if you can.

i love the gym, good equipment,it is a pity that there is no seated leg curl, back extension machineand,aura rotary torso and steppers, also i dont like the cross trainers next to the main entry and is extremely cold, i thing should be more then one water station, and is no wi-fi

considering the ammount of people complaining about the new opening times, this seems like a simple thing to change back? or at least open a lot earlier then what is currently being offered? makes no sense to not be 24/7, this was literally your main selling point. plus, the main reason for changing was the underused gym at night. 1. people are complaining about this change, so it was used. 2. so you want everyone to go into a crowded gym at peak times? so nobody really gets to enjoy it? just change back, or change to say 4am opening 12am closing. what you have done makes no sense at all.
great new gym. classes well run by knowledgeable and helpful teachers, if a little crowded for the space.  be great to have pilates and or yoga added too
the gym has been smelling so bad recently. such a strong and disgusting odour which does not go, the gym really needs an ac or just something to help with the smell. makes me want to vomit!!

as an amputee i sometimes struggle going to new places and i know the gym can seem quite daunting. mel the manager met me at the entrance and instantly made me feel at ease. the other staff members are also very friendly and more than approachable, and are always happy to help with a smile. the gym is well equipped and even in my wheelchair there is plenty of space to move around. the disabled shower room and toilet are also roomy enough for most with access needs to maneuver around. highly recommended.

pure gym!!! eevsham- always full, no space or enough equipment to work, instructors and personal trainers not lasting longer than two months. had premium membership as i travel for work. even paying extra i couldnt access all gyms in other locations. they asked me to upgrade my membership to an even higher one. i have frozen my membership in august last year and asked them to cancel my membership. in november realized they have been charging me every month. asked for a refund as i didnt visit the gym once in the last 4 months - they refused. in january realised they still been charging me for the gym even after i asked twice to cancel my membership. i had to call my bank to stop them from taking money off my account. never again. schamy on you puregym

Review Title: Not quite sure what‚Äôs happening with‚Ä¶
Review: not quite sure what‚Äôs happening with the cleaners but i was in the gym just before 5am today and the gym was filthy, black bags under the stairs, rubbish everywhere, the studio back doors left open where anyone could walk in from the back. absolutely terrible. quite shocking really and i‚Äôve been at beckton for 2 years and never seen it so bad

never did i think i would say this about a gym but i literally love this place. the staff are awesome, kelly is a fab personal trainer, she had pushed me to be able to do things i never thought i would achieve and been a massive part of my weightloss journey which is currently at 3.5 stone. classes are great, brilliant energy from all of the staff with the great recent addition of joe, who is a super laugh and really encouraging. ive made some amazing friends here, the equipment is usually in good working order and if something does need some repair, it is attended to quickly. it is never so busy that you cant complete a workout, but i like the app feature that lets you check how many people are at the gym before you attend. nice job guys.

puregym in oxford templars is an exceptional place to workout. it is proficiently well taken care of; from the regular maintenance of equipment and spaces, to the meticulous cleanliness promoted at every instance.  many gyms in ones local area may boast state of the art equipment and low prices, however very few are able to provide a welcoming, encouraging environment conducive to a good workout. puregym in oxford templars, is among those few. staff are both patient and passionate when attending to members, with no task or query being too trivial. particularly of note is chris ntezi, who has been kind, inspiring, and informative in my every meeting with him. i have learnt a great deal and would not be where i am without his aid. my experiences with other staff members have been congruent to this.  i cannot recommend this gym enough. the only regret for those singing up, is that they wish they had done it sooner.

i love this new gym! it is huge, so you dont feel crowded. there are plenty of machines, so the work out is always pleasant. no need to wait around. the personnel is amazing as well. big thanks to gm daniel giratta and assist.gm george theodosiou as well as maxime delacour and alina neamt.

the gym is new, all the machines are there, but the water tap and sink in the mens bathroom, there is no much space between the tap, and the bottom of the sink, so to wash your hands you touch the bottom of the sink, and that is no good, the other thing is, the entrance door to the  mens bathroom, close 12am and only opens 3am automatically, now tell me, how can one use the toilet in those 3 hours??? also there is no one  to help you there from 10pm, and there is no paper towels around, to clean the machine after the other person has used.

great classes, instructors are really engaging and motivating, everyone in the classes have been really friendly which is amazing. the facilities are excellent, it does get busy so i just check the app and work around it however i‚Äôve never had any issues not being able to access equipment even in busy times. price is great too
lovely staff, so friendly and approachable. great classes, great equipment
amazing gym, love the staff, the classes and the equipment.

the gym is large and is equipped with a good range of equipment. the entrance system is easy to navigate. the whole place was very clean. the only let down for me was that the changing room is very small and the gym was far too warm.

Review Title: great gym very clean and humble staff‚Ä¶
Review: great gym very clean and humble staff including james he is great pt and shown me how to deliver all the exercise correctly and safely

Review Title: The gym is super clean and new.
Review: the gym is super clean and always fresh-smelling. just be careful not to come in at the peak times because it can be full but even then you can still use most of the equipments.

Review Title: For being a budget gym it's really‚Ä¶
Review: for being a budget gym its really huge, three floors, a star trek holodeck like virtual studio. most of the machine you may need and some extra functional areas. clean and nice locker rooms. even though im a very needy gym goes (need rings, a proper real high bar etc) i was very surprised. not a 5 star because the locker room door will be locked between midnight and 3am so no bathroom -the only one outside was out of order- and its not clear what would happen after door gets locked. what happens if i get in at 11pm and i forget about that? shall i wait four hours in order to go back to my locker? what happens if i am inside the locker when the door is shut?

Review Title: Good quality equipments and lots of‚Ä¶
Review: good quality equipments and lots of space
great equipment, helpful staff and atmosphere for a great price. this was my first impression earlier.
been with pure gym since they open, free car park, easy to access

Review Title: I had a piecfull work out at pure gym‚Ä¶
Review: i had a piecfull work out at pure gym catford and ive been a there for opening day and it was a good work out experience the staff are welcoming
wonderful experience, great size gym and lots of equipment

Review Title: I would have given this gym a 5‚Ä¶
Review: i would have given this gym a 5 previously (been coming here about 4 years). it used to be the less rough/noisy/intimidating sister to london greenwich, the staff used to be so friendly & upstairs there was not loud music blaring. yeah those days are gone. i was there this evening the music was unbearably loud upstairs, last week there was a young man rapping at the top of his voice the whole time i was in there ( i could hear him clearly through noise cancelling headphones) and the assistant said not one word to him. theres so many things wrong that im cancelling. such a disappointment its become like london greenwich which is frightful.
always enjoy my visits to the gym & especially the classes with hannah!
great value for money a variety of classes running all day professional & experienced trainers very friendly atmosphere.

very well put together gym, plenty of options available so easy to cater for any workout. staff are polite, friendly and seem to be on top of hygiene issues. can get busy and skeptical if it sticks within h&s requirements at these times but no problems as of yet.

really pleased with the new gym at the carlton centre, lincoln. nicole is a great instructor and i always thoroughly enjoy her classes. tonight, an external instructor unfortunately didn‚Äôt turn up, so she stepped in and taught a class so everyone hadn‚Äôt had a wasted journey, meaning she taught 3 classes back to back. she‚Äôs also stepped in on a weekend when another instructor wasn‚Äôt able to turn up. she‚Äôs an asset to this gym!

Review Title: Great gym but toilets always really‚Ä¶
Review: great gym but toilets always really dirty.

an amazing gym!  toilets, showers and changing always bleached clean which i am a huge fan of.  gym is always tidy as the staff are constantly putting back equipment people leave out.  friendly atmosphere with a wide age range.  plenty of equipment meaning that even in peak times there is something to use or go on.  it‚Äôs a big gym so when you are not feeling confident or want some space there is always somewhere you can tuck yourself away. allowing you to do a workout on the app or go solo

the gym is longer 24/7 anymore. this was the only reason i choose this gym! they opened access to limehouse branch but i was declined to enter on 30/01 and got a message this gym isnt available to me.

have been going to puregym for over a year now. recently added the london wall gym to my membership and its brilliant. well maintained and a lovely team running the gym. so nice to do my workouts there.

the location is excellent, its very well equipped and the staff are present, but not in any way pushy. it gets busy between 12-1.45pm and 5pm to 6.45pm monday to friday. usually outside of these times you only queue for the flat bench! this will be a successful branch and i fully expect it to double in size within the next 18 months.
since charlie has been here there‚Äôs been amazing improvements, new machine, great pts and friendly mangers..

Review Title: your still taking my money tried so‚Ä¶
Review: your still taking my money tried so long unsubscribe you all d

Review Title: I wish I'd read the reviews‚Ä¶
Review: i wish id read the reviews before i signed up for a gym membership here as i certainly would have thought again. as others have said its all set up for body-building with only three exercise bikes, and all of very poor quality. most of the classes are all about weights too, and theres no spin classes which is important for me -  although there are a couple of very nice spin bikes on the gym floor and the puregym app has some great spin video workouts you could use - if only there was good wifi in the gym like you do get in other puregyms. all the cross-training machines are right next to each other - this is far too close and i think i may have caught covid from the man next to me who was coughing a lot. in the world we live in, nobody wants to exercise on top of strangers. as a semi-professional athlete any cold or virus can have devastating consequences for my training. as others have said, the male cleaner walking in and out of the open plan female changing room is a terrible idea - its feels creepy, and uncomfortable and i had to take to changing and showering at home before and after they gym. in addition, they advertise free parking, but two and a bit hours just isnt long enough for a good workout....

arrived 5.35am to access gym as advertised 24 hour all website and across all marketing. waited and waited and informed at 5.55 by staff member that gym doesnt open until 6am. pretty poor considering all pure gyms are 24 hours and nothing mentioned across any media

Review Title: BEWARE! DANGEROUS GYM AND NOT A SAFE GYM FOR WOMEN  STAFF MEMBERS WILL GET AWAY WITH TOUCHING/ GROPING  WOMEN INAPPROPRIATELY AND DOING CLASSES DRUNK BUT NO ACTION WILL BE TAKEN  AT BLACKBURN PUREGYM
Review: i would not recommend this gym to anyone. staff members will speak to you rudely and treat you like rubbish, never  any words of encouragement during classes from them. they will make you feel uncomfortable and isolated in class, and ignored, like you dont exist, and wont treat you equally, so you stop attending them, then they wont have to carry out the class. male staff members will come to work drunk, touch women inappropriately, and threaten members, but no action will be taken against them, instead members will get punished. one particular staff member, who acts like shes a diva, will constantly go on her phone, look in the mirror, continue talking to gym members during classes. when you complain to head of members  ceo  and md  theyll just make an excuse and try to fob you off by stating, theyre just having personel issues. so theyre allowed to bring their personel issues to work and take it out on gym members!. theyll also blame you and state, youre overthinking it. no point complaining because they wont believe you. gym staff members werent adhering to the rules and slacking. they were cancelling classes constantly at short notice, when youve made an effort to travel to the gym.  they werent even prepared to do classes for either 2/3 people. its just beyond a joke!. head of member, ceo  and md, dont give a damn about gym members and wont take your complaint seriously, or consider this a serious matter, despite members complaining to gym manager, about their concerns regarding this serious matter with male staff members touching womens buttocks and two gym members providing statements to head of member. a lot of members left puregym after this incident. head of member will respond by stating their behaviour is nothing personel, when it is!. this is the reason  i was afraid to complain, and wanted to remain anonymous, because  staff members will take revenge when you complain about them, because theyre not happy being forced to do the classes and remain angry during classes, and cant even be bothered to carry out the class properly. theyll treat you nastily in class, and  speak to you rudely and single you out.  theyre aware they can get away with it no action will be taken, so will continue doing this. no wonder the classes are always empty, with this kind of behaviour and attitude from staff members. head of member must be delusional if she thinks this is the busiest gym. the bikes in the spin studeo are never in  working order, you have to keep switching bikes, its very disruptive during a class. management cant  be bothered getting the bikes repaired until a complaint is made. theyll cancel classes, so they can have their private pt sessions, to earn more money rather than do a class. ive been told theyre investigating, and footages have been checked by regional manager, but theres nothing out of the ordinary.  theyve not bothered to check the footage  properly or fobbing me off as usual. the regional manager is useless. he didnt have a clue that  staff were breaking rules, including managers. md ceo will never take action against puregym staff only members. staff member would get away even if male staff members raped a gym member. ceo head of members  and md  condone this kind of behaviour because they cant find staff, everyone keeps leaving and theyre already short staffed. worst gym in blackburn. disgraceful/zero customer service. ladies beware! not a safe gym for women because if a puregym staff groped you, you wont get justice.  the groper/drunk, is still in the gym. if you complain, your complaint wont be taken seriously or your membership will be terminated, if footage is checked, they wont find anything. puregym cant even afford  extra staff or to repair the microphone, bikes, and ac, which is never in working order, but happy to take your money. unprofessional staff, slapper whose bad mouthing me to a gym member, when boyfriend cheated and got her pregnant, she came crying to me. they were  bad mouthing another gym member on how bad he smells. when head of member found out staff wernt following rules, her response was, it happens, it shouldnt happen, then members wouldnt have to complain! lazy, rude, unprofessional staff who cant be bothered /interested in doing the classes properly. worst gym in blackburn. staff members dont comply with the rules, so are capable of any thing. theyll never get rid of staff. members get slagged off. if you complain about a staff theyll take it personally, and will misbehave in class. they wont show you any empathy. gym is a shambles going down hill its a toxic environment where your mental health will be affected.  dangerous rubbish stingy gym and not value for money. caren anderton sonya others r paid by puregym to write fake 5 star reviews for them.

i have been a member for several months now. i have been weight training for many years. the gym is always very clean and the equipment is well maintained. if something breaks its usually mended pretty quickly. i like the way members respect each others space and keep the training areas tidy. it always feels a safe friendly space, where you are free to carry out your own routines in your own time.

Review Title: The gym offers free parking- NOT true
Review: the gym offers free parking, but twice in 10 days my voucher from the gym has been invalid on the paying machines and i‚Äôve had to pay ¬£1.70. also, the gym has no wi-fi unlike the old one. finally, the treadmills are infront of the window so everyone walks past and stares in, very uncomfortable i‚Äôll be moving gyms.

the change away from 24/7 is insane, the gym is not poorly equipped exactly, but the quality isnt great, lights, plumbing, cleanliness are all relatively poor. in summer it gets incredibly stuffy.  all this is forgivable to me if not for the fact they took away 24/7 access.  i signed up to this gym specifically because of the 24/7 aspect, i work in hospitality and its the same story for the guys i work with. i cannot go to the gym on the weekend now, and the times i can go in the week its so packed its not worth it at all. i wouldnt pay ¬£5 a month for this. i am cancelling my subscription.

i cannot give them 1 star. absolutely disgusting. dirty, full (on a normal tuesday was showing 199 people) i mean cmoooon!!!! that‚Äôs outrageous. no equipment free at no point except weekends. boys, teenagers take over all equipment and do f*** all, they are allowed to wear office shirts and trousers, including office shoes while working out. nobody ever pays attention. you could die in there and no member of staff would realise. it‚Äôs too full to see if someone ever needs helps. just today was trying to fill out my water bottle and saw a piece of chewing gum spit in the water tank. really? bathrooms are filthy. gym just opened and machines are already damaged and faulty. no thank you.

second week at this gym and my locker was broken into. they stole my phone and tried accessing my bank accounts. luckily the thieves are dumb. won‚Äôt be stepping foot into that gym. avoid at all costs.  edit after response: your terms don‚Äôt change the fact that you have thieves roaming around. moreover, i wasn‚Äôt asking for anything. this review is to let others know and be cautious. thanks.
great gym, clean and friendly. legs bums n tums today was the best class of its type i have done! instructor was top man üòÅ

doesnt even deserve a star, joined here last week, every day went in the gym is busier than the shop. couldnt move couldnt get on anything. really needs to have a limit on how many allowed in per time unbelievable, canceled membership

got a ticket at the crown wharf car park after joining this pure gym because the parking code i used was invalid. even tried two codes and both were invalid - this was at10:30pm so there were no staff who could assist.  avoid this gym if you train late because you will end up with a parking ticket either because the code they will give you will be invalid or the machine that prints the code will be playing up.  edit - i have spoken to one of the staff at puregym and they have advised they will provide evidence of my parking times which should resolve the parking fine. if this is the case then i will gladly change my review but until then, the parking situation is making it difficult to recommend training here. edit 2 - still 2 months later i am still being harassed by the parking company even with evidence i was using the gym and the parking codes were invalid. puregym has been absolutely no help what so ever, even though they clearly have the power to cancel my ticket.  on top of that the gym facilities are actually awful.

as you could see members are utterly dismayed by the unprecedented change in closing time . we choose this gym because of its location and 24hr opening time conferring degree of flexibilities . how the management dealt with the issue is not the best approach even at corporate level . not much notice just a blatant note on social media. that‚Äôs how they value their members. i don‚Äôt think they care if you switch to a different gym. it‚Äôs far from perfect the state of the gym to start with but the new announcement is  just taking the p&¬£s to the max. the management cited saving electricity and manpower as among the issues they faced with low usage during those hours .. well check with other puregym across the country i‚Äôm sure they are no different. i train at puregym all over the country because of work .. never heard their closing time changed  .. perhaps you should try harder promoting your gym to the local community to boost your members‚Äô numbers rather then neglecting it with a  lack-lustrous upkeep  that doesn‚Äôt do existing members any justice at all . oh yes why not go to puregym london road .. you must be kidding .. the gym is a war zone .. wooden panelled ceiling with leaking water with condensation over the mirror  opposite the weights area you can‚Äôt see a thing you may even forget how you look like after 10 minutes . full of juvenile trigger happy kids who used it as their playground and social hub . the area is not central or  very safe at night with notable undesirable characters on the prowl . inside it‚Äôs a definite health hazard.. if the health inspector paid a visit it won‚Äôt pass the health and safety test to operate. the pungent smell of damp that filled the air is enough to intoxicate anyone . worst of all members still paid the same amount despite the changed closing time .  no word of apologies no corporate incentive for members to stay‚Ä¶even the responses on trustpilot are generic  cut and paste ..  might as well close the gym at brighton central it‚Äôs easier .the staffs are excellent in general  including the managers but they are powerless against  the higher managerial decision. they had to endure all the disgruntled members rebuke as you could imagine but in general they are awesome. they had been a petition circulating around i think someone is writing to the local mp and the local newspaper about this . it‚Äôs time the management listen and value it‚Äôs members .. why not open till 12am week days and later during the weekend ? it‚Äôs time to listen .. we love this gym it‚Äôs far from perfect but we make it perfect as our home gym over the years . your kind consideration is much appreciated.

Review Title: Not for regular gym goers, just iron pumpers
Review: i normally go to puregyms at home in the midlands  and they are fantastic value for money, with great no frills facilities. i visited this gym whilst on a long work trip in the area and wasnt impressed. its not a proper puregym as its mostly just weights with very little cardio equipment. for this reason, it seems like whoever set it up has only had experience of small seedy gyms that cater to iron pumping, and gym candy users rather than bigger more commercial gyms that are targeted to regular members of the public. towards the end of my trip i went to try the uni of bangor gym, which was much better and let me just do pay as you go.

Review Title: Disappointed by timing change - Beeston PureGym
